content: I completely love this game! I maxed out everything in the 3rd hotel, even though all scuba gear said 0% towards my next star, it still gave me the 5th star. The 4th hotel shows 0% on the disco facility too. As a side note, the game is painfully slow without taking advantage of ads, and full of moments where there's no where near enough money for even the most basic items.

I've enjoyed a lot of titles from this developer but the monetization is getting worse and worse. It's always been pretty heavy, but this is ridiculous. Especially only getting 10 minutes of 2x per ad (usually just under a minute long)... If you have more patience than me, by the time you've watched enough for 2 hours, you need to watch an extra ad to top it up to a full bar! Very excessive.

The game is great. Can easily spend time on it. But to make it less annoying you will have to pay a small amount to get rid of the ads otherwise it becomes very annoying. Another things that can be looked at is the logistics. Some services the guests have to spend at least 30 mins to reach and hence most of them don't reach on time. The event hotels the Housekeeping keeps on zigzagging due to the room numbering system leading to unnecessary rooms not clean messages.

I really like the game. It's a bit challenging to manage the money, but all over it's great. Some feedback: 1) the couple doesn't sit together to eat 2) the ad placement avoids the notch area and leaves it empty 3) the status bar for money is coming under the notch bar 4) guests go all the way to the exit and then come back to the front desk while checking out

It's a very good game! It haves a pretty high and interesting stuff, it is one lf the best tycoons, it's pretty good and it got most of the best things that other's don't have, The only problem i see is the high price for upgrading the Main Generator, and the batteries, which is very powerful but still, it doesn't even cover like enough upgrades to get a good price for the room. Well, this game is still very good and haves every property that could even get this to the best. tycoon. game. ever.

It's unique. This is the first hotel tycoon game I've seen with such unique graphics. It looks good, it feels good. It's awesome! However, i do have a complaint about the sensitivity, the game doesn't respond to my touches/taps sometimes when im in a room, if i press the left/right arrows the game suddenly doesn't recognize any input. If you could fix that, that would be great!

Simple but fun game, watching ads is completely your choice, no annoying popups occur. It's very satisfying to upgrade everything in your hotels, and it's playable without spending any money (I personally think that 11_ for all-time ads-free bonuses would be a bit expensive though). And the support is THE fastest support I've ever encountered. Not even a minute later I had all the answers to my problem. Keep up the good work! ____ Edit: Santa's shelter seems a bit lazy (just a bigger Codinental)

A fun game, I understand the issues with ads but it's better than most games of its kind. I've seen way worse. I did buy no ads and it's worked so far. Each hotel presents more of a challenge and more effort. which is fair. It does take a lot to get started. Though a tip. If you buy no ads you can boost your double money without watching an ad for it. which really helps.

The game is very unbalanced. Watching ads gives much more money than playing, so to move forward you pretty much only need to watch ads. Everything else you upgrade is pointless. If you don't watch ads , progress is unreasonably slow. The ads are too intrusive in terms of the playing experience too. Every two minute or so there's a loud sound and a guy start dancing in your hotel's lobby, until you either watch the ad or dismiss it.

Really enjoyed it up until unlocking the last hotel. The design seemed rushed and not well thought out. The layout is messy, cluttered and not appealing. I paid for stars that I used and upon reopening the game, the items I purchased had disappeared and the stars were not returned. Disappointed that this is the culmination of my time and money.

This is the first time I've ever played a game and caught up to the developers. I love that we have the option to pay a one time cost and remove all ads. I love to support the developers and that way I'm not constantly buying small upgrades... Tedious. Love this game. Brilliant, and super cute. I love watching the people roam the hotel and use the various facilities there! The animations are great.

Wow, this game is so much fun! Its so addicting. It is so easy to get lots of money in this game, all you do is ask the dancing king! I think thats halarious __. You also get money while offline, thats actually a really great perm. The animation in the game,in my opinion is really nice, well, other than you can kind of see the private areas.__ ITS NOT THAT BAD...Its also really cool that you can get different hotels and fully upgrade them all. Download this app! You won't regret it!

Pretty terrible. Seen a review saying you dont have to watch the ads, but... you do. The point of the game is watching ads, you can't play without unless you want to sit for hours watching nothing happen. It could have been made into an awesome game, but I didnt expect an ad suggestion every five minutes that if I don't accept a 30 second video I will start losing :') So cheap and awful....

If you want a game that is as realistic as can be expected, then this is it! I've had nothing but fun challenges here. The graphics are excellent, the ads frequency are tolerable and become an acceptable routine. Having been in hotel management, this is a great primer for promotability. A few speed and music glitches here and there in upper levels but they work themselves out. Be patient. This game gets my highest rating ever! The music stays in your head all day! It's the greatest.

Ads issue. The game is nice and addictive. I like it. But like any other f2p games, you need you watch ads. Which is fine I understand. The problem is this: you watch the ads but you don't get the reward. It happened a lot of times, imagine waiting for a 20-30second ad to get a reward. And you don't get it.that is so frustrating. And when you contact the the customer support they tell you it's internet connection. Sure ..

Love the game, but the latest update has meant that I can't play the game in an enjoyable way anymore. I can watch one video and then it goes into a permanent loading cycle for all other videos until I restart the game, and then repeat. ***as of 9th of May 2021 this issue is STILL happening. It STILL always seems to tie in with when events are happening.***

I actually really enjoy this game. I h aven't encountered any issues add off yet. My only suggestion is earnings for all hotels should be combined into one 'account,' so when working on other hotels we can use that money. My first hotel is all updated but I still make money off of it and have no use for it. Anyways, keep up the great work!

I like the game. I like the style and graphics. Game play is fun and challenging as you progress in unlocking the different hotels. I do hope more hotels will be added. I'm on the 2nd to last one. One request if it is at possible. When upgrading certain areas mainly bedrooms. An upgrade ALL button would be nice. It would work if you had enough money to completely upgrade everything in the room. Similar to how the manager informs you to build a room as you have enough money.
I maxed all hotels, haven't been on in a month and just checked to see if there was a new hotel.. nope, but Little Camelot got reset for the 3rd time on me now... I'm done.

The best game ever in my life keep it up!!! There are a lot of things to do. Great graphics. But I wish that there were more problems or events like different types of food, running out of food or water, theives, costumers who would pay more and different types of things to clean in the rooms. Overall, best idle game ever!

I actually enjoy the game quite a bit. Graphics are decent and it is good fun expanding and improving your hotel. I also love the little comedy bits (maid face down on sofa).There are loads of ads but they are optional, you are not forced to watch them if you choose not to. I usually hate games with too many ads, but I actually watched a lot of these because I wanted piles of extra cash to expand my hotel faster. I have again caught up to the developers, so am eagerly awaiting the next update.

It's pretty much impossible to make any progress without watching copious numbers of adverts - and over ¡ê10 for an advert-free version is daylight robbery. They're technically optional but if you want to achieve anything in a reasonable amount of time, you need that extra cash boost - especially because it's not a true idle game. You can have a full hotel, switch to another app, come back a few seconds later and your hotel is half empty. It doesn't properly simulate running in the background.

This is a wonderful game. Unlike all other idle games, the prices and income are fair and equal. Quite addictive and very satisfying to see the objects go from level one to 10. Also, almost no compulsory ads, and premium is not required to play in the slightest. This investor guy swings in every so often if you're running low on cash, offering an ad in exchange for a bunch of money. One thing for improvement; Please could we have a way to transfer funds from one hotel to another? Install btw!!!

The game was good in the beginning but then it started not giving me my bonus rewards after I watched the videos. Actually, when I pressed the video tab it played for a short second then went back to the game with no reward, that sucks cause my reward was $10,500 which would have helped my balance a lot!!! I'm afraid this game doesn't deserve any stars until this gets fixed. Also, I tried to post this without giving it a star and it wouldn't let me. Sad!

Don't be fooled about the lego-like graphics... this is really addictive!! Simple yet entertaining! A great way to get the basics of management. I just noticed that there is a bug with the housekeepers. Sometimes they get stuck (or hung up) and ends up not cleaning the room, then the option to clean all rooms for an ad pops up. But when you try to refresh the game, it all goes back to normal. Fix that, and I guess I could give a 5 star. __

I LOVE this game, the gameplay is super fun and allows me to relax when I am tense. Its not one of those easy games and requires strategey which I love. It hardly has any pop-up ads and there are only ads when you want a reward. The only reason why it is not 5-star is beacause it is slow in the beginning and if you want to grow fast you have to pay SO much money. Overall it is a great game and I recommened it to anybody who sees this post (if they like strategy games).

I enjoyed playing the game. Now that I have completed all levels ie all hotels. I don't know what to do except to uninstall. I did not mind add once in a while but there were too much. Also allow money earned from one hotel to be used in another. Plus there is no way we can customise, I feel we just have to see and click. Nothing else. Give us option to design our own hotel, in our own way, what facilities. That would have been much fun. Some activities to earn cash. There is no task I feel.

I love this simple game. Just enough to do that I can play while watching tv and it's not distracting. The event hotels are a nice wee addition. I don't mind the ads, it all helps the game along, but I have a major issue with 45 second + ads. Other ads can be as short as 15 seconds, but all I seem to get now are the long 45 seconds. There is no option to cut the ad short. This is reducing my rating and enjoyment of the game. 45 second ads are ridiculous!

It's a pretty decent game. It's real fun and addictive. It, however becomes so repetitive as you move on to another level. It's not much of an idle game because you have to check on it every 2hrs (unless of course you avail the VIP). It would be better if you have like a drone view option to view the overall activities in the hotel. Lastly, profit from the previous hotels should be used for the developing ones, otherwise it's useless.

I enjoy the game, but I have 2 suggestions for a near-future update, both based on the fact that once a hotel becomes 5 stars, it generates money but there's nothing else to spend it on (at least, nothing that I've found). I think it would be nice to be able to exchange game money for diamonds (as opposed to just real money), and transfer money from one hotel to another. I like the separation between hotel money instead of having 1 big money pot for all hotels, but I wish I could transfer money.

I really liked this game at first but I agree with other critical reviews that ads disrupt gameplay. At first I didn't mind but once I got to the second hotel it was really disappointing that I couldn't use ANY profits or anything to make the new level easier..... it felt like there was no point in the first hotel existing. Even if I did spend the $10 I can tell the game would be completed in a few levels. Boring.

I like some of the bug fixes. The game us still buggy. Ad crashes throw you out. By the way, the 1 minute 4 and 3 spot ads are really awful and way too long. It may be a deal breaker for me. Update: The bug fixes earned the full 5 stars. It really is fun now. I would love some new hotels to build. Fine job.

Cute game. I loved the graphics and music, but most of the gameplay consisted of watching ads. The game was built in a way to forced you to watch ads. Unless you want to just sit there and watch your money deplete and your staff walk out on you, you watch the ads to boost your earnings. On top of that, there's no offline play. Overall, Hotel Empire Tycoon is a cute game to play when you have access to internet, time to kill, and don't mind watching ads for extended periods of time.

This is the best Codigames title yet! I've played pretty much all of them for several hours as I'm an idle game addict but I can't seem to put this one down at all. It has the most to do, the coolest progression, and the smoothest gameplay of any title in this series. I check this page every day to find out when the next hotel is released, and I can't wait to see what you guys have planned next!

Delightful and frustrating in equal measure. If you don't pay ¡ê10.49 to remove ads this game will drive you insane. The ads themselves are lowest of the low, awful misleading ads for games you just want to avoid. Some are over 40 seconds long! You're not given the option to skip ads which is pretty condescending. I paid to remove them for my own sanity. The game itself is good fun, well made, has some nice touches etc. Quicker methods of upgrading would be nice, and more affordable add-ons.

It's actually really fun, not like a lot of the money grab games you see now and days. It looks really pleasing and plays nicely. It's also got an ending objective. I oike jow your full on given an option to not see any ads, the only time I've run into them is if I wanted something from the game. The only real issue is it can get boring sometimes, and I would like if there were many more character models. Great game guys!

Game is good overall and it's different from what you guys made so far, BUT greed for money has to stop. Balance is just awful, at the beginning you can't make any money but only watching video ads to get cash from VIP. This sucks on so many levels...even though I managed to survive to next hotel after watching like 300+ ads.... this is just crazy guys....You need to do a better job on balance or you'll keep getting bad reviews like this one

I really enjoy this game and I love it a lot but there are quite a few issues I've run into which have caused me to give this game a 3 star rating instead of a 5 star. After you complete the tutorial portion of the game, the in-game character that is meant to help and advise you becomes absolutely useless. There's no help button or anything to help you in case you get stuck or have misunderstood something. When I opened up my second hotel it told me to keep working on my first to earn money for my second. However, you can't move funds between your hotels so I was lost for quite a long time trying to figure out how to do this when it's not possible. Many times the ads will take me to their download page and when I return to the game it restarts and I lose the reward. I've also been told that I've earned gems through watching ads but no gems were added to my balance. Sometimes ads won't even load or I'll click to watch an ad, no ads will come up and then my game gets stuck asking me if I want to watch an ad or not but it becomes unclickable. Also there is no clear time when my hotel will close while I'm not playing. There are locks that appear but they will say 2 hours and then as soon as I close my game it tells me my hotel closed, or sometimes it won't tell me until hours later. I've even gotten notifications that my hotel has closed while I'm actively playing. If these issues were fixed I would change my review to 5 stars because overall it is a really fun game to play, the graphics looks good and the areas are really beautiful.

I am still waiting on a new hotel. When I first downloaded this game, it advertised 10 hotels. I've been waiting on the 8th hotel since last year some time. The event hotels don't last long enough. I pushed hard and actually hit the 50,000,000 mark once with very little sleep. If you have time to produce event hotels, then you have time to produce promised hotels.

This game is overall good. But there is one thing about the ads in the game that I think I should talk about. You see,the ads are not like regular ads, there like websites. It's really annoying knowing that a regular ad would talk 3-25 seconds long and theses ads are 40 seconds long. I think lots of people would like to get to the game from an ad alot quicker. I'm not so sure if it's just me or everyone else, but i'd really like it fixed. Thank you.

Be really good if income was shared across all resorts as I have one that has nothing left to buy but making a fortune Fun and addictive, great graphics. I just wish the game speed was a little faster and the upgrades didn't cost so much real money compared to other games, but they do offer ads at your choosing to get time VIP stats. I love developers that don't force you to watch ads but give you the option if you choose for a reward.

Great game, must watch Ads if you want to build up quickly. The only down side is that the hotels you have 100% (not including gem upgrades) you should be able to transfer money from one hotel to the other. I understand the fact that it needs to get harder for each level, but each hotel has more and more expensive purchases. So using the other hotels would not really be too much easier. And it would keep you going back to the old hotels more often, like the games wants you to do.

Too many glitches. I'll list them all here. The first bug is when you open the app, before you closed the app, and you had all rooms occupied, you rejoin, regardless of when, 2 rooms are open. Guests don't come sometimes. Your guests won't come. No cars, no nothing. Even the travel agency ad doesn't work. Daily balance bugged. 2 rooms open? Same daily balance. All rooms occupied? Same balance. The balance only changes if you upgrade it or not. Services are also affected with this bug.

I absolutely love the game, always enjoy it when a new hotel comes out :) though I think there's one thing that's missing and it becomes very clear on the Arabian nights resort. I need 20 stars total to move to the Imperator Palace; that's no problem, I've got all the money I need to upgrade everything. The problem comes with actually upgrading. The process is painfully slow, spamming the upgrade button so much. A simple button to upgrade x object to max right away would be much appreciated. :)

Game is great! Best time management/idle style game around. But, once you upgrade your hotels, you can't do anything. I beat all the hotels and now I have nothing to do. Also, you can't get 5 star hotels without paying for more diamonds. So, if you can't afford to buy diamonds, you cant make it past the 2nd hotel. Please update and keep adding, this game is great!

I would've absolutely given this game 5 stars, if it's wasn't for the horrible ADS, omg where do I start? You can't play without ads or else you'll lose money, and I'm not talking 10 seconds ads, I'm talking 30 SECONDS, I genuinely spend more time watching ads than actually playing the game, which threw me off a little, there has to be another way to collect money other than watching these boring ads. But game wise, the game is fun.

There's just far too many ads! I felt my time spent on this game 80% was on watching Ads instead of playing the actual game itself. If it werent bcz of those endless ads this would actually be a pretty good game! I actually enjoyed it (but the extreme ads ruined it!) Also, the game start to crash now and I cant open it anymore that I have no choice but to uninstall it. What a pity! Please fix this bug!

Normally I get tired of idle games because of their "wash, rinse, repeat" cycles. I never got what was so appealing about those. This one, however, is a bit different. The pace is still the same: buy and upgrade to make money. That's where they continued where most don't. Energy, customer attraction, service speed, , staff expenses...these are all minor details that, when added to a simple idle game, really change how you play. I 'm happy to say I finally found a mobile "Tycoon" game

Editing my review AGAIN because it's been MONTHS, beginning on a year since the last release of a hotel beyond the event hotel. I went from playing all the time to only checking to see if there's finally a new hotel... I'd give it higher if there were more levels. I've 5 starred every level and now have nothing to do... I paid for everything that was basically offered and only regret there isn't more...

Graphics are nice. Management is okay. But after finishing one hotel, there is literally nothing to do. You keep on collecting cash in that hotel for nothing. There should be some element in game which makes this go away. Either transferring the cash to other hotel managements or adding some features for continuous cash flow. Also adding google play achievements is a good thing. And in-game purchases are very costly, furthermore after any purchase, the game will end in a week or two.

This game is really great for many reasons, but not perfect. There are plenty of hotels that you can transform all with different themes, meaning it keeps you busy for a while. I've had this game for a few months and its still entertaining. You can earn gems fairly easily by completing goals given to you, however once you get to the 6th hotel, there are no goals to complete. This is very frustrating as that's the only way to get gems without paying for them, please fix this!!

This game is good but not much progress. I've been playing this for hours and it's starting to get boring. Watching ads is the best way to progress but it kinda felt like I'm just watching ads and not playing anymore. Although it is a very nice game. The graphics and gameplay is good. Nice choice of characters as well. More updates and maybe this could possibly be one of the best tycoon games or whatever it is called. Lol. Overall, I still like it :)

Great fun, I dislike idle games but this one caught me off guard by how invested I got in so little time. Yes, the best way to build is through Ads. I don't mind that and it's not too aggressive. Loses a star because every so often you will watch an ad and won't get the cash. When this happens, whenever he comes up, no video will play. It fixes if you close out of the game, but every time i close out of the game two rooms are emptied for some reason. This is very, very irritating.

are played a lot of games which are basically a strategy games but this game is totally amazing and it has provided amazing experience while I was playing this game smoother. amazing story line just the one thing which it requires is few updates which can give us more access to the services which can be provided to the customers. currently in the hotel industry what kind of services which are provided to the customer we should also keep it. Thanks to the developer.

I love this game! Hope you planning to add more stuff to customize the hotels, cameras etc. It would be nice to see more animations. Very good at the moment, very stable. The income is a little low, you have to watch a lot of ads, but I think it's okay, because you really work hard for this game, and there should be an income somehow.

I absolutely love this game! I have had ot for quite awhile now and think it is so fun. A bit of a challenge to save your money when upgrading, but a good way to know what a struggle it must be to keep a business perfect for customers! There aren't many ads. The only times you have them is if you accept to am investment deal or more customers. I will keep this game a long time!

Super fun until you get to the third hotel and then its super glitchy. Videos ads not working, always have two rooms available and hotel closes after 30mins rather than 2 hrs. And earning money is impossible with all the glitches. Also don't see the point in keep hotels after you finish all the goals. May help the game to be less glitchy by removing them after you finish a level. Hope there's an update to fix the bugs out soon.

Fun game! It's a good balance between an idle game and something that requires you to be active with. You need to pick your upgrades while also ensuring there are enough funds to pay your workers. Two complaints: 1) after you get all of the upgrades in one hotel, it is essentially self sustaining and there's no reason to come back -- it needs an end game. 2) the event hotel is BS. Unlocking even 1 star in the given time frame is difficult unless you pay to win.

I really like this game and i played it before but i wanted an idle game to come back to since I'm busy all the time and i remember something that frustrated me was how I can't take money from a previous hotel that i finished and use it in another hotel. Its like starting from rock bottom again when I'm not entirely there because I have money from other hotels. I don't know if anyone else feels this way but if it could be changed i would enjoy the game better.

Carrying on from my review, this game revolves around watching adverts every minute , 30 seconds each advert so most of the game is adverts. Although I thought I might pay for advert free, I thought a couple of quid would be worth it. But no, ¡ê10.49 for advert free version, that is disgusting and extortionate. I will probably be uninstalling the game.

Although the advertisements are optional, it is very difficult to advance without watching videos. Sometimes when I watch adverts for the monetary rewards, I do not even get any money. I just get a blank screen for about thirty seconds and then the guy leaves. Making money is a very slow process because when you upgrade items you do not even get the full amount the upgrade states. This game would probably appeal to the most hardcore of grinders but not for casual players.

Was enjoying playing this game until installing the latest update. Can no longer get extra cash or perks from watching the videos as it fails to give you the reward! You watch the video, it now takes you straight to app store as if you clicked on it, even if you didn't, and when you return to the game: the opportunity is over but no reward! Please fix!!!

I find it challenging and exciting until I finished all of the tasks and upgrades for the 1st hotel. Wish there was a way to transfer money from one hotel to another. It's a lot difficult to progress on the 2nd hotel due to lack of money. Upgrades, rooms, and equipment are way too expensive than the 1st one. It's non sense that the 1st hotel keeps earning for no purpose at all anymore.

I love this game, but I'm giving it 2 stars because after upgrading everything in one hotel, it is pointless to revisit that hotel. You can't use the profits from a previous hotel to help build up a new hotel. Why even have the option of revisiting old hotels if the profits aren't shared? It's a perplexing and disappointing mechanic.

Good little game, I quite enjoy it only thing is once you have upgrade all of the hotels to 100% there is nothing left to do. The Event hotel bundles are a bit of a rip off and not worth the money it. I'm curious to know if the developers of the game will be releasing anymore hotels to manage any time soon? Or is that it? Time to remove the game and move on . No new updates for months on end .

Awesome graphics. Super fun, and addictive. My only problem, is that if the cash guy comes and you try to watch a video, it won't let you. And sometimes when you leave the game after you watched a video it will reset some to all the money you got from watching the ad. Other then these small problems it's a great game and would recommend to anyone who is feeling the need to do something.

I loved it at first. Then I paid $10 to remove all the ads and enjoyed it more. I made it to the 7th level. All the hotel guests go to the same place regardless if it's open or not on every level. When you switch to a different hotel or log out entirely, you instantly lose guests. In my experience up to 10 guests at a time would instantly be removed from the hotel depending on your level. Therefore, you make waaaayyyyy LESS money to none after you log out. Waste of time and effort.

Great game. Love the management aspect. And that this game is not a clicker. It's really hard to find games like this one on mobile. I personally like that it's vertical so I don't have to turn my phone. Though, a lot of bugs when it comes with advertisements. I'm experiencing a lot of freezes whenever I watch a video for some cash or 2x profit which results to not getting the bonus at all. Hope you guys fix it!

NEED NEW CONTENT!! Updating now to just 1 star as still waiting on a new hotel to be introduced. That's over 2 years we have been waiting! I paid good money to not see ads and to update the managers in yet Codigames seems to want to just bring out more and more new games, (which are too fussy and iver complicated) instead of respecting the players of the ones they already have! Theme Park and Prison NEED NEW CONTENT!

Pretty cool... Starts off a little slow and you've got to be pretty strategic. The option to watch ads for more money is great and the ads I've seen are 15sec or shorter. It's a great game to wake up to because you earn money while you sleep too. I just purchased my second hotel so we'll see. The only suggestion I have is to be able to choose different styles and look in your hotel... Color options would be cool.

Edit: I've reached Little Camelot now and thank you for reading my review before (I asked for different upgrade in rooms). It's really refreshing and now I couldn't stop playing it even more. The ads doesn't bothered me because in fact I used the double time ads everytime. If I could give suggestion, it would be great to have a Chinese Imperial style Hotel (like those in colossal drama). I think that'd be really cool! ^^

This game is amazing! It's so fun and addictive. I play this for hours and hours every day! It's quite hard and slow at first, but once lots of money starts coming in it becomes easier and more laid back. I also love how there are a variety of different hotels that you can unlock later on in the game. I definitely recommend this game. If you are considering installing it... then what on earth are you waiting for?!

Awesome game! Rarely do I play a mobile game for more than a day or 2. But this one was so well done I 5 stared all of the hotels. My only "complaint" is that once you get 5 stars on a hotel, there is never a reason to revisit it, which also means once you 5 star the last one, you're done. I would love to see something to bring you back to the first ones. Or maybe once you finish the last one, you can restart in a mastery mode. Again, awesome game, I'll be checking out some of their other ones

I really love the game itself from the cute effects to the details of the game. Overall its really good and i really love it. But, as for this game is for killing time, i would love to have this game offlined and can be accessed by anyone anytime anywhere without any internet connections. Maybe someday in the future you'll have an offline game tycoon for everybody.__

This game is fun for the first hour and then it's just the same boring stuff. If you want to progress at all, you have to watch ads upon ads. If you pay to remove the ads, the game gets too easy and you just wait for the dancing money guy to give you all the money you need. By the 3rd hotel, I only come back for a minute to collect the offline money and spam the upgrade button a few times. There doesnt seem to be much strategy, just watch ads, upgrade stuff and come back later.

Loved the game! I have a request, please make the guest utilize the other facilities, and make them use their room balconies, example from the blue crystal resort's suit rooms make the guests use their private swimming pool, slides, and let them relax, sun bathe on their decks, also make them do activities like swim on the ocean, sun bathe while the beach bar is close, night party at the beach bar, you know dancing, and making some trouble. I would love to see guests interacting with each other.

Was fun in the beginning, but now it's gotten old. My event hotel keeps getting deleted for no reason causing me to start over every time. Also, the old hotels are pointless and there's no reason to go back to them after you've finished them. 2 stars because its a good idea, and fun at first.. but they need to fix some bugs and think of some new ways to keep people interested longer. I'll edit this if that ever happens.

Ads are cheating most of the time. Other than that, nice game. Placement of ad feature is perfect though as if you have to watch some ad now and then to earn some extra money, like getting a loan. Its just it doesnt work most of the time when needed. Sometimes, the ad button takes years to load, sometimes if we click it, the ad wont play, sometimes even if we watch the whole ad only to get some money for the game, we dont get the promised money. It happens mostly when the money is big

It's an okay game while you're bored but there are way too many ads and most of the time the ads DONT work. You click the button to watch it and it just goes back to the game without loading any video. You have to exit out of the game a few times to even get one to work again. Not worth it, find a different hotel game that doesnt require ads every 2 seconds to get any kind of revenue to expand your hotels.

The game is fun and i quite enjoy playing it but there are several bugs that drive me crazy!! One of the bug is alright which is I can't get the money sometimes after i watch the ads. but the other one, the most terrible one, is that last night i go to bed for like 8 hours but when i wake up and open the game, it didn't increase my money at all!!! i don't want to play this game anymore until these bugs are fixed.

Only game I have ever actually finished fully. I love the different locations. It is a bit repetitive, but it seems to keep you entertained and watching your guests roam and explore and utilize the services is great! Also, paying to get rid of ads is worth it. $10 is a steep, but it transfers to every hotel and you get $ from the VIP guest instantly, which is one of the main ways to get cash in game. It would also be grand if they added a hotel/game reset button. I'd love to play again.

So after playing for almost a week and I confidently say you are not going to get anywhere unless you watch ads literally every 2 minutes. I understand that it's a free game but the amount of money it takes to upgrade and get more hotels is pretty high and it will take you A WHILE to unlock. I would watch an ad for 30 seconds, get around 2,000 upgrade something and then wait for the money man to come and give me another ad so I could upgrade. Graphics are cute but money is too slow without ads.

Fun game, have to watch adds but not a problem you don't have to pay to get ahead, I finish all the hotels at 100% but that's it there's no more hotels. They should add more hotels, they should also have the people do different things at different times. They should not all go to the restaurant some should go to the pool, arcade, bar, etc maybe also add in room service. We should be able to make the schedule we want out shops to be open they close to soon or open to late.

I love this game, it's very addicting. I just got to my second hotel and its so much fun. I love that you can watch ads to double your money or just earn more altogether! Watch a 30 second add for 8,000 more dollars? Sold. I love that even after you've finished your hotel and moved on to thee next one you can go back to the original one and continue to upgrade it until it is five star, and continue to earn money from it as well. 10/10 will reccomend!

Great game but needs updates - similar to everyone else, I have to say: ALLOW MONEY TO BE TRANSFERRED FROM HOTEL TO HOTEL. If I'm the one building it, the money should go with me! Especially if I'm still earning on hotels that are no longer able to be upgraded. The money is still sitting there, accruing, and I can't use it! Ends up being disappointing in the end.

I really enjoyed playing this game, but am sad that there are no more hotels after 30 stars. I recently just paid extra money to have 10 hours of open hotel idle time, and unlimited double profits, but I only got to use it for the last hotel. If I'd have known it was the last hotel, I wouldn't have spent an extra $15 on this game. I'm really bummed because I would've loved to keep playing, but there are no more levels after 6 hotels? __

Honestly this game is pretty neat. The art is very cute, simple and yet really nice to look at! I love that the hotels really change from one to the next. The ads are well placed and entirely optional. Events feel impossible unless you're willing to spend money, and honestly I might consider it if there was more to do. Once you finish a hotel, it's pretty useless, which kinda sucks. And I'm pretty sure there's a set number of hotels so eventually, you'll beat the game I assume. Great game tho!

It's really good! The ads are optional. And it's fun when you understand the trick or what to do first. I've been playing since feb/mar2020. Haven't bored once. I'm glad they keep it updated and adding more hotels to maintain (I was half afraid the game would be 'that's all' after I'm done with 3 hotels that's available when I first played it). Good job!

The game is alright if you buy the ad free in-app purchase, but if you ask for that amount of money, you should be offering a better gameplay 1)guest ai, who would spend all day " visiting" all the facilities in the hotel but don't get to use any of then because of "bad timing" 2)restaurant, queue limit at 6 but not proportional to the number of chefs? 3)after the first couple of hotel, it gets old as the hotel items are very repetitive.4)guests check out at 11:30pm?

There's not enough to do within a hotel, ever. I get that creating a hotel and different quests takes time, but the game should have never released if you were going to force us to wait WEEKS to even be able to play again IF a new hotel is released. I can't believe I wasted money on the ad free, I want a refund immediate

The game was fun but there's only four hotels and literally nothing to do when you have those completed. Rated 1star for the misleading description: "hire drivers, porters... provide laundry service or sightseeing tours... build triple or even King rooms" None of that is possible. Either add all the above in to the game, or remove it from your description

The game so far is very good, I enjoy it a lot, but there is a bug at The Stanley Resort where whenever I leave with no rooms available, I come back to the couples rooms empty, I don't know if I just timed it with them checking out but it always happens. It's doesn't affect the gameplay much, but the progress slows down a bit because I can't earn using those couples rooms.

It's an amazing game! Addicting and fun. My only concern is that you make a lot of money from another hotel that you've unlocked, but you can't transfer any of that cash you've made into the current hotel your working on. I hope more levels come soon too because I'm nearly finished all the hotels. Other than that, the game is very fun and would recommend it. A couple glitches here and there where house keeping staff go into a room, clean it, then stay in one spot and never leave that spot

Great game. Lots of enjoyment. Upgrade all kinds of things. As fantastic as this game is, it is plagued with ads that fail to load or connect you back to the game for your reward. The amount of times you have to reset the game as a result and losing out on your reward is appalling. ... Update. Became tired of trying to play the game now starting on the 4th Hotel. Came back after a couple of weeks. The first ad I go to watch for 2x pay for 10 minutes stalled the game forcing a reset. Uninstalling

Fun game but the ads don't load half the time. Just a blank screen you can't even x out of so you're staring at a blank screen for half a minute and you don't even get any rewards Sometimes it also doesn't even register that I wasn't playing in the game so when I come back to the game it's like I wasn't even away and have had no money made

So I'm addicted to idle games. They're perfect for a quick in and out game. This one is by far the best. I usually get bored, or the game stop progressing in an interesting way. I'm on the last hotel and had to say something before I finished it and forgot about it. Each stage is different! You don't just restart the same thing with a new added goal to reach, this one has different hotels with cool themes and fun items to build. Thank you creators, I had a blast with your game!<3

It is just impossible to surpass the beginning of each hotel without watching ads. Meaning, you will have to watch ads until you get to upgrade items to lessen your debt. Employees wages are too high that's why instead of a positive revenue, you will have negative revenue and even debt. I am playing Idle Inn Tycoon instead. That's much better App of yours.

This game is awesome! Once i started playing the cash flow in the game was great! The great thing is, i have not bought ( with real money ) any if the perks, because all you have to do is watch an ad to get a smaller version of them. The only thing i dont like is that sometimes when you want to waych an ad to get a perk, it doesnt work. If you like tycoons, this is the game for you.

I would rate this game much higher if it wasnt so glitchy! I watch the adds in order to get the VIP money, and it never fails that when a good prize is offered, the ad freezes or I get a "Video playback can not be played at this time" error message and I miss out on getting the reward. The ad that it ALWAYS freezes on is an Amazon grocery delivery advertisement. Please fix this and I will happily give a higher rating! My app is up to date, btw.

This is a really nice addicting game. 5 minutes into the game and I bought the no ads item and I haven't regretted it. The drawbacks of this game are: 1)you can't play multiple hotels simultaneously as the next unlocks when the current is finished. 2)Not challenging at all, victory is certain, you just try to get there faster. 3)Purchasing something for a specific event seems pointless. The reward is to reduce the time to certain victory, thus reduce your gameplay time. 4)No replay value

Super addictive, fun game. With a few pretty big drawbacks. The amount of adds you need to watch to get anywhere is absurd, the events are fun but impossible to get 3 stars unless you pay $15 every week to get the bonus that should be permenant if bought once. The additional costs for the VIP guy and the guy to keep to place open for 10 extra hours are also a bit much. In the events, if you've bought the permanent VIP, too bad. There's a lot of little things that could improve the game majorly.

Nice graphics, easy to play, and entertaining. I bought the ad free and it's worth it! But after a few weeks of playing it, i found a hug in their event hotel. The House keeping is being stuck in one of the rooms leaving you with a dirty rooms. I tried to email the devs many times. But they still couldn't solved the problem or fixed it.

This is a super good game. Very creative and colorful amd perfect. Really recommend it to all of you. However the only problem was the design for rooms are so messy and cause confusion. Other stuffs like the bar, restaurant, spa or pool are very beautiful but I think the room's decoration has to be improved by reducing some useless stuffs. And you can only see the confusion after you have upgraded every thing in the room (at first it was beautiful and enough).

This game is so much fun! There are plenty of mobile "management" games that aren't much more than clicker games, but this one actually has some management aspects to it, which make it a more involved experience. I only wish there were even more ways to get hands on with the hotel and it's staff. But this game is still very enjoyable and a great time killer.

It's an alright game. Issue I have is that all the sudden, when I click on a video ad via the "Invester Offer", the video doesn't load and it glitches, and I lose the money for the offer. You guys need to address that. I never thought I wouldn't mind clicking on video ads. But if I'm not going to get the credit, then what's the point? Update 01-13-2020: I ended up rebooting me modem, and I haven't had any problems with the video ads since. Hope this helps.

I would put 5 stars however you only get 4 hotels and even without buying any of the in game stuff you really only get alittle but of content. Once you get 5 stars on your last hotel theres literally nothing else to the game. I would have loved doing more hitels however the content is just not there. **do not buy the in game benefits because once yoir done your 4th hotel (which doesnt take long) then its useless)
Never get rewards for watching ads. Watch ads over and over and not receive the rewards you're supposed to get.

I love the entire tycoon series, there are some downfalls of this game. These include high priced micro transactions, and the time it takes to build up your empire without paying to win. The time required is not unreasonable but does make the game less enjoyable. Overall, it is a great game I would enjoy more decorative choices but it's a fun way to pass time.

Need better offline features, I meant the game should run while being offline more like other games because we can't stay online all the time and the progression is too slow. Loved this game only the mentioned feature should be include and I will give 5 stars with best review.

I like the game and all these other people saying you have to spend money on this game are completely wrong. I have completed 5 hotels to 5 stars without spending any money at all. Yes it takes a while to do it and that is why you have an option to spend money. As for the ads, In order to get double profits, you have to return to your hotel while the multiplier is still on. It also works for every hotel, not just one it brings you to. 4 stars because there are no more hotels as of right now.

Brilliant game, I love the fact that ads are optional to watch and aren't shoved in your face every two seconds. Clearly well thought out by the devs. I love that the perks aren't a monthly subscription, but are a one time payment. I feel as though many game developers are very money hungry and only use subscriptions, so I thank you devs for being very considerate of your player base. I just wish that there were more to do besides just move on to another hotel once one is completed. Overall 5/5

Whenever I close the game in my mobile and open it again, all the guests in the double bed rooms dissapear. This happens only in Stanley resort. This happens every time and all the double bed rooms show as vacant when I reopen the app. Anyone else facing this issue? It's very frustrating!

Enjoying it. But since i started the second hotel i would only rarely receive the cash promised by the VIP (maybe 1 in 10). I would watch the ad, he would walk out and i get nothing. Missed out on hundreds of thousands of dollars by now. Really annoying. Imagine trying to make progress in the challange hotel when the VIP doesn't give you anything.

Great game. Very fun to play. Only problem I've had with it are sometimes things mess up. Housekeeping in the Stanley Resort do not clean all of the rooms for some reason, and I found a customer in the first hotel that was wearing skis and was stuck in a chair lift. These bugs are mildly annoying and confusing, but overall an amazing game!

I really do enjoy this game. But unfortunately after I've almost completed the 2nd hotel the game became unplayable due to all of the game crashes.. I hope you guys fix the issue in an update! And after I maxed out the first hotel it became useless to me. I hope this isnt a buy stupid expensive "upgrades" and just stop updating. Because that would be crappy.

This would have been five stars if not for a few things that started to annoy me. For starters, the guests walk around like a flock of sheep, going only in a one way system around the hotel. So you end up losing money as attractions are closed by the time they get to them. Also, on imperator, every time I click off it, it kicks 5 guests out the hotel, so i always have 5 rooms empty. The items are ridiculously expensive. A few tweaks and this game could be great.

Lots of fun, a great idle game...however I find myself leaving the game running so I can get the investment money when he shows up. If you do this, buying the ad free is an absolute must, and the game is so much more fun when it's ad free. Hope they keep adding hotels, because there is a very satisfying feeling that you get as you slowly upgrade your hotels to 5 stars. Fun game, and keep sending us new hotels!!

I was enjoying the game quite a bit and always found myself going back to it. Exciting to see what the next hotel would be like and how the rooms would be decorated. That is until I finished the castle and do not have anywhere else to go. There are the events but that gets me a new character to earn more profits. I just don't have anything to put the profits toward. I wish old hotels actually had a purpose. Also an "upgrade all" to fully upgrade a piece in the room instead of clicking 9 times.

I really enjoy this game!! The variation in each hotel is awesome! It takes long enough to upgrade to the next hotel to keep it interesting withput becoming frustrating. I opted to remove the ads which was well worth it and was pleased that spending additional money (which I wouldnt have done) was unnecessary. Of the codigames Ive tried (supermarket, theme park, hospital, police and jail) this one is by far my favorite and the most enjoyable!

Love this game, but recently (11th may 2021). I can only watch one ad in game and then have to restart the game to get one more otherwise it gets stuck in an endless cycle of loading but never actually completing. This issue means I cannot play the game in an enjoyable way. **Edit 22/05/2021** There has still been no change to this. Which is appalling meaning I cannot play the game to progress or play the events to get special managers.

Lowered from 5 to 2 stars. I've been playing this game for a long time, spent money on it. There hasn't been a new hotel in over a year at least. The events are now useless to me. What point is there if you've done all the hotels, and the only rewards for events are things to help complete main game? Add more hotels, and I'll change my rating.

This game is fun and addicting. My only complaint is that there is 5 hotels to complete. I completed them all and spent the $10 to have the manager keep up with my hotel while I was away. For spending $10 on a mobile game, I thought there would be a lot more hotels to complete. Not just 5...

I really love this game!!!!! but ofcourse, for the owner to earn double - they have ads that you can click anytime to get an extra money. Which is 10x of your earning. It is really annoying, but it's my choice BECAUSE I LOVE THIS GAME AND I WANT TO PLAY CONTINUOSLY. I just hope there's a lot of things that we can do on this game rather than upgrading everything. It really took time to play this game if u dont watch the ads. I hope we can control our staffs as well __

Update: I have noticed it is just one advertisers issue. Anytime that it plays scrabble to go ads, I have the problem listed below. I loved the graphics and game play. However, after watching one video, it wouldn't let me watch anymore. Also, if I close out of the game, I lose any rewards I have earned. If these issues get fixed, I would definitely reinstall.

I love that there are different 'levels' that you can advance from. And once you buy the $10.99 (It's DEFINITELY worth it) to remove the option to watch videos to get bonuses, it's MUCH MORE fun. What would make it better is for more buildings to be added so I can keep serving hotels and resorts! Please add more!! Or even more updates to the other hotels as well so we can keep working on them too!

I like this game. But I watch the videos of the invester in the sports car, and it isn't giving me the $ at the end. I have now watched a ton of videos, and lost out on at least 10 grand or more. Please fix this. Still havinig the same problem, now the beds will say they full, game freezes, and then 2 to 4 beds are now empty. That means I am losing profit. Which I need to advance in the game to get stars to move on. Please fix.

It's a really good game, it's cute, awesome, whatever. It has no forced ads, which is great. But it's almost impossible to get by without watching ads, ESPECIALLY in events. Events are only 4 days long and that is still not long enough to get there. Being in quarentine, I sat for maybe 8 hours a day maybe more, watching a show and playing this game, watching every ad that came my way for money, and I STILL wasn't able to meet the requirements for the event prize manager.

The game is beautifully made, but there's no denying that it has much room for improvement. There's very little to play except upgrading the things. I suggest add a mini games to every aspect of the fields for example in restaurant make a mini game which we can participate and earn money our selfs instead of waiting for the ads to finish and get our money.

It is an amazing game! I love playing it. The best thing about it is that it is offline. There is just one thing that bothers me a lot. I have finished one hotel and there is nothing left to upgrade in it, but I still earn money in that hotel which is kinda useless cuz there is nothing left to upgrade. I have around 300k dollars in that hotel and I'm pretty poor in my other hotels, it would be great of u can add a option of transferring money from one hotel to another.

As far as idle games this is one of the best that is until you have completed all the hotels then your stuck playing the same "Event Hotels" with nothing new to strive for. If you can't do anything with the existing hotels or the income from them it's useless to continue to play. Give us a reason to come back to the game. Add something.. Valet parking, bellboys ,room service, security employees anything... how about more HOTELS! Just a thought.

The game is really amazing but only one thing is bothering me much is tat the money earned in one hotel cannot be used in upgrading the other hotels _____¡â_____¡â when one hotel is fully completed what is to be done with the money collected by that hotel??? Please look into it. At least the money from one hotel can be used to upgrade other hotels. Please guys make some changes.! Looking forward to it.!

Awesome game, super addictive (if you like tycoon games) I couldn't stop playing. The only negative I have is that it forces you to buy things (new room/hotel) when you may not be ready or want to. Hopefully this particular developer will come out with other tycoon options because I'd definitely download.

It's a fun game, especially seeing the characters in your hotels but it gets repetitive. It's straightforward enough w/no need of help. Except for the special items that costs gems, I 100% the game in about a month. I spent money on 1 item to be able to double my profits. That makes the game go by way quicker. At this point, what is the point of the special managers? Unless you're adding more hotels or space to the existing hotels, I'm done & get no benefit from them. Don't spend $$ on the game

This game is fun, but very slow. It'd be nice for the profits to be slightly increased. It can get boring quickly waiting for income to upgrade stuff. I'd be interested in a PC version of you sold one on steam. Keep it simple, fun but with more content (varied locations, forest, desert, snow, etc. ).

The game would be fun. I have been playing now for a couple of weeks. In that time u have sent about 10 emails because the ads for the dancing guy don't work!! They claim to sent the info to someone to get it fixed, but then things get worse!!! Now the app freezes when I try to view the ads from the dancing guy. This game has gone from good to the worst app I have ever played a game on!!!! Do Not download unless you want to be frustrated all the time!!!

The gameplay and the graphics are cool but it takes just too much time to get enough money to make new rooms and develop the hotel. You can easily get money from watching video ads, sadly you will do that every 8 seconds so the game become repetitive and too slow to get somewhere. I was watching a 14 seconds and every 10 seconds of gameplay to get some money and even that way I couldn't build much :(

Overall it's a cute idle tycoon game. I would give it more stars but I have a few issues with it. First is the ads, there's so many that it wants you to watch. They're not absolutely required but make a big difference in how fast you can proceed. Second problem is after watching the ads, sometimes it does not give you the rewards you were watching the ad for. That's very frustrating!!

I updated my review a few days ago but I figured out that bug (advertising campaign) I thought since I brought that manger I didn't need it. I've been playing recently and my game is glitching. I'll come back to a hotel and all my staff are just walking in (no matter the time or shift). My guest go to use services then pack up and leave, sometimes w/o checking out (losing money)!! Fix please!!

Good game! Very good. Graphics are good and I like the music choices. I don't mind ads to get __ and I like you have to get stars to progress! Also,ignore all the people who saying bad stuff about this out of spite(insulting graphics etc) but don't ignore people who report bug fixes. No bugs makes a person happier. One 5 __ review =1 bug fixed

*updated* enjoyable game, but last few days finding that if I come back into the game after not playing it for a few hours, and watch a clip to double my profits, it is not doubling the profits, so i am missing out on the extra dollars. Makes it frustrating when expecting it to give it to you. Be great to have this fixed asap or maybe time to play another game.

This is a great game for killing time! I like how you don't have to constantly monitor every little aspect. The design is cute and it is rewarding to level up the items in your hotel. I downloaded a few other games from this developer. While they are very good(especially the other idle games) this one is my favorite. I just unlocked the last available hotel and am really hoping more content will be released!

I've been playing this game for a few days, and it's really addictive but I do some suggestions. Firstly, the amount of ads is ridiculous, 80% of my time is spent watching them, so gameplay is limited. The upgrade to remove ads is very expensive, you may find that more people purchase this at a lower cost. I'm struggling to see how I will reach the 5th star on my 1st hotel, and therefore unlock the 3rd hotel. My 1st hotel is making money but I can't use it! I should be able to use it on another.

I love the concept of the game. But with gems you can't buy anything but unnecesarry room or kitchen boosters. After you proceed to the next hotel you do not get x2 income or so (is too long of a grind). The main reason for 2 stars are the Advertisments. It is simply taking too many ads to complete one room and manage expenses plus, a lot of times when I watch the ad thru, I do not get that in game currency. Otherwise I really like the idea behind this game and it's style.

Really cute and entertaining idle game! I love that you get to choose when to watch ads, it makes me feel like I'm actually getting something from them instead of just filling the dev's pocket. This is the only mobile game where it doesn't feel monotonous, It's balanced well where when you buy upgrades you actually feel like you are improving. I play it every night before bed to relax and it gets the job done. Tldr; Non-intrusive ads and good gameplay.

The game is incredibly slow. Boosting profits by 2x only gives you 10 minutes per ad. Max 2 hours. I have to watch 12 ads to get Max?? There's a guy dance in your lobby asking you to watch an ad for money you can get in 30 minutes also. Along with five other watch ad and get money/boost. Almost 50% of the screen is asking you to watch ads or pay for no ads.

I've had to watch a lot of videos to stay in the black. Otherwise I found it enjoyable in the beginning. However, once I decided to pay to disable ads (way too much I might add) it became repetitive and boring. The final two hotels showed lazy development, reusing car sounds when the flying carpet shows up, buggy people stuck in walls, etc. When you get 5 stars on the last hotel, nothing happens. You're at the end of the game with nothing to do except delete it. Disappointing purchase.

Great idle game, can't really find fault, rating 4 stars due to the lack of levels, but other than that it's your typical idle game. I do wish your money carried over per hotel, but I understand why it doesn't. There is no major pay to win either. You can pay to remove adds but that's about it. The closing of the hotel after 2 hours is an intresting feature that I quite enjoyed! You can pay to keep it open for 10 hours. But I never felt the need. Which is great!

I LOVE the game! The first 2 hotels was fun but the 3th one was a bit difficult and a bit more expensive, making it a little bit harder to complete, and mostly, the people staying at the hotels usually appear at the facilities but sometimes they were still closed, I think you need some kind of code that could trigger the customers only when its the right time.

It's a really entertaining and engaging game.I had played this game 3 hours straight on the first day itself and watched over 20 ads... Though I like it very much, I didn't liked the manner in which we are asked to pay for something that it's quite obviously a need for us.. moreover the payment gateway always shows errors that's why I cannot buy something with real currency even if I want to . please fix this and I won't hesitate even a bit giving it. 5 stars :P

This game is a good distraction for slow moments. I can see how the ads are annoying but the remove ads feature is helpful for low price. The only disadvantage is there is an end to this game. After the last hotel, that is it no more hotels available. There is nothing left to do, no reset to the beginning hotel or any more challenges.

The game is a lot of fun, and I find myself opening it quite often to check on my hotel. However, the prices on the in-app purchases are way too high for the game that it is. Most people wouldn't pay more than $0.99-$1.99 for an entire game on google play, nobody wants to pay $10.99 JUST to turn off ads, that's way too high. The other in-app purchases are just as bad

THIS GAME IS Amazing! In most tycoon games, you just keep on upgrading the same thing over and over again and the 'renovating' and basically doing the same thing over and over. This game is much more sensible since there are many ways to spend your cash. Each new hotel has a unique style, with new upgrades and services. I really think that the images below don't quite capture the best parts of the game. Ads are not required you can watch them for bonuses but otherwise they don't appear.

Super fun for anyone! Wish I could use profits from one hotel somewhere else. I get that it shouldn't be used for the next build, but I have no reason to go back into an old hotel when it gets 5 stars. What about a bank option where I can earn enough in all my locations for a gem or take out a loan to purchase hotels and use profits to pay it off... Ya know, kinda like in real life? Otherwise, love the events and there are enough hotels to keep going, for now...

This is a great spin on traditional idle games. You can largely play this game without paying anything though I suggest buying the manager that lets you accumulate cash for 10 hours. My only concerns are the events and needing new hotels. I hope you guys come out with an update adding more hotels soon! The events are damn near impossible to complete without paying the $10 EACH time for the suites. It's kind of BS. The rest of the game it great.

I absolutely love this game, the progress is well paced, and strategy does play a small part in playing it, knowing how and when to invest your money in upgrades and staff and extras. It does require alot of ad watching if you wish to progress at a reasonable pace. Normally that would bother me, but for this game, it benefits you to leave it open (more customers show up) so I just leave the game open and click in and out of the ads while I do other things, like homework and such. I recommend :)

It was a fun game at first until after you have completed the first hotel and come to find you cant use any of your money from that hotel towards the next. Whats the point with all that money building up with nothing to spend it on when everything is upgraded to the top tier? Pointless. I advise to def not use any of your real money on this game. Im glad i didnt i would have been furious if i had.

The game is perfect aside from the guest AI, which is terrible. Guests completely ignore when services are available and check at random times. There should be a way to improve this feature at the front desk. Making sure guests know when services are available is important when minimizing losses and maximizing profits.

This is the most best game I have ever gotten!______It never forces you to watch ads, you can choose to if you want double profits or something like that. I also love that the game goes on for an entire hour even after you close it out, so when you get back you have more money than when you left! One question though, even if I have more than 6 tables then why does it only let in 3 or 4 people at a time? Is it because I need to hire more chefs__? Please let me know. Thank you ________

Game's pacing is good, I don't find myself wishing I was progressing any faster or slower. Had some issues getting my hotels to 5 stars in order to move on to the 3rd hotel, so I contacted the devs and the issue was resolved! I appreciate their quick response, I just wish I'd been more proactive with contacting them. ____

After downloading and getting to the second hotel, the "investor" for ads doesn't show up anymore and neither does the button to watch an ad for 2x earning. So the game is now basically just sitting and waiting for the tiny profit to add up very, very slowly. Makes it less playable and if the ad guy doesn't come back I will be deleting as he was the only thing that keeps the game moving.

Although the game is lengthy in terms of racking up enough funds to upgrade rooms fully and buy new parts for your hotel, after a few days and also a lot of ads from the investor to help speed up the process I finished the first hotel and moved on to the next. Overall, from what I have experienced, the game is very fun and rewarding when you begin to take off a bit more. It's quite polished and there are no ads other than when getting optional benefits. Can recommend :)

Nice game but you have a bug in your event hotel. The cleaner sometimes gets stuck in the room and doesn't finish cleaning. Also having a buy all option would make the game more fun. There aren't much updates or variation between the hotels, once you finish the hotel there isn't much point in going back to them. Maybe daily quests for each hotel? The event hotel is way too difficult if you don't play continuously for the whole period or buy the package.

Great game, love playing it every chance I get. The issues I have is at points I can't watch videos to increase 2x profit time. When the guy/gal comes to invest I can't watch their videos to receive money either. When I start the game it let's the videos play, but during the game I have to close the app and restart all the time. That's the only way I can watch the videos

It's a bit of fun, very similar to prison empire. The rewards for watching ads is very low and sometimes they won't load properly so are unavailable. In app purchase prices are way too high for what you get. I don't understand, if you're the hotel empire tycoon, why cant you use the profits from the hotels you are running really well to upgrade the next hotel?

Addictive game, shame so many ads. ¡ê10 a bit steep to get rid of them, ¡ê5 would be better. About the game though, if you are the "manager" of the hotels, shouldn't you be able to take money from other hotels that are fully equipped making money to help in new hotel "ventures"?? Would be a nice addition.

I am playing this game again after a long time and I now see new content including events feature. Well done. However, the ads multiplier is STILL NOT WORKING! I have purchased the "No more ads" feature for _ 920, and what is the point in skipping the ad when the double reward do not come! This is pure cheating. This issue had been raised by many since the beginning, and even after updating this game you still haven't fixed this bug. Until you fix this issue, I am not going to play this game.

I would LOVE to give this game a 5 star. It was fun, cute, detail-oriented, everything you want from a tycoon game. But one BIG issue was when I log out from the game, the guests from the double rooms suddenly missing from my hotel. I tried to logout just for a few seconds and login afterwards and they're gone. Please fix this and i will give 5 stars back.

Overall its a good game with a great gameplay. perhaps it could be improved by making the customer become more natural. make them interact each other, they look like a robot in a loop pattern. 3 rooms having a shower together at the same time, sleep in a same bed but having a different table at restaurant, make them more natural like a real social creature. I think thats all, thank you.

I've been playing this game for weeks now, it's quite fun and addicting but I'm giving it three stars because of the extremely expensive and absurd microtransactions. These microtransactions are called "Managers", they cost $14.99 each and there are three of them, one of them let's you make hotel cash offline for 10 hours, instead of 2 hours. The other manager doubles money and the third removed ads. Buying the third one makes the second one useless and it isn't really worthwhile

I really enjoy this game, it is one of the better idle games! My only complaint is the Events only last 3 days and it is impossible to win without having to spend real money! I am an avid played and spent so long on the event, watched all the ads, got the multiplier again and again but still not even close to earning a star. It would be good if the events were longer to give people who don't pay for games a fair chance.

There's no point even playing after the first hotel. Progress is excruciatingly slow. So slow you're practically forced to watch ads to get anywhere at all and even that isn't enough. It's clear this is just a garbage money grab since a permanent x2 is $11 and to earn a x2 without paying you have to watch an ad for TEN MINUTES of time. That's all you get. Garbage game from a garbage company.

How did I get sucked into another one of these games lol. I've already done the Theme Park one and SuperMarket one. Must be doing something right lol. I love these games because you actually get to SEE the progress you make so its satisfying. I really love this one! Thank you for fixing the money dancing guy! 5 Star Game all around! Keep up the good work! :)

The game is very addictive and enjoyable. I did the payment for no adds and worked great. However when I paid in the recent "Event" to be able to build 3x presidential suites, my money was taken but without the benefit given. Disappointed. Now trying to connect for the past 2 days, it gives a Code 4 Error, unable to connect to game server. Please assist.

It's a pretty fun game so far, but there is either a really annoying bug in it or I'm doing something wrong here...for some reason, even though I have 4 tables, apparently only 2 tables can be occupied at a time. The other people will stand in line as if there aren't any empty tables, and then get angry and leave pretty much right at the time a person finishes eating. It's like they are practicing social distancing or something...it's really wierd.

I definitely enjoy this game. At first it seemed like a standard idle builder. The lower levels are easy but instructive. Then you hit the first timed event and you realize that there is a lot more strategy involved. I was blown out of the water on my first event, the second I reached the one star goal, and the third a two star goal. The optional ad model is nice although after playing awhile I bought the ad-free experience ( both worth supporting the dev and enhancing overall enjoyment ).

I've been playing this game for a week and so far It's not so bad. It kind of sucks that the only way to get the perks are to watch ads or pay. My recent encounter that's lasted the whole day so far is that I don't even have the option to watch ads anymore. The dancing guy, the taxi icon and fast forwarding to the next day are still options, but when I click watch video, it doesn't do anything. Please fix!!!

Update: They fixed the issue of it not giving the funds so as promised five stars, it's a really fun game, I just opened my third hotel in it. Hoping they add more hotels __ I actually really like this game but it has one huge issue. When I come back to the game after not playing it a while it'll say I've earnt X amount but when I click continue or watch the and to double the amount it doesn't give me the money I've earned while away. If it wasn't for that it would easily be a five star review.

I played for a few hours, and I barely made any profits. I had to watch well above 20 ads to get any income. I had no 'energy' for any upgrades. Everything was super expensive. The tasks for profits where too difficult so early in the game. Unless you instantly put real life money into this game, and a lot, it's not worth playing. Uninstalled.

Love the game but its driving me crazy cause I worked so hard to get my first hotel too five stars but you see it says I have five stars at the top but then when I go to get another hotel it says I dont have any frustrating urgh. Tried to uninstall it clear the cashe but nothing so pretty soon just gunna uninstall it which makes me sad cause it's my favorite game...

It's a great game. I've been playing for less than a week and I'm 90% done the third location. The build is neither rushed or too slow. I don't feel it's necessary to always watch the ads to get further, it's possible without doing so. The only downfall I wish there's more locations (future updates?), or hopefully more to do in each location in future updates. All in all, this is what I look for in an idle game. You don't have to constantly reset to get ahead, make more money, etc. THANK GOD

Like this game... But... It has improved a lot in the months I've been playing it. I've done the first three hotels to five star and the Xmas one is almost finished. I like the idea of events in this but this current one is ridiculous. I've got just over 4million of the 10million required for one star and that's just in a day and a half so how you expect us to get to 100million in that time is beyond me. The only way we can make that much is to buy the upgrade and that's a big no.

I absolutely love this game. Great graphics. Great work guys! But I do want to say that I wish you could use money from another hotel to upgrade another one. For instance when you complete a hotel the money is useless and completed hotels earn more money, but uncompleted ones are incredibly hard when you only get 2000 dollars after a paycheck 9000. Please look into it. Thank you

This was a pretty nice game. A game to play when there's nothing else to do. But the sheer amount of ads you NEED to watch to actually progress is annoying and didn't need to be included what so ever. If you don't watch ads you 1. Don't get money to upgrade certain things that you actually need and 2. If you don't have enough money your staff quit.

They provide x2 profit after you watch a 15-35seconds ads but most of the time after watching the ads you won't get the profit especially when the profit is high amounts. Waste a lot of time to watch the ads and get nothing. Disappointed with the game. I'm not recommend this game to those players there are not planning to invest some money in the game. The time spent on watching the ads is longer than playing the game

I'm addicted to this game, and love playing it. It's provided hours of entertainment. My only complaint is that the prices are exceptionally high for the "vip" status during events or to get rid of ads (which I did because I play the game so much and appreciate it!). Would love it if you could unlock the vip ($10.99 - OUCH) for events ONE time and keep that status for ALL events. It's ridiculous to spend that much money once, let alone for every event...

Love this game, wish there was more hotels. I've already completed all the hotels. So definitely needs more hotels so people can keep playing. I also agree with other reviews about transferring money from other hotels to your current hotel, well at least a percentage of your earnings would be nice. I'd hate to delete this game, so please add many more hotels. ______

I take 3¡î back because (1) most time I watch ads from Dancing King, the game is force closed, so I almost never get the cash Only get about 1x from 10x watching. (2) when I am log back in, all my staffs disappear. The worst is the cleaning service (3) The 3rd hotel is nonsense. From a room to the restaurant, the guests need 2 hours. So when they reach the restaurant, it is already closed. I've been thinking to uninstall it.
