This game is a notch above other idle games! Unlike other idle games where you just mash a button and upgrade components, this actually requires some patience and micromanaging. There is a day/night cycle, shift schedules, and if you don't plan your finanaces right you can actually lose money! Also, I do not feel constantly bombarded with ads or "deals" to buy gems. Overall, it's a great game. Loving it so far!

Would definitely be a 5* because this game is fantastic. I don't mind watching adds to speed things up in the game and I'm grateful that they help, but I keep getting the same tedious advert that last at least 1 mins (Klondike) every single time. It is the most soul destroying thing ever and I'm stuck in isolation! Please at least vary the adds more and I might change my rating!

Great game! Very addicting! Very easy to play, it takes a little bit to get going in the begining of each level but it makes each map last longer. It is cool how each new hotel you get different services to add and different up grade designs. Ive spent money on the no ads, a little pricey at $10 but it will be well worth it if they add alot more levels. Keep up the good work and keep the new hotels comming!

I dig the plot, the graphics, and the goals. my issues are with how much actual money you have to spend to have a decent playing experience. I'm not even saying it would be an exceptional playing experience, just one worth playing. The manager cost $10, the dog to remove ads cost $5. if you watch ads, you get cash/customers, no problem. an option to use diamonds to obtain a manager should be on the table, however he can't cost more than 300 diamonds, when you're only rewarded 5 at a time.

Honestly, I can get past the ridiculous amount of ads and real life cost to get rid of them (for $18 i could buy a pc game). But when I found out after unlocking my second hotel that the money doesn't carry over from the first, whats the point? Aren't you supposed to be building your profits with more and more hotels? Could be a great game, and looks really nice but this is just a cash grab.

Game is so much fun but ads refusing to load ruins it. This is a consistent problem across all games from this company but this one seems especially affected. I get maybe 30 minutes per 1-2 days where ads will load, that's it. The rest of the time I can't use any ad boosts. At least set it up so that we automatically get the boost even if the game can't load an ad!

I appreciate the update that allows you to see the upgrade percentage of a room/facility from the menu. It was inconvenient to search each section to check. My only complaint is that you need full stars/100% to advance to the next hotel. Update: a hotel was posted that didn't need all the stars __ thank you Devs. If I may suggest something else: it would be awesome to have a group/mass upgrade ability. It's a lot of time and attention to upgrade over 40 rooms, each with 15+ upgradeable items.

Lots of bugs on the beach... Every time I exit and come back to the game I have 2+ available rooms (doesn't matter if it is 5 minutes or 2 hours) even though I literally WATCHED the guests check in. So I am being robbed of my full earnings potential. **UPDATE: Same on the Santa Resort^ (even tho I did PURCHASE the $10.99 NO ADS) I am still getting robbed on my rooms every time I leave the game. IDLE means you make money when you are away from the game? That is not what I am seeing here.

I downloaded this game a week ago and fell in love. It reminded me of "The Sims" and "Zoo Tycoon" that I loved so much. The first two days I beat the first hotel. Three days later I beat the second... Then the game started constantly kicking me out and back to the loading page. Can't watch an ad (which is the biggest part of earning money) to double profits or make money from the VIP customer. Takes too long now to keep my attention. So sad.

This is an interesting game, but it has one very major flaw. If you ever close the game, the next time that you open it, your double occupancy rooms are all vacant! Since you can only add double occupancy rooms, not single occupancy, thus means that the majority of your guests just plain disappear. Those rooms then sit empty, not earning anything, until after check-out time. You really need to fix that.

I love this game. I was playing it on my tablet and it kept freezing, so I started playing it on my phone and it's fine. My only problem is that all my hotels are 5 stars, and there's nothing left for me to do until the codi hotels pop up. I also don't like that it's $10.99 each time to get presidential suites. It doesn't roll over to the next codi hotel, and it should. Things cost way too many diamonds. Other than that it's fine. It needs more hotels.

I like it... it's fun, but I wish when you finish with one hotel & advance to the other hotels, the extra money should at least go to the next hotels. Plus I wish that the rooms, upgrades, & other resorts wasn't so dang ridiculously expensive!!! Overall, I believe it would be a more enjoyable game if the extra money would carry over to the other new hotels. I'll admit I enjoyed it, although sometimes it can be frustrating, however, I think it could be better. Soo, I will have to give it 3 stars.

I don't often write reviews on games, but in this case I felt it was necessary. This game is only fun if you enjoy watching ads. I've watched probably 3 times more ads on this game, all in an attempt to get ahead. The game won't hold your attention for more than 2-3 weeks. The constant ads and the cost of in-game items is ridiculous. The regular event is impossible to advance in without spending money. But beware! The advantage is only good for 4 days and doesn't return for the next one. No wins

Bugs. The game constantly develops new bugs and the in app support is useless and careless. And what's with all the inappropriate ads?? This is obviously a game that kids play as well and these ads are basically softcore porn! The team needs to get a hang of their bugs and ads, it's getting ridiculous and I'm thinking of deleting.

It was fun but the cost of each item is way too high then you can earn. I have to watch tons of video to gain money. But I did and build a 5 star hotel and moved to the new one. Now I figured out I can't use my previous balance to upgrade the new hotel. So you have to start again. If I think as hotel tycoon then I build my business, use my current fund to grow more. I have no energy and time to watch tons of videos again to earn money. So I am uninstalling it. Bu the game and features are good.

Ok, so I really like this game. Fun graphics, cool mechanics, etc. I also don't mine watching ads for 2x profit or money. My problem however is that neither are working anymore. I can't watch ads for 2x profit or money. And it's very slow if you don't. I've tried backing out, reinstalling, restarting the app and my phone. Nothing works. Really hope this bug is fixed cause I really love this game

The game was fun at first, but it stopped connecting to ads all of a sudden and they won't come back. You pretty much need the adverts to advance so playing the game is pointless now. I'll be uninstalling by tomorrow unless it's fixed. EDIT: anyone having trouble with the game not connecting to ads, just uninstall and reinstall. You don't lose any progress. I have been doing this about once per day. It's a dirty trick they're using to get you to spend a fortune on an ad-free version of the game

I like it, it's a lot better than those 'Idle' games, where those just get boring. Yes this has pay to play options but you can absolutely play without ever paying, I've worked my way through nearly the whole thing with no $ spent. It does have a lot of watch ads options to speed up the process, but it's actually not so bothersome for me with this one. Simple but addictive.

Great Game really easy to play and a brilliant way to kill a bit of time. I really enjoyed it, so much I paid for a manager (no ads, there were far too many otherwise), reason for only 2 stars, it's a very short game, I paid ¡ê10 for the manager, thinking more hotels would open up... nope, there are only 5 hotels in the entire game. If you do play this, don't spend money just power through the ridiculous number of adverts...

Fun and addictive game. LOTS of ads, but if you watch them there's no stopping you from getting one star in the events if you put in the hours. More stars would require spending money. I disagree with other commenters who say cash should transfer over to other hotels - that would make the game too easy. I like the increasing degree of difficulty. I'm only on level 4 though. Customer service isn't very useful, when and if they respond (the game shortchanged me some gems).

Good game, as of yesterday I have completed all the hotels. Only scored so low because I must have watched over a 1000 ads during my time playing this game. For me, I would have it open while watching something and constantly have ads playing to actually make money in game. Another thing, once you've completed a hotel, there's no need to go back to it, it's just making money that you can't use. Guest pathing is a bit weird at times too, and the opening times of facilities is a bit off as well

I love this game, i really want more of it im so excited to see more added to the game. As soon as i possibly can im going to spend a lot of money into this game i want to see more things. To do more hotels, i just i love it so much from the graphics you use to the layouts of the buildings. 1 main question though do the purchases i make help the creator? Like support for the game and help live? Hopefully comfortably. I'll be trying to get my friends to play for sure they'd love it!

I give out 2 stars, as I enjoyed this kind of game very much. However, -3 stars as below: _ -1 star : seems like I played the ads more than the games itself _ -1 star : after upgraded all the 1st hotel facilities & hired max qty of employees, I only got 4 stars. The coins getting pilled up for 900k++ but I couldn't spend it at all. _ -1 star : even after I got those 900k++ coins, I couldn't use it at the 2nd hotel. All the upgrades at the 2nd hotel could've done if I could use 1st hotel's coins

Fun game, easier if you'll watch commercials. You're never forced to, but there's rewards so watch a million commercials and this game will go by quick for you. 3 complaints: 1) in-game purchases are stupid expensive. I'll spend cash on a good game, but in-game purchases are like $13 (for one manager for example) 2) special events are incredibly difficult to accomplish getting 1 star. 3) there needs to be more levels.

This game is lacking logic. It is so frustrating to see the NPC travel back and forth between amenities that our closed. This makes no sense! For instance, all guess will travel in pre-determined order from place to place (even when said place is closed) while your pool. By the time the arrive at the pool it closes. Therefore the hotel loses money. By the forth hotel guess don't even sleep anymore. They are just walking from place to place. I'm looking for something new. Any suggestions?

If you are willing to pay for "addless" version go ahead. If you're not willing to pay then don't even bother. The game is conceived to force you to watch ads otherwise you can't do anything. The progress is very slow without ads and you have nothing to do while waiting for funds to gather. Here skill is not required, you are just expected to watch adds to make the money you need to make the upgrades. Or you can pay and the income from the hotel becomes normal as it should be in first place.

Great game with fun progression and no necessary P2W. My only complaint: I have a maid glitched and stuck in a bedroom. She won't clean, and I can't fire her, so that room isn't getting cleaned and I have to watch a video to clean it every day. Anything you guys can do to help me out? It's the first hotel. Thank you!

I like the game but each time I upgrade something in the bedrooms it doesn't work with the other bedrooms also my game keeps freezing and if it isn't freezing it lags and stops me from using anything after 10 minutes then when I restart my phone it kicks me out the app!!! Unbelievably bad, I have seen so many better apps and hotel empire completely sucks I hate this game because i cant even do anything, fix your game, I have tried to play for a while now and I am leaving a review now good day!!!

Excellent idle game for people with genuine business mind. More challenging than most idle games. You need to look at the cost/benefit of each upgrade to work out the order, because you can't just keep clicking everything like in so many games. Log in every 2 hours or so if you can and watch one add to double income, then spend the money upgrading. You can watch more adds for money but that gives you the best value for your time. Its slow progress but better than games that are far too easy.

Great addictive game! But when you get to Santa's Shelter - 1. It's Summer. 2. The hours of the bar & restaurant are crazy, so you spend a lot of time (if not watching adverts to proceed) watching guests wander down to find them closed, then go back up to their rooms. Bored now. If you don't watch adverts, this game would take years to get through. Was fantastic, but I'd be great if you could make steady progress without hours of adverts.

Special events are buggy!!! You see, when you play a special event you have 3 days to make 180m... Even after purchasing one if not all three extras (a total around $25) the game will be playing for you only to freeze and lose a whole days worth of profits. When trying to get to support, you just get a list of known problems. No way to reach out to anyone... Highly frustrating, not worth your time.

This game is very well polished with a great art style and easy to use interface. I had a lot of fun with the first two hotels, but ran into a big issue. Upgrades are priced such that you really can only progress through the levels in a very linear fashion. By the time you get to big upgrades like the ski slope, for example, you are making so much money you can upgrade it all anyway. This really makes things feel bland and eventually too boring.

The game is fun enough, but new hotels are very slow to start. Would be nice if you could share some of the money from other hotels to get off to a better start. Also, when you watch an ad to get double profits while you were offline, you don't actually get double the profits. It says on screen that you do, but when you check your balance, it only gives you the amount once.

I was enjoying the game, but then I noticed the AI is horrible and makes you lose profit when you expand. When you purchase a major expansion to your property (such as the ski slopes) it actually cut the income of my hotel in 1/2 because the guest waste time walking out and around the building even when the ski lift is closed. By time they get back inside the other facilities are closed and you make a lot less because of all the time they walked around not spending money.

Its a fun game that helps the time pass when I'm bored. But I've noticed when I watch the ads for "double the cash" when i open the app, it only does the original ammount.... so, literally watching the ad when I first open the app for no reason. Supposed to give double the money while I'm away but it keeps giving me the original amount. A 30 second ad isn't worth it lol (and yes I know ads keep it free but thats not the problem so please don't respond with that) please fix it.

This game is good. I love it. Maybe because i love it so much, i really want to do well so i disconnected the game with google play and uninstall it. After that, i install the game again so that i can reset the game but nothing happened. My game money also gone but there's nothing such as reset happening there. I have done it many times but it still the same.

I love the game so much. I don't make in-game purchases so i don't have any complains about that. It's so cool and i love that system of paying wages daily... so you know exactly your financial position after each day. It's kind of addictive for me i won't lie. But the game is just sooo good, it's worth it. I love the game. I've tried the other games as well and they're as good as that one. Keep it up____
Suddenly the event hotel is not opening. It's showing "wait till connection with server is established". Whereas other hotels are working fine. Please resolve the problem ASAP.

Used to love it until my screen was overtaken by ads! Gradually more and more upgrade buttons kept popping up on my screen until I couldn't help but to accidentally press one and open up the pop up screen. Becomes so annoying I just uninstalled. I wish I never would have purchased the no-ad version. Because I feel like I was lied to. I look forward to a company to make a version of this game that has no ads!!!!!!! I loved playing it, but the developers need to sell upgrades got out of hand.

Very fun game... Ad issue appears to be fixed so I increased to 4*. Suggestion: the game should be move of a puzzle in a quest to make your hotels, 5*. There should be more options to make me have to find the most successful combo, plus more than 1 way to reach 5*. Make me have to maintain my hotel instead of doing things for me once I reach a certain point. Don't like how I come back and things have been purchased. (maybe I didn't want to buy that. __)

A fun little time wasting game. I've honestly played it more than I care to admit. It's simple with concise goals, and allows you to play and win with minimal ads unless you choose to use them. I am hesitant to give higher than a 4 star because there are a few changes I would like to see in the app. For instance being able to zoom further out would be amazing.

It's fun but lacking. Just a few things I like: * It's cute. Pretty simplistic, but still very detailed. * The early stages of a new hotel are challenging. They force you to think strategically. Some things I dislike: * Way too short. There's only 5 hotels and then game over. * Late stages of a hotel are incredibly easy, but only if you're offline for the maximum time. It came down to me just getting the 10 hour offline time then doubling profits.

I was very hesitant about this game at first as most switch over to an advertisement every ten seconds. But within this one, you choose whether you want to watch them or not and in return, you get pennies and stuff to help expand your hotel. You can hire additional staff and choose to skip advertisements but still gain all the perks, but it's over ¡ê10 each for these amongst others which I think is a little high. But certainly doesn't stop me from being able to play the game which I'm enjoying.

A fun and enjoyable game for individuals interested in entrepreneurial games. It helps pass the time, is easy to learn, and teaches one basic business aspects from micro-economics to accounting. May still need to take classes for taxes though (sorry folks lol). There are ads, but they are optional for an in-game currency reward to help your business grow faster. 5/5

Hey, when watching ads from the dancing king or opening back the game you get extra money. But sometimes it doesn't work properly and there is no extra money after watching the ads. Must be fixed. Also, some of the housekeeping staff in the crystal and the Arabian resorts are laying on their faces, instead of being seated or standing. haha. Please add more hotels. Events must be added as a service IN the hotels, not a hotel itself. Like a banquet department. Extend restaurant hours. 1h30 is not enough. I know it's a game but try to be more realistic ;) Too bad cannot be played on a computer.

It's very glitchy. Ad rewards aren't loading 75% of the time. The VIP keeps on just disappearing before entering the lobby; the car sound are there but there's no VIP car?? I've wanted to purchase the no ads package but since the benefits are being glitchy, I may have to postpone until it's fixed. I wish there were more options of further developing hotels that already have 5 star rating (like the first one).

The ad I saw for this game mentioned how tycoon games are usually boring... I didn't realize they were advertising that there's was boring as well. During nighttime, you have to watch the characters sleep or purchase a manager who can bypass the night. So you sit there, with nothing to do, for a few minutes. What's more boring than not being able to interact with your game?
Completely finished Little Camelot. Awaiting the next upgrade. Highly addicted to this game. It is a long time in between upgrades in this game.
Alot of ads but kills time. Unfortunately I finished the last hotel and now there's nothing to do. So I stopped playing.

This game is slow at start, but it gets better as you make money. The constant ad helps gain when business is slow. Good time killer, but at a time, the gain isn't much, but positive thing is it makes it challenging either by saving to build a section or spend to get better gain in the long run.

The game is actually good and very accommodating. But the complaints are also true. The game stops giving ad after 5 mins. then, if you restart the game, it will leave you with only 2 customers in single room. Nit even enough to cover the wages of staff. So, you end up losing money instead of getting some. Hope you guys can fix it. Ill leave it at 3 stars till you do.

It's fun for awhile but when you get to the later levels everything is so expensive (TV for a room costs $30k) and there's nothing to do to pass the time and make more money. Plus you gotta watch an ad for any kind of boost, even if it's for a measly $1k that doesn't get you anything anyway. Plus they purposely set the hours to all add ons to keep you from making more money delaying the game. Why have a bar that opens at 9am, then closes at 4:30?

Really enjoyed this game much more strategic than other idle games however it would be nice to have more than 2 hotels and when I got the 2nd hotel the main manager says the income from my first hotel might help me in the 2nd one yet not sure how. Lastly in latest update there was a bug which the guests went to the ski and spa when closed and got angry but sure it's a minor bug. Other than that cant wait for more hotels
The event is incredibly obnoxious. When there is an event the popup takes up half of the UI and you cannot get rid of it whatsoever. Terrible design. I started to dread whenever an event begins.

My apologies, I ended up buying the no ads and am currently working on the last 2 hotels. The Imperato has some glitches, it only had 2 goals to complete and I don't always get my doubled profits. I'm currently at 4 stars on that hotel. Can we talk decor...The Codi Resort, to be 100% honest, is ugly and needs a redo of wall and floor colors, sorry but all the other hotels are colorful __ That has no bearing on my star review. When will new hotels be coming?
This is by far my favorite game. I'm glad you can reset and start over with the purchases remaining.

Pretty fun game really. I mean, in the beginning. The first hotel is small, easy to upgrade, and has the best Bar TV seen in the game. Too bad you never see it again.... I paid to remove the filthy ads, so upgrading is faster but if you like ads you can complete the game without spending a dime. Graphics were good and the object design also a highlight. But the level design and pathfinding in the bigger hotels ... "needs work" would be a nice way to say it. Overall, a 3. Needs Improvement.

Fun game. I've only had it a couple of days but I'm really enjoying it. I do wish you could transfer funds between hotels with a premium exchange rate or something (like AdCap) to add a bit more oomph to higher levels. Also, the "events" are terrible. There is next to no actual reward for participating. What the heck is with the 2 hour max idle collecting time?! On top of that, the "boosters" only work for that one specific limited time event. Disgusting money grab, if you ask me.

In the beginning the game was great, however since the "upgrade" things have been horrible. I click on the important guest and the ad won't play so that I can collect, its constantly buffering when I'm trying to obtain double my profits, then today it said I made $22k while I was sleep and when I tried to double my profits it didn't give me any of my money I made at all. Getting ready to delete if things don't change.

This is a great game. The adds are well placed. Want to skip night? Just watch an add. Want some more money? Just watch an add. The adds are optional. It doesnt hit you over the head with it. It just displays an icon saying "im here". Well done. The game play is engaging. Its a well made tycoon. I havent finished the game but for now well done. Im enjoying the game.

Unplayable game unless you are willing to watch 30-40 ads per day. Revenue generation is extremely slow, basically forcing you to either keep watching ads or spending real money. You can't even wait it out cuz revenue only gets generated for 2 hours if the app is closed, if you want it to be generated, guess what, you gotta pay. There are multiple hotels, but you can't use the revenue generated from one hotel to upgrade the other, means if you fully upgrade a hotel, it's BasicallyUselessToTheApp

I would've liked it but when i exit it and came back,some of the things are gone and it did not refund the money and gems,also the parking lot that i bought.So i decided to delete it and install it again(bc i thought that it would have a new game )but when i opened it, the previous game continued, so now i just spent my GEMS FOR NOTHING. also the ads that i watched didn't give me money even though it is said that it would give me money__.If there's ever 0 STAR RATINGS i would've been rated it.

This game is fantastically well done! It has a perfect blend of playability and idleness to it. Great user interface and easy to pick up, great attention to detail and art work, and the economy in the game is superb! Only thing I had a problem with was that the app slows down SIGNIFICANTLY when the bigger hotels have about half the rooms built and upgraded. Specifically when upgrading rooms, you can tap the button but the app will take up to 30 seconds to finally show that it upgraded.

The game is good to start off with but the more Hotels you open it's just the same thing over and over starting from scratch and you need to pay to get rid of the annoying adds, which is fine it's cheap. Suggestions, be able to transfer money from each Hotel or just one Hotel and instead of stars to open the next Hotel they should be brought to make it more interesting. In a nut shell very repeative.

It's a cool game, slow progress but that's better than really fast progress like in many tycoon games. You have to fix some bugs though. I lost my cheffs two times for no reason, and when I watch ads I don't get what was promised to me. I watched many ads and nooothing. Please fix that. Edit: more bugs. I watched the add for double profits earned in two hours and I did not get the money. This happened two times until now.

The sensation of being a hotel manager is there. But the strong promotion to watch ads is there. You can't progress much if you don't watch ads or pay real money, unless you can play for hours while focusing your attention in-game. There are bugs on the waiting in-line at the front desk where the second to front always finish the queue first than the one in front of the line. The usage of the facilities are only numbered and fixed on time, so it makes the game less simulator-like. Improve the AI

I love this game but there's no more hotels? I paid to remove ads but every hotel is the same & the only thing that changes is the price of upgrading items! I'm a bit irritated, it seems very lazy & I regret paying 12e to remove ads. It is impossible to complete an event as the game forces you to spend more money to earn extra stuff for your hotel, which ends at 25 stars!? Don't know what I paid for. Add an "Upgrade all" button because it's just tedious & boring upgrading every room

First off, I want to go by saying that the gameplay if this game is phenomenal. The player upgrades the rooms inside the hotel and the then the hotel itself. Unfortunately, this is where I have to stop. They have this guy come out every 1-2 minutes to give you money for your hotel. Good because the revenue stream sucks! This is a mobile game. STOP TRYING TO MILK ME FOR MONEY. The game designers are apparently a bunch of bloodsuckers.

Edit: newest update doesn't double profits when entering the hotel after closing. Original: It's a pretty good looking and decent game. My biggest issue is that there just isn't enough of it. Once you get towards the end of each hotel, the money speeds on in making it easy to cap off those last rooms.. Once the hotels are completed, that's it. They just keep running and earning money you can't use. I'm done with all 4 hotels, and now the game is just taking up space in my phone.

So far it was a good game,managing a hotel and balancing the finance but its hard to collect money at some point that we need to rely more on watching ads in order to get enough money . Sometimes after watching an ads the app went crash with black screen . Please fix this , no one wants to waste a couple of minutes watching an ads then ended up crashing the game without receiving any rewards.

Extremely well designed and ceeps you busy all the time really good game, 5/5 __. 1 thing I'd change is in (stats) at the _ (services) make it a bit more clear why you have losses in whatever department (as in the "Front Desk", "House creeping" extra...) so that it can be easy to spot and change it if needed. Other than that no problems so far.

A fun game to play, but without the in-game revenue provided by watching ads, it would be near impossible to move the game along. Not only that, but there is a time limit (2 hours) to how long the game will run AFK, a problem only solved by paying nearly $11 to increase the limit to 10 hours. The game is fairly addictive, but there are far too many annoying cash grabs to warrant a good rating.

I would absolutely love to be able to recommend this game, I played it for about a week straight maybe two. And I can no longer progress due to a pay wall. It's impossible to get 5 star hotels without spending those gems, and you can ONLY get them by doing the LIMITED tasks or by buying them with real money. The game is awesome, I love everything about it, but I just can't progress cux I can't get the required "star ratings" to unlock the next hotel after the snow resort.

Fix your damn game. You watch a video to double Profits, only to have it disapear. When I go to watch videos to make money, the video starts then disapears too. It is impossible to play the event without the videos. Those are two glitches need to be fixed. If things just randomly disapear, why would I consider actually buying something with my hard earned REAL-WORLD money? I like the game but that is a real breaker. Please don't give me a generic response. Just fix it.
Paid the upgrades for no adverts, got a new phone, all my purchases are gone, what a waste of money

I love the idea and the game but I completely agree that the events are not only pointless but impossible to complete even if you buy things for it. The amount of money it asked you to make in the amount of time is ridiculous. Though I love almost everything else about the game I do not like that you only receive 2 hour max on ads for times 2 and hotel open offline. I have to watch 12 ads for 2 hours of time? The ad to game ratio is way off. Lastly, Can you make the zoom wider?

The game looks great and it's very well animated. My problem is that you basically play the game by watching ads. You earn instant cash just watching ads. Majority of the early upgrades you can do to your hotel about 80 percent of that money is from you watching ads and through playing the game. If you don't watch ads progression is very slow. The ads also error sometimes and doesn't give you gold.

Great little game, although we should be able to buy extra cash using gems. The hotel takes such a long time to make enough money to do much more then upgrade. Their super market game is awesome. I paid for both to remove the ads and def well worth it, you get your rewards fast instead of watching videos. But please make a change so we can buy money with the gems or even earn more money from customers in the hotel. Like it a lot but its too long. THERE EMAIL DOESNT WORK. DO NOT PAY ANY MONEY.

Love the game! Though I feel it needs more to do with the hotels. Currently once they're completed, there's nothing more to do with them (unless I have missed something). So they just make an infinite amount of money with nothing to spend it on. Perhaps there could be an option to add more floors to your hotels and thus add more rooms to make more money and spend said money! This would also make the 500% customer increase more viable. :)

This game was great until it started to freeze, you can't get the profit x2 reward the ads freeze. Sometimes it will tell you it gave you your profits but it doesn't. Now this game is a waste of time! PLEASE FIX THIS!!!! 2months later still don't get the double profits! We are in Oct and it still hasn't been fixed, throughly annoying. Sucks cos I like this game

I love the game i just wish the money you make from the other hotels rolls over and you can use it to upgrade your current one. Its doesnt make much sense for there to be a time thing on the others that the hotels close after 2 hours if the money doesnt roll over. I also wish yall would add more hotels to the game. I have beaten the game entirely and cant pogress anymore.

The best part is I've manually calculated my profits and expenses. When the app is offline still the business goes on and the profits are credited in your balance. I still recommend developers adding some more realistic features such as conditions when the business is hard to run it will make it more enjoyable!!!

Love all the codi games! Playing through hotel lately, though, I have noticed that the music is pretty loud compared to the sound effects. It would be awesome if we could have sliders for the 2 sets of sounds, rather than just on or off! I enjoy the music but I think it would be far more enjoyable if i could have it be more like background noise to the sound effects.

After playing the game through, I've really enjoyed, i did spend irl money to advance easier but it's not necessary with the ad based items available. The only reason I haven't changednto 5 stars is that I've finished and there doesn't seem to be a way to reset the game to do it again, without wiping purchases (unless I've missed something which is probably the case). Also devs, any chance of more hotels being added? __

Overall, the game is good and the game play is smooth. I did note that the front desk sometimes stand backwards and a few times the services weren't there before the guests, but overall good game. Read in another review that there weren't anymore hotels after the last one and noted that there wasn't a "prestige " option either. Just thoughts for a future update.

okay here is the thing, after finishing one hotel then what? what will the money be used for? I need a feature where you can transfer the money from one hotel to another. Maybe you can add tax feature for each tansfer so it will be another challenge for us. But really, starting from the start again for other hotels. and everything is 10times difficult? Hmm sure but at least add the feature i asked you: to transfer money from one hotel to another. I watched ads but sometimes its not helping.

It's fun in the beginning, once you reach 5 star level that hotel is as good as junk, cause you can't use that money for any other hotel so it keeps getting accumulated. Basically the developer wants you to spend insane amount of money to keep adding my stars from the scratch for every new hotel. It will be fun for a couple of days and then you'll exit & delete this app.

I give it 4. The biggest isshue wasn't the adds themselves, I didn't mind watching them, but they never worked and kept crashing the game. The dog is worth it, only if you can't stand that. If there were more hotels, I would play for the event managers.... However, I would LOVE to see some more hotels! Japanese traditional inn (I would LOVE!), Russian hotel, a hotel with igloos, Indian hotel, Australian outback hotel, Mexican hotel, a cruse ship! This game has a lot of potential!

Played this game last 3 days nonstop and loving it. Only issue is blue crystal, where we get 4 double bedrooms, but when you go offline for a few minutes, it's always stuck at '2 rooms left' which is odd. The first two resorts were perfect. Its a slow pace game and makes you work, but its so satisfying when finishing. Hope you guys have more planned! I'm almost done with blue crystal! ______

Fun game, but there's just not enough currency in the game. It's nearly entirely ad based revenue. Each room only pays a tiny amount per hour, so you pretty much have to watch the VIP ads if you want to get anywhere fast. The game is fun, it's just really hard to play without constantly accepting the ads.

Game is fun, but not enough updates. There are to few hotels. You go through them and build them way to fast. The event is the same hotel over and over and over. If we could get more frequent updates for quality of life that would be great to. A buy max option would be real nice, I would even settle for a buy 5 at this point. Also there is not much of a difference in looks between hotels. A large variety of decor that fits the hotel would be nice. Instead it's the same bed and decor.

I like it very much! It really feels like I'm running a hotel and the animations are great and the game style is great. The only 2 things I would really want to improve the game is 1, when you look at stats and it tells you that you are losing money and in the negatives I think you could have the option to know why you're losing money. 2, I wish that the amount of money it takes to upgrade the generator was a bit lower, 16,000 dollars is a bit much for a beginner that's running out of power

Great concept for a game! Unfortunately you spend all your time watching ads and many of the ads crash or you don't receive the reward after watching. Each hotel gets more expensive to build the same things as well as having extras......a level is fun once you start making enough money to keep building but for the last few hotels it takes days of checking in every 2 hours to get it started. Also, many problems with customer AI.

The game is a lot of fun, typical free-to-play money-grubbing antics. Too many pop ups asking you to pay real money for things, considering it's a FTP. My biggest qualm with it is that the dancing money man is broken. He works the first time, then after that he doesn't give a reward and keeps perpetually dancing until I restart the app. If/when they fix dancing man, I'll add another star.

One of the suites shows the safe at a level 3 when the ithers are level 4 and is saying the room is 100% upgraded. Not sure how this can be when its not. when you upgrade the restaurant to the max and have it running as fast as you can, it still doesn't allow for all the people to eat food. Half of them turn away because there isn't enough people being able to sit down and queue so you lose out on revenue. Can this be rectified at all?

fun game. but doesnt make sense why I cant zoom out. sucks I've gotten to the end of the game and it doesnt seem there will be anymore. and the hotel events are always the same hotel. great concept with a little more work this would be an amazing game. beat every level. it takes a little bit of time. but i can't keep playing the same event over and over we need new hotels. Months later and still waiting on a new hotel. About to uninstall this game.

Hi! Great game and all, I love the graphics, but once a hotel is finished, the money from that hotel just SITS there while other hotels could really be using that. I wish there was a button you could send money ever so often like every 24 hours you can send however much you want to which ever hotel. But other than that it's cool

I love this game!!! You can buy different things for the people and more rooms! And I love how the things are cheap and money is easy to earn. And i also love the boss! This is on my top 3 list of games. Thank you for creating such a great game! I only have one question about this game. When the people leave the hotel, Were are they going? Do they go home? And i also like the animations they have. That's all.

This is a nice game but not very logical. The only way to play the game is to watch an insane number of ads (basically the entire point of the game is to upgrade your hotel- you must watch videos to get money to upgrade ). I quit the game when I realized that money can not be shared between hotels (which makes earning money on a fully upgraded hotel pointless) not to mention the new hotels are twice as expensive. I wrote support & heard nothing. Glad I realized this before spending real money.

I actually enjoy the game but it has too many issues. Firstly it's an idle game but has a 2 hour limit. Secondly, even when I have a strong network connection, I can't watch ads even though I was watching them 5 secs ago. Thirdly, setting up your hotel without any outside force is impossible. With all these issues, it makes the difficult and lack luster.

Love this game! The only down side is that after playing for a while I no longer get ads from the dancing man to get money rewards. So I have to uninstall and reinstall the game to get this feature back and then it disappears again and I have to repeat the process. Super annoying when I love playing this game so much!

Reeeeeeally needs new levels and it's been way more than a year since any substantial content updated. It's not even worth coming back to the app for special events because you physically cannot obtain a measley 1 star without spending a great deal of your day watching ad after ad to get any sort of cashflow. If I wanted to watch ads all the time, I'd put the TV onto QVC.

I'm not sure how this game has good reviews. You make no money while the game isn't running - the only way to make enough is to watch ads. Basically a pay to play game (costs $10.99 just to have the game function when the app isn't running). Total scam, don't download. Other reviews must be fakes. Waste of time.

Game is super fun and addicting. I find myself going back into it repeatedly to see the progress. However, random times when I touch the investment guy when he arrives, I touch to play video and video plays but then I don't get the money. It glitches, like it never happened. So I watched a preview for something, for nothing, frustrating.

This game has several great things about it. First I would like to say that for an idle type game, i actually had to pay attention to what i was upgrading or buying at first. there were a few times where I ended up negative in my income... until i fired everyone, lol. Secondly, I am really enjoying the way things change as they upgrade. Thirdly, moving on to the next hotel didn't mean a complete restart. Overall, a great idle game that requires some forethought!!!

It's fun and relaxing. If you're playing this without paying any money, then it probably has too many ads. I went ahead and got the $10.99 ad free option and it's definitely a lot more enjoyable. I love the simplistic art style and upgrading things feels satisfying, keeping the game feeling fresh. Can't wait to advance further __

I love Simulators. This one is a bit challenging. If you hate ads, this is not a game for you because it will be hard to advance fast if you don't watch ads. It's a 2 Star for me, I don't mind watching A LOT of Ads, but there have been MULTIPLE TIMES the reward was not given to me after watching the Ad and it bothers me a lot!! Specially the rewards with high amounts.

I don't normally write reviews, and I do like your games as a way to pass the time, but the best way I can describe the latest Santa's shelter level is lazy. The core of the level is just a blatant copy of the first, despite there being so much scope for a christmas themed level. I really hope this isn't a sign of things to come. Edit - next level was better but now been waiting weeks for a new level, despite two updates.

I really enjoyed this game but after paying for the full upgrades, I'm a little disappointed that the game was quite short and does not seem to be receiving any further level updates. There also needs to be an option to do a max upgrade by item or even rooms, particularly as the game slows down so much when the levels get larger.

So i deleted my first review posted 3/4th april 2021 to do another one.Now in may, all main hotels still completed at 5 stars, and STILL no new hotels!!! There is no point me doing special event hotels because what you get given are pointless to me!! I cant progress any further in the game than i am!! The main hotel updates are not coming quick enough!! The last was medieval hotel and that was added last year!! You are focusing on too many codi games at once and new updates are getting slower!

This game is cool. But... I wish the money from other hotels could be used on new hotels. Or that you started out with more money, cause in real life you would if you have multiple hotels. More activity in the game would be great. Each section you cannot really look around. Money for watching ads doesn't always credit. More activity is definitely needed... but cool game other wise.

The game is quite fun. The way ads have been incorporated into it is good, it doesn't force you to watch ads but the benefits are good enough to encourage you to do so. The only annoying thing is being constantly shown the paid features. I wish these were just in a shop or something instead of onscreen at all times. developers are going to be getting money from all the ads, feels a little money grabbing.also the paid upgrades are overpriced for a mobile game.

This is a great tycoon game which I very much enjoy to play, but there is one problem. After you get a hotel to 5 stars you keep getting money, but you can't buy anything there because you all ready bought everything in the hotel and you can't bring it to other locations making the money you make in a 5 star hotel useless. If you could at least bring your money from location to location I would for sure no doubt give this game a five star rating.

I enjoy this game because I loved watching hotel impossible, but I got to a point in the game where I had upgraded everything in my hotel and done everything I could do and I just couldn't get the last star I needed to move on to a new hotel. I'm disappointed because I really like playing this game but I wasn't going to sit in a hotel with nothing else to do with it.

Great Game Goals are actually achievable with decent in play costs for new and upgrades. Money does take a while to accumulate but watching ads and gameplay with benefit this. Each levels difficulty raises but achievable. Keeps you interested in the level and coming back to play. Caught up with the developers and now waiting on the latest level. Actually spent money to skip adds it's that good of a game. I've actually restarted because I got a new phone

This game would be awesome if it wasn't for the fact the ads hardly work anymore. Constantly having to restart the game or my phone just to watch a few at a time. It's a great idle game but if ads don't work then your only option is to pay for it and honestly it's not worth it at that point. If it's not fixed soon might just uninstall and find something else.

The game is very simple and competitive but soon the glory ends. The task for a hotel gets over soon and there is no more upgrade then the next hotel opens up, challenge starts. The already upgraded hotel will give earning a lot but you can't transfer the amount being earned to the new location. We have to start from the scratch in the new location. There could be more challenges and if there is any possibility of transferring the profits would be great.

I like this game very much, it's simple, yet actually fun and satisfying watching your hotel grow. I learned a lot like needing to have enough money to pay the workers by the time they leave or you have to rehire them. The music is calming. I also like that you have a choice to watch ads and actually get something out of it instead of just wasting precious time. Good job, whoever made this should get an A. But again this is my opinion. __

As fun as this game is, it's equal parts frustrating. 1. FIX THE PATHING ISSUE. My guests go to closed amenities constantly! Roaming the halls at 4am. 2. Let me turn off your pop ups for the event. Not interested. Doing to same hotel over and over is BORING! 3. Extremely lazy using the same hotel for Arabian Nights (which was great!) and reusing it for the next one. And no new amenities that weren't used previously. Don't even want to play anymore. I was ready to move on to something new.

Add watching simulator. Literally just opened the game and the only thing I can do is wait for hours or sit there and watch ads while I'm waiting. Plus watching 3 minutes of ads for only an hour of bonus cash is far from worth it, let alone you can only stack that up To 2 hours (about 6 minutes of ads by the way). Don't get me started on how expensive the monetization is. It seems like a fun game that doesn't want me to play it so I won't.

I've noticed that there's another review that describes the same problem I'm going through currently. The game is very fun. However, it requires watching ads to have a normal progress. The thing is that the ads no longer load for me and the "dancing man" no longer shows up either. It's a shame because the game has gotten a lot more boring with this issue. If you could fix this, great! __ If not, I'm afraid eventually I'll no longer feel the urge to play it and might uninstall.

I would give higher stars if the game actually kept my save data when switching devices. I had just gotten a new phone but all my saved data "went out the window." I love the simplistic design, but the constant stream of ads that you essentially need to watch just to make a profit adds to the annoyance factor.

This is a very fun game to play... I am on my second hotel now.. but for some reason the game starts to glitch... Even if I have all rooms occupied, if I close the game and open it again immediately, it shows my two rooms are vacant. It happens every time I close and open the game.. I would very much like to give it 5 stars if you'd solve this issue. I tried emailing you. The mail id mentioned in the developers info doesn't work.

This game is really easy to play and really fun ! The only thing is I wish to turn some sound effects like people going to toilet whish was gross ! I mean we can hear everything! Hope to see that in the future update ! There is a lot of ads in order to play it to get more money! I just buy the option to get it of ads, now it just pure fun .

Prices for items are ridiculously expensive and the game has so many other problems that you just can't enjoy playing it. Don't even bother with the events, if you don't spend money you won't achieve anything. These developers are super greedy and don't care about the players. The game has bugs that forces you to close the app so if you have a VIP campaign running, know that it will expire as soon as you close the game, it's ridiculous..

Fun addictive game... However just like all the other recent reviews, the new update needs to be fixed for the videos!!! Is it just me, or does anyone else have to be connected to wifi in order for the game to connect??? I hate that I can't connect outside of the house. Also why are my maids coming to work not hung over, flat out still drunk??!!! ________

Not sure if this is a bug or something but I downloaded the game and tried to launch it and it seems to be stuck on the first screen before you get to a menu or options or anything. If this isn't a glitch then it's taking more then 5 minutes to get past the first screen before any game play happens and that is a ridiculous amount of time. I'm uninstall this which is annoying because I didn't get to play at all. If this bug is fixed I might redownload but right now I literally can't play it.

Great game, terrible progression. Once you finish the first hotel you get no reward like other tycoon games. It actually gets harder to buy things because you make less money and things are more expensive. Plus my old hotel still makes money that I can do nothing with because I have bought all the upgrades. It should be one account for money instead of separate ones for each hotel.

Great! Absolutely, in love with this game. It's interesting because you don't just constantly profit, you lose money too, which reminds you to always keep everything in balance, or even your staff may resign! Although, sometimes the ads don't work, or I watch a thirty minute ad and I don't get the money. Not frequent, just wanted to mention. Great game.

It's a game that can be fun if you don't mind ads for more money/passing time or mind spending some real money for permanent in-game perks. There's an event every week that is challenging, but doesn't change from week to week, the only thing that changes is the manager you're trying to get. I've enjoyed my time playing, but I wish there was a way to upgrade multiple rooms at once so I'm not just tapping from room to room.

Great game i really enjoy playing, but lately the ads have been not working properly, coming up blank,so you have to come out of game losing the money from dancing King especially the big money,getting a bit annoyed now __ Update getting really annoyed with the ads not playing and losing money, the programmers not doing anything about it and I see I'm not the only one having trouble with this, going to uninstall the game im not getting anyway,its shame its a great game.

I love this game! Got to spend hours "in game" to really get the benefits, but good game for anyone who can stay in game and give is 2 sec every 10 min. Have purchased twice no issues. Only glitch is sometimes your hotel guests glide sideways (on thier bellies) in thier bedrobes instead of walking in thier everyday clothes. Makes for a laughable experience.

The game is fun, I enjoy playing it to kill time. But I think earning gems should be easier and there should be alternate ways to hire the Hotel manager and campaign manager. Ten bucks is steep. Lower your prices, and add more to the grind especially with all the ads you have. Also you need to add more hotels. I've been maxed out already and now I can't play anymore.

I never normally do a review, however, this is a Great game for someone who love these types of games. definitely not pay to play, but it takes a very long time. I have purchased dog adblocker for $15 AUD and finish the game till very end. I have just finished. will recomend to spend a little as O havr played this game consistently for last 4 months.

Updating my review: I love this game, and I'm enjoying the new challenge of the "Imperator Palace." But the more they add and the bigger the hotels get, the more obvious it is that the little hotel guests simply don't move fast enough - my restaurant is barely open long enough for them to walk to! I'd happily spend gems to speed them up, please!
Great game! Very fun and relaxing.

The game is great, but I have two complaints. The first is that the permanent upgrades cost far too much. In your other games, there were opportunities to earn gems to spend on permanent upgrades instead of real money. My second complaint is once you unlock the second hotel, the manager tells you to keep checking in on your old one to earn money towards the new one. However, money seems to be separate between hotels. Money should be shared.

It is repetitive, it is boring to have on your screen to watch, but it is still just a game to have in your background. It NEEDS more levels. Finished, now what? You should also be able to send money between Hotels. Also, the purchases are VERY expensive. Despite it being boring and repetitive, I still enjoyed it. Please add more levels though.

Great game.. But there seems to be a glitch. Each time I close and reopen the game I end up having only 2 rooms filled up. It's frustrating. __ And would prefer the guest to move faster on the bigger locations because by the time they arrive at the restaurant it's closed. Other than I enjoy it way too much!

PLEASE MAKE SOME MORE HOTELS!! I love this game and I even spend real life money on it because I enjoy how things are achievable. I would like to see some more hotels added such as a jungle, city and maybe some more services added. Maybe family rooms too that could be between a double room and a suite. I have completed all the levels now so any idea of when the next is out? (I don't like that during events you can only complete by buying a pack)

Love the game but hitting a major glitch. On Camelot hotel and was at 6 rooms. Twice have purchased a battery to upgrade power and a 7th and 8th double room and twice it has reverted back to no battery and only 6 double rooms. It feels like groundhog day. Just changed to 1 star. Tried 1 more time. Spent 1,000,000 on bar, 2 new double rooms, room upgrades and exited the game. 5 mins later re entered game everything gone. At least got money back. Still sucks. Major disappointment. PROBLEM SOLVED!

Its okay, the ads are really broken, sometimes if i get on the game and then leave,then come back,my 2x income that i watched ads for goes from 1 hour to 3 minutes,then its gone. Sometimes ads dont pop up at all unless i close the app and come back,most times when i open the app it takes away a bunch of my money that ive been saving up and i have to start all over. If youre going to get the game be ready to be set back often

Love this game, and other codigames! However, I have also recently found that my game has become glitchy. No matter how many times I restart the game including my phone, either I can't access any bonuses due to the videos not rendering properly, or the bonus guy doesn't appear at all which is annoying... any advice?

I really love this game.. But i do have an issue with it. Once you get a hotel to 5 stars, you then open a new hotel.. The 5 star hotel is now making a lot of cash, but theres nothing to spend the cash on.. And you cant transfer it to the next hotel...whats the point at that point...theres no more upgrades, no fun decorations etc.

The game is fun and addictive. BUT There are many time where I watch the VDO and I did not get the bonus. Also the housekeeper is very stupid I have two house keeper and 6 room (in the event hotel) the keep taking the long path and walk almost across the entire hotel which took about an hour(in game) So 2 house keeper cannot finish off 6 rooms which they should! (as of now 5 housekeeper can't clean 7 rooms!!!)

Any more hotels? I only downloaded the game a couple of weeks ago, but it looks like I'm on the last hotel. Will there be any more? Events are impossible unless you buy a presidential suites pack, and even then, to get past 2 stars is pretty much undoable. Art work is great, but my little guys move around in a pack andwant to do the same thing at the same time. If you could somehow make it so that room service is available, or the player could alter the timings of the services would be ace

This is a fun, cute game. But I dont like that I have to start all over for every hotel I have. We should be able to take our profit to other hotels with us. What's the point of my seeing my money going up at a hotel I've completed if I cant even spend that money on anything?

Ok so this game is pretty good. It's graphics are pretty good for most games. Big plus. Another plus is you can do just about everything without having to pay. But that means you have to watch a LOT of ads to double money, or pass night. Which is awesome. But omg, I CAN'T STAND MISTPLAY NOW. I got their same ad over 6 times in a roll.

I've really enjoyed the growing complexity of the game, but the increasing level of upgrades and sheer number of rooms to upgrade has become overwhelming. The app force closes repeatedly on me while trying to complete these upgrades. Can we please get some mass upgrade buttons to do a room at once when we have the resources to do so? It's fun to see the different levels of upgrade available the first couple of times through, but this latest hotel with 32 rooms of the same thing is tedious!

Waste of time!!! If you want to watch ads, ads, and then more ads, this is your game of choice. Oh yes, and after you get far enough into the game, the ads stop working!!! So you can't get the money or double profits. WOW, this must have been created by someone incompetent at best! DON'T waste your time, move on!!!

I really love this game but there are some issues that i dislike , first ; at the start of every hotels the things we can do is very less almost nothing to do and our income is very very low ,so we just only wait for invester and watch ads thats all , second issue ; why we cant use our money in previous hotels they are just numbers in old hotels and just useless for what? These issues are the worst for me and i think some of players will feel like me

It's fun but you either pay to win or watch adds to survive. When the guy with money shows up (who I refer to as "my sugar daddy") I'm almost always clicking on him and watching the add, I needed to because for the first 2 hours or so there is no way you can make any profit. For example the kitchen with each chef the daily wage is $200 but, you are charging $13 per customer when you have 4 guests who eat 3 times a day you can't afford to pay the chef and have to hire a new one every 10 minutes.

Love the game. This is great. Excellent. It does not force u to watch ads till you dont want rewards.. Its a great experience. But the only thing i dont like is the profits earned in a hotel cant be used in other hotels... Thats the only thing I dislike about it. Otherwise its a great relaxing game. Not only this but all other tycoons of codigames are really cool.
This by far is the BEST HOTEL GAME! Fun and Simple. Yes there may be ads, but it really helps because in exchange for watching the ads, you'll get money for upgrading your hotel. Try it!

Lots of ads. Long and short, forced and voluntary. The first hour I hardly encountered any, now I have to watch one just to load the game. Strike 1. Progress starts quickly then goes to a snail's pace soon after. I can't collect offline rewards unless I force close the app before leaving. Strike 2. Lots of their games have a great visual representation of your growth that's fun to watch. I don't get that feeling here. It just stacks stuff on screen, leaving a cluttered feeling. Strike 3.

Great time waster. I bought the no ads upgrade. Totally worth it, except now I've 5 starred every hotel and there's nothing left to do. To my point I currently have $50 million in the highest level hotel, but there's nothing new to spend on. I have effectively finished this game, and spent $11 I can longer enjoy at all.More stars when this game doesn't end, like it has for me. Also, think about adding the ability to max out an item if I have enough money to do so, so there's less button mashing.

Unplayable game unless you are willing to watch ads consistently. Game honestly needs to be reviewed separately for the paid and unpaid versions. I highly recommend the ad-free version and would rate it 5 stars with the exception of the event in-game purchase offers. Like many other reviewers have said, the game is almost unplayable if you do not pay for the ad-free version. Revenue generation is extremely slow, which means that in order to progress, you must watch ads or spend real money. I have no issue spending money to support free games I enjoy playing. I purchased the ad-free version and enjoy playing it. There are in-game event hotels which are limited time. There is an option to buy a package for $11 that includes different perks including a VIP manager and hotel upgrades. The wording the developers use to promote the in-game purchase lead the player to believe the package will allow you to keep managing the hotel and continue to have access to the manager after the event period. Because why would anyone pay $11 for in-game perks that only last for 12 hours? The game does not explain the events and the associated purchases. The details are under options in the support tab which I only noticed after I realized I had paid $11 for nothing. As a new player, I wish I would've known that the in-game purchase would be only usable during the duration of the event. I feel that the developers have made the details and wording of the purchasable offers intentionally unclear.

It's by far,one of the best idle game I played. It's difficult in the first part but as time goes on,it gets more easier and challenging.I think the only minor issue of it is the fact that some guest in the double room don't want to sit together and take up one of the space.It's kinda annoying because the guest get's out of the hotel but the fact that the guest appearance is frequent so its kinda easy.So overall,a great idle game.

If you don't mind watching a lot of ads to get a great game, this game is for you! Love all the cute things you notice if you pay attention (hint: watch the cleaners in the staff room). They still need to fix half the guests leaving when you leave the game though. Love the latest update but we need more levels! After two weeks, I'm almost 5 stars on all levels and I need more __ Great work devs!

Overall so far this game is 'okay'. Simple strategy to earn money, but the developers put the goals too high so you can't earn money quickly. It will take few days to earn some cash unless you are a hard player playing the game all day with your phone on. This is a day 2, and there is a bug i the game where I can't get the reward from the investor from watching the ad...maybe make a better version of the current app?

The whole game is great but the Imperator Palace looses ALL PROFITS, you cant upgrade hardly anything, only have 1 room & the next room is worth $31,000... i cant even reach 4,000 with 3 member of staff wages all count up to 2,500 a time... i cant just keep continuously playing all day everyday to keep what ive done... all the other hotels havent drained my profits when i start up... also its heavily draining my battery... **uninstalled**

I like and enjoy this game but it has some bugs __ to fix. The problem that I have encountered in this game __ is that the dancing king __ has stopped coming. The 2X income would take forever to come up, that I would have to get out of the game to enhance the 2 X income. The ads for the nightly skip would not come up. So irritating...please fix the bugs __.

A very cute game! And the most important thing - the ads are optional !!!!!!! You can always get money watching the Dancing King's ads (very useful by the way) but no need to do it all the time as in most games nowadays. Good graphics, new items in each hotel. Always interesting.

So, I had this game a while back. I really enjoyed it. Then it started getting all "glitchy." I uninstalled it. Missed it and reinstalled it. Now it's in perpetual "loading" mode to see an ad. It's not a real "idle" game either, because when I leave the game, the hotel stops working. I'm about to uninstall, again. Fix this, please!

Really nice idle game. Looking forward to new hotels. Please make the event hotels more varied. Like a beach one, or a sports one. Looking forward to see the evolution of the game. Only drawback is I don't see the point of revisiting an hotel I have reached 5 stars for. Any way to improve on that? New upgrades, or so advantage to getting revenues from them to finance another hotel maybe?

This is a surprisingly fun game, but be forewarned. As far as gameplay goes, it's a marathon and not a sprint. It can take days to make headway with revenue and for those wanting fast results, unless you're willing to pay up, you may be disappointed. A few thoughts. First, how about allowing outside guests to use the facilities? Second, what would happen if a hotel had to be created from scratch using revenue from other hotels? Third, if at 5-stars, turn off "!" for the optional suites.

WASTE OF MONEY DO NOT PLAY!!! Game play was nice, however it comes to an end. Once the hotels are done there are no more hotels. I spent money to help with the game, however that just expedited the game being over. Took a few months but again once you complete 35 Stars it's pretty much over. Update or allow players to start over with increased benefits.

The great is fun, perfect for slow build success. Unfortunately, the rich guy does not give you to coins after watching ads. Its inconvenience as you waste 30 seconds, waiting to get sometimes good coins(20k) and when the ad is over your balance is the same. I hope the developers fix this bug. The game itself is great though. :)

One of the few games that you can play without watching ads or paying money. It is up to you to watch ads to get extra money or pay a little bit to have no ads but you still get the benefits. So far the game is entertaining and helps to pass the time. It is very rare I give more than 3 stars so that means this is a great game. Update, only 4 hotels. Now what? More hotels will ad more stars.

I love this game so much. Codigames is the only dev that I trust that can make a really good idle tycoon game. You can really tell that there was effort put into this, unlike the other games out there that are just half-baked. I also really love the movie/pop culture references!

I still really like the game but it's really annoying that I spent money on the permanent 2x money and they turn that off for the non permanent codi resort hotel. If I had known I probably wouldn't have got it. Seems like a waste to me since once I finish all the hotels there's no other reason to have it. Other than that, it was still fun to play. Laggy especially on the last hotel and I think they need to improve all the AI but I'm sure that's because I have an Android phone.

Can you please reduce the price for premium to $7.50? I will buy it then. At the moment it is to expensive. Also, sometimes when I want to watch an ad to get double income the ad button won't show, there is just the loading "wheel" going in circles. I had to reinstall the app one time to fix it, but now it happens again. Please fix this issue.

I enjoyed the game at the start and paid to remove the ads, but has become very repetitive. I even paid for an upgrade during an "event", which happen every few days. Won't buy any more as this has become a moneymaking exercise. Also there are limited hotels. I am now on the last hotel, and taken only 3 days to complete. TBH a little bit disappointed when I consider I have been playing another game for 3 years and it is still going. I will be uninstalling when finished last hotel.

I had to take back as many stars as I could because I am deeply disappointed with the developers. I purchased the package available during the events that was a hefty 17 euros for me, and they give the upgrades only for this one event that lasts for four days. They dont give you a permanent upgrade. Support answers to complaints, for example with ingame diamonds purchased VIP decoration that is not working properly, nothing was changed. I do not want to play this anymore. Deleted all your games.

Really loving this game, it is one of the first phone apps ive spent money on(removed ads dog). Only complaint ive had while playing is that the AI of the customers needs work, their stupidity limits the money I make when playing actively due to their wasting of time by walking back and forth to closed places, which is only made up by the dancing king(sometimes). It's a major issue, but is pretty good otherwise. Will update this review over time.

the game is really great, no pressure just pure fun. I used to have no problem with it but now I do. I don't know why but the app keeps on crashing, I've uninstalled it then reinstall again but the same problem still occurs. The other games I have on my phone are working well. Do you have any suggestions to what should I do? Because I seriously don't want to permanently uninstall this app.

This game sucks, it has videos to help add money to your wallet,while you wait. This money is given by watching ads. Sad part, it only works 20% of the time. Sometimes it gives a nice reward, majority of the time it doesnt work. It will start the ads then, they will disappear and you wont get rewarded. Sometimes they freeze then you have to restart the game. My other games dont freeze up at all even during the ads. I believe this is just to cheat you out of money and upgrades!

Fun game. I've completed all the hotels, so that speaks for itself. I'm keeping the app too just in case you add more hotels. My only critiques is that it could use more of a storyline. Maybe obstacles to overcome? And, as someone else stated, I don't know why you can revisit past hotels if they can't do anything to help with the current island. But still, you shouldn't lose stars for that. They are just suggestions. Good going guys!

Worst game, why? 1) A lot of bugs, example you won't get the rewards sometimes after watching add. 2) This brings to my second point, that it just a game with add baits and high prices to buy add free. 3) They have a feature that you can start with a special even and a new manager/influencer can be earned, but they throw an impossible task that can only be accomplished by spending money. Basically they try to force you spend money to progress in the game

A really nicely made idle game - the pace is more realistic than many others I have played, the guest movements are a nice touch and there is a genuine balance between income and expenses. One suggestion I have is to dim the lights in any unsold/unoccupied rooms so that its easier to spot at a glance once check-in has ended which have failed to sell.

I love this game...but the Codi Resort Hotel way of earning managers to continue the game even when I am offline is bad. They don't give us money enpugh for making upgrades for earning money...and all are to be bought with money. At least let us use our money from the old fully upgraded hotel. We have huge stacks there and would be helpful if we could use our money from other hotels to upgrade in the Codi Resort Hotel.

The game is almost exactly what I want from this genre. Worth the price for Ad-free. Ads are all optional, but you progress much faster not having to watch them. Upgrade system is on point. Reason for 4 stars is because there is no system for utilizing hotel profits from a hotel you have fully upgraded. There is no incentive to bother with already upgraded hotels because you can't use any of the money, anyway. If this changes, it will get the 5th star.

I really love this game. It's super addicting and not to hard to progress in. It's good to play during some downtime. However, I think that the money you make should be transferrable or shared between hotels. It sucks that I don't have enough money for the hotel I'm working on, but the hotels I've already maxed out just have money sitting there that I can't use. I think having a transfer system would greatly improved the game.

I like this game, I enjoy the simplicity of the game design but it gets boring after a while. What could improve the game is adding in a challenge component. Right now with enough time you can beat each level and fully update each hotel. It would make for a more interesting play if their where challenges with each hotel you had to overcome to complete the hotel renovations.

The game was great to start off with. There was a consistency in new hotels to work though. With the update to the event hotels, it seems like the amount of new non event hotels has lessened, and the event hotels are difficult to pass. With the first one I purchased the presidential pack, and still didn't complete the set by the end of the 3 days. When I didn't purchase a set, I barely made a dent. I don't really bother with the event hotels because of this.

After the latest update my video's have not been loading so I can watch and get more money. Also same with the investors. I uninstalled and reinstalled and it started working again for a day but it's not working again. It was working just fine before this last update. Please fix! Otherwise love the game. I will give 4 stars when fixed! Thanks

It's a fun game, I can easily waste a few hours playing this, but there is one thing that is annoying enough to lose the game two whole stars. No matter how many cleaning ladies I have or how few rooms, at least one room will not be cleaned and then I get a chance at the end of the day (after losing an entire day of profits from that room) to clean it by watching an ad. I have four cleaning ladies and only three rooms, but then two of them will just do nothing all day. Really annoying.

Best game by CodiGames but whenever I want to get extra cash from the Dancing King or ask for more customers, I mostly watch video ads but there are always annoying news ads that make me wait for a minute for my rewards and have to press "Next >" every 20 seconds which is inconvient on its own. I promise, I don't look at news and even reset my ad ID to stop these occurences. I hope this review helps the game get rid of these inconvient ads and make the game convient as possible for new players.
Pretty much all the hotels look the same, same stuff, not much of a difference in design, just standard cleaning staff room, rooms, restaurant, and that's kinda it. Needs more diversity in new hotels

The concept of the game is great, it doesn't go too fast and the goals aren't unreasonable, however, I've been having trouble getting the ads to play in order to get the bonuses. Either the ad button won't load, or when I click the button it skips the ad and I lose the bonus. Also, the inability to continue upgrading or maintaining a hotel after it reaches 5 stars is annoying. Once you're done with it, you're done.

This game is 100% ad based if you want to keep it on the free version, which is perfectly fine by me! You have the option to pay to get rid of the ads and keep the rewards, if you choose. The cons are - 1. Sometimes a video won't play when you're expecting a reward, so no reward. 2. When you have a full hotel, if you close the app or switch to another hotel and go back, you somehow lost half of your customers. 3. No transferring funds to/from hotels. Other than that, it's a very addictive game!

I paid to remove the ads. But if you dont want to watch the ads you don't have to. It's addictive. Hope update to the next hotel comes soon. If can utilise the completed hotels it would be better. The best part if this game is it handles split screen mode seamlessly in both landscape and portrait. Play game and chat in WhatsApp very easily.

The actual game play is fun but there is way too many adds. Half the time I watch an add from dancing guy I don't even receive the reward. I do love this game but I'll be uninstalling for now until she if these problems have been fixed.
