And as others have stated, it's completely impossible to achieve anything in the events without spending money weekly on items that should be permanent like every other game similar to this one.

Enjoyable and addictive! But rated it 4 because the game is so easy, especially when you watch ads. Theres no challenge, just upgrade the hotel and generate profits. Once your hotel is 5 stars making tons of money, theres nothing left to buy so money adds up for nothing. However when you buy a new hotel your money starts from zero again. Itd be nice if i could use the money im making from my old hotel to put into my new one. Also please let the backround music change too for each hotel.

I liked the game, you can finish the game without spending real money but a little frustrating when it comes to game events... The goal is absurd cannot even hit 1 star (15 Million income), but its okay I can enjoy without participating in the game event. I hope the developer will make changes on their game events someday or add new features or something other than that I will finish the game. Just my opinion.

Please help!!!! I purchased many expansions, and those have been restored, but my game data is completely wiped out!!!! I was almost done with Camelot. I only had to finish upgrading the rooms. I even had all the services and amenities. Please help. I've sunken hours and hours into this game and a decent amount of money.

It's a great and fun game but my only issue is... if only there was some way to use the money in one hotel to upgrade the other... I am at the second one and I barely go to the first one cause I'm at 4 stars and have a lot of money nothing else to update but getting money in the second is quite difficult...

Originally gave this game 1 *. I even spent money buying some features. Over the past year they introduced events... and offer a special pay package for the event at $10.99. Given these events last 4 days, run about one per week based on what I have seen, and you have to buy a new package every event, this means a cost of over$500 a year to be able to compete. Further, i bought a package that updated my open time to 10 hours, cost me approx $10, does not work with event.

The game in itself is nice. But lot of bugs. After playing the advert also the reward is not credited or the game just restarts after playing the ad. Secondly what kind of tycoon game is this, if you cannot use the money earned from one hotel to another.
I loved hotel empire tycoon but from some reason the important patron didn't let me watch the video to earn money twice !! It was unfair ! Reallly! Daughter, of karelyn .

Totally worth it to pay for no ads. I only wish that when you pay to play that there would be an upgrade all button. When you generate enough money to be able to upgrade a room in full it is kind of boring to have to keep just tapping each object multipule times... Please make an upgrade all option because like it is worth it to pay it will also be worth it to upgrade all and not spend an hour upgrading when you know you have the money to get it done already. My only suggestion... 5 stars __

Sure, it's a great tycoon, more elements than usual but this is getting ridiculous. I bought stuff from previous games you've made but now all you're doing is making a "new" game every 6 months and forgetting about the older ones. SO MANY ADS. So expensive to remove ads. Difficult to play without watching ads. If you continue this I'll just end up 1 starring every game I've previously reviewed. This is getting silly.

Ads don't appear automatically after some time and you have to reinstall to continue them. Not much option for gameplays since upgrades are too expensive. You have to spend a insane amount of time to watch videos. But, it has good graphics and good game designs. Not monotonous except that ad watching part.

Game concept is good enough to play for fun. It's a mix of Tycoon and idle clicker style game. However, there are so many bugs that need to be fixed. 1. Reward ads are not working properly, sometimes I play an ad but not got the reward. 2. When game is closed , when reopening every time 3 rooms are vacant. No matter how much time I got offline. Either 1 min or 1 hour the result is same and thats really frustrating. 3. What is the use of the money earned at previous hotel ? Nothing!!!

I would definitely give this game 5 stars if it weren't for these bugs, for example: I've had many times when customers didn't come, no cars, nothing; It also happened that I entered the game after 2 hours and the cooks magically disappeared, and I don't know why. I didn't have any problems at first, but then the game started to feel a little pointless. It's nice if they fix the bugs of the game.

There's a lot to like about this game but at the moment there are few things that need to be fixed. The money boost ads sometimes don't load up, which prevents the boost from being gained and when that happens the customers will sometimes act differently as well. For instance, a customer got angry for not getting breakfast and spent the next two days in one spot in the room mad. Also the front desk clerks don't leave even though their shift ends at 12am. Small bugs, but still an enjoyable game.

I've been playing this game for about two months now and still enjoying it. Easy to grasp gameplay. Fun themed hotels to manage. The only problem is that some ads force the game to close without giving rewards.

I payed for the no ads thing. I do love it but I've almost beat every level in the game. I continue to throw a few bucks at it here and there, I was just wondering and hoping there would be a few new levels in the future. This is the best time killer I've found on my phone, I'd hate to complete it with nothing else to do. Please make a few more levels, and props to the developers for making a simple game super fun.

Heavy ad based. Your screen is sandwiched between push icons for you to buy. If you don't buy, you can always sit through many ads to get some double profit, etc. However, the ads only let you play one, then the next ad will load forever until you exit and restart the entire game. Very annoying. I've cleared cache, searched their help section, and changed to 4 different wifi and get the same frustrating result.

This is a really fun app, reminds me of a mix between a Sims game, and Dinner Dash. The things you can do are fun and numerous. You can watch ads to get currency and customers, or you can purchase premium items to give you the benefit the ads give you, which is really cool. I'm glad to see the options. Gameplay overall is just fantastic. The game is fast paced enough to keep things fun. Give this one a go, and buy the devs a cup of coffee if you can afford it.

Great game. Art style is good, gameplay if interesting, and overall a good time killer. But its kinda p2w. At the start, your gain is like 10.5 something in your rooms, and then the upgrades are like 300, 500. You must watch a lot of ads to get bonus cash. Tips are quite low. And you can easily get bankrupt. But when you get the hang of it, you can get everything right. So overall, good time killer, but grinding is so slow

__I love this Game!. But it is too expensive to play without ads. Have to watch as many ad videos as possible to establish the hotel. Otherwise, Good to play. Many things to improve in this game such as different music for each hotel, And to make the game more realistic by setting the wage manually, choosing decorations and room checkin check out...etc. Thank you

This game has kept me engaged for about 2 years now. I love it, but the hotel guests are the dumbest hotel guests I've ever seen. It takes them 30 mins to get to the restaurant, they get there 2 mins before it opens, and instead of just waiting, they walk away. They walk around looking for fun at 2am. Or they all rock up at a public space at one time and there are too many of them so some are turned away. Sometimes I lose a lot of income from this and it's very annoying.

Good game, I love it. But I only give it 3 stars due to profits way too low and expenses way too high. So I have to depend on the ads to get money. And the problem is now that ads won't load either. Ads gives you guys money, why would you make it playable in a limited times if you want to earn profits as well?

Great game! I have but one complaint: How about 20 or 30 minutes for watching ads to get the 2x bonus? I know, revenue. But it would be nice to enjoy the game without literally 10 minutes worth of ads before I can enjoy the extra scraps 2x money gets me. Please consider my suggestion. Thanks you.

Its fun. But if you are away for a while and come back, they offer double your earnings by watching a video. I have done this multiple times and ever time, they don't add double to my balance. :( they should fix this. I watch a billion ads already to get anywhere in this game. It doesn't deserve anything more than a one star at this point.

Without the ad problem and issues with occupancy dropping to half every time you log out the game it would be an easy 5 stars. Even with the gameplay issues, I would have given it 3 stars. But to see many people on here express their issues here for weeks, and to see the developers give bad excuses and say they'll look into it with nothing changing is my reason for giving it 1 star.

GREAT GAME!!!!!! This is more of a suggestion than anything.  Was just thinking how it would be nice to have more of an opportunity to many extra money in  the game.    i.e.  let's say all your rooms are booked and the new walk-in guests are denied because there are no vacant rooms. Instead of leaving they would visiting one of our services room restaurant, bar Etc..And than this way here you still can possibly make extra money from randomly choosen denied guests. Keep up great work! ______

Slow to the point of boredom right off the bat. I dont know if it gets better because I don't want to spend any more time playing. Good luck paying for your employees without watching ads. Upgrades to rooms seem to give only the tiniest uptick to your profit, so you would need to watch ads for several hours to begin to actually make money. Most mobile games start out very fast and slow down, this one is like a brick wall at the start, and I dont care to bash my head against it.

This game is easy and fun to play. It's enough to pass a few hours away with. BUT! And it's a big but, you have to watch a ton of adds to really get anywhere with game. If you don't watch the adds it could take months just to build up enough money to complete one hotel. Unless you spend actual money on this and to skip adds completely it'll cost you ¡ê10.49. No thanks! That just way to high for me for a game that only has 4 hotels to build up. And I'm already on the last hotel!

I play the game and to try to keep without any boosts or anything I barely use ads which firstly makes the game very difficult from the startup of a new hotel. Also, this is meant to be an idle game so I don't understand why the hotel closes after just 2 hours of inactivity. And now I think my game is bugged and wouldn't let me open it even thought I have a strong WiFi connection. I can literally play the other game theme park idle simulator with no issues.

It's a fun game, but I'm having issue with the double profits function. If you watch 12 ads, you accumulate the maximum of 2 hours of double profits, but if you close the game and re-open it (immediately), the amount of double profits time decreases significantly (usually by 1 hour), which either is a glitch, or either the app is quite agressive ad-wise.

Really good idle game. The downside, once every couple days the game will only allow me to watch one ad for extra money. I reboot the game and once again I can only watch one ad. I reached out to the games support but never received any.

There needs to be more hotels & a reset option. I have finished the last hotel & now have nothing to do. I tried deleting/ reinstalling after clearing my cache to restart, so I would have something to do. No luck...so I now will not log into the game until there is a new hotel added. Gems should be awarded more, so we have the ability to buy more gem items.

Really enjoy this game. Only downside is I have completed the third hotel. All rooms are maxed out, all services maxed out, and all targets are completed but have not been awarded the fifth star. All staff that are available and have been employed and all advertising is on. I am making maximum profits and still cannot unlock the next hotel as for some reason, have not been given fifth star even though there is literally nothing else I can improve in this hotel.

Is it possible to increase the number of guests that each member of staff can serve at the restaurant and bar? It seems silly that 1 chef can only serve 2 customers. There are lots of empty seats and a small queue of people, and most of the hotel goes without food if you have a large hotel. The prison game was more realistic.

Game is superb but only one thing that is very bad that it has very low money generation compared to all expenses and everytime i leave and back then i was in loss . Plz fix this And one request that you must provide landscape mode for playing this type of games .

It's very nice game and interesting but after completing the other hotels there is no use of going back to it even though they still continue to run and make more profit could've been better if u can borrow money from the other profitable hotels to use on the new ones instead of starting from scratch and there will be no use of the money made from the already existing profitable hotels.

Nothing more than an ad delivery device. About every minute or so, it is presenting some reason for you to watch an ad. And now, it's gotten to the point where even if I agree to watch the ad, no ad actually shows, so no reward. And $10+ just to keep the game running idle for more than 2 hours? Really? The depth of play nowhere near justifies the pay-to-play upgrades.

Love this game. Absolutely no forced ads however if you want extra financial earnings you can watch them for a good amount. The ads generally aren't super long either unless they're uncommon 30 second ones to show up. The game for me was a tad laggy, especially once I started upgrading a lot of stuff, but overall the best tycoon game developers I've seen so far

Main reason i give the game a 3 star is due to the bug this game has. For some reason when you leave the game running in the background it won't countdown your time or build up your profit after leaving the game alone. You have to completely close the game and reopen it but even that sometimes doesn't work and you're not able to to get your reward for coming back to the game. Please can you fix this issue it's tedious and annoying.

It is alright but I actually want to start a hotel like no objects is there from the start and that you get to choose where to put the objects. How ou can do the tutorial is just have enough money from the start to buy a counter. Then they pay you enough money to make a room and make it evolve. I know I'm asking a lot for you but I'm begging you, please listen and understand my advice. My opinion A fan

I love the game, it was the only thing I wanted. Half a year ago I was searching for a hotel tycoon but all I ended up with was some kind of bUiLd YoUr oWn CiTy, like townscape and now that this game came out I was so happy! The only thing I don't like is that there are only boys and I would also like you to add a family room and add girls and little kids ( please) thanks a lot if you do because that would be a great pleasure!

Edit: Took three days to get an answer about an issue and then y'all leave a half smarta$$ reply on here. I understand it isn't an automatic service, THAT'S FINE. What isn't fine is there's no wait time listed not even an idea of how long things will be handled and in my case, it was 3 days. ANYWAY, people who buy on this game are making you money. Remember that, developer when you're leaving halfway smarta$$ replies.

Update: after posting this review the problem got solved quickly and the game is back to being very fun! Just a little bit buggy. I'm hoping the problem stays fixed The game was fantastic until the ads stopped working. I loved it but now it's incredibly slow and not very fun. I didn't mind watching the ads and they sped up the game to a good pace. Now they won't load and the game is very slow.

I really enjoy playing the game it is great. However I recently got to the second Hotel and problems are starting to occur. 1. Anything that is ad related will close the game at times. 2. The button for the boosters won't function at times as well. 3. The game will only keep in game guests checked-in the single bed bedrooms. Once you exit and return to the game the two bedrooms will be unoccupied. Like I said I enjoy the game but these glitches make the game a bit upsetting to play with.

poorly made cash trap. played through most of the hotels in the game and it's taken months. cool concept at first but not worth the little space it takes up on the phone. not to mention the bugs. you can return to older hotels but theres no point at all considering you have to get 100% done with each hotel to even get the next one. edit - in one of the last hotels and I'm permanently stuck making -3k a day. great game. I'm honestly ashamed I spent the amount of time I have on this.

Keep having to close the game out! Everytime the ads stop working the housekeepers get stuck and game play is no longer worth the time!!!!! I wouldn't be so agitated over this if I was using an old device, however, my device is brand new, which means the game needs to be fixed so people can play it. I hope this is taken seriously as I love playing this game, but it seriously needs to be fixed to work properly. At the moment this game isn't even worth one star.

I enjoyed this game yes I paid to get all the bonuses .. it was a little more expensive than I like but well worth it the game is so much more enjoyable. My only concern in I'm worried I will beat the game and it will run out of levels. I would also like to see a bit more flexibility in what you can do with guests but otherwise thoroughly enjoying playing this as a past time.
will there be a new hotel? Finished the latest one ages ago

I love this game! Every detail was thought out so it plays beautifully!! However, here's my issue: Ever since that last update, nearly every time I click the VIP the app crashes. Sometimes I've watched the video and gotten the money, then it crashes and I lose it. Sometimes it doesn't even black out the screen to take me to the ad and The VIP has turned to leave, then it crashes. Lastly, when it crashes it kicks the people out of 2 rooms, even if it's night. (Always 2). I'd like my VIPs back...

Fun for 10m but it quickly gets old. I also felt it did not do a good job explaining rating system. Felt this game was very unrewarding for the hours of ads I had to watch and the constant grind, literally everything needs an upgrade on top of an upgrade. I was finally done getting to 5 stars on 1st hotel after prob 4-6 hrs. After all that time and resisting the obvious cash grabs to skip ads it just reminded me how unplayable pay- to- time-skip mobile games are.

I've been playing this game for over a year now and its been engaging. But I would love to pool in all the money from all hotels, that can bring in the feel of a hotel tycoon. Codigames should introduce hotels based in different countries and can develop the hotel portraying the culture of different countries and different regions. This would bring in actual feel of being a hotel tycoon. I would just like to know when is the new hotel update coming up??

In app purchases don't work. Customer support ignored my request to simply receive the event booster I purchased, and then ignored my second request for a refund when the event was halfway over. Super disappointed and out $11.
I've completed all the hotels to 5 star level. I'm not spending any money on buying upgrades, so what now?

I liked it a lot. I'm on my second hotel, but when I got the game, whenever that "dancing man" came, it would OCCASIONALLY freeze in the middle of the ad and then not give me any coins. Now, nine times out of ten, it CONVENIENTLY freezes at the end of the ad, and then clicks out without giving me coins- or it freezes and I end up having to restart the app. Please fix that.

Game is overall fun with quite few bugs and hard parts. I'm on the 5th hotel currently and it's still as fun as the 1st one. The biggest and most annoying bug I've come across is that after the "dancing man" arrives to offer me an ad for video and i watch it, after he leaves, his icon pops up on the right of my screen in order to watch another video for more money. I never seem to get any of that money and sometimes the dancing man's money also doesn't get delivered. Not sure what's at fault.

Good fun little game, worth buying the no ad upgrade if you can afford it though. I'm already in the last hotel.. kinda wondering what happens after that, as finishing that negates the point of doing the event hotels. Editing this nearly a year later, still no new hotels! Downgrading your star. Come on, new content please!!

Where has this game been all my life!? Its fun managing the ins and outs of a hotel. I thought I would be overwhelmed, but it has a nice pace to it. Charming game...the finacer/investor is my favorite character!

I wish it wasn't quite so focused on ads as a part of the active play. In order to advance quickly with the app open you need to watch adds to get perks that would otherwise take a while to get; I would just enjoy it more if the ads weren't nearly as necessary. Other than the vast quantity of ads, the gameplay is very fun and rewarding! Excellent concept!

Great graphics and addicting game play. All the shiny reminders of things to buy can be annoying and really take up the screen. Biggest issue is tha the profits from one hotel can't be spent on another--once I've reached 5 stars, what's the point of even collecting the profits? Isn't that the basis of a business empire???

I like the game! I enjoyed playing the game until about halfway through the third hotel! At a certain point the investor stopped coming and I am unable to watch ads to double my income. This makes the game move too slowly as upgrades are extremely expensive compared to what you are accumulating in the game. I am at a point that I cannot do anything without double income or investor perks.

The game is fun but very very very glitchy. The ads don't play. I either have to force stop the game or uninstall-install it again. The investor doesn't come as well, unless I uninstall the game then get it back, that trick only works for the first time i open the game after re-installing it. If i watched a video successfully to double the profit, when i exit out of the game the doubled profit goes away. If I had all rooms occupied, once i leave the game i come back to find half rooms empty.

I thoroughly enjoyed this game from start to finish! The first time I've ever played a game like this and now I'm a fan. I'll keep this one on my phone to delete and replay in the future. I did pay the extra $10+ for ad free and another $10+ for the manager later in the game. Neither is neccessary. I was simply enjoying the game so much that I decided to enhance the experience and I would have spent that much on a movie and snacks which would not have lasted as long or entertained me as much

At the bottom of the screen is the VIP campaign where you have to watch a 30 second advert to get 10 minutes of 2 x's play. Click on watch video then come out of the game and go back in. You don't have to watch the advert and you'll get 10 minutes double play each time you do it up to 2 hours. I don't think it work's anywhere else in the game but it definitely work's on VIP campaign.

So far I really do love this game. I definitely can't wait for more hotels to come as I have finished the first hotel and fully upgraded it so for now my money is just building up and I hope when the new hotels come I get to keep it all instead of losing it like most of the games that are like this. This is an awesome game just watching the rooms change when you upgrade them brings me fun to see the differences they have with each upgrade.

This game is a lesson in how NOT to do addictive phone games. I've finished the game not once but TWICE now after their "additional content" amounted to 1 more hotel. Top tip CodiGames - if you're going to make a game this addictive, at least have a ton of content ready to go *before* you release it. Now I'm sat around waiting for them to catch up. The game itself is great and well thought out - but ¡ê10 just to keep the hotel open for 10 hours is outrageous given the issues above.

I think that it's a brilliant game, but very recently a notification keeps popping up when I access the game and it's rendering me unable to play the game at all! I'm extremely angered by this; I hope that the issue can be resolved or I will have just have to rid of the game.

Really love this game but im upset that after getting really far. I didnt manage to get back and check my hitel and the game continues to play..which i didnt know. I return after cooking dinner and i get a... my hotel closed!..and i have to start over. Happened twice now. How often do i have to go on this game? Love it but why the hotel death? No fair ..can it be fixed? Would be 5 star if game didnt ruin my fun.

Thank you for fixing glitches in game and responding to my request promptly. Love this game! So addicting and fun to play! Just wish you could earn enough diamonds to get extra speciality items for every room.
Constantly crashing. Great when it work, but crashing doesn't even let me open the game.... Dissapointed
Many glitches as when ever u close the games few rooms become empty. Then in restaurants the take seats which are away making more time.the cleaner also cleans room which are away so it take time.

The game is enjoyable. But I wish housekeeping would go into the rooms where people aren't in. Also, they charge way too much for the removing adds and other extras. 100% of the apps I've played, which is a ton, they charge about $1.99 or $1.95 to remove adds. The other perks are also way too expensive. I would understand if it was $2 or $3 dollars. I also wish that when you max out one hotel, you could transfer up to half that money to another hotel where you really need the money. GG though

Pretty fun game so far. Love the concept and game play and the fact I can own and have multiple locations. But since were not able to use profits from our other hotels to build on our new locations, we have to watch ads to generate extra cash and watching Ads for little hotel money is pretty ok but half the time the money isn't even added to my balance. Please fix!!! Thanks. Update: the New events are cool. But I have Millions of dollars in my old hotels that I can't use to do ANYTHING. Fix pls

The best tycoon game I have ever found. I bought the no-ads, which made it PERFECT. And unlike some games, it didnt cost me a lot just to remove ads. My only complaint is that I ran out of hotels after getting all 35 stars. But it was extremely fun while it lasted!! *UPDATE: Despite their response, no new hotels have been added and its been nearly a year*

I really enjoyed this game at the start! I'm now on the 3rd hotel and am now deleting the app... the dancing man does not work most of the time which is extremely frustrating as you have to watch ads to pretty much progress in the game. This doesn't bother me too much, but the fact it crashed all the time is so dumb. Also when I switch to look at my older hotels and then go back to my current one, the guests have disappeared.

Yep same as everyone else .. finding the game very fun and I don't mind having the option to watch ads, you get a reward and it isn't forced on you like some other games. However, why do the ads stop? And limit to once a reload? It's silly to reward us for a while then take it away? Just makes me want to stop playing, especially because when you start a new hotel the little gold man with free money helps a lot! Please fix... plus more ad revenue right?

I like the basic idea of the game, but what frustrates me is that the game is at first incredibly slow to play, you get double profits for only 10 minutes if you watch one ad and some ads don't even do anything. I watch the ad, but nothing happens and the game just goes on as if I didn't just watch an ad... The ads which have no effect are the ones from AdColony.

It's a good game that I ended up purchasing as the ads are annoying (I feel it was worth it). Later hotels got a bit buggy and would crash and special items purchased with gems would disappear from my hotel. These were refunded by the company when reported, however on repurchasing special items they again disappeared. I didn't bother reporting again. I have now completed all of the hotels and awaiting a new one __

Really fun game until it crashes. It stopped connecting to ad videos and no VIP turns up even though I've tried closing the app etc. It's so frustrating because the upgrade were designed to have to use the ads to get money $ if not I'd have to wait a whole day or two just for one upgrade. I'm not doing that. What a shame and waste of time.

Great but not satisfied. When you move hotels the customers will be gone when you came back. Also the chef wage is 180 but if you have 2 chef it will be 1080? Skipping tutorial is nice because you can just literally learn while playing but you should have an option for help for others that is very forgetful. You can't bring the money earned in the first hotel so basically it's nonsense to go back. This game has potential. Please fix all the bugs. Thanks

Love this game, however quite often if you come out of the game and then some time later go back into the game, the game will be stuck on the moment you left the game, which means your hotel didn't earn money while you were away. Also, if when you're watching a video for some extra money and accidentally click your screen and the ad takes you to the play store/apple store it cancels out the reward from the video. Such a shame as this is a good game.

This game doesn't save progress very well. If I am playing it and get my hotel full of guests and then my phone goes dark even for a second, it gets rid of half of the guests I had. Money doesn't seem to accumulate accurately. You can't turn the sound off. I have turned it off and still heard the noises in the game. If I'm playing and listening to music, I don't want to hear the sounds of someone pooping. Also, how immature to have that sound to begin with.

500 characters is not enough to summarise my thoughts on the game. It is annoyingly fun and addictive, but so terribly lacking in the way of polish. Flawed mathematics, annoying bugs, little realism, a lack of continuity between idle and active play and the list goes on. Ads aren't obtrusive and don't appear without the user's input which is a plus.

If you like Hotel games then it is for you!! But I can tell you right now that you can't build it yourself but ANYWAYS YA it's pretty fun so go download it yourself!!! If I like it then you will to. But ANYWAYS you can buy your own staff and buy Hotel rooms and by the way they let you start off with (2) Hotel rooms. GO DOWNLOAD IT YOURSELF AND I BET YOU WILL NEVER DELETE IT OFF YOUR PHONE. P.S can you find the gander room??

I loved this game becuase you can play it all day and it almost never gets old. One thing I didn't like about it is you can't create like your own account so if you break your device you have to restart or re-do all of your progress. But overall for anyone that is going on a trip and has nothing to do or is sitting in bed and saw an add I recommend this app.

It is very challenging that rivals a lot of simulation tycoons, but still needs some improvement like renevation and more upgrades to keep customers enjoy as well as new challenges such as daily quest to earn money and jewels. Althought I still lack more sayings to allow yourselves to improve the game, I'll keep in touch and notify if I have new ideals to say. Neverless, it's awesome!!!:))

The game is cool. I understand that you use ads to make it profitable and I am fine with that. But it's disgusting the way you intentionally make the "double profits" and "VIP campaign" buttons not clickable (most of the time). All buttons are instantly available to click, except these two, which is a way to force us to buy premium features. This is not a bug or connection issues from my side, this is intentional. Don't even bother to respond me unless you change its behavior, then I'll give 5*

You have to watch quite a few ads to make it worthwhile or spend $11 to disable ads. Also, like many others have said there is now an issue where you can only use the ad loan maybe once or twice before any ad benefit is disabled when you're supposed to be able to watch several to double your profits up to 2 hours. Hopefully this will be fixed soon

EDITED: I loved it at first, slow but I like it for that reason... however, I got to the second hotel and I quickly realized that the game had a bug where the cleaners would constantly ignore rooms or stand in the rooms they are cleaning and stare at the walls forcing me to restart the game. I also realized that in order to get 5 stars in a hotel you have to BUY all the gem items. Not a problem until you realize you need 9 stars to get hotel 3. In other words, you have to spend to move on :(

1 yr later- no updates with new hotels. what a shame Dont waste your time or money like i did _ . __ I still enjoy the game but I'm on the last hotel and its bittersweet. I can't believe there hasn't been any new hotels yet. I'd love to see a Halloween, kids, cruise, zoo, or amusement park themed hotel! 3/7/21 . _____ I paid for no ads and its worth it, the game is still fun and I cant wait to finish all the hotels! I hope there are more added so I don't have to stop after the final one. 9/8/20

Is it just me today or are other people having issues loading the game today. I have been trying to load my game all day. I have uninstalled and reinstalled 2 times and restarted my phone a few times plus I have double checked to make sure my phone is all up to date. I have a newer Samsung phone so that is definitely not the issue. All I get on my screen is loading. I have even let it stay on the loading screen for over 30 minutes and still not letting me play.

Takes way to long to make some money and is not working in offline mode. Usualy a game of this type, when is closed is still making money. But is not the case with this. I have played for a little bit and after a week the game didn't collect anything. Is exactly in the same place where I stop playing. I was expecting to see it had collected some money from visitors. So is uninstalled now.

I have gotten really addicted to this game, I don't even really like Idle games! I didn't know that this was going to become my favourite game. And I have got to say I never watch adverts for things, but now whenever I see it saying it will give me more than 400, I am there watching it. The layout is good. And I had a little laugh when I first saw them on the toilet__ I really recommend this game, and it is sort of educational because staff wages have to be kept in mind

It's a great game, i just got one problem I will wanted the developer for this game to make it easy, when it come down with the employee you have to contiue to pay them. That you won't have to pay them, but the employee will still do there job on the game. And add free gems ads on this game too, to make it easy, to go to the hotel, instead of buying the gems.

So many have posted but nothing changed, ads don't load, have to exit game & re-enter to continue but then lose rooms & parking. And hotels take FAR too long to build up in initial stages, the rewards need to be higher. Plus restaurant staff too expensive and only serve 2 guests. And if chef wage is 400, why is daily wage 1200 for 1 chef, 2400 for 2 chefs etc? It must be 400 per chef PER MEALTIME to serve just 2? Ridiculous! Takes too long to build up earnings. Many similar games work better! __

I played this game everyday until now.. "Dancing King" and the "skip night" just don't work anymore. It's the best way to get money, but now I only get them once when I play. I've tried everything like turning my phone off and on, restarting my phone, and turning my wifi on and off. Without the "Dancing King" I make very small amount, so I just go off the app a few hours and check on later. just I think it's just a glitch or something, but I will delete this app if it doesn't get fixed.

This would be a 5 star if you didn't have to pay to actually have fun playing. If you don't pay for no ad bonuses it would be a nightmare. If you can pay it this game is honestly great, you can spend a good amount of time playing instead of just waiting but there is some waiting involved. The events are always the same but fun. Major downside is i completed all levels so long ago and I thought there would be a new one by now. We need a new level asap! Or at least the option to start over!

Simple but great way to pass the time. Requires a lot of patience and you must be willing to watch lots of ads or pay real money to get bonuses like 2x multiplier, extra cash etc. I'm glad the game has been updated recently as a new hotel has been added but my only gripe is that since this update, the game seems to start lagging after about 5 minutes of gameplay. When you're trying to drag your finger around the hotel it's not ideal, hence the 4 star rating. Maybe another update to fix this?

Addictive and enjoyable to see the hotels grow. Accomplished all missions with all hotels running 100%. But, special event is a waste of time ie NO way to achieve the final target unless spend real $. Imperator Palace has serious known tech bugs but yet not fixed. Graphics cute though a few guests sleeping at wrong corner of bed, and some walked through walls. Thanks for helping us pass time.

I like playing this game a lot but sometimes a few things don't work. Like when you first go in and you can double the money your hotel has earned, the button to watch the ad doesn't work. The ad button to double your earnings while playing and to get the extra investor money doesn't work either. Quite frustrating

I'm a simple guy, I enjoy these tycoon idle games. The reason I gave this game 5 stars is due to how much I enjoy the game after the purchases I made, which was alot for a free game. Somewhere around $28. I only spent the money, well, because I can and it's my money. If you're willing to play it without the purchases, I wish you patience.

There is a bug. Whenever I close the game and start again, always 5 rooms seem to be empty and even if it is 2am in the night in game, people start leaving hotel. The Stanley resort. Please look into it. This is reason I have reduced the rating to 1.

Ultimately fun and I like the artwork, but the main issue is that time progresses very quickly and people move at a fairly normal speed, meaning that it can take 2+ hours for guests to walk the maybe 100 metres from their room to the front desk! Also not many hotels in the game. Also, particularly in the third hotel, the restaurant serves 12 people maximum, but I've already got 22 occupancy with only a fraction of the rooms and only a small amount queue at a time, so many just give up.

its nice. havent played it enough yet but im digging the graphics. 2021 Edit: The beach hotel needs work, the patrons are so freaking slow they can't get anywhere on time. It`s frustrating. 2021 april edit: the ads aren't loading properly and I can see others are having the same problem. Hope this will be fixed soon.

It's a fun game. You don't have to consistently move characters around which I love. The graphics are pretty basic and the fonts can be difficult to read if reading small fonts are an issue. I like the options to upgrade the rooms and to keep leveling up. I'll keep this one! Fyi: the tiny dancing guy that comes into the hotel lobby to dance? Free money for gameplay if you watch a short advert. Turn off the sound .. You're golden.

The idea of managing a hotel and the gameplay are fine. Support is horrible, if you send a ticket, you don't get a response until you run out of patience and end up writing another (didn't get any sort of response within 3 weeks). Graphics are sometimes buggy, like street lanterns in one of the hotels only had the upper part but no "body". Would be useful if the game gave you a notification on your phone once the 2h 2x money bonus runs out.

Great game! I think it just needs more options on upgrade like more items, more venues and more places. Also like events, meeting room for people, birthday event. and Reservations also more choices on which room you will make as the owner of the hotel. Sorry my english was not that good, but i hope you understand my point. God bless.

I love this game and have been using it as a pass time for many months, but there are glitches starting to happen in the game. The ads wont load, the guy who comes to give you money just up and leaves and the game will freeze at times. These make it really hard to play expecially with the events.

There's some control issues with the game, and if you don't buy the no ads feature then it's a rough start, but the game is enjoyable. No ads is $11, so if you want a cheap(ish) game to burn some time then I recommend it, but otherwise you might want to go somewhere else if you don't want to spend the money. Not cheap for a mobile game for no ads, but as a game it's cheap.

I really REALLY enjoy the game but I think there are some things that would make it better. 1) allow us to use the money from previous hotels on the NEW ones we open AND use them on the EVENTS to be able to attempt to complete the events. 2) if we want give the options to use our diamonds to purchase money if #1 isn't going to happen. 3)[not really a suggestion more of a question] are the packages that are available for the events are they available for entirety or not?

Update: May 2021 Completed all Hotels, hope there will be more hotel levels. 2020 Review Addicting Game, love the updates. Wish their was opportunities to get instant cash fast, something like how you watch ads to double your profit for 2h. Other then that its an addicting game to play, keep up the updates. Recommend this game for sure.
I love this game :D. It have many hotels to manage and events in between too. I've been playing from just 3-4 days and it is ver fun. I really recommend to play this :).

Game is decent. I've played other tycoon games, but this is the first mobile one I've played, so I expected some "roadblocks". However, the game is WAY too slow, and watching an ad will only speed it up for ten minutes...although you can increase that watching multiple adds. And the generator should be putting out more power then it does...or some items should be using less. Either way it doesn't feel balanced to me. I can't see myself playing for much longer.

Cute Game to pass the time with; however, it was too easy to beat. I've had this game less than a month and already fully upgraded all the hotels. I hope they plan on coming out with more soon. One annoying thing, is as soon as you close the app it tells you the hotel closed, I figured out it was just to get back into the game - I just waited until I got the all hotels are closed message (every 2 hours). Small thing to note, I hate ads so I bought that add on.

Giving it a 2 bc the game is one of the better check out the app a few times a day depending on how much I feel like playing. It was enjoyable. Now that I've made some progress and got to the 2nd hotel it seems like the game is working hard to make me pay. The cash for an ad character shows up much less frequently, which I sort of get. But now the ad only plays like 20 percent of the time so you don't get the reward nearly as often. Seems like they're trying to get me to buy the no ads feature.

It is an ok game and somewhat fun to play, but the game is lacking some complexity and flexibility. It's pretty straightforward, and most of the times all you can do is wait for money to accumulate or watch ads or pay money. There is no real threat of bankruptcy, and wrong choices only affect the time you need to play to complete the tasks and get 5 stars for hotels. I understand that this is a very casual game, but come on, tycoon type games need more complexity.

Love this game, wish there were more hotels. The graphics are cute. The balance between ads was fine for enjoyable game play (and it is an idle game, so meant to run over time passively) but I enjoyed it so much I bought the no ad upgrade. In game I wish there was an upgrade all function, once you get the hang of creating successful hotels its frustrating to upgrade each item individually. Preferred this over the prison game as I like to make people happy :)

It was a fun game but I would really appreciate it if the hotel had some bad scenarios to add to the fun. As you play the game, it will start becoming boring to a state where you won't want to enter the app as it isn't fun anymore. All you need to do is just wait for the money and then upgrade things. It would be much more fun by adding exciting scenarios like, the hotel got broken into, the hotel closed down, the hotel went broke or the hotel had a fire. It would really be a better game.

It's an OK casual game, but you need to watch a lot of ads to get anything out of it, also only 5 hotels to complete so done relatively quickly. The events are also impossible without spending a lot of money, which I'm not doing, especially if my other hotels are fully completed so the bonuses wouldn't be that much benefit anyway. If there were more hotels so I could keep playing I might rate higher.

I love tycoon and idle games. I found this game after playing idle miners. Although i enjoy it. I have a couple issues! 1 being the money from your other hotels doesnt transfer over. After buying all the upgrades there is just money piling with nothing to spend it on. 2. Its only 1 way 2 earn diamonds 4 special items. that wouldn't be a problem if there were enough task 2 get them. It would be nice to use the money at my old hotels in the new one since i cant spend it at the old ones

Just finished building my first five star hotel and noticed that I can't use my profits from this hotel in my next one. I'm done upgrading this hotel so it will just stand there and collect money for nothing! I don't understand how the developers thought - it's like you have to restart the game Everytime you finish a hotel? It's too bad because I don't feel motivated at all to build another hotel that will just stand there and collect money without use. Fix the bug and the game will be super!!!

It's a good game. Its challenging and there's a lot to do. But I don't understand why the money you earn from your previouse hotels can not be used for another hotel you started. That doesn't make any sense especially when you have nothing left to update on the previous hotels. All of the money on your old hotels just stock up and you don't even have anything to put it towards on that hotel because everything is completed yet you can't use it towards a hotel you are starting.

The "idle" time. It is only 120 minutes. for every 10 minutes of "idle" you need to see a small advertisement. 12 commercials for 120 minutes of idle. I can't go through level 3. for nothing I made all the changes I don't have 5 stars I spent all the diamonds in front of no purpose. it seems that I should still buy diamonds to be able to pass the level I think the game is made in such a way that without buying you can not pass on level 3.

I really love this tycoon game! However I do have a complaint that the guests never spend time in their rooms! You put so much stuff for them to do in the rooms yet all they do in their rooms is sleep. I get that them using all the attractions gets you money but it's still a waste to add so much into a room and it's never used

The game is a lot of fun, especially if you pay to get the ads removed; however, I'm now at the end of the game and there's nothing left to do. There aren't any more hotels and I'm not even sure they are going to add more. There's also not a way to reset the game. It's also unfortunate that you can't transfer money from one hotel to another. Each hotel, you have to start with nothing but everything is a lot more expensive to buy the further you get into the game so it takes awhile to earn money

I've only been playing this game for a short period of time.. but here is my honest take away from the game play. I have enjoyed the game for the most part, and haven't seen the issues with the ads. Probably because I decided to support codigames and spend 10 bucks to avoid watching ads. My biggest issue with the game is that there is no AI built into the guests.. i watch a guest mosey clear across the hotel to get to the restaurant that opens at 730. The guest walks away at 728

Fun, but glitchy. Half the time when you click on the investor and then click "Watch Video" the video screen flashes and he walks away without giving anything. Pretty annoying. Other than that it's nice to slowly build and become profitable. Unfortunately after you Max a hotel it becomes pointless unless I'm missing something. Wish there was a way to use the millions of pointless money.

Very enjoyable game, can sit and play constantly for hours on end... However it seems after the game has been played for a small amount of time the videos for bonuses stop working and the game starts to become very slow and difficult to grow on. Had to uninstall and reinstall just to get them to work again. Unfortunately the problem reoccurred after a day of playing and have had to do the same again

Feeling more like the game creator was just in it for money. The amount of ads you have to watch just to keep your income somewhat flowing is insane. The upgrades tap out easy so there isn't much of a way to earn higher income, a combined income would be better. I finished most of the second hotel upgrades and I'm finding it incredibly dull just watching ads(10.99 to stop ads), which is the majority of the game. Eventually you have to pay to finish the game anyway. Cute graphics though.

This game has a lot of glitches that started to get worse the farther you get into it. I would give it 5 stars if it wasn't for that it's an awesome game please fix the little bugs. Some movies don't play when you expect an award for watching it. And the third board all of the guest are not going to room it's simple I think that can be fixed. Fix the bugs on the videos. Think I am going going to delete the game it cheats you out of money from that supposed to earn for watching the videos.

It was really good until we got to the last one, Santa's Shelter. Very disappointing. I played this and paid for benefits just to get to Santa's Shelter. Not worth it if you are looking forward to something cute and festive. This hotel is literally the first hotel. Just with a touch of a christmas wreath and a christmas tree. Not worth. Waste of time. Also the star ratings only go up once you've upgraded everything in your hotel. I would expect it to be based off the likes of customers.

45 second adverts are not acceptable. I want to like this game but it's just so buggy, whether that's people flying through walls or logging in at 2am to find everyone starts wandering down to breakfast or the spa. Basically the exact same bugs as in prison tycoon. It's also really tedious that most levels need 100% completion before being able to move to the next.

I've been playing this game for months now, and all of a sudden I can no longer plan ads, and since I will not pay $10.99 to have the ads removed completely, I am now STUCK. I don't appreciate whatever change was made in the last update, because now nothing works! I am terribly disappointed because I loved (note the past tense) this game. Fix it please! And to Codigames, don't comment "send a message to us" because I ALREADY DID!!

The game is a good way to pass the time. Its a little time consuming and a slow build but not horrible. My issue is with the purchasing. I buy the VIP packs for the events and I have been charged double at times or I have been charged but did not receive the pack. I have contacted support but I have not received any help. The events are time based so that is a problem.

I love this game, I found it really addicting. I'm so disappointed that there are no more hotels to play. Still waiting for new levels:( the events have gotten boring and what is the point if you beat all the levels

I'm only rating two due to the fact... 1. Fun game and time killer 2. Very very slow paced 3. Trickery... you have you buy gems to progress. Meaning, you can easily obtain 4 stars for your hotel via cash, but the other star is obtained via gems, just2 unlock the hotel's require stars gathered from others. For example, spend 20 gems for a tablet in one room, you have 6 rooms first hotel. So if you want to progress you have to buy gems. That's just the rooms, there is still the bar and kitchen...

Codi is back on track with a quality game. Bugs have been fixed and loving the new hotels. I wish there was a way to channel money between hotels. It seems pointless to have all that cash on other hotels and not be able to use it for other options. Maybe make it usable for the new event hotels? Please?
Just can't getenough of this game. The first idle game I can say that I'm relaxed. The money earning is fast, the upgrading of is cheap. The perfect idle game for relaxing. Highly recommended.

I do love this game! It's a great time passer and although you must use your money wisely, it isn't impossible to earn. The only negatives I have are that it's unclear how to change negative income. Also it drives me insane seeing the SAME ad OVER AND OVER. The ads are not extremely long, and always give you a reward in return, however it would be nice seeing ads for other apps too.

Okish. The game is fine, but the progression is really slow. They want you to focus on buying, or ads which there are a lot of. You really have to rely on the 2x multiplier if you want to progress, but you have to watch a 30 second ad to get 10 minutes of it. The power ups you can purchase, but for the price of 5-15$ wouldn't you just go get a solid game instead? Tycoons are fun for a bit, but I would never see myself paying so much to play a game without ads.

The game is perfect the graphics, style and the gameplay are good wish all Idles game (idle supermarket..) was at the same quality as this one. I have a question what we can do whit the money we earn from the previous hotels? We can't use it once we reach 5 stars! It will be good if we can use it in the development for the others hotels or at least a 50% of the sum or something like this! Thank you to find a solution for this problem and to make games like this .

Good game. Not too difficult to progress, its achievable, which is great especially for an app like this. No requirement at all to purchase anything or buy gems. Only thing i would suggest is it would be good to control check in and check out times, be able to accept or decline bookings dependant on how many nights/people are staying in a room or be able to hold them in hotel until checkout - be able to control opening hours of facilities and staff wages. Good app but needs more hotels!

This game honestly it's great. But the issues that I have with this game is that Its so hard to move up, you basically have to keep watching ads to get money and upgrade your stuff because the money that you're getting from your hotel just is NOT enough because you have to pay your chefs, check in person, and your house cleaning people and you pay them WAY MORE than you'd actually get.

I really enjoy the game, brings me back in time when we were playing all sorts of tycoons. But there's one thing that doesn't work for me... When I fill the 5 stars it becomes useless. You buy a new hotel, become millionaire with the first one but can't use the money... Why? U need to fix this, make us use the money on others atleast.. Or else u can just delete because it gets repetitive and boring...

Love everything EXCEPT that hotels are meaningless after completion. Like everyone else who has played this game is asking: please let us transfer money from hotel to hotel or make it one pool of money that we can spend anywhere. You can adjust the prices for upgrades on the next hotels to balance it. Devs, if you even read this, THIS is how to get people to keep playing. Such a small fix with such a huge implication.

I love this game. But I noticed that with all the chefs hired, they still cant serve everybody or the amount of people that can be seated in the restaurant. Also, its the same with the parking. The parking is not enough for the amount of rooms I have. My last complaint is that in the beach hotel, the rooms on the right side do not match the left side. This causes my guests to go to the other rooms to use the bathroom. And they use the chair and desk without actually sitting in them.

Fun but definitely pay to win, cards you can buy with real money only drastically boost offline rewards time, profits, no ads, etc. Not needed to play, and highly recommended against purchasing them as these levels are finite and after not a very long time that stuff you have paid for(insanely overpriced fyi) will literally be pointless as you will have "beaten" all the levels. Yes they are creating more, but nonetheless I feel the pay2win cards are absurdly expensive and actually ruin the game

Really addicting, fun to play. Haven't noticed any glitches. The money you get for watching ads make them less painful to the flow of gameplay. It's really fun to watch the hotel progress as you earn more.

Okay, if my comprehension is bad blame that on my age. I am 13 years old. Now I don't have that much experience in idle games but I do like this game. However whenever you get into the game you'll understand why I like this game. You pay rent or your hotel will I mean will go bankrupt. And if you don't want to stay bankrupt you have to watch the video with the very important patreon. Even though that the ads are annoying, it does progressed you into the game. So my final thing I say is Hi world.

Fun game. The con is that the event hotel would be more fun if it earned money like the other hotels when idle. Also, what's the purpose of completed hotels earning money when you can't do anything else with them and you can't borrow money from them in order to build your other hotels. It would come in handy during the event hotel.

This game was really fun, still plying. I don't see any bugs compare to other codigames. But I'm not satisfied with Codi resort hotel event, its really hard to complete watching by Advertisment. If you want to win this Event you have to pay more real money. They even don't have affordable starter back here like other codigames. I would be really loved very very much if they have option to money transfer one hotel to other hotel .Over all if you want play for fun you should try this app.

This game is so fun and awesome I love it if you can make getting diamonds way more easier it would be better. I wish you a merry Christmas and a great new year but my only problem is that when the customers stand at some kind of table, it makes them get angry __. At the chefs place then they leave why then they leave the hotel __ __ with this headache sighn and also angry __ face __ wat kind of game did I download?!!! Please fix this

I like the concept and love these types of games. It is a bit slow though and if it wasn't for the guy with the briefcase and the ability to watch ads for his service, then I feel like this game would be dreadful...skipping night helps speed it up a little, but I feel those who cannot afford to go ad free like myself would/will grow tired of all the ads and slow progression without utilizing the available ads.

This game is really fun, well made, and surprisingly addicting. I reccomend playing it if you like taking your time to make very profitable businesses without needing to buy in app purchases. Two notes for the developers. 1. When you click on a room and then try to click off, there can be a bug where you don't, so maybe add an "x" in the top right to close out of the room upgrade menu. 2. Having more than four guests can sometimes cause the game to not add profits for additional guest's staying.

Fun tycoon game but for some reason I can only watch 1 or 2 ads for 2x the money or to get "loans" then they stop. I can click over & over but nothing works. I have to close out the game completely, reopen and try again. It's the same thing over & over. I'm ready to just call it quits on this game because it's so frustrating!

This is a great game! Despite being a "tycoon" game, it remains challenging enough to be continuously interesting; usually I play these games for about a day, figure out the formula, get bored and delete them, but I've been playing this for weeks. You also don't need to spend a penny! Watching ads speeds things up, but even that is never required (no "watch this ad to continue" nonsense). The support team was also responsive and fixed a glitch in my game within a day. Overall, amazing!

Ads. Ads. Ads. It's honestly ridiculous how many show up whilst you play. No joke within the first 5 minutes of play I had 3 ads back-to-back, also the tiny little x to close popped up for 2 seconds and immediately went straight to another ad. Too many games are ruined for allowing these intrusive ads, I've had enough of it all and it's far too expensive for what you pay for. I cannot recommend, unless you like ads.

This was an alright game, a decent time waster, but now it is just a pain. When upgrading the various items the game lags and slows to a crawl. It takes me 15+ minutes to upgrade a single bedroom. The only time the upgrading goes somewhat smoothly is when all the guests go to bed. I actually began to dread booting up this game because of this.

Hi I played this a while ago and liked it. I decided to try again but for some reason the money I should be getting from a room is far less than I am. I noticed this during the first level hotel but when trying the event to get manager, the default price for the level one bed should be 30 dollars by itself.. for an hour in the room I am only getting 5.17 instead it's not remotely matching up. Wasn't sure if it is adjusted from when playing last or bug please help.

As someone else mentioned, it's a marathon... Not a sprint. You don't have to pay to play but I have bought the odd thing just to thank the developers. Hoping they still expanding on the game. Really enjoy it, no pressure.... Can pick it up whenever you in the mood. Big thank you to Devs. I would suggest buying the no ads option... Doesn't cost an arm and a leg.

Good game. The best I played so far. Unfortunately it only has 2 hotels. I'm sure you'll be adding more later. I can wait. I just started the second one. The bigger issue is, the first hotel is maxed out and making lots of money that I can't do anything with. You need to add more things to the hotels to spend the money on. And a really good idea would be that we can use that money in other hotels we purchase.

This game is filled with misleading upgrades, bad and incomplete math and it's all to make the user spend money or watch ads for bonuses. Bonus events are impossible to complete without spending money. Do not play this game.

Its a pretty good dame to pass the time by i just wish as you upgrade the bars, restaurants and other parts of the hotel that the customers can use all the seats available rather than 4 people at a time with 12 seats in the restaurant and bar. Hopefully that's an upcoming update. Most times my customers get angry waiting the 20 seconds

Love this game really addictive and enjoy being able to compleat levels, I dislike that I'm on the 6th Hotel and the missions have stopped and I've not earned any gems? Obviously the levels get harder each time and earning money is hard let alone without being able to spend gold, I have purchased a few packs for money but would still like to get my rewards from the missions? Why would they have stopped on this level thank you

Love the game! So much fun! NEEDS MORE HOTELS ADDED. I finished every Hotel. So, can't wait to get more to do. The game needs Other WAYS to Get MANAGERS than just the Event Hotel, due to it being impossible the get one in the events. Thanks and love your game!

It's Good. Just Good. Starting this game is slow, and very gradual when upgrading. You really don't need to spend money which is nice. However, I believe there's a glitch because when you leave the game come back to it an hour or later, you're optioned with a 2x bonus. When I click it, it doesn't give me the 2x even though it's been selected. I wish you just upgrade the room itself rather each individual item.

It was ok. It's pretty fun and realistic. The only problem is that I wish I could use profits from previous hotels on the new hotels. Another problem is on the second hotel, when I leave the app, all the customers in double beds seem to disappear, I've done this multiple times and they always disappear after a few seconds when closing the app. The game is relatively hard to progress. You have to watch A TON TON TON of ads to get enough money, otherwise, very nice game

Very well programmed, planned, and executed. It's an impressive game. I also like that even though they ask for money it's not necessary to actually spend any to rank up and complete missions. Just takes a bit longer. I knocked a star off because the video ads are all 30 seconds or more and that's a lot for fake digital currency (you can watch an ad every minute or two so they add up). Also there's no real autonomy. I saved up enough to buy another room but the game forced me to add a bar.

This game is okay. Very very slow start unless you want to keep watching ads every 30 seconds for money, quick housekeeping, more customers and skip nighttime. What makes me most mad is after I put in so many hours and do waste my time watching ads to get money, I finally get a 5 start hotel with maxed out upgrades and I move onto my second hotel, 2 days later my first hotel goes back to the beginning. And now to unlock the 3rd hotel I have to 5 star both hotels. What a waste of my time.

I use to like this game but now it's so bugged that it's ridiculous. The ads don't give you double profit even though I watched them.most of the time you don't even get the double profit button it just loads forever and never pops up. I have to constantly close or uninstall to get the game to work properly. Update* now it's not giving me the profits I make while I'm offline. It makes me click the ¡Á2 button for normal profit. Uninstalled until fixed.

If the only way to generate revenue is through playing ads, the game itself becomes irrelevant. Why should I continue playing and coming back to the game if the only way to make it work is by ads! As a player, I understand using ads to get ahead once in a while, but there needs to be an in game stimuli for me to continue. Please increase the pace at which revenues increase for this game to be more rewarding. I spent 2 hours just building the basic infra yet spent more than 80% just playing ads.

This game is ok. The game play isn't very exciting. Another issue is that the employees quit if they don't get paid one time. ONLY ONE. Then they quit so then you have to save up to buy that staff back and waste all of your money that you just earned and it is very annoying and makes the game longer then it has to be please remove this because if that wasn't a thing the game would be playable and not just you spending hours to buy the next room or upgrade.

The game is great. But I think there should be a little bit more details especially the NPCS. As well as when opening a new hotel, the earnings from the previous hotels must be used so that it would have a purpose in having them. The events are basically micro transactions though.

Good game needs more hotels, I completed both hotels and upgraded everything to the fullest within a day of play great game and loads to do with very simple controls takes a while to get going but once your going you'll fly through it like I did, would give it 5 stars but sadly only 2 hotels atm until more hotels are added i cant give it a 5 star but great game cant wait till more hotels are added
Really do like the game but have noticed bugs. Today the game has crashed twice. Unsure why

Growth strategy? There aren't enough hours in the day to watch enough ads to make a dent in the requirements to succeed. NO THANKS. I have a life. Game achievement hinges on adverts. After the first hotel is up and running, the adverts are your only hope of success. The limited time challenge events are impossible. The game concept is great but there is little game to be played. There is about 5% of play to 95% adverts. Could be a great game but it is simply a marketing tool more than a game.

I have really enjoyed playing this game. It's a bit of a shame that there are only 4 hotels currently as I have completed them all now, but in fairness the game did last me a good long while. I found very few problems with it aside from occasionally ads just wouldn't play if you tapped the button before the loading circle went away, losing the opportunity and the bonus. Otherwise, a pretty solid mobile game.

Devs made prices extremely high to upgrade and buy new things like bar and upgrade generator to lvl 2. This is a crippled turtle with one leg in terms of advancing. You make very little money, even offline. Basically forcing you to spend real money. Game massively tailored for PTW. They need to redo the entire money making and upgrading for this game to even be playable. Unistalled

I want to love this game. But any game that makes you watch an ad for TEN MINUTES of double profits is ridiculous. Oh, don't like ads? It's cool just pay ELEVEN dollars. The game is only four levels, so you're paying that for maybe a weeks worth of gameplay. It's insane how greedy these developers are. The market is saturated with tons of games like this. Pick a different one

I would have given 4 stars ( one star off because it seems to be a long time between new hotels and can become boring). I really like that you don't need to watch all the ads, one off purchase for that, and that any purchases are all one offs and constant subscriptions but since the last update I have been unable to purchase VIP packs for the latest event hotel so I will be unable to get the 3 star manager like I usually do. Please fix.

Great game, haven't completely as yet. The only problem is the timing for customers/guests is off, the beach bar opens at 12am but the customers come and look at it at 11 and the bar attending is on the way and they leave back to their room and once it hits 12 the go to the restaurant. Same with the customer leave time some nights the hotel is empty because people check out people come to check in but no staff. Also i believe you should add customers to use others facilities like ski, spa ticket

I got really into it and played pretty much non stop the whole day. But...then I got all the upgrades for the first hotel and figured out that your 'profits' won't transfer to other hotels. I guess now I'm done with the game, because what's the point of playing if you get all the upgrades but then have nothing left to spend the profits on? It would be a better game if the profits were collective in my opinion.

It's a good game. The things that let it down are: 1. The restaurant can never have enough staff to service the number of tables and customers 2. Customers will go to facilities that are closed. No one would so that. 3. Glitches. Staff don't work for the full time they are paid for. Customers get stuck and take up spaces in facilities. Housekeepers will not clean all rooms even through there is enough staff and time.

I hope there is a global leaderboard for the most wealthiest player. Also put some challenging AI that could make this game alot interesting like the employee have emotions like a stress that could affect their performance due to intense workplace. Like busy day __

I love this game, isn't money grabbing at all. I dont have to wait hours for upgrades! I love it so much I would actually pay for it. No problem with the ads as they're options and give you rewards. I was super disappointed with the graphics on the Santa hotel, as all the beds and rooms look the same as the hotel before and it doesn't fit in with the theme, plus the "climate control" was air conditioning... in a snowy area? It just didn't make sense, I hope the next hotel at least makes sense

Extremely aggressive monetization and very buggy. If you want more than 2 hours idle time you have to pay over $10. Fine, I thought, I'll see if I like it first. But sometime when you come back you don't get any idle results at all, as if no time has passed. It's often enough that I've taken to force closing it every time I leave the app. Also, I will frequently watch ads and not get the rewards for them.

The biggest drawback to this game is the speed at which you earn money - it's abysmal. I played almost an hour and time went by painfully slow with very little money coming in. The only way to progress in a reasonable time frame is to watch videos constantly for more cash and to instantly start the next day. It's painful having to watch so many videos. Once you get the "no ads" package the game becomes enjoyable. If you want to enjoy the game, you'll need to spend the $10 USD for that pack.

Ads hang and crash the game all the time, and this is the only way to make money (you'll spend more time watching ads than playing the game BTW). Makes for a terrible experience. When the game crashes, you have to restart progress and that is also very frustrating. For example, if all your hotel rooms are booked when the game crashes, when you start the game again, a bunch of rooms are empty, and you lose money because your operating expenses are the same. Game had potential. Ruined by buggy ads

I could not be more happy with this game! It is super addicting, a wonderful time passer! You also do not have to spend real money in order to progress, there are optional upgrades you can buy with real money (which are totally worth it) but you can play without these upgrades. 5 stars without a doubt, best hotel game out there.

There is some major glitches. Rm 102 is always dirty. The suite has 2 different levels of end tables and the prices fluctuate with each log in. At one point i was making 102k hour then I logged out and back in and I was making 56k hour. There are several other things wrong as well. Please fix. Thank you. Love this game. So glad that a new level came out. Can't wait until it's fixed completely!!

I got past the tutorial and it is way more dialed down with the unnecessary conversations that stop the flow of the game. I absolutely love this game! It's a great Tycoon game and I spent money to get rid of the ads and get 2x profits all the time. I never buy anything in mobile games, but this one is an exception. 5/5 Fantastic Game

I would rate 5 stars but their is a huge problem. So basically, you complete a hotel 100% and you go to the next hotel, but then you find out that you can't carry ANY money from your old hotel to your new hotel. So you're left ALMOST BROKE while your other hotel just sitting their raking in the dough. And to top it off, the hotels stuff become more and more expensive as you play. PLEASE fix this issue because I'm not watching a million ads just for a few upgrades and this issue made me ragequit

The game is awesome and I love to have it as a pastime. Although I would say that a good way to have endgame content would be to add a longer event that runs for a month or so. After finishing the final hotel it feels meaningless to play for an event that only runs for a few days.

The concept is good, but the game feels unfinished. There's no missions for the second hotel, you can't transfer income from the first to the second so there's no point to the first hotel once you've passed it, and sometimes the game mechanics feel a bit unbalanced.

This is not intended to be a free game. You essentially need to watch an ad to accomplish most tasks. In 30 minutes of playing the game you will spend 15 watching ads. And the game is very demanding and if you spend time away from it, you can essentially lose money if things are not running smoothly. Cool concept but not for me.

This game is pretty good. I personally like managing games and this one is the one that i will remember. I like that you can have more hotels, that each hotel has it's own special upgrades and that once you watch a few ads to get some money for upgrades you will keep wining more money! Great game.

I decided to give this game a try because I loved Theme Park Tycoon but due to some reasons I am giving it 3 star rating. The ads displayed often do no give rewards. They are being watched for no use and it's even more irritating when the rewrds are not provided. This needs to be fixed so the reward can be provided as promised before watching the ad.

I would have given this game an instant five stars if it weren't for the steep price tags for some of these in-game offers. The gameplay and music is enjoyable; repetitive, but enjoyable nonetheless. Though, I do wish they add new permanent hotels to work on; the event hotels are just way too short for the constant payment to get them done.

Its a great game but i've completed all the hotels...please add more Also i think a time speed up function while online could be fun... Also the purchase function needs fixing...on a couple of occations i have purchased things and its charged me but not added the purchased items to the game and its not always worth the 3-5 day process to get it refunded
This game is good. I like the way that you can still travel to old islands dislike the other games, BUT when you get to the 2nd hotel, it gets extreme. Please make the game easier. Ty!

It's fun I think, It's feel like you really manage a hotel with the money you got and such. But I think the event is kinda unfair.. Because no matter how hard you try, you won't get a star in the hotel, you really have to buy the VIP package to get a star in the event and it's suck. Well, if you're looking for a game to kill your time, maybe this one is good for you tho. Hope the review helps.

I love the game but the last update took a lot of things I have already bought in the game ( rooms, suites, casino, pool, spa, nightclub, archery) I'm in the Little Camelot Hotel and majority everything is back at square one.

So far love this game. But so far there is only 5 hotels. So when is there going to be a update to add new hotels? Been waiting a year. And the weekly hotel that you do where you have to pay to even finish it don't count. And I have money invested in this game. Been nothing.
