My original review was 5 stars. It was enjoying this game until my purchase has been deleted. I payed with real money and played and then suddenly, my purchase didn't exist any more. Plus my progress was deleted and I was using only one device for this game. I am gone and will never ever install or play any codigames.
Finally! An idle mobile tycoon game that's more than mass clicking! Greatly enjoying it so far! I hope there are endless levels!

A lot of fun, I enjoy games that build up. Though it would be a lot more convenient to be able to have all the money from the hotels in one "account" to use since it just goes to waste once everything is leveled. Plus it would add a fun management angle with needing to keep a level of money always to pay staff across the different hotels. But I am really enjoying it, I hope more hotels are added!

Please add more hotels soon! I bought the "remove ads" feature, which has made the gameplay go a lot faster and it got rid of having to watch all those annoying ads. It made it easier to build up the hotels and within a week, I've completed all 3 hotels. I would have thought it was a waste if I didnt see that this game came out this month. Please add more hotels soon! :)

If you read the reviews, for the most part they are spot on. Graphics are great. It's a time eater. There are a lot of ads but I find that with most games. If you pay for the ad removal, the game progresses smoothly. I do worry about finishing the 5th hotel as it seems people catch up to developers with no where to go above that. My concern with these slow developed games is it will stop working upon update or they change the pay features and make it more difficult to achieve progression.

Very good when you want to kill time. Definitely like the art and design. Only issue I have is I purchased the benefits without watching ads. I start the game after not playing for awhile, the option to double your profit is there but when I tap it and hit claim I only get the normal amount of money shown. Worse off, if you don't tap the double profit and just claim the money, you don't get anything. Unacceptable if Im paying for the upgrade and not getting it. Please help, 5 stars otherwise.

Game is a nice time killer but gets pointless. After you 5 star a hotel it pretty much dies cause you can't use the money it generates. $10 is kinda expensive to skip ads with the fact I just mentioned. Unless they add more hotels or give you more features the game is pointless after you max all of then out. I'm on the second hotel now and everything is hella expensive. Guess that's to stop you from progressing too fast so they can keep getting the ad revenue. And now the ads wont work.

I don't know if its only me, but I can't seem to get past the initial quest. I don't have engouh money, and I have only 3 staff, and upgraded what the quest told me to upgrade. Been everytime I go into the game, I only get negative numbers. So I dunno, I really, really love this types of games, and i think this has alot of potential, but so far for me, it's just so slow, (hate nighttime), need to use money or watch ads all the time.

This is a great game and I could spend ages playing this. However, lots of minor bugs, some of which were fixed in the update this morning. However the update has now broken the AI as hotel guests now try and go to ski or the spa late at night, get angry as it is closed and then leave. So hotel is only at 50% full every single night (with a 5 star fully upgraded hotel). I would love more hotels as well as there are only 2 currently. Once you complete the second one there is nothing else to do.

This game is definitely my favourite of CODI games as the graphics are great and the economy system actually is realistic. But the guests pathfinding is horrible. Why do I have guests wandering around the pool at 10 pm instead of at the nightclub? It's causing me to lose money for no reason. The guests shouldn't be path finding to a closed facility.

Where most idle games give you lots of stuff and progress fast at first then come to a crawl, this is one of the slowest idle games I've played. It was kinda cool to build up my hotel slowly over time rather than all at once, but as soon as I moved to the second hotel to start from 0, I had no desire to do it again.. it's just too slow to progress

Love this game so much, but there are plenty of little things that could be improved. One particular thing that has bothered me is the hours that services are open. It make more sense to me to be able to leave them open all day. Another idea is the ability to use income from completed hotels to improve new ones. A gift or transfer feature would work well

I gave 3 starts just because the ads problem. Why is the ad videos only working at the first time you play this game? A few hours later I play this game, and the ad videos just keep spinning and can't be played, sometimes the taxi one just won't work by watching one video, I had to watch it twice to make it works.

F me is this game is balanced around watching ads. The idea of the game is fun and good.... but man, the moment where you earn 100x more (not even exagurated) by watching ads rather then playing the game is just downright sad. I don't mind paying money for a good experience of a game. But if I were to pay the whopping 12 bucks to remove ads, I would just make it worse as I won't have a reason to skip the ad money anymore. I literally earn the money of 30 minutes with one ad.

Love it Amazing game. The only suggestion i have is to allow the money earned at one hotel to be available to the other hotels. That is the only reason i give 4 stars. Addicting game and great game play. But one of my hotels racks up tons of money that is pretty much useless, i would like to use some of that money for my other hotels.

I like the game, some of the hotels are really simple to get through and the events are fun. Keep those up! I do wish I could control the service hours of all services. Too many times I watch money leave because they are 30 min late or early. Please give us the ability to control the hours or adjust the hours for longer services. No bar should close at 12am!!

Im having the same issue. I cant even skip night time on the game anymore because the button to show the ad wont load. Im not playing this game anymore until its fixed because I want the x2 profits and skip night time. Update: took a star away because the same problem with the ads is happening again. Will uninstall if this continues. Lost out on double profit overnight because ads wont load again smh

Update: deleting the game after not getting my earnings when entering the game for the 3rd time. Waist of my time... It could be fun. I passed level one and realized that you don't take the money you worked hard making w you and the money you collect in level 1 does not continue to go in your bank for other levels. I play other tycoons that take the money with them from level to level, much more fun to play. I will play this second level to give it a fair shot, but kinda bored.

Great game no purchases necessary unless you want it add free (small one time purchase which makes it more easy to play quickly). Additional purchases can make game play faster but I have enjoyed playing gradually. Only complaint is that you cannot update a whole room at once- which for those of us who like to play methodically would make finishing a level easier. It is a but tedious to update each sink and each bed up multiple levels. Please include an update all for each room in next upgrade!

Gameplay isn't very fun thanks to the lagging and one of my housekeepers always getting stuck in a hotel room. The persistent internet connection requirement sucks. I do, however, appreciate that ads are available to make money, unlike some other money grubbing apps that make it impossible for one to progress without paying real money.

Good concept but it would be nice if the money from the other hotels carried on to the next one that you unlock. Otherwise you can collect all of this money and when you cannot upgrade anything anymore..it feels like a waste. Please consider doing this, and also there should be an option to buy General Managers with the gold diamonds that are earned, investing real money for a GM for each hotel is NOT ideal.

I kinda like this simulation game. Downside is that profits are way too low. And you need an investor everytime, in which requires for you to watch ads that are 30 seconds long. I want a game where I could enjoy playing and not getting pissed watching nonsense ads of other games which I'm not going to download anyway.

I love this game. I can seriously play it for hours if I'm left alone. However, I'm only rating it two stars because the things are getting too expensive and the ads to get extra cash isn't working. Fix this glitch then and only then will I change my rating.

I can't in good conscience recommend this game and there is one big glaring reason why. One of the main components of an idle game is the ability to gain resources while you aren't playing. This game allows you to do so, but only after buying the ability with real money. That's right, what every other idle game gives you by default, this game makes you pay for. If you want a proper and fun idle game experience, look elsewhere

This game is really fun!!! I love pretty much all your games. On thing about this that I don't like is, I just started today, I don't get a lot of money but everything is really expensive so I have to wait a long time before I can buy anything. Also I love the fact that I can watch ads to get money! If that wasn't there then it would be really hard to buy stuff. Hopefully you can put more updates! It is amazing and a really good time killer! Tysm for making this game!!!! __

I have loved this game but today the game doesn't want to load. I have uninstall (which probably means I have lost all my data and I was on the last hotel) then re-installed it. Still, it loads but stays on the loading screen. The developer xame back to me and fix the problem. I was very impressed. I am so happy to be able to carry on with this game. I hope they will soon get another similar game

It's a nice idle game. Wish there was a vacant sign guests could stop coming when there are no rooms left.. but really love this game. When I wrote this review I was in the second hotel and I was really enjoying it. The 3rd hotel is awesome. Then I got to the last hotel and now I'm upset. I worked really hard to get there and it's the first hotel with more rooms. Nothing extra like the beach hotel where you have scuba diving and a hotel pool. Still the first hotel just barely themed.

Edit: They already fixed the login Google Play issue. Thank you so much! Really like this game since the trailer seem really promising, and the graphics is really good. Keep the game up, by maybe building more hotels with different variant.

I love the game its great how you only get ads if you choose to have i mean of course your gonna have ads but most of them give rewards after. I have downloaded this game in the past and you dont get progress fast and nor do you get it slow its more of how you play the game. Honestly i recommend this game just because of how fun it is and how much stuff you get to do. Good job Codigames and keep doing what your doing.

Pay to play (at least $100 game) To get to the next level you have to buy EVERY item on that hotel floor. This includes the special gem items. Theres ways to earn gems....just never enough to progress to the next level. So you have to buy at $10-$20 a pop to have enough gems to progress. It says free but the truth is this game costs over $100 to fully play by level 4 (and that's just the normal levels)... Youre better off buying a damn Xbox or Playstation. Also the developers don't respond.

Liked it but few problems, in the beginning you are responsible for a hotel when you get 5* for it then it starts making enough money which you cannot rotate in other branches which gets unlocked and due to that you are stuck at that level unless you invest your real money. Fix this as the owner will bear the responsibility of all hotels so using the unused money lying there else it's wasted

It's a good game, but it costs a lot to remove the ads & have other features. To remove ads, you need to pay $10.99. To double your VIP rewards (not worth it), it's $5.99 while another feature is $10.99. I was tempted to remove the ads until I only saw four hotels. I think it did a good job of creating new features (ski area, bar, restaurant, scuba, etc.), but it has potential to be more. It's definitely a battery drainer, & people get stuck in the spa causing me to restart and lose guests.

I really like the game but...Extras (ie. hiring a manager) are seriously over-priced. After paying said extortionate price for an extra, I would not expect the game to then end after completing 4 levels. I was considering raising this issue with support or requesting a refund, but then after around a month of not being able to play because I had finished the game, another level was added. Which I then finished in a couple of days. Just add more levels at a quicker rate so we can continue playing

Very good game. Spend many hours with this game and have a lot of good times. The game progressive is good, doesn't take extremely long to achieve something. Can't resist to watch ads to get more money. Wish I can change opening hours for restaurant/bar/etc; because sometimes it's ridiculous, lol. Recommend.

This was fun for a short time, but now ads won't load. It offers options like watch an ad for 2x the away profit or to increase earnings by 2 for ten minutes, but there are no ads available. The investors no longer show up either, presumably due to no ads. This makes it much more boring and I likely won't play much now unless it gets fixed.

I am really disappointed as I'm one to not pay for things in games so I rely on the adds and they are not working. There is no way to complete the bonus event without the adds on constantly for 2x profits. Its 50/50 if I log in and it allows me to watch the adds. If your willing to spend money then this game is for you. If you just want a challenge and not spend money this game sucks right now.

Remove Idle. Something about this game hooked me. Satisfying progression and curiosity. Ads or not. I did levels watching ads Spent 10 bucks. I hope the developers continue to expand this game. More levels. Using that creativity. The Turkish belly dance! Great Sim game!! But it needs more levels as I've finished the game.

Really like this game! The artwork is the main draw for me, very cute. love the little customers walking around and the items around the hotel. I happily spend the one off $17 AUD fee to remove the ads and have access to all the feature. Love it when games offer that option rather than continue to gouge their customers for $1000's in microtransact. To all these people complaining about the cost, er...have you never bought a game from steam ? P.S love the Mad Men ref. Keep up the good work guys!

I love the game obsessed lots of play time but still entertaining, I've spent 20 bucks on the game but the last time I got something, it was the pack for the event where some customers spend 50 percent more and I get a bonus profit suite with promised 4000 cash a day. I didn't get it and I got charged for it. I want a refund or something of better value in game since I kinda got screwed. Otherwise love the game definitely worth the download maybe not in app purchases

i was really enjoying this game until i lost a star on the second hotel whilst working on the third hotel for no reason that i could figure out despite over an hour of trying and therefore was unable to advance. plus too many ads and it's definitely a play to win sort of game. as a result of all of this, i was forced to uninstall as i could get no further in the game. this really bums me out as i was very much enjoying this game up to this point. seems i'm not the only one with these problems.

This is the best idle game you have made so far. I like how it is not just a one-sided game wherein you always move forward. This game will make your progress harder if not taken care of. This tests your strategy skills on which to upgrade first, and I'm a fan of such gameplays. But I won't be giving 5 stars because I cannot contact the app developer for I have something to ask.

This game is ok could be much better. You should allow people not getting a room to use the restaurant or bar as a way to gain more revenue. Once you finish a hotel there nothing more until an event which are hard to get anywhere with in 3 days with only 50k to start. Make it a bit more interesting and I'm not buying the same vip package for every event adjust that model. Can you expand the events or hotels? We should be able to adjust costs or hours of operations.

It's an amazing game but the new Codi Resort is not loading for me and it gets stuck in an endless loading cycle. I have tried restarting the game but it never works. ____________________________ Edit: You were right. My phone is a 2017 model. In any case, other than that, it's a great 5 star game.

Zzzzzzzzz. All 4 hotels at 5 stars. Nothing to do. Boring. Awaiting the developers to actually release content for 1 month now. Updated review since game update: Released new Hotel in Feb. Completed the hotel within 5 days... more boring waiting zzzzzzzz

I love the business owning concept as very few games are designed to make it feel like real life, but when it comes to the events, it's clearly just an extra way to get people to spend more money on something you won't be able to keep for the next event. That said, if you don't buy the presidential suite pack for the event, you'll be very hard pressed to get 2 of the 3 stars, and it ruins the appeal of the game. Putting very hard effort into something with little reward will make people quit.

Great game over all. Only issue I have is that they seem to be way too heavy on advertising. Most games usually offer 2 hours of 2x income for watching an advertisement. This game only gives you 10 minutes. I would happily pay to have double income if the price was reasonable. They ask way too much. I can see the exorbitant amount of adverts getting old after a week and I'll eventually stop playing.

Was enjoying this game. However ads stopped working so I uninstalled and reinstalled (as I'd done a couple of times before) and it bombed me back to the start! Game play is very slow without watching ads so if the ads keep hanging it's not worth playing... EDIT found out why I lost progress. I was logged into a different Gmail account so even though I was still logged into the correct Google play account it lost progress! Still a pain that ads stop working and I have to reinstall frequently

Game idea is pretty good...I like it. But you can't always be online and you lose money when your hotel is closed. No real grinding opportunities here. you have to pay for hiring a manager. Also there should be some good options for maxed out player to use their wealth on something or contesting with other players in some way. BOTTOM line it shouldn't have to be pay to win

The game is cool, i don't really mind watching some short ads to gain money and all BUT one thing I hate is the fact that you can't transfer money from 1 hotel to the other. I mean, what is even the point of earning a great amount of money if I won't be able to use it after the hotel is upgraded to 5 stars? It's frustrating to have to start all over again in each new hotel and it seems pointless.

Having serious issues with videos and rewards. Sometimes clicking a video doesn't do anything at all. Sometimes the video closes prematurely and no reward is given. It's making it frustrating to do the event hotel when I can't get the 2x profit bonus. Or the VIP guests either. Basically any video rewards aren't working for me.

I've really been enjoying this game, but it is a shameless money guzzler. I know that's par for the course on these kind of games, but they charge money for an upgrade pack for EVERY EVENT THEY HAVE! I spent $10.99 on an upgrade for an event, thinking it would be there when the next event started, but now it wants me to buy another one for this event. Extremely disappointing. I'm not sure if I'll be continuing to play this game anymore.

This game can be fun but it does try to push you to spending real money and it is VERY expensive. Its clear the challenge to get a manager is just a gimmick to get you to spend real money because the goal and cost of everything is extortionate but don't worry they have convenient booster packs you can buy to help progress. Gameplay is mainly watching ads. Your money doesn't transfer between hotels and you can only get offline profits for one hour. All about money.

It would be very good if you guys added some more minigames or increase our control of the hotels. And sometimes something get hidden by other things, so it would be awesome if you made this 360angle view, i mean it's boring to just zoom in and zoom out. Hoping you guys will show your magic by Improving this game as soon as possible or before i get bored. And one more maybe you guys should make our pocket of all hotels one because hotels we fully upgraded become useless after that. Thank You _

Great game. But once you have completed a hotel and gone to the next, the fact you can't use the old hotels money is pointless. There's nothing left for me to upgrade in the first hotel yet moneybis racking up. Other hotel is idle. Gets boring after a whole because you go so far just to start at the beginning again. Change this please.

It's a long game if you want to finish it without buying items or watching ads. It took me a year and a half to finish it. In the last hotels, it gets laggy while moving around the hotel. But when I'm upgrading room's stuff, it freezes for a second or two.

This game can be fun. There are plenty of issues. For one the VIP cash videos dont always work. The cash flow could be improved some. It feels like a very big grind to get anything improved. Especially when you get a new hotel. You will lose a few staff pretty quickly because you arent generating enough money. Hopefully you guys fix the issues soon or at least keep this game updated frequently.

The game itself is pretty entertaining and engaging. Lots to do and explore, but also a lot of decisions that will affect the bottom line. The only 3 issues that I have is: 1 Limited number of people you can hire for specific jobs. Which in turn you have to pay attention to P/U the slack. 2 Kitchen staff take break right during peak hrs. And maids follow straight lines that sometimes waste alot of valuable time. 3 Now that I reached my final Hotel there's nothing to do.

I love the game but once I reached the third hotel, any time I click on the investor to watch the ads for more money, either nothing happens when i click watch ad or I watch a few seconds of the ad and nothing still happens. Please fix.

I like the game very interactive but the challenges i have completed but i haven't recieved the rewards therefore I cannot progress in the game. I'm getting really annoyed and the game is no longer fun for me. Please update and fix tbis and i will re install and change my rating.

I love this game so far! My only problem is that sometimes the Dancing King and/or taxi offering glitch. I click on them to watch the ad but it just closes out and doesn't give me the ad or the money. Also I have a concern about completed 5 star hotels. I'm asking for a way to incorporate the previous hotel's savings into the current one. This is because right now I have The Codinential completed, and no way to spend the money. The money just keeps piling up and I have nowhere to spend it. Thank

A truly enjoyable game, but if played for more than 15-30min the ads stop playing and you don't get any of the perks (instant sunrise, investor, travel agency). I've tried closing the app and reopening as well as restarting my phone, but that either only fixes the problem for a few minutes or doesn't fix it at all. Once a hotel is somewhat established these perks aren't as important, but in the beginning the speed at which you make money is negligible and it quickly gets boring.

I love this game. It's simple and fun to use. It has its normal challenges for these types of games but my #1 complaint is once you complete one hotel and move on to the next, you can't use ANY of the money you make from your previous hotels to use on the next one. So it takes about a week of consistently playing and constantly watching ads to make any progress at the beginning of building your hotel. Can the developers tell me why?

I was enjoying this game for a little bit until the ads. You HAVE to click on the ads to even get anywhere in this game and for the ads that are supposed to give you a "reward" they never do! I sat looking at a ad for close to 2 minutes and nothing I didn't get a reward and then the game crashed.. super disappointed

The queues are too short on larger hotels and the pathings are bad, and the ads are a lot, but once you get past all that, the games decent and the art is nice ///// Later edit: the game is really boring after you get to the 3-5 star range, especially for the later levels. Hell, all I do at that point in the game is boot up the app, watch the ad to double my offline income, and then close the app. Repeat that process every two hours until you get enough money for those last expensive items.

Game is addictive but many times even after I click on Watch video which comes while the dancing king appears, the video still don't play at all. Even to fast-forward the night , the video playing fails couple of times. I have to close the game again and again to get the money from dancing king. It's a bug. Please fix it.

I've played a lot of your games and all of them have ad issues. This one is particularly bad. You can watch 1 ad and then you'll have to close the game completely if you'd like to watch another. When you're trying to get the 2x bonus and have to restart the game for every ad you also lose time. Sometimes when there are like 5 minutes left of the bonus the game will cancel those 5 minutes when you restart the game. The gameplay itself is a lot of fun but this ad issue makes playing it tiring

The game and app is fun. Just a lot of bugs. Im unable to play an ad after I've played it once. It requires me to restart the game and am unable to just continue on while playing and watch and ad in between while my hotel thrives. Eveeytime u close the game to rest the ad, the game loses its progress. Its quite annoying and the bug needs urgent fixing.

Really enjoyed this game, the ads placement is really well done, you can play the whole game and never watch ad but progress will be slow. Had to drop a star, been over two months since a new hotel and theres no reply value on the others. You collect cash you cant spend and do event hotels for bonuses that you cant use as all hotels completed with no option to restart them. To sum up. 5* game when you first start but once completed theres nothing left to do so 3 *

So the game is great and I have understood it has a lot of playability factor. But suddenly the advertisements stopped after the first 2 hours. So I can't understand if this is a glitch or a cap since it is very difficult to move forward without the advertisements. Could you please address!!!

To be honest, the ads made the game look boring. The only reason why I downloaded it was because I was bored with my other games, and the ads for this game popped up dozens of times. But it IS a fun game. I didn't think I would enjoy it as much as I do (or at all). It keeps my interest and keeps me coming back the next day. I don't really have much to complain about. Once you find a good strategy, the game is real enjoyable! But sometimes when you watch an ad, you don't get the reward.

I love how this game is based off the money you have, theres no labeled level you need to be in to be able to do a certain thing. One thing I wished they could change is the money transfer. I currently am maxed out of upgrades with my first hotel and now I'm making so much money but I cannot spend it, while my second hotel is in so much debt. It would be really neat if my money from my 1st hotel can also be of help to all of my hotels.

Most expensive in game microtransactions I've ever seen in a game. Ever! The money earned in game to money earned watching ads ratio favours the ads. If you want a game where you watch the same adverts of the same equally greedy microtransactions heavy games, this is the game for you. Don't let the charm of this game fool you. It's quite shallow once you get past the first hotel.

This game is relaxing and a lot of fun! It's exciting to manage & upgrade different hotels! I wish there was a way to share proceeds from completed hotels with other hotels you are currently upgrading. Otherwise, what's the point of completed hotels continuing to earning millions when theres nothing else you can do with the proceeds __...the ONLY reason it didnt get 5 stars.__ *Today game is throwing error 4 code when opened and cannot be played*

App keeps crashing. Won't load ads and freezes. I've been losing money and customers randomly. As of May 12, I have the same issue. I notice it mostly happens during the day and at night around 8pm it'll work good for a couple hours then crash again.

The game needs more hotels I have beat all the hotel levels and all that exists are the events that you have to pay for to get the full experience of the event, where you win character's that could potentially help you in the hotels that have already been beaten or finished. (Update) their are still no new hotels even after the recent update.. this has caused me to lower my rating the game is fun and stimulating but it comes to an end..what a shame.

I'm amending my opinion again now that I've reached the end as far as I can go. It will be so good if the owners will update the game with the power in the Arabian Resort can be upgraded so that I can finish upgrading the "ruins". Also, add the next resort to move onto please. When are you going to upgrade so the Arabian Nights Resort can be finished and we can go to the next resort? ____ Obviously the game owners aren't interested in going any further, so I'll just uninstall it. It's a pity.

The game should be renamed "watching ads tycoon" because the time spent in the game, literally 90% is for watching ads and the rest for actually playing the game. (Except if you pay money to remove the ads) Unless you watch ads you won't be able to do anything in the game. No skill or brain needed, as long as you watch ads you won't go bankrupt lol

Its a machine to watch ads not a game. U can only progress and earn money by watching ads. It would be better if u have kept some timed target, quizs anything but simply we have to watch ads, earn money and build the different places of a hotel.. not at all a gaming experience but an ad watching experience... uninstalling it right away

Fun game, wish there were more hotels though. I'm almost done with the last hotel and bummed there's no more hotels to do. Edit: Changed rating to 2 stars for recent update. New events game type is glitchy, new guests can't come in, rooms are glitched and can't all be cleaned, etc. Disappointed.

Fun, Until..... After completing all the tasks, and they only gave me 14 out of 15 stars, so now I can't start the final hotel. I purchased everything and still nothing. Now the game is starting to get glitchy. Housekeeping is pushing their carts on the city sidewalk, laying facedown in their break room, chefs are coming to work in the middle of the night after all the guest are asleep. Front desk clerks keep their backs turned away from customers. Just weirdness.
Decent time killer. Finished all hotels and nothing left to do. Maybe a reset option with new challenges? Unsure if there's a notification for the small codiresort events
I personally find it a good game and all but please fix it where the customers wait in line for a table but there is literally 2 tables open.

A fun time killer. Ads are completely optional, you dont have to watch any if you dont want too, and you still progress at a good pace without them. The main thing that I find kinda offputting, is once you upgrade everything in a hotel, all it does is just make money for you. Theres nothing more to do. You cant even send profits from one hotel to another. Great game overall.

I love this game. I like the themes around each hotel. The developers have given a lot of thought to detail which I like in a game. I would love to see an "upgrade all" button especially when I know I have enough funds to upgrade the entire room. Also my game just started shutting off after the update so that's a little frustrating.

Love the game. Very addictive and fun. The only thing, in my opinioun, that could be added to make the game more fun would be a money transfer system for different hotels. Not only would it make the other hotels slightly easyer, it would also remove the annoyance of so much useless cash pileing up as well. Other than that, best idle game I've ever played!!!!!!!

The game itself doesn't need any input from you other than upgrading things as much as you can, which quickly takes a lot longer unless your spend money or watch a lot of ads. All in all there's only 4 hotels, so in the space of a few weeks you can finish the games by popping on to double your bonus every two hours, upgrading, and repeating that. If you wanted to actually watch the game, you can, but there's little to nothing in the way of interaction.

It is a fun game, but content is limited. Also, I don't understand why we can't utilise the money made from completed hotels to fund the new ones. I would rather things be a bit more expensive in the following hotels rather than just have the money collecting and being useless. It also seems that you can't get 5 stars without using in game currency. Again, it would be a good opportunity to give the options of a higher price OR gems. Good game, but definitely room for improvement.

Loved the game. However, after i got onto the 2nd map, I'm not getting my rewards after watching videos and my customers would disappear after closing the app and returning. I.e. having 10/10 occupancy before closing the app. Once it's off and back online in less than 10secs, it's down to 4/10, with all the double room's occupants missing. It's frustrating and i cant progress much.

Unplayable!!! Really enjoyed this game for awhile as you have to take time can't just fly through it but it has become unplayable as you have to use adds to progress in the game you can play for a little bit then adds won't load at this point I just delete the game because it's not worth it to me to keep letting them know anyways hopefully yall have better luck

Love this game! I've already completed all the levels. It's beautifully designed and although earning income is a little slow at first it all feels very rewarding! UPDATE: After yesterdays update the quests work perfectly! I absolutely can't wait for more hotels to be added :) easily one of my favourite idle games that you guys have made! Thank you!

This is a developer that listens to it's players. Codigames different idle games have always been fun but I've backed away from some of them because you spend an excessive amount of time watching videos to progress rather than enjoying the game. Now incorporating a feature where you can eliminate most videos for a price was an EXCELLENT idea. Players now have the option. $10.99 seems a bit much but developing games does cost money. Good job on this game!!

Overall a good 4 star game. Great quality and it has a rare feature; negative income. Most idle/clicker/tycoon games dont incorporate expenses into the mix. Also, Yahoo article ads are quality in the fact they never glitch out, unlike other types of ads other games have.

I love this game! Its slow to start at first with a limited income but you get extra money from the dancing money man and from the parking lot/rooms. I havent played the event very much because its expensive and relies on you constantly playing it and the event seems p2w. I have bought the x2 modifier and it does help! You have to be a little thoughtful on what you spend your money on. I gave it 4 stars because of the event and the hounding of the paid managers. But this game is really fun!

It's a decent game, but nothing really out there for an idle tycoon. Definitly a cash grabber but, thems the breaks. Don't really have any complaints except for the fact that theres no way to tell why customers get angry. You just see a pulsing anger mark above them and you have to guess. Was it the resturant? The bar? Their hotel room? The cleaning service too slow? Theres no way to tell. If there was like, a customer reviews tab on the stats page that would make that easier. Just a suggestion.

Cool way to past time and really fun, if you like upgrading things for people. I played the prison version of this game and it was fun for a while but eventually all my progress got erased some how so I stopped playing. Hopefully this one is better.

DO NOT BUY THE VIP PACK!!! Warning to those even close to thinking about buying the VIP pack during the event hotels for the special managers! I bought the pack, my account was sucessfully charged but the goodies that I paid for never came before the event ended. Said something that the server was down. Upon requesting a refund I was assured that I would see it "in a few days" by customer support. That was 27 days ago. My last 3 emails have been ignored. Poor business practice to me.

I really enjoy this game but I do have a few issues it cost so much to upgrade each room, the guests need to walk faster they take so long to get to the restaurant that by the time they get there it's closed the rooms are too far away from anything especially in Blue Crystal Hotel and also there are a few glitches in this hotel the showers that are in the set of rooms on the right are facing the wrong way so guests are coming out there room and going into the next and going through the wall

The game is super relaxing and fun but here's the thing. Sometimes the app glitches and gets eternally stuck on the connecting screen. I have resolved my refund issue by getting it directly from Google. I hope this eternal connecting glitch will be fixed eventually. I don't see why any connection is needed to clock in those free gems...

For some reason there's always a glitched out ai/costumer that just stands in the lobby the whole time? Update: after playing for almost a month and half, invested $20 into the game I started seeing a few things that DON'T MAKE Sense. For example if you exit out of the game a soon as you get back, your money, and time of day is accurate but all of the sudden you have half of the customers you had before you logged out? Also the customers glitch out all the time.

I will give this game 5 star but this is the reason: we can't transfer money from one hotel to other so, if your hotel is in max level the money are stored as waste. But transfer money to one hotel to other is possible in real life but why it's not possible in this game. Pls make a option that we can transfer money.and there is no landscape mode. And important thing is pls respond to my comments!!

Kinda shocked you want me to pay 11 dollars everytime the event runs. Bought it once thinking it would be a one time purchase and would roll over to future events. Nope! Really disappointed that it wasnt made clear that it only worked for one event.

This review is for customer service/saving game data. I reinstalled this game a few days ago and all my game data was lost, so I contacted customer service, gave them all the requested info to hopefully find my account. Unfortunately they were unable to retrieve my it and gave me $40 worth of refunds on a portion. Told the rep I have since changed cards and she told me it would be sent to the bank. Today I get email stating my refund couldn't be process from giggle pay due to payment method.
Everytime I accomplish a task I just keep getting error reports and not get rewarded. I can't even play the game cause everytime I tap the screen I get this popping up. Highly annoying!
Hi I been playing this game fore 5 Year now and I upgraded and unlock everything now and I was wondering if you guys can add another hotel?

This games clearly cool! I love this game so much and with not to much adds because if you need some money you can use adds soooo cool app i recommend you to download bye i have to play the game_______________________
This game is too much nice but my reason to four star is that my all things which were in my old move has been gone and my connectivity was also .

I really enjoy this game. It's adorable and entertaining. However, there are a couple complaints I have been experiencing recently. There are some glitches that make the experience annoying. I click on the dancing man to get some money and it'll glitch out where the ad won't load so then the dancing man leaves, I get no money and have to wait for him to come back. There is another glitch where I exit the game quickly, come back and 4 of the rooms are empty when I had them full before.

Was really enjoying the game until I completed all the missions on the 4th hotel, decided to check for updates and it won't work. Just keeps spinning after 30 minutes I gave up. So I dropped by star rating and will not be playing anymore, the update worked after uninstall but it was not worth the bother. So i can swipe between rooms big whoop. Could have included a few missions in that upgrade too. Oh well. Was fun while it lasted. Have fun folks

I played a lot of the codigames idle-tycoon games and this one is my favorite. It's more realistic than the other games and I find it more fun that the others. I especially like that you don't have to wait for the upgrades. I also really like that different hotels have different setting. I read another review that suggested that we use money from the last hotel because the money just keeps coming with nothing to buy. I really like that idea and I would really appreciate the game more if it did.

I have been playing this game for almost a month and have really enjoyed it. There's only one problem I've run into, hence the reasons for 4 stars. I'm currently at the Stanley Resort, and every time I leave the game, even for a minute or two, all the guests in my double rooms just disappear. I'll have the rooms filled up, leave the app to check on something real quick, come back, and all the rooms are suddenly empty. If this was fixed I'd give it 5 stars.

I enjoy this game a lot. It is fun. I think the new pricing on the events is ridiculous. I shouldn't have to spend like 35 dollars to get all the boosts. These events last 4 days. I dont see how you can justify charging these amounts. I would gladly pay 16 for all of the boosts but the way you price them now is taking advantage of your customers. I just want a new hotel. Thank you

This game, along with the Prison Tycoon game, relys heavily on the pay to play or watching obnoxiously long ads to get money to progress. Getting money is slow going and upgrades to get more gets costly very quickly. It's a good idea of a game, poorly executed relying on ads so much. I get it's a free game and needs ads but this is a bit over kill...

I have decided to change my review but it remains 1*. Why is this? Basically they added an extra area, which I finished, but okay, not all bad. However, they added events. Now this isn't bad, more content is never a bad thing. Its just broken as after almost 6 days I wasn't even half way to 1* and that's with a purchase. I guess their hunt for whales is an ongoing venture.

DON'T PLAY THIS GAME OR SPEND YOUR MONEY. I did give this game 5 stars, and even paid a couple bucks for a couple of perks, and diamonds, and subsequently lost all progress I made in the beginning of the game. Now having to start over without any of the progress I made for a 4 star hotel. All diamond purchases are gone too. I want my money back. Terrible programming and thievery.

At first I've enjoyed it a lot.. But there are some cases that when you reached the highest level of upgrading your room facilities it turns up that you have nothing to upgrade, you'll need to get a stars before you invest in other hotels available.. Instead of using stars why would you convert it to money that we had in our hotels income? Seriously what would be the use of our sales in other hotels and we have nothing to upgrade anyway.. The ads though quite annoying.. Thank you..

So ever since march 30th, the game has been messing up for me. First it started with the invester not showing up anymore, then the ads would just keep loading. So now the game is slow and not that enjoyable. Please fix,i love this game and i esnt to play it while enjoying it.

Watching ads just to earn money to build a hotel that doesn't make any money in the beginning....... I would hardly call this fun or a game. You can not expand to install more bedrooms.... The chef cost 200 daily but you don't earn enough to keep the restaurant open daily. So I'm guessing the developer wants you to spend money to get the game started?????

Great game, I used to play the Idle Prison Tycoon game and i found this one to be much more enjoyable overall. My only point would be that the restuarant open times seem way too short for my guests to actually all go and eat before the place shuts down. It's not a big deal because they usually go to other attractions anyway.

Really enjoy this one out if all the tycoon games, I'm a busy mum so I can let the ads play to build x2, however last few weeks they haven't been loading and the only way to do it is to come out of the game after every video and load it again which is way too much hassle.

This is by far the best tycoon game I've ever played. Alot of games are empty and have no meaning or use. This game is much better and I love playing it. If you like a challenge this game is also for you. And it really shows how to manage money and good business strategies. Great for kids

6 large icons related to paying real money stuck on one side of the screen... kinda says it all. Also, I recently watched ads so I had 1hr 30mins of the x2 bonus. Came back 30mins later and it was all gone.

This is such an interesting game.But their is only one problem that the money earned by one hotel can not be used in another hotel . But it's really beautiful and very good game. I can't bored while playing . All the things in this game are very beautiful .I request to the owner of this game that make one more game like this . I really love to play this game . I want to give this game hundred stars if I can.I don't now what to say about this game . I thanks to the owner for making this gam__.

Nice game but some things don't make sense. All the guests are up same time and rush to eat. You have 16 tables all the chefs so can't go faster but customers are queuing, not take empty tables. This should be reworked to customers sitting and time spent at table depending on how many chefs. If too long then have them unhappy and leave. Staff is cleaning the rooms while customer is having a shower... It takes the same time to tell a customer that the hotel is full than to check him in...

Very easy and enjoyable game. I like that it is very easy to play and you go at your own pace. Also enjoy how it is being updated, another thing is that if you do everything just right you can beat every level really fast. So far I have 30/20 gold stars and I'm just waiting for the next level. Only thing I wish there was a to make it so that instead of clicking everytime you could hold the button to multi buy something. Other them that good job game creator!!

I LOVE this game. It's not a game that you can blow trough quickly unless you spend money. The only issue is that the ads doesn't load about 60%-75% of the time. And even then the failed ad load only works for night into day. I think that if the ad fails on your part that we should keep the reward. Overall a great game

Fun! I am a hour in and having a blast. My only criticism is maybe lower the price on the ad removal service. I hate ads as much the next person but not for $11 of my hard earned dollars on top of needing to purchase managers to run the place while you are offline. I know it takes a lot to create this game but as a consumer I wouldn't pay that for 1 service.

I only gave it three stars because after the update or whenever the update was because my phone automatically updates. the game quit giving me coins when I watch a video so I don't know if it's a glitch and it also takes a very long time to load when I open up the app. But I'm not sure what the problem is I just hate I can't get the money that I earned for watching videos but the game is awesome I love this game no problems besides that. Would like to compensated if possible for missing coins.

This idle game is perfect me! The upgrade for instant claims and skipping all ads bought by husband for me is really awesome. Great job for the app maker. Also want to ask if you could add some tips on how to minimoze losses.. I've got some bsr with word losses on it but couldn't find out why. Lol. Looking forward to more interactive upgrades from this app. Thanks a bunch

It is indeed a nice game. Thought the fact that you have to start from scratch to build each hotel and there is no option to transfer the money that you are still making in the previous hotels, is really frustrating and definitely makes people eventually delete the game from their devices. You only have the option to watch again and again ads to gain some cash to invest in each hotel separately. What is the use of the money that the previous finished hotels are still making? No clue.

Very nice game, I enjoy it a lot. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because of two details. First off the marketing expert ($5.49), general manager ($10.99), and no more adds($10.99) are separate to purchase. Can't there be a separate deal in which all three are put in a deal pack for only $20? Also, sometimes it feels like the game is very slow. Adding an option in the settings that makes the game double the speed or maybe even triple would be nice.

Very good game, only issue is once I completed my first hotel to 5 stars I was still earning money but I could no longer spend it, may be useful if you just have the one bank account for the entire game? Seeing as though the prices rise as you open more hotels anyway, would feel more realistic with that! Other than that, the only mobile game I've continued to play with out becoming bored!

Outstanding. I mean, if you buy no more ads and the 2x unlimited its pretty much a time killer. I love it. Yeah you may spend money to get somewheres but they use it to bring us more of these games. I played quite a few of their games and still enjoy it. Would like a way to make money quicker as its taken 3 days to pass the 1st hotel but other than that i love it

It's a good game with lots to do. But you got greedy trying to charge a stupid amount of money to have double profits and the ads and stuff. On top of that for watching a 30 second ad you only get ten minutes double up time. You've done good with other games and your going to get greedy now and ruin it? Should be 30 mins for an ad as before with others and stop trying to extort players. $15 is greedy

Would be 5 stars but with it being so slow in the beginning and me having a feeling there isn't much to do after you 5 star everything, only 4 stars. Great time killer. Good idle game. Just need more to do to keep up looking forward to what's next that we don't have to wait for unless its a progression level.

This is one of my favorite games to play! It's quite relaxing on stressful days, and for me at least, buying the no ad option was worth it. I do have a question about the events though, if you buy the VIP pack for the event, does it carry into the other events? Since I have fully upgraded everything I have, the events are all that's left. If the VIP doesn't carry, I would have to buy it every time I did a new event, and that's just not worth it.

Beat the game in about two-three weeks. Loved it, was thoroughly invested. Adored the different hotel themes and seeing how they grew as i upgraded things. But now I've paid $20 for a game I can't do anything with except sit and earn more money with nothing to spend it on??? Is there more content coming??

The game would have been lot better if we can use the profits made by our previous upgraded hotels on our current hotels.. I mean every time the new hotel is opened we have to start from scratch with no money.. All that hard work and time spend on the previous hotel is for nothing. That's really bad.

I would give more stars because it is a good game but you spent more time watching ads to advance than actual gameplay. You can get rid of ads buy paying a small fortune GREEDY GAME MAKER. USE ALL THIS MONEY FROM ADS TO MAKE A BETTER GAME. There are way better games that don't even make you watch any ads check out !!!!! UTOPIA ORIGINS !!!!!

Was doing hotel event I had everything built including arcade disco, I had one star and 15, 807, woke today no arcade built and not my star and only 7, odd in total earnings, not the first time it's done this, fix the game as I'm on the last hotel and like the game, but for the events not keeping the money or the parts built,,,,,my last comment was removed,,, I've completed all hotels now there is nothing to do, more hotels please

Overall this is quite good and exciting game, but i think there is small weakness point in profit. I don't know if this game have this feature or not, but if this game have transfer profits among the hotels, it would be better. Thank you.

I have been waiting so long for the ads to load and it automatically shuts off and wont give me the money of the ads. Why did I spend 10 minutes looking at a screen that says loading and not get anything from it? Give me back my coins

Overall I really love this game! it takes stradigy and spending your money wisly. Its one of those harder idle games but a really run one. For now i will give it 4-stars becuase there are a few things they could fix. Sometimes when i watch a video it dosn't give me the rewards. And another is, it lags for ME way too much and i dont really enjoy the game when it does but overall I really enjoy the game!

This game is fun but you guys give us options to watch ads in exchange for the game's currency but it's a crapshoot if you get that money. Or sometimes when you click on the ad, it won't even play and almost immediately boots you out without getting paid the money. This is the only reason why I can't give it 5 stars, which is a shame because it's a fun....Update as of 3/1/20 - the situation, please fix, it's ruining the experience
It's a great game I have only experienced a bug once it was after an add which there are ads but it froze for about 30 minutes but other than that AMAZING GAME!!

This is a great game! It's a great way to pass the time. However, I would give four stars if you could make it less about relying on watching ads to progress. Another VERY IMPORTANT thing to change for five stars would be to make it so that you could use the money from your previous hotels to upgrade your new ones. Would make more sense this way.

Its a great game as you need to think about how to manage finances and etc. However to remove adds from the game or buy a manger costs way too much money and is unreasonable, and i dont like the fact that you cannot transfer the money from one hotel to another, therefore im giving it 3 stars. It would be better if you solved these problems and also made a global competition in the game for like bitcoin or something. Make the game more interesting for a stronger purpose.

Started playing this game a couple days ago and I am Obssessed. Its really fun and addictive. I just wish that the money from the previous hotel could be used in the others (since I own them and all), so tht it wouldnt be so difficult and expensive to upgrade and stuff, but it makes it more challenging tht way, so not really complaining. Also, I havent been getting investors lately and Im not sure why...

The first two hotels were fun to play. The third one is quite annoying to play. The guests only stay for one day therefore the restaurant is completely empty on the second shift because the guests are leaving. New guests if they check in after 6 PM they wont be able to enter the restaurant or beach bar because they spent too much time walking. Also the guests don't know the working hour of the facilities. Nice game but needs improvement.

It's a good game and it had potential, but once you reach the higher level to update each segment you want there's not much to do, your hotel makes money but then again there's nothing else to spend your money on. Maybe add more levels of update or let the money be transfered to other hotels?! I'll play while there's hotels to work on but once I reach every level on each hotel then I think I'm not going to continue playing it.

The game is fun if you play a few minutes every other hours. For a few coins, you can skip add, add a few boost. But as you can't transfer your gains from one hotel to another, it's pretty much meaningless. Worst, they implanted some "Limited Time Event" where your previous purchase aren't available anymore and request you to pay more money for options you previously had in the "main game". Tldr; fun but kind of a money grinder.

Good game but annoying. As you upgrade rooms or services the star rating increases. However despite upgrading everything to the maximum I can only get 4 stars at each hotel. To get to the 3rd hotel you need 10 stars (5 from each previous hotel). Gems are awarded for completion of tasks (such as upgrading a bed to a certain level) but you can not earn enough gems to get all upgrades available. The only option is to pay for gems with real money. Seems to be a fault with the game.

Enjoyable and relaxing but one hotel is so spread out, guests don't get to do much, spend too much time walking to and fro, everything is open at the wrong times, and check in/out zips by in 4 hours!!! The restaurant has tons of seating but only serves 12, pool is huge but not really in use, spa is miles away and vacant most of the day. Loads of improvements could be made to this level.

It's not that it isn't fun, it's just that there are issues. I have upgraded everything in the 3rd hotel and have a full staff but I still can't get the 5th star so I am stuck. It sucks that you can't use the wealth you made on earlier hotels when you move to a new one. Some upgrades are REALLY pricey. I hate how there are so many tables in the restaurants but you can't use them all, but if you don't buy and upgrade them you can't get the needed 5 stars.

Too Easy and Too Basic. There's absolutely no intelligence needed for this game. It's mind numbingly boring. All you can do in the game is buy items for the hotel to increase revenue and hire/fire staff. There's nothing else to it. There's no decisions to make, so scenarios or events that happen. It's just 'customers come, stay, then leave'. And the graphics are appalling!!

I love this game. I even spent some money so I could get triple the money when I log on each day. I've been playing for about a month or so. The reason I'm only giving it 4/5 is I've completed all the levels and go on further. They have been adding some short-term challenges, which is okay except I completed the first one. Then when they did the next one, it was exactly the same as the first except the only way you could get a presidential suite was to pay money. And I wasn't about to do that.

I've decided to change my rating. It is a really good game the only complaint I have is the pricing for premium content is too high for my liking and without it it's impossible to complete any of the timed events that happen randomly. But the main part of the game is is good you just need time to complete things. Which I don't mind.

I would give a 5 star if there was a way to transfer money from one hotel to the other. Or money that you make from hotels was usable at all of them like the gems. It would make it a lot more enjoyable. I give up after a few days because I get stuck due to not enough money. A lot of the add ins to the other hotels are expensive. I also find when I go to double my profits after being away for a couple of hours it's not giving me the extra cash. Which is frustrating.

I did finish all levels and like all Codigames recommend playing with the No Ads. But must admit, this is my least favorite. Way too many rooms in the hotels and thus way too many repetitive clicks. Once u have built a few rooms all the rest become mundane. If more levels added I hope there are more unique items rather than tons of rooms

I had play this game for quite some time now as I am at Arabian Nights Resort. I noticed my videos 2x rewards dont work although i finish watched them. Also when i left the hotel with 2x profits, I found out that i am losing by negative numbers of money. That doesnt make sense at all. It's a slow game each time u begin opening new resorts. But i cant stand with these bugs. Please put some real fix improvement.

There is a very annoying bug in the game whenever I leave the game with all of the rooms occupied and then I come back again 7 rooms are empty. I tested it to see if it was just because I left the game for a long time but it isn't because I left it for one second and 3 rooms were empty so now I have to try and fill them up. If you can please fix this because it is such a great game.

Ever since the latest update my game hasn't worked like it used to. It used to take me back to the current hotel I was working on and it doesnt anymore. It takes to just whichever one it wants which is very ANNOYING considering that I watch the ads for double profit and it doesnt tell you which hotel it's on until you've watched the ad. It is beyond aggravating to watch an ad for a hotel that you're no longer working on. I just wanna open my app and go straight to my hotel I ended on but no.

I'm adore all these cute games that Codigames has been throwing out but I'd like to see more variety of decorations and such between levels. The two giant heads and stack of cash in the bottom left corner do not encourage me to buy anything, they just clutter up the screen and are annoying. It would be more appropriate to have them in the store to buy gems.

Finally a more realistic idle clicker game!! Where 10 minutes after playing I'm not already a trillionaire. Love how you can lose cash. So far everything about it is great. I've been getting my rewards from videos, no glitches. I will report back as time goes. So far great Job C!

There are only 5 levels of hotels. The paid upgrades are useless without additional levels. Fun game but there is nothing to do once you complete the 5th hotel (Arabian Nights Resort). If there were additional levels or ways you could start a new hotel, apartment complex, condominium, etc. then I would give it 5 stars. 1 star is because the game is dead after completing 5th hotel. There needs to be additional ways to grow as a Hotel Tycoon.

It's an enjoyable game it's just that after completing the first hotel with 5 stars & complete all the tasks; there's no reason to go back to that hotel. There's nothing to do. Even the money you make doesn't transfer to the next hotel_____¡â_. Other than that I'd give it 5 stars. Edit: Yeah this game sets you up to spend money in order to advance. Not really "free". You'll also notice that you'll complete all the tasks and STILL not receive your 5 stars fair & square. DELETE

This is not one of those games harass you with constant ads. However you still have to watch ads over and over and over and over. Because the game's in-game economy system depends on the ads. Yes, there is a payment system that removes all ads. However even if you pay the money, it feels like cheating. I wish these mobile games stop depending on the ads and give us proper games. But I am sure developers are happy with this ads based system and will give me a copy/paste reply.

This is a tentative 5 star review. First, this app is amazing. A great time killer for anyone that enjoys these idle games. You wont fly through the stages too fast and getting 5 stars feels like a reward. My only concern is the amount of stages. At 4 hotels to build, I feel like I'm about to max out without even being a month in. Updated: Yeah, 4 stages isn't enough. Edit 3/12/20: nah, this game is legit for what it is. Easily my favorite idle game.

Hi i really enjoyed this game. Its fun but would be nice if you add a power up that makes your income x2 then it becomes x4 if you watch enough ads and add more level please. I know it would be too much to add but its okay if you disagree.

EDIT: Built all of the hotels, maxed them out. No more new hotels to open. Would have given more stars if completed hotels profits could be rolled forward to other hotels. Fun game, but I completed all levels in a week and now there's nothing left to play.

This game keeps me occupied, and is lots of fun! I just wish the ads were a bit more appropriate __! Other than that this game is super__! This is the best tycoon I have ever played and lasts the longest! Thank you!

This game is very awsome its great for children but one thing that bothering me is that i cant earn offline money and when i click to wacth add to earn money it just dissaperd off plss fix this problem

Too many ads to watch in order to progress in the game, but one purchase can get rid of that if you're willing to pay for it. I did, figuring to both help out the devs for the game and speed up my gameplay. It was a small price for me and totally worth it. I purchased the no ads+instant rewards and the double earn perk at the same time when they had a sale.

The game isn't bad and I have the no more ads. My biggest problem is if I minimize the game instead of going in to actually close it, I collect no money. It's a waste of time. Also it feels pointless that when you finish a hotel it continues to collect money that you can do nothing with. Either add more to completed hotels or allow me to use my part of that income on other activities or hotels.

Update: so... Weirdest complaint about a game ever but... They won't take my money __ I purchased the ad free thing, Great purchase, but it took forever for it to finally work. I contacted support and they didn't get back to me but I was able to purchase. I'm not going to email them everytime I want to spend $5-$10. I have decreased my playtime because of this, it's pretty annoying! I've tried purchasing Google play points, a Google Play gift card and just using my debit card but to no avail __

This game is alot of fun! However there are some extras that you can purchase that are priced outrageously. I get it they are pretty significant characters that are very beneficial but they are $10.99 a piece. That's outrageous! I'd spend at max $10 for both and even then that's rediclous for a few virtual characters! All around the pricing in this game is ridiculously expensive. As far as game play, it's pretty slow to advance, but still much fun.

Fun game, but has some annoying mechanics. I hate that after 2 hours of being out of the hotel your hotels close. It's too short a time frame. Also I wish you could transfer money from one hotel to the other. My first hotel is fully upgraded and makes a crazy amount of cash that I have nothing to do with while my 2nd is struggling to get started. Even if you can only transfer funds once when you first open a new hotel that would be great.

The three stars are only temporary! Until a fix is issued. I'm on the ski resort hotel and my customers keep getting stuck between the front desk and dining room! I'll close the app completely to reset this bug and it'll take 25 minutes off my double money time. That's a little harsh considering I'm trying to correct an issue. Overall it's a fantastic game and I've been glued to it since Friday. I love the subtle movie and video game characters you guys have added in. (Add some more will you?!

The ad free option is definently the way to go to throughly enjoy this experience. I'm going on 20 gameplay hours and play a few times a day. I enjoy seeing my hotels grow and moving on to new locations once I "5 Star" a previous location. I'm hoping the developers add new locations because at this point I've already beat the game and I want more. Happy managing!

Love the game. Pretty easy flowing and fun. The only thing I'd like to change is the money bit after you move on to another hotel. Once you've completely updated a hotel and have everything purchased you're just pointlessly collecting money for that hotel. Unless I'm missing something? I think it'd be cool if the money is all one whole amount you pull from for all your hotels.

This hotel game is veryh good and fun, there are no glitchs or lags, and it is entertaining. The only bad thing is, that i wish that there could be more upgrades for things like the bar and restraunt in the city hotel, where you start.

It's OK to pass time. I have been playing this game for a few years. It keeps me busy during down time. My only issue is there are no new hotels being added. It's been about 2 years since I had a new hotel. I have fully completed the 7 available hotels. Yea we get short limited hotels here and there but I would like to see more consistency with the development of new hotels.

DO NOT SPEND YOUR MONEY ON HOTEL 3! Really wanted to rate this game high. I loved the gameplay and the graphics. It's simple but easy to enjoy and get lost in. However it feels like a grab at our wallets. You have to watch ads every few minutes to get anywhere with advancing. I was willing to bare all the ads but not the 7.99 (660 dimonds) I had to pay to get enough diamonds to advance in the game (third hotel) to find out I have one level left to play. Very disappointed.

As much as its a fun game, the ads keep coming up as a black screen, then kicking me out without my reward. It happens way too often and is starting to affect how much im enjoying my experiece. Other than that, the game is fun, great to kill time, and is definitely something i would recommend.

I really enjoy the game as a idle timewaster however I don't like how once you've finished with a hotel you can't do anything with the money it keeps collecting since each hotel has it's own money anyway. It would be good if once a hotel was complete there was something you could do with the extra money such as buying perks (like x2 money for an hour ect) you could use in the other hotels. I also hate the new events as they're impossible without paying so not even worth attempting!!!

Updates that don't fix? People have been constantly telling the developer of the gameplay issues, including bonuses not received, double profits not working and general gameplay bugs. It's the same thing everyday, no structure to it and very tiresome. Good for the first hour and then nothing to do. Even the event hotels are just the same as a normal hotel.

I love the game but it only lets me watch one video per session which is definitely frustrating, it gives me the option to watch a video for a perk but once I click to watch the video it just closes but the optional perk is still there; it will let me reject the video though. If this gets fixed I will change it to 5 stars; but i feel like I'm not able to fully enjoy the benefits the game has to offer.

This game eats battery life like crazy. Plus it is fairly boring. There isn't much to do, and watching the hotel is pretty well pointless. Doesn't feel idle, doesn't feel interactive. Edit: Gave it another try. Uninstalling again because the previous review is still all true. Ads don't pay out. Took away another star because the events are also impossible.

Great game, but ads are long and the cost of going ad-free is expensive - ¡ê12.99!? Whilst other games are as low as ¡ê3.49 albeit permanent, it's still steep! Also, sometimes the investors disappear immediately after entering the hotel and on occasion watching an ad doesn't credit your hotels finances with money.

It is frustrating to see that most of the negative reviews are concerning the same problem I am having with the ads.The worst part is the automatic reply every comment gets and this is STILL NOT CORRECTED. I was really enjoying the gameplay up until the ads stopped loading which left me unable to receive the rewards I was really wanting to get. The 2x income is a great incentive but I can't get it! Hopefully this is something that can be fixed

I don't like the dancing guy or free money. Rather not have him come back so fast. Also I would like if it did not force me to buy certain things like the bar first when I rather manage the hotel myself! Lastly you have to watch ads until you earn your first star as you can't make enough to support the building through normal means. Feels like cheating when I get free money takes fun away. Other wise great game.

Very good customer service. Which is essential if you have bought extras in a game. A few tech issues in game which each time customer service team fixed. All emails were answered quickly. Love the game and over all service. Finished all hotels. Loved the game, but once all hotels are done there is only the event hotel to complete, which is the same. Can't more hotels be added via updates? I would like to keep playing.

Seems to be an overall good game, but there is a bug for whenever you join back I to the game. Instead of getting dou le the amount of money when you join back into the game for watching an ad, you get the base amount. I've seen this go for money around a few hundred to hundreds of thousands. It shows the money doubling, but doesnt actually add double to your "bank account"

Another of the "Wait for 2x 'Watch Ad' button to appear, but when it clicked on, ad fails to show and you've wasted as much time as watching any ad, without getting any benefit" games. Listen, it is not our fault your ad link fails. We tried; at least reward us for the effort rather than wasting our time.

Yeah, so...I love this game. I think it's simple and beautiful (except for decoration). I know you have to make money so I think is fair watching ads. Being a UX Dev I kinda wanna make some suggestions tho. One is making more missions would be nice. Some users tend to follow missions on what they expect to upgrade next in this type of game and getting compensation on it is satisfying. Example: Instead of 40 gems to upgrade a room for lvl 8 make 8 missions of 1 lvl worth 5 gems.

It is addicting. Graphics are nice and animations are sweet, cute and funny when characters get frustrated. The only thing I can do to support the developers is this review from my usage of the app they have designed and created. Thank you for the app. Also I have noted some eastereggs too. There can be found famous celebrities as characters. I did pick up Keanu Reeves, but i had to zoom in to see him more clear. Sincerely great work from you developers. Keep making it more awesome __

Is fun apart from the fact you cant play unless you spend real money. Only way to progress in the game is to spend ¡ê10 to get rid of ads. Another ¡ê10 to continuously make revenue whilst not playing which is ridiculous. So you either spend a ridiculous amount of money to play this or you play hours on end each day and watching an ad every 30 seconds. Rather spend my money on a proper game.

Hi I was new to this game and after a couple of days I really liked the concept of this game because it is where you have to manage a hotel but at the same time the advertisement is long and at the starting you always have to watch ads to get some money__otherwise there is no way otherwise getting slow money after some minutes but I recommend you guys reduce the number of ads and make money a little bit more easy to get and I know ads are your source of income but now you have way too players__

Finally beat this stupid game. I have to admit that it kept me busy for the first week. But the several weeks after was nothing but repetitive play and loooooooooonng waits. Dont waste your time buying in game "perks" they dont help how you'd expect. I spent $10 for something the game said unlocks everything but it didnt. Spent an additional $5 and felt like I just burned my money up. Didnt bother spending another 10 for a manager. The game is about waiting.

I am addicted to this game. I have paid to use the upgrades so.i dont have to watchs ads which is awesome. A few suggestions to make it better, can we have neighbours/friends that we can send gifts to or visit their hotels. Also please give us something to do with the money that is sitting in the other hotels. Its a shame that there is nothing more that can be done to them..also are my hotel clerks making out. One was on top of the other yesterday behind the desk !lol

Well I thought this was going to be a fun game. Now with the first hotel you keep making money and you can't build anymore and you can't take that money and transfer it into the next hotel. Wondering how you get enough stars to open the third resort, I've been waiting for about a week and I refuse to spend real cash......Too boring, uninstalling

Wonderful game. Loved it. thought I was gonna rate it 5 star considering the fact that it's a fantastic game. But in the "EVENT HOTEL", chefs(hired 2) don't work when they're supposed to and the housekeeping staff(hired 3) cleans only 1 room out of 3. I have to clean the remaining 2 by watching videos. I'll give 5 star after this is fixed.

***EDIT(1) The update has still the same problem with ads loading or should i say not loading. You have to uninstall the game and then re install it to play realtime 2 hrs before uninstall and reinstall. I will wait for one more update then im removing this app.FIX THE GAME PLEASE! why mention bug fixes with the new update UNLESS YOU MEANT TO SAY YOU ADDED MORE BUGS...SERIOUSLY FIX IT. THANKS. ONCE FIXED ILL GIVE YOU BETTER RATING.

Love the game until I finished the 4th hotel. But what else is there to do, also why can't we use funding from other hotels. Got all 4 hotels to 5 stars. Enjoyed it untill then, but from there the game is dead. It's just a few weeks of play. I would add more stars if Devs can figure out a way to keep it alive even after completing 4 hotels.

Great game, but now I've completed all the hotels. The game no longer intrests me. Which is a shame, cause this was my 1st Tycoon Idle game I actually liked. Those constent clicker games, bore me. Please update and gives us a new hotel each update. Or I may have to uninstall the game :( P.S You can't transfer the money you've earned. To the new hotel, you are working on. Which sucks

Great game for what it is. They dont choke you with ads. Thing that bothers me is why have staff that can only help 2 people. Example 5 chefs help 10 people yet you have 20 seats which they cant sit at if 10 are already there. only a few can wait in line yet you have 40 guests. The math doesn't add up.
