Also in one hotel many guest have too far to walk to get to the restaurant that it could close before they arrive. Why does a restaurant close at supper time? Regardless I still play daily

This game deserves minus rating. Its full of bugs and only good for watching ads. Event hotels keep getting deleted and after complain they do nothing to fix it. Restaurant/Hotel room becomes vacant even after full update when u leave the game. Profile booster goes to zero if u r inactive for 30mins even when its full and supposed to stay active for 2hour. All the room/restaurant customer goes to zero if u do not continuously play. After completing a hotel the generated money is all useless.

I do like the game but it's currently having connecting issues when ever I try to use gems or getting rewards from the Codi Hotels (it's mostly not my wifi), I'm also getting notifications that my hotels are closed even though I literally just checked it

This game is so good and entertaining. the only thing that bothers me is that I can't transfer money from one hotel to another. I know it is a game that you have to build a hotel from scratch but what else can you do with all the money that your 5 star hotels make?
Super super super interesting... I love it... But there is a server problem.. I hope they will solve it soon

Fun to kill time with. Needs work for more play time, feels incomplete. It would be nice if it was a little more in depth. Customize the hotel more. Maybe just adding more services like pool, spa, fitness center, etc. Possibly invintory managment. buying specific supplies, getting deliveries. Or even giving the restaurant/bar a star rating and more personal upgrades/customization. It would give a cause to play longer and watch more adds lol :)

Once you get to the next to last hotel they make it impossible to get to the last one without spending money. You upgrade the entire thing and can't get all the stars unless you buy diamonds to upgrade extras. Disappointed. REALLY loved the game. Didn't mind all the ads. It's tons of fun! But I uninstalled cause it's impossible to go further.

GAME PLAY PROGRESSION IS HEAVILY DEPENDENT UPON WATCHING ADS!!! In the beginning it was okay because I enjoyed the game. But quickly learned that you will need to watch 30+ ads daily for progression. That's entirely too much! Ad free version is way too expensive. Add all of that to the fact the ads DONT always load (therefore no reward) and frustration can start to mount. While concept, gameplay and graphics are awesome, I would like to see less ads.

Great game. Straight to the point and playing straight away with very little intro. A few ads in game but I don't mind because it helps you improve your hotel (They don't pop up every 5 minutes. You choose to watch them for more money) . Theres an option to buy the game to take the ads away, which I'm very well thinking of doing.

The game is amazing I have to say but there's just one thing that annoys me: I have all my rooms occupied, and when I change to another hotel just to check and then revert back, suddenly only two of my rooms are occupied. It doesn't retain my customers. I wish this is just a technical glitch or bug they can fix. Other than that, I play this game the entire day and I love it! I just hope the developers can fix it asap.

I gave it a try, finished first hotel. No thanks, uninstalling it. You basically have to watch ads every minute in order to make enough money to progress your hotel at a reasonable enough pace to be considered interesting. Your most significant source of income for upgrades is from watching ads. It's "addictively boring". Ad, ad, upgrade, wait, ad, ad, upgrade, wait... rinse and repeat.

It's fine. Good concept. Poorly implemented.Unfortunately you have to reliy on a lot of ads to make any amount of significant money. Or you can pay to remove ads, like I did, almost $20 AU, which speeds things up so much more so you actually feel like you're playing. Now if you've paid that ridiculous amount to remove ads the gameplay begins. It can actually be fun but there's a lot of repetitive play to it which becomes old very fast. Yes I'm very salty I had to pay alot for this mediocre game.

The one and most problem that am having is with the ads, why is it that it's always closing the app when you click on it and I don't think it's doing it on its own I believe the developers created it that way. so it's just one out of ten times you really get the chance to get the money the ads are displaying to you and that is unfair because every minute or two they send it and this is the problem it cause and that makes the game start to get boring..It's best you don't put these ads in it then

Was great until the last update. Now the reward videos are messed up - when I log back in I watch the video for x2 rewards and when it's over I click 'X' and it tells me "ate you sure because you'll loose your reward?" Even though I've watched the whole thing. And the dancing man offers me videos for extra money and the same thing happens, or the video doesn't even load at all.

I usually get bored playing games where we need to wait for an item to build/cook/get produced but this was a really addictive and interesting game. I love the theme related items and its exciting to earn money and upgrade things. Overall a really fun experience. Would love to play more of these types of games.

It was a fun game to play at first, then on like the 3 chapter/ hotel it started to bug out. Maids weren't cleaning the rooms. Customers were checking into the hotel but would leave the hotel and yesterday while I was playing the game my phone started to glitch on me turning the screen on and off on repeat to where it was difficult to restart my phone.

The game is great, my only problem I have is with the dinning area. The dinning room could only have two seats taken and customer still go to wait in line as if there isn't any free tables. Or say two customers are eating together, one finishes and the person in line sits with the person that's still eating, even though there are other empty spots. It's just really annoying and makes no sense.

Hi, this Hotel Tycoon game is simple one. Small tutorial to lead you the way if first time playing . Lots of leveling up some adverts if you wanna make quick in game cash to fancy up the hotel rooms and other features !! Enjoy game. The game did freeze on me in beginning twice when I was progressing a bit. I bounced out and came back in and now things are smooth . BTW Google Play also has similar leveling up game but it's Night Club & Bar with nice relaxing club music . Give it a try too !!

It will keep you very busy, especially with having the money to buy new things. I wish there were goals to make the game more fun its just a free play. Also i wish there was a way to buy more rooms.. I hate the fact that buying generaters or upgrading is so much money. It does take quite a long time to get money. And what can i do besides competing a task for gems. What make it fun is that you can watch ads to raise the money or even double it.. Just make a few genius updates and ill be fine!

Lots of fun but seems very short. Paid ¡ê20 for both perks only to complete the game in about a week. Lots of bugs to iron out (restarting the app resolves these). Hoping that more features will be added in time - including more hotels and the possibility to put in-game money towards something once a hotel is maxed out. Update 2020-01-21: there are now 4 hotels but all are complete and it has been some time since the last one.

Such an hilariously-high amount of ad begging. I feel like 1/4 of the screen is taken up by "pay $11 for thing" buttons, or the ever-present giant VIP "watch ad for game money" button. You can watch ads to add time to a 2x-income multiplier, but each ad only adds 10 minutes to a maximum of 2 hours. You'll spend more time watching advertisements than playing.

Good game to pass time. Interesting concept. Graphics are funky and vibrant, and well detailed. Really wish they added more hotels as Ive completed the game so far. And have done; for ages now. But theres no updates. There is so much more they can do. I will give it 4 stars until they add more hotels to upgrade then will rate 5.

You cannot and will not progress without ads. 30 second ads aswell. Why not 5 second ads? Want to get x2 money (for 10 minutes only) : watch an ad. Get bonus cash for upgrades : watch an ad. Need a room cleaned : watch an ad. Need guests : watch an ad. Without x2 income and without bonus cash you will not be able to progress. I spend more time watching ads then I do playing the game. Once a hotel is completed you cannot use the money gains towards anything else, the money just sits there.

This is a very simple yet entertaining game. I usually play this while I'm bored and it instantly cures my boredom. There is absolutely no lags bugs or anything like that. It runs smoothly and I definitely reccomend this game. In addition if you go off the game for maximum two hours, you still earn money for the 2 hours you were off which can really help when going back on so you can upgrade your hotel and pay your staff.

Would have been a cool game if it wasnt FLAWED. If you dont max out the number of stars needed to make it to the next level your eating potential is DONE!!! Your allowed to keep playing (which there is nothing to do once all task are complete) but cant increase your star rating for your hotels to earn more hotels. And I spent money on this game just to never be able to get another hotel after level two. And you cant start over. Super disappointed

Fun game but needs work. My first hotel earned 4 stars. My next 2 earned 5 each. I cnt move on to the next hotel bc I don't have enough stars. I went back to my first hotel, there's nothing else to be done. There are way too many ads for this game. It would be nice if some of the money from the previous hotel rolled over to the next one.

My go to game at the moment. I only started playing this game a few days ago and I've now managed to unlock the second hotel. Unlike most idle games you don't get loads of cash really fast it is a bit of a grind but it's still a very fun game to play. You have to rely on investments and watching ads to get decent amounts of money which is always random sometimes 2k sometimes 10k. It would be better if you could earn a bit more money a bit faster though other than that it's a great game to play.

Great game, very fun! Quick to learn, but takes a while to master. Is there a way to reset the game but keep all my purchased managers and earned special managers? Now that I have earned most of them, and have made it to Camelot, I would love to start over. Again, great game!

The game is great so far but it could be better like dont make it hard to earn money to upgrade things to make more money at the very beginning of the game its very tedious and time consuming just to earn the little bit of money to upgrade stuff plus you have to save some money so that your staff dont quit on you i know you guys wanted a feel of running a real hotel in a game an it feels like that trust me but its also to be fun.

Fab! I got this game thinking it was another idle upgrading game. It's more than that, you really have to think about how you're playing or things can go wrong. Devs have put a lot of time into the interactions and animations of the visitors and staff. The only thing I would say is once the hotel is complete along with all the upgrades, could their be a way of personalising each room? - I'm also not sure how to tell why my guest in their room is angry?

Love this app. It's fun and engaging. I would totally give this a 5 star rating but my only issue is the ad glitch. Occasionally, the ad will glitch and allow me to watch the video but then not give me the money or I will click to watch for the money and will be kicked out which restarts the game and the VIP will have gone. On other occasions, it will glitch and the VIP will be there but I will click on him and nothing happens. Please fix this bug as it happens with over 10,000 involved.

I have been playing this game for about a week and all was going well, until last night. I cant watch any videos to get money or double the profits or anything. It just flashes black and white and does nothing. I can't even get out of it, i have to close the app down and open it again. Then I loose the x2 profits. Please fix this!

Its a good game. Slow pace, item price is reasonable, more like a reality game. I agreedthe with most players, watching ads will help in the beginning, but after u updated some items, the cash will keep generating. Just dont over hire too much of employee. And, why cant we transfer money between hotels? It doesnt make sense when first hotel is max, but cant spent the money in other hotels..the event is also impossible to reach 5% without paying, after watching tons of ads, still barely near it

The game has great potential but is in need of some serious optimization. Guest pathing is a bit askewed. Hotels are so large that it'll take guests 2 hours of in game time to get from one place to another. Guests will path to closed hotel services wasting valuable in game time. A second of real time is about 2.5 minutes in game and the guests are slow to get anywhere. Exiting the game for even a few seconds will turn your "no vacancy" hotel into a "10 rooms available" when you return.

Currently on the Imperator Palace. Not sure if its a bug for this hotel or a bug thats developed coz of the last update. It keeps glitching out and not giving me any afk money. I am not sitting here for hours watching my money go up like $20 every 2mins or so waiting to get enough money to do anything. Uninstalling now coz to many bugs. This. The x2 thing does not give x2 money like it says it does. Getting cleaners just not getting up and doing their job no matter how many times i fire/rehire

It's a really good game and I enjoyed a lot! Unfortunately I'm gonna have to uninstall since there hasn't been any more update on the game for 2 years, still the same hotels so this means that the developers are not interested in this project for now. Hope someday you'll go back to it, because it's really nice and you could achieve even more players

Love the game, would love to see a family hotel with kids themed rooms fun pools, play areas, cinema etc. Would also be great to upgrade the presidential suites to have personal butlers and chefs. All hotels roughly the same need new hotel challenges for special events. Come on Codigames, start using your imagination a bit more please!

I bought the VIP pack for the event on Thursday and never received it. I contacted them several times and have yet to hear a response (it's Sunday). That is completely unacceptable. Don't buy anything with Codi games because you WON'T get it and they WON'T respond.

I rate this 5 STARS!...but i found a bug when when the people started to move out the house keepers started to clean but then thats when i saw the bug a house keeper just standed there by the tolit just standing there but at first it did not bother me then over time i got worried but then i got annoyed (defintion of annoyed slightly angry irritated)
In my opinion, it is helpful for many people but, if the technology was this good,in the olden , it would had helped my daughter's husband for his old profession in land.

This game was fun to play it's definitely a time waster. Issues I'm having with it now since the update is after so many videos watch sometimes just even 2 to collect things it glitches and won't let you watch videos to gain anything. If you try and shut it down to restart you lose some of the guests you may have had and have to start over. If they don't fix the issues soon I'll probably delete the game.

This is an idle moneymaking simulator with a twist - you start each hotel with a budget and a dream. It's fun, and grows exponentially as you improve. A lot of the bonuses are ad based, but they're well worth watching - I bought one of the bonus packs to further support the creators. There are still glitches and bugs, but they're mostly visual.

I have downloaded and played most of your idle games and have to say this is easily my favorite one. The progression feels natural as opposed to your and other apps where machines or stalls becomes increasingly harder to upgrade. This felt like I was really investing in my rooms for a profit. Granted, I'm not opposed to watching ads as I usually am doing other things whilst playing this, so I have a bias on progress but still. This model needs to be followed for your next game.

Love, love, love this game! The only ads are totally optional (I use them because I like the extra earnings you get). My one and only "complaint" is that there aren't more levels. I completed this game once, redownloaded it hoping there were new levels. Nope. C'mon, those "events" are totally stupid and a complete waste of time. PLEASE stop doing those, which are entirely repetitive anyway, and start adding new, "real" levels!

Great time killer overall and easy to play. I purchased the ad remover, but the upgrades altogether are definitely way too expensive, hence why I didn't get the other ones. The reason for the 2 stars is because the events are nearly impossible to achieve if you don't get the vip package, which only lasts 4ish days anyway. It doesn't carry over to the next one which makes it ridiculously greedy! Even without ads, I struggle to get even one star during the events. Game needs some adjusting

Well my other post doesnt exist anymore. The clockmaker interactive game is crashing the ads. And everytime it does I must restart the app. When I am forced to do this I lose anyone that is in the building as far as guests go except for the original single bedrooms. This needs to be fixed please. I love the game but restarting is obnoxious.

UPDATE: Still enjoy the game. Finally got was able to get passed the hotel that was effected by the update. The new hotel load correctly and I can easly play it. Still have the issue with the previous hotel and will not be able to finish it.

Very entertaining and time-consuming but when I had a second hotel I couldn't do anything and the money between both hotels should be shared. Also the dancing king comes only every time you have a shortage of money, so you have no choice, either lose everything from chefs and even more money, or watch the annoying adverts all day long just to take a little amount of money. There should be little or no ads in this game, because it's very amazing and wonderful but the ads just drop it to 4.4 stars instead of 5.

This game is good, long wait to do anything between days, makes it a nice little Idle game. I have however found a couple things I think are bugs?. I watched an advert and didn't get the money (I didn't close the ad early), I got stuck in the room upgrade menu with no choice but to restart the game, I could hit the back arrow, it was making the noise but not exiting the menu. Also the cleaner got completely stuck in one of the bedrooms and didn't move for days, a restart fixed it.

Everything is good, expect the game stutters(when opening it after switching from another app) from time to time, wich I don't understand while i have a pretty powerful device and the game doesn't look to demanding, although the "stutter" is more so a slight frame srop. So the only thing i would like to see improved is the optimisation if possible

It's definitely a good game to help you pass the time. The game mechanics are different than others I've played. This one tries to be more realistic but loses playability when night time has come. I'd give it 5 stars if there is a way to earn good amount of income while everyone is asleep. I spent some money to remove ads & to appreciate the developers hard work.

Really addicting games. But had one small issue, that is : whenever I logout from the game and return I see that my time suddenly become empty, even though I left it only for a few seconds. This is the only issue that is stopping me from giving that 5 starts. Really appreciate to see this fix in the next update.

Great game while it lasts. With only 4 levels and the latest update just with big fixes ot seems like we wont get new levels. Shame really as the game itself is great, dont even mind watching the ads to progress. I definitely wouldn't spend real money on the extras especially as within a month you can easily complete the 4 levels the game has.

This game is rlly fun but its rlly hard to get money in this game but every now and then this man comes into the hotel and starts dancing in the hallway and if u watch a video he gives you a considerable amount of money. This is kinda the only way to get enough money to upgrade ur hotel. I also wish we could have time to upgrade the hotel and then open it when we want to, instead of just having to deal with customers. However, the graphics are AMAZING in the game and I highly recommend it! :))

I love the fact that you dont have to wait for upgrades to complete, or buildings to finish, once u buy, u get it instantly. Make sure u buy the 'no ads' though, soooo worth the money or else this game might be slightly irritating with all the ads. Also, want to thank the support at codigames as well. Raised a ticket yesterday and it was resolved today with a little bonus for my convenience. Thats what i call service!

The first hotel was really fun but then with the second and the third there is a very annoying glitch that is happeneing. Everytime that I go offline (even just closing and reopening the app) half of my customers leave my hotels and it makes no sense. They just dissapear. I'm basically spending all my money upgrading rooms that don't even work if I'm not staring at my screen... I'm also going through hotels pretty quickly and I'm almost done all hotels in just 2 weeks. __

Hi guys, I enjoyed this game so far. However, after arriving to 2nd hotel and upgrading spa & ski services, I noticed that my income drop due to longer travel time of people going to those services. Thus, in average, less people use all four services. Would be helpful if you provide options to fasten their walking speed (that can be bought using gems) just like your other games. Will update the rating after you solve this problem. Thank you

I played this game for awhile and ive come to the conclusion... this game is virtually impossible for someone who has a mindset like me. It just feels like an unfinished game, due to the fact that everything cost a decent amount of money... except there are no good ways to get money except for to watch ads for coins. This game has potential to be good but if its annoying to play or gives you a headache to have to watch so many ads... thats unacceptable. Please make the game better.

It has so much potential but my game is bugged. I just unlocked hotel 2 and the VIP guy sometimes just refuses to show up. I don't know what causes it and he started showing up again for no reason. Progressing is insanely slow without ads and it's just a stupid bug. Sad to see that my fun had to end this soon, as I really enjoyed the game.

The game is fun and worth the $10 to just get rewards without watching ads, but there aren't enough levels. Currently there are only 4 levels with one of them being a Christmas Cottage (complete with the dancing king dressed like Santa), which make me think more holiday themed levels would be nice. Like a Haunted BnB where the staff is famous monsters (or just the dancing king is fine too) and the tenants are ghosts. Even without the holiday themes, just having more hotels would be good to have.

Previously I gave 5 starts. I finished the third hotel, and stopped playing it since I had no more hotel to manage. But then 4th hotel came up, and I played again. I was so surprised the 4th hotel looks VERY similar with the 1st hotel. First thing that came up to my mind was "were the developers too lazy to come up with new hotel design?" I stopped playing. Wasn't interested. Some people pay for your games, don't be lazy put more efforts and thoughts to design new hotels. Disappointed!

I like this game, but I'm giving 3 stars because since it's supposed to be an idle game, it has a lot of glitches in it. For example I left the game to restart it because the ads weren't loading for some reason, when I came back to it, the number of guests went down from full to maybe 50% full. What the hell?? How does that happen?

Even though game is very slow I liked the game concept and started playing. But after playing for couple of months, still I am unable to build 2 hotels. Whenever you login to game it will always be mid night and you need to wait till morning or need to watch ads to skip night. Rediculous. Uninstalling it.. Better improve your game! Good luck!

I like the game but it becomes repetitive after the first hotel. Not to mention, although the nexts gives more to do, you dont get to use the capital made from the first hotel. Which makes no sense. Once the first hotel reaches 5 stars, theres nothing else to do with that capital. Would be nice if it could be used with future hotels instead of starting from scratch each time.

I've maxed out most of my rooms and near completing everything the game has available but I find the game quite enjoyable. I like that there's some strategy to the game when decided what to upgrade and not upgrade as well as managing power. I'm looking forward to more content being added as it's definitely going to be a game I'd love to see be expanded.

The graphics are gorgeous but you either have to constantly watch ads or pay in order to make any considerable progress. This is not an idle game because after 2 hours of offline you won't get anything. Also when your phone goes to sleep in game no progress is made and it just pauses the game and income somehow

I give this game a full 5 stars!! The graphics are amazing and this game is soooo addicting. I would say that it is a little hard to make money without watching ads, but that is the only bad part of this amazing app! So amazing graphics, addicting, and ads are normally optional (recomended though). Get this game now!!!!!

So far it's ok, I have played these games for a long time but this one seems deliberately slow paced, especially the special events, it is not possible to go very far in the special events without buying bundles for real cash, that just makes it a waste of time to even start. There are similar games available that are a lot more free and enjoyable.

The game ok, but the event game is a fix. To be able to build Presidential Suites you have to buy (real money) the VIP Pack. I think you should be able to build the Presidential Suites, but if you want to build quickly then you can buy the VIP Pack. It should be a option NOT a choice, build and take time to build or buy pack and get Presidential Suites straight away. I don't mind watching adds to double you takings while away from game.

This is a good idle game but it only lasted me 1 month. I have purchased remove Ads as I do not want to watch video every single time the VIP comes. Thus, I have completed this game pretty fast. I hope you guys can come out with more hotels n resort. Also, it should increase the difficulty as most of the time I'm just waiting for my profit to upgrade things n hire staffs. If there is no more updates on the game, I'm gonna uninstall it since I have nothing to do anymore.

It's great until it's not. I've run into the problem of the ad button doesn't load it just circles forever. I've closed out of the game, forced stopped it and cleared the cache, reset my internet, restarted my tablet and it still doesn't work

I'm really enjoying the game but watching an ad for only a 10 minute boost is kind of ruining the gameplay. You have to watch 12 ads for a 2 hour boost, so you have to watch a full 6 minutes of just ads. Comparing to other games it feels way to ad heavy.

It's a good game but needs some work, doubling money to watch a video doesn't work sometimes doesn't even give the amount, also the restaurant keeps saying I'm in debt but then changes to I'm making profit, there's just some thing the game needs improvements, like a really good update...

I'd 1st like to say thank you for resolving my gem issue. Okay. So I enjoy the game. It would be nice to have the option to transfer some of the cash from your other hotels. I wish the guest wouldn't do the same thing at the same time. Make it a lil more realistic. Also it would be nice to be able to change the schedule. Like have housekeeping clean before everyone gets back from breakfast. Oh why spend gems on things that don't get used?? Like the mud bath..

Game has potential, graphics ar good (for mobile top down game) has a nice layout but there isn't a sense of challenge. Anytime I run out of money I can watch an ad (which is annoying) but still I can do that and get a boost and I feel watching ads is part of the gameplay if not you would be sitting idel waiting for some cash to make a upgrade. It's a good game but could be better

It's an amazing game, can't wait for the next update... I've nearly done up both the available hotels, when is the next one,.. where is it? More upgrades!!!?? Hope so love this game, this and the idle theme park tycoon one are my life I only play them and when this one gets bigger I'm spending the ¡ê10.49 to get rid ov the ads! One problem I have is on my mission list it says...: inaugura un hotel como Dios manda. Im English and only speak English so have no idea what that means...

The overall game is great other than the fact that it takes a long time to generate some actual cash. I would suggest may be a calendar to bring people back everyday with a different reward, such as cash, gold diamonds and other things. Maybe increase how much each patron to the hotel spends during their stay. But overall I am enjoying the concept of the game.

I love this game a lot! The only thing is getting money is hard. I've completed the first hotel, and im on the second, and money is very tight. I cant afford to pay my employee's because i upgrade all my things. Also, why have a power limit? There is still loads to upgrade in the first hotel, and i had to stop becayse of a power limit, though i updated all the batteries and generators max. But overall i love this game! Good job! Ps it would be 5 stars if not for the power limit and money

I gave this game about a week but now I know all it does is frustrate me. It's a free game so I expect to be able to actually play it a little. Instead I watch a thousand ads because I don't want to spend real money to get rid of them. Just found my first event and I don't see how it's possible to even get one star without paying real money, which is completely ridiculous. Definitely deleting it now.

I used to love this game, until this most recent hotel add. It starts you off with 1 room I've been playing for the past week and have yet to get enough money to even get a second room. My daughter plays as well and said her hotel started with $250,000 and she was able to added rooms to get going. My acct balance was $0 when I started, I don't know if that was a glitch for her or a glitch on mines. Another thing that I don't like is you can't purchase money only gems and gems can only do so much

Addictive at first, but I believe improvements could be made for example starting a new hotel the accumulated cash from previous hotels should be carried over when you first start because if a hotel is complete previous ones become irrelevant, you can't do anything more to them unless new rooms or services are constantly added secondly when it comes to events give alternative options to unlock rather than needing to spend real money and finally im up to the second to last hotel please make more.

Loved it. Great game. However to proceed to the 3rd level hotel you need 5 stars on at least one of your two hotels, which you can ONLY achieve by spending gems. The game literally doesnt give you enough gems to do this, so you would therefore be forced to spend money to unlock the next hotel. Absolute joke, and am immediately uninstalling. If you are not prepared to spend money to advance, do NOT install this game, as you will have no choice.

Acquiring the speciality furniture within the hotels should not have to be exclusively purchased using gems, as completionists will find it very irritating that they're missing out on fully upgrading the hotel. I think a good solution would be to allow gem usage for most if not all hotel upgrades while also allowing the specialty decor to be purchased with cash too.

Decent game and would rate higher except 1. The 2x bonus for watching a video only gives 10 minutes of the bonus up to two hour max. Other similar games give 30 min up to 5 hour max. 2. I maxed out the 2x bonus from videos and that should have lasted till 6:40PM my time...it is only 5:30 PM my time and that bonus is now gone requiring me to watch more videos, a full ONE HOUR AND 10 MINUTES before it should have been up so I basically watched 12 ads for 50 minutes of 2x bonus.........

Not a true great, but not one of the reeeally bad ones. Am usually one for long-form management games and most are a bit quick for my pace and i buzz through, but this one seems to drag a bit in early game. Hoping it gets better as it pregresses.

It is so worse that the videos have limited for us to watch and earn extra money. Have to wait for 24 hours for the videos to be back to normal and this feeling is so sucks. Hope the support team can fix this bugs if not I am going to lose my interest playing this game in the end!

It's great,but When you start playing, it's great. But I your first hotel, when you get over 6000 bucks, the game forces you into getting the bar. Now I had a lot planned at that point . But due to the bar, I am now almost broke. So uhh, that is my only complaint.

I paid for a booster pack in the game, for $5.49. They took my money but didn't give me the booster pack. Nothing short of THEFT! Update: I demanded a refund from Google Play and was told that they'll decide if they want to give me my money back, but if they decide to, it would be up to ten business days to get it. Takes one second to steal my money, but two weeks to give it back? Sounds like a money hungry conglomerate to me. If I don't get my refund, I'm reporting the charge as fraud.

Way too many ads to watch with little reward. Also hate the fact that if you close the game for 1 minute you lose half of the customers already in the hotel, especially during an event it is frustrating

I do enjoy this game, but the problem is needing to have x amount of stars to progress to each new hotel, and on top of that, there's only 5 hotels. You can't progress as needed because you need gems, paid for with real money, to buy the necessary items to make your hotel a 5 star hotel. You need 9 stars to progress to the third hotel, 15 for the fourth and 20 for the last. Each gem item costs between 15-100 some odd gems. 1 star due to unable to progress without spending money.

Great game! I think it would be cool if you added card decks because most of your new games have them and if we buy everything with gems we can buy the card decks, and there's a bug where the vip disappears as soon as he starts dancing please fix the bug.

In first hotel it¡¯s Okay. But when you make that hotel a 4-star hotel then you unlock the second hotel. That's where my problem begins. it¡¯s already hard to manage the hotels. With added extra price for everything. You can't even use your own money from other hotels. NOW what kind of logic is it? It¡¯s my money i should be able use my money wherever i want to spent... But no there is no option for that.. Just make the money same FOR every hotels. Now in the second hotel i don¡¯t even Have enough m

Don't play this game. Events are impossible for freetoplay players. VIP Packs costs 12$ PER EVENT. They're not permanent. Each events requires separate VIP pack purchases. --- I'm done playing your games thanks to your greedy business model. I paid a lot of money for your games because I had fun but charging money for VIP packs on every events? And those events only last for about 3-4 days? That's way too greedy. Thanks for the fun and you can keep the money. Farewell.

I really like this game, but since that last update the game is sticking and you are not able to access the dancing King to get the money as the ad is being played....this is __. If it doesn't improve I will delete.
So many advertisement is understandable. But the paying game currency advertisement need to be done sure either 1 can't load. No need to judge the internet line. Using fibre 800mbps.

Amazing game this game had a good laid out plan my only problem is the fact that i have to click everyone to upgrade something the dev need to create a complete upgrade button incase you have the needed money to upgrade that room Have you guys considered my option
Fun game but you do need to make purchases otherwise the ads will irritate you after a while. I've finished the last hotel Camelot. Can you advise when new hotels will be available?

This game is impossible good.but you think why i give you 4 star?Well i give you 4 star in a reason. Suppose i hire 3 cheafs,3 bar manager,4 hoomkepper and 3 room booker. Then i quit game and back the game i see 3 chefs go,3 bar manager go,3 homekepper go and 2 room booker go.i need to hire again.so you need to fix this problem.dont need to fix but it so much. Plz its do down

So you know what the best part of this gaming app is? It's got the most awesome elevator music that I've ever heard. The melodies go round in my head about as often as my eyes roll up and around due to the fact that upon opening the app it constantly freezes.... it's impossible sometimes to even get as far as getting the option to double your earnings because, as mentioned the app becomes unresponsive. Perhaps the app is overloaded with a tad too many ads? Hmm, maybe...?

It would be 4 star, but the santa level completely sucks and it lacks a theme strongly compared to other levels. Can't wait to just be done with this hotel. It also has a lot of recycled furniture from previous hotels. Nothing unique. But other than this level, I've enjoyed all the others. Edit: I changed the game to 4 stars because they just added a new hotel level after the santa level. It was great and looks like they put a lot of effort into it compared to other levels.

It's okay, if you don't mind paying real money. It's not an idle game by default - it only runs offline if you pay to enable that. I also never really got the sense that I was a hotel tycoon. You get very little say in how your hotels run - you can't change the restaurant's hours, for instance. You also can't move money from finished hotels to the one you're working on. Lastly, there are quite a few visual problems: paintings hanging on windows, for instance.

It's a very simple game but with a lot in it. You keep up with everything and you're great. I also like minimal ads and cheap options to further yourself iui n the game. I would like it if you added a button to the upgrade screens where you can upgrade all in a room if you can afford it. It would save a lot of time where you have 23,000,000 and can upgrade more then one entire room at a time. Other then that I absolutely love the app.

5 STAR POTENTIAL, but too short with poor customer service. It is basically unplayable without the ad remover for $10. I enjoyed it so much without ads that I spent another $10 to allow my hotel to stay open while I was offline. However, I have finished every level in less than 2 weeks. The prices for this game are outrageous considering the length of the game. I also wrote to support with screenshots about a bug several times, but they never replied. LOWER THE PRICES TO 1.99

Game has been fine for the last 2 days, and now everytime I try to watch a video, the app crashes. Right before that started happening, if I would fill the double profit bar and exit the game the game, even for a few minutes, when I come back, the bar is empty. It's a good game to pass the time, but not enjoyable when you spend the time to fill up the bar and it's depleted in less than 5 minutes. Please fix the issue. Not spending my money on this game, especially when there are bugs like this.

Played through 3 hotels and a couple event hotels. This game is super fun and easy to get into. A couple issues though: every single guest seems to follow the same pattern and makes for relly time consuming walking around. It would be great if guests had randomized order. Also it made little sense to my why the restaurants could only hold a max of 12-ish guests when the dining halls look like they can seat at least 20. I wouldn't mind hiring waiters to get more people fed!

It's alright, kind of fun at first but after the first hotel you realise it's the same boring grind over and over again. The hotels don't really have any substance, you don't make any creative decisions. It's just about upgrading to the next thing and accumulating more money which then devalues as upgrades cost even more. Ads are optional but you will have to watch them if you want to progress faster

The game is quite fun. The only issues (or add one that could be cool) is a downgrade system where of you don't see a hotel for a while it begins to revert. Only because when you move on from a hotel it just makes more money and there's nothing to do anymore. Another thing that would be great is a money transfer system from hotel to hotel.

I love this little game, simple to understand and tbh I don't even mind the ads, you don't have to watch em, it'll just take you longer to progress. I think the little people are great, especially when their faces go bright red on the toilet! Only downside is that there's only 4 levels so you finish pretty quickly but I've just started again, would love to see more resorts added

Seems fun so far, but a lot of the time the $1k+ ads dont give any money, even when I complete the little gameplay preview. Update: ads no longer will load or play. When I click the option to watch an ad for extra $, x2 profits etc, it disappears like I've watched the ad, but an ad doesn't play and I dont get bonuses. Basically the only thing that makes this game playable is getting a boost from watching the ads, so I'll probably uninstall this game soon.

Great game and im happy to watch some ads. However there's a bug with the cleaners. They suddenly stop working halfway and stand there. I checked the time and it was only 11am and they should be working. The only way to get rid of the bug is to restart the game. I will give 5 stars once this bug is fixed

I love the game! So much fun and addictive! However there are a few bugs sometimes, like a room can't be rented, or the cleaning personal are so lazy that they only clean one room xD But restarting the game usually solves the issue. Also, more variables would be so amazing __ like more commands, more into details from the management side

They give you a bunch of opportunities to watch videos to get more cash for the first hotel and then absolutely nothing for the second. If you're not someone who doesn't want to spend $30 just to get money in a game, it'll be too slow for you to progress. Even upgrading items in the hotel barely generates an income so it just gets really boring.

The game is great and very interesting. Everything from the bar to the hotel rooms itself is just overall amazing. It would be even more fascinating if you could add more levels to the hotel, and make it an option to show each of the floors for the player or push a button and you'll maybe just see 1 floor.

fun game! but it's kind of frustrating that while one hotel is struggling to get started, I cant transfer money from my maxed out hotels to help. once you've got all the upgrades and features, your hotel just kind of acquires money you can't do anything with. kind of a dead end to an otherwise fun game.

The structure of the game is good enough but clicking a guy to watch ads is basically the key to advancement. So much so, that any other decisions you make are moot. Pretty sure if I were to pay for adless version, the game would still revolve around waiting for the guy to walk into the lobby to give you cash.

The game itself is great, ads are just nice, since it's your option to have it or not without paying anything, but, the money system is bad, I hope we can bring our money from the older or completed hotels to start another one,yes,it can be too much,but the amount of money you'll need for a new hotel is much too,great game,nice experience,hope to have that soon

It was really fun to begin with but there's a glitch every so often that won't allow you to load any ads. The only way to fix it is to constantly uninstall and reinstall the game when it happens. I've been playing this game for a couple hours now and have already uninstalled and reinstalled it at least 4 times. It's so frustrating.

The events are nice, but more hotels would be better. We don't need a new manager or to upgrade the ones we have if we have completed all of the hotels that could use them. It's just a waste of time, and definitely not a reason to spend money, if we don't have a purpose for the new/improved managers. More hotels are needed. Perhaps an underwater hotel, or ice hotel. There should be a little more in the hotels to do. What about ballrooms? Perhaps multiple levels of each hotel. It needs more.

So far it's a great game, passes the time during my quarantine and its pretty addictive, but in a good way. Only negative is that the upgrades they offer cost over $10 each, and there are multiple upgrades you can buy, but it is totally possible to play this game without them.

If you want a game you do nothing really this is it. You do need to invest real money to get the better manager and to get the exclusive items in your hotel. Plus on the special 3 day events expect to invest at least $12 or so to achieve 3 stars in 3 or 4 days I feel like the game is a dead end game. Once your hotel is complete it keeps gathering coins without a purpose. You can not use them in any other motel or upgrade anything after a point. It is not really fun

I loved the game until for some reason the investors stopped showing up and I couldn't watch a video to double profits anymore. I had to check every possible issue that could have stemmed from my phone just to find that the app wasn't offering me these services anymore. They won't load. I can't make substantial progress anymore.

The game is really well put together. There are not a bunch of ads that randomly pop up out of no where like past games. The ads that do happen are ones you decide you want to see. The game is fun and entertaining. Lots to do and upgrade. It is definitely worth playing and it's a great time killer. Plus you don't need to invest money to get farther like most games. Great game!

Would be more stars if it was set up as an actual empire and not as separate hotels. I wish I could use the money earned at one hotel towards the building of another. Once you get 5 stars at a hotel it's pointless to pay attention to. Also, the goals of the event hotels are impossible to reach without spending real money.

The game looks awosome, it's just that I can't really make no progress because earnings are ridiculously low, and when I finally get along really soon I opened a 2nd hotel that requires to earn money separately and spend more money for upgrades. The game should open more options instead of reverting back to the start in a new hotel with no option to use the money from the last

This game is a lot of fun and super addicting, love that more content is getting added and it get increasing more challenging and expands. I love the rewards for watching ads and the quirky little items worth diamonds. My only complaint is the the Blue Crystal Resort, the spacing between everything is far too slightly odd and causes a domino effect and makes everything else and making money complicated.

I really enjoyed this game out of all the idle games. Only thing missing is more levels of hotels to complete and an option to manually build presidential suites during the weekend challenges. Other than that it's a great game to just kill time with.

I did enjoy this game and played for a while even spent money on upgrades and no ads however I fully upgraded the blue resort (3rd or 4th hotel) and it's still stuck on 4 stars and a tiny tiny tiny little bit to get to 5. It just won't budge. Would be 5 stars but the fact I've spent almost $50 and it still won't progress, there is no chance I'll give this a 5.

The gam is pretty fun imo, pretty addictive and pretty cool. The only reason I'm giving 4 stars is how when you move to a new hotel your money from the previous hotel doesn't go with it, I know that would be like overkill but at least like 10k of the money from the previous hotel get brought, for a start up since it's a bit hard to go up.

This is "ad" game!! At first i am just enjoying this game and i dont really care to watch many ads so i can get money, until in the blue beach resort theres many errors like when i am watched the ads but i didnt get the money, theres always half costumers when opened the game, the ads didnt come out so i'm always try to "exit and the open the game", and more. Because of that, it became really annoying and i am not enjoying this game again. Hope you guys dont install this.

A very good game to play which shows real life business strategies etc. But i think there should be an option to use savings from previous hotels to upgrade current hotel which will be a great help. Other than that, it's addictive. __

It is a simple and relaxing game that doesn't require much thought process to play the game. This game is about managing a hotel, and you make money by upgrading the rooms and other hotel services like the kitchen. It has several different hotels you can acquire by upgrading a hotel to the required amount of stars needed. Only thing I do not like is that when you switch to another hotel, you start off with only a little money. I would like the money to be shared amongst the hotels.

Going to quit this game, somehow the concept is good but its hard to gain money to upgrade equipment. The only way faster way is to watch MORE ADS, kind of annoying. Suggest that some money can be earned by completing mission instead of all rewarded with yellow diamonds.

This game will LOSE your first hotel and probably any others that are not active if you reset data. I reset the data because it was stuck on the loading screen. Restored hotel 2 from Play Games, but first was lost. I don't want to do it again, especially if I'm just going to lose it!

Fun game, could use a setting to turn off investors as it gets annoying seeing them over and over, also 11 USD to turn off ads permanently? Thats over 1/6 the price of RDR2!!??!! Also it would be great to have an in game purchase that allows for you to run the hotel longer as i don't want to pay 11 USD for a general manager that only works for 10 hours at a time

The game is good but You cannot move forward depending on just Hotel income...you will have watch 30 seconds ads evry 2 minutes. This takes all the fun.. instead of ads it could have been some puzzle or mini game.. That would have made it more interesting.. But see same ads every 2 minutes is so boring. So uninstallling the game.

DO NOT SPEND ANY MONEY ON THIS GAME. For events the VIP pack is a one time purchase and as noted is only effective for THAT ITERATION OF THAT MANAGER. That means when the same event comes back for the same manager, you need to repurchase the pack each time. The bonus however does stack, though there really is no reason to get any of the paid for perks. Also the offline income calculator does not work properly. For the event after returning 6 hours later the game only registered 40 minutes.

Great game. Yes of course with ads, but you get quick money with an ad if you are about to lose employees. I have been enjoying it on my free time. It's the first game that I keep wanting to come back to. I love it like this hopfully it stays this way. 5 stars for sure

I paid for No Ads. Totally worth it. Wish there were more options like when to start/end staff shifts. Better than most Idle games because you get to open up the landscape and see little ppl interact with the upgrades you've purchased. Is there a way to prevent guests from walking the long way (& back) to the baths at 3am on Arabian Nights level?

sadly i'll have to downgrade this game to 3 stars from 5. been a long time player and finally bought the no-ad package. buying it means you'll never see the extra customer, etc bonuses ever again. yeah i can skip ads and get rewards, but the only person who ever shows up anymore is the VIP (much less frequent than before i bought the pack), and none of the other boosters. kind of shady and sad. would've stayed an easy 5 stars but i definitely regret my purchase.

11.99_ is way too much to play correctly an android game of which one's get bored of in two days ... divide by 2 the price and people will certainly not hesitate anymore to buy the no ads perk that permit playing normally. For those who haven't downloaded the game, you need to know that it is only playable by watching the ads that give money, the money you earn of your hotel is not enough to upgrade anything. You need to wait like 5 minutes to upgrade a single thing __

I like this game, and will likely keep playing it. I do have a few small issues with it though. My first problem is that I can't see anything at the top of the screen because the game doesn't take my phone's notch into account. I can see how much money I have, but that's it. My other issue is with the game managers, and needing to pay money for them. I don't have a lot of money to spend, but would watch a crazy amount of ads if it meant I could earn managers that way instead.

The game is very nice, but there are 2 problems. 1, when the guy who wants to profit comes in, sometimes he just disappears and the golden car drives away. 2, there is this bug where the cleaner cleans but ends up getting freezed in the bathroom.

The entire game is made intentionally frustrating and slow to force you to watch ads or pay for in app purchases. The core gameplay is good, but the game doesn't let you make much profit. This leads to a slow boring game.

Spend your time for more valuable things, NOT TO THIS GAME. It's time killer for sure. But for you to advance in the game you need to watch a LOT of ads. You're not going anywhere without the ads. There's no skill need for this, it's just you need to watch ads or either, pay. GOING -> UNINSTALL!

I'm very disappointed I was having alot of fun with this game I even paid for the manager. Once I had updated all the spots in the hotels it ended with nothing to do. I suggested ways to make it more fun I even asked for more hotels but it seems that this is a very short game. So in conclusion I loved the game when there was something to do. When it is done I can find anything to do. Very big bummer!!!!!____

Bugged The second hotel would not keep guests in the double rooms. If I switched views to go to a different hotel there would no longer be guests there. I tried it several different ways, (middle of night, just waking up, etc), all had the same result. Also any new rooms besides the 2 singles are also bugged like this

Played and compared quite a few tycoon games. - Fun, able to create different sizes of rooms and amenities like restaurant, spa, bar etc. - Managing employees also takes strategy to ensure profit comes in. - VIP comes around and provide cash after watching ads. However, the cash is rather low compared to other games. - It'll be better if the cash earning process can be slightly easier, otherwise it takes way too long to be able to advance through the levels. Overall great game!

Pretty decent idle game; it's interesting to just watch the hotel guests move around to the different activities etc. However, a couple of suggestions to improve things: 1. Have a central upgrades area where we can use the money from the 5-star hotels to upgrade general things like customer speed, multiplier timer, income from activities. It's the thing I love most about another Codigames app - Idle Supermarket Tycoon. 2. Make events more rewarding! It's so frustrating to spend hours upgrading little things only to not meet the 15 million mark and thus get NOTHING from the event. Should earn diamonds for lower targets, perhaps every 1 million? On the same note, when you DO finally earn a VIP, their increase is pointless! 5% increase, really? Should be 100 or 200% for the first star! 3. 2 hour limit on hotel opening - why? Some of us have to sleep! It should be minimum 4 hours, with the ability to upgrade as per point 1. Ditto for the 10 minute multiplier - either 10 mins for 5x or 1 hour for 2x, also upgradeable.

Has so much potential let down by poor code. There's so many glitches that ruin gameplay. Don't even get me started on the ads. I've paid ¡ê20 to get the most enjoyment out of the game and I feel robbed (no ads ¡ê10 and hotel to stay open during afk ¡ê10) Glitches start happening the most during the 3rd hotel. Cleaners don't clean. They just stay in their room. Guests get stuck and don't move. Also on the 3rd hotel with the beach bar added. All the guests seem to want to sunbathe at 10pm-12am?!

Codigames has been telling everyone for a couple weeks now that they're going to contact the ad providers. Still nothing has been done about the ads. I want to enjoy this game and spend my money on it but I refuse to when it's so unreliable. Update: They finally fixed the ads so the game is perfect again __

This should be called, THE HOTEL MANAGER. Not Hotel Tycoon. Everytime you finish one Hotel, you cannot invest any profit in building other Hotels. So when you are finally seeing nice amounts of money rolling in and you can expand, you start a new one from scratch which takes days just to get an extra room. Even though the money is nothing when you start, every Hotel starts to get more and more expensive. Calling this game Hotel Tycoon is totally misleading. Shame.....

Honestly, it's one of the best idle games there is. Invest your time into investors by watching ads and your progress more than quadruples! Keep your multiplier above an hour so that way when you log off you're still racking up your stacks. Pay attention to your expenses and don't go under the amount you have to pay out daily or you'll lose employees. Everyone has their own style on maximizing income and spreading it out but make sure you calculate things to maximize profits so you can progress!

I really like this game but I have to take off a few stars because I didn't get what I paid my real money for!! I paid what is actually a lot of money to keep the game earning money overnight, i woke up this morning to the exact same amount as I had when I went to sleep!! What's worse is this happened on the competition hotel and I probably won't get very far in the competition hotel as I should have!! Can you fix this???

This is an ad generating nightmare with expencive microtransactions thrown in for spice. Progress is painfully slow. Its undeniably designed to be artificially slow. As you quickly bore of a pace that would put a snail to sleep, the app throws ad after ad after ad after ad at you. You want inconsiatant amounts of cash? Watch an ad! You want X2 cash gain? Watch an ad for only 10 minutes of X2. X2 caps at 2 hours and you'll need to watch 12 ads to hit that mark. 500 characters isn't nearly enough.

Ads that take longer than 30 seconds or force user interaction to close are unacceptable, and this game is basically watching ads for ten minutes before going to play something else. Ad-free is not worth $11 just because you load players down with them.

The game is fun but it's glitchy. Everytime you click on the investor you try and watch the ad but the ad doesn't even load and the investor leaves without giving you any money which is pretty stupid. Let me mention this too, NONE OF THE ADS FREAKING WORK!.______. Just fix your game that's all I am asking from codigames right now

The main game is fun and simple. Lots of the characters pay homage to pop culture. I have seen Mr Trump, the hit team from pulp fiction, the genie from Aladdin and many others. The problems arise in the events, which are special hotels you must develop far faster than a regular motel. I'm this case however the event hotel develops much slower than a regular hotel. That is unless you pay for special event packages. A clear pay for play scenario. Ignore the events.

I love this game, in fact I have played other games from Codigames as well but recently I have seen the double earnings are not working as shown in the game. If you have double earnings started and if you exit game and return back then game reduces almost 95% of earnings so that you will have to either do some in app purchase or watch ad!

It's amazing! You get to watch adds to get more and do a speed-run through the entire game! It's very fun and my sis play's it everyday now! It's just like a never ending game of money and game's at the same time! I love the game very much! If you like the game, thank the creators for this! If i was not for them, this game wont be known! And again, i love the game!
Once you finish everything in the first two hotels you cannot move forward without spending money. You need five stars and they will only give you four. I loved this game but it was a waste of time.
I really like this game. I found myself wanting to keep playing. I like the challenge. I did paid to remove ads. Way better and it benefits with collecting money.

Great game. Just a few annoying things, not worth losing a star over. 1. Would be great to have people stay random number of days. 2. When someone comes with someone, they should do things together. 3. If the restaurant has spare tables, people should be allow to sit. 4. Using spa as example; if all the nodes are taken, the people still get out to change node and then get back in. Either don't get out if no nodes or have a waiting node. 5. Don't make people walk to a closed Service.

Game is good but even done all upgrades won't get 5 star think developer try to cheat people as first hotel got all stars next level won't receive any 5th star and due to this we won't play to the next level and develper just announce new event in which people spend money and they cheat people need to report this game bad and worse game 0 star don't download they cheat you
Cool game doesn't stop or hang it has graphic adventure game l really like it because it's smooth I hope you make more games
After you reach the last hotel there's nothing more to play. Don't download in the first place nothing much to accomplish.
This is the best game I have played in an Android phone.

Ci mette molto tempo per avviare il gioco. Gli hotel che durano 4 giorni hanno obiettivi troppo difficili da raggiungere. Le camere nn si possono personalizzare e dopo un po' ¨¨ troppo noioso. Le pubblicit¨¤ durano troppo e sono invasive

I really like this game but it keeps crashing after like 5 minutes of playing this started happening after I updated. Not to mention but in the real world you when you build chains you can take the money you earned from a previous successful chain to help build the next new one. It gives real meaning and incentive to finish those other hotels since they're still collecting money but you can't do anything with that money.

This is a great game. I have not been credited for hundreds of thousands of dollars for watching the ads though. That would be the only thing I am disappointed about. If I got my ad credits, I would give this game 5 stars. After playing a while I reduce my ratings to 1 star. Game starts good. After finishing 3 hotels, the game starts glitching. Ads don't pay, advertising resets when leaving and I always lose 10 - 12 rooms of customers. I have watched ads for in excess of 20 million points.

Honestly, been playing nonstop for a couple days. Although the game is fun to me and I love it overall, I have to rate it two stars because of the terribly slow progression. The game basically forces you to buy the microtransactions and watch the ads. Im almost done with the second hotel and I've probably have watched over 100 ads.

This game is addicting I love it, just cant stop playing this game It's cute simple and easy to play, there's different levels you need to accomplish. It would be cool if they could give you a bonus level where you can choose what furniture's, employees, and type of food and bar you can get. But so far it's just that good if you like how to build your hotel type of game.

I would like more items in the game. I feel the balance between what your offering in return for all those ads I have to watch just doesn't compare. However, the game is great and has a lot of potential. I have it 4 stars because it's bordering on a useless money grab app with all these apps. I just feel if you added more items in the hotel to upgrade then it would be a good balance. Maybe it will get better the more I play???

This game has an amazing idea for a style of game, but executes it so horribly. Ignoring the rant about the fact that you sit around and do barely anything, you never pull in enough money to ever get anywhere in the game without watching ads, if you don't want to shell out cash like a normal person... it's mind-numbingly boring, with a "goal" of getting a new hotel, but with the issue of never being able to get to that goal.

Awesome game!!! One thing thats not working is the video to skip night time and the double profits for 10 minutes. Also the real estate car is not coming anymore so my progress is very slow. Is there a way to fix this? Thanks _ EDIT: The suite wasnt part of the main hotel building lol my mistake.

The 30-sec ads are very helpful in sustaining the hotels cause they usually pop-up when you really need the cash. It isn't too long and it gives more money than I expected. Although, it'll base on your hotel's balance of course. So enjoyable and simple yet it makes you analyze how you manage your profits. I just hope for more hotels 'cause I'm almost at the last one. Having time-limited events or hotels may make this game more fun and entertaining to play. Please put it in future updates!

The game is okay though on first, it is really hard to earn and takes time to upgrade stuffs. The concept is good, there's earning and expenses system. However, I saw that we can change the wage of employees if sort for money (not paying employees result to resigning) and I can't find that option. If someone can teach me how, I'll change the review to 4 or even 5 star. The game is really addicting and expect lots of ADs to help you progress.
Can you please codicames add More hotels, because it would be more fun if you add more hotels cause, i'm almost tired to play this game again and again.

This game is amazing. So simple and yet so addicting. I would give 5 stars but however I feel that any money you have should be able to transfer between all hotels. I feel in order for it to be a proper hotel management game you should be able to use the money between all hotels so then you can still budget and feel like proper Management.

Really nice game with great concept, but only to the point of completing the first hotel, because when you go to the next one, you find out that hotels have different balances, which is pointless. I mean, what's even the point of having a fully upgraded hotel which has , let's say, 70k saved up, and you can't even use them to the next one???? All that money has gone to waste, and apparently your time. Got so pissed when I found that out, and uninstalled it at once. Only for that it's a 1/5.

In the new Little Camelot update: the parking barrier gate processing rate seems extremely slow for the amount of parking spaces you can upgrade to. I'm losing way to much cars for a fully upgraded parking lot and I'm only using the radio campaign. The cars should be processed through alot faster. I should be having a hard time filling my (fully upgraded) parking lot with just a small champagne as the radio is. Fix this to be way more balanced please this is very frustrating.

DECEMBER '19! Really loving the game! I am unable to sign in to my Google account through the app. I'm afraid I might lose all of my progress! UPDATE!!!! Saving via Google account does not work! I lost my first 2 fully upgraded hotels. I now have had to start over. DEVELOPERS!!!!! DO YOU PLAN ON FIXING THIS? The dancing man button seldom works. It doesn't kick into a commercial. WILL GIVE 5 STARS WHEN THESE ISSUES ARE FIXED!!!!!

Ad based lies. You watch ads to get bonuses and while I understand they sometimes do not work properly the worst is the x2 multiplier. You watch ad after ad and when you leave the game, it takes more time away, your math is incorrect and technically robbing me of time spent. I'll leave the game for 5 mins and the 38 mins I have has dropped to 6 mins. Forcing me to watch more ads and make money for the developer. I don't mind until I feel like I'm being lied to and robbed to watch more ads.

Fun game, but only took about a week to get all hotels, and all of them upgraded as far as possible. Would be nice to have more hotels left to get... (also, for those that experienced the video glitch as well, they've fixed it :-D ) Oh! Also, no need to pay in order to win. You can, but you gain the things youd pay for extremely easy, (w/o paying) and that doesn't affect the stars. You can still get each hotel to 5 stars :)

love this game and just opened a new hotel starting with little money. Everything is so much more expensive and I think you should be able to transfer money from hotel to hotel. By selecting a certain amount to transfer then watching an ad to transfer. I would definitely give 5 stars if you made this change. This game is a good time killer.

Want to play in the special event hotel to earn extra rewards? You won't get any rewards without spending more money. Want to watch an advertisement to get an extra 4 customers? Watch it, but you won't get the extra four customers. This game is actually pretty good if it wasn't such a huge scam to get you to spend money all the time to be able to play a very simple, unoriginal tycoon game. If only I could have the time and money back wasted on this game.

The attention to detail in this game is amazing!!!!! Fun to play when passing the time and extremely entertaining. I wish there was a way to see why customers weren't happy and how too fix it, as well as what too do with the hotels after you have completed all the challenges. I hope they create more hotels too extend the game.

I LOVE this game. Not too many ads, amazing locations, sweet upgrades, and great graphics. I love how you can hire people and fire them, and how the days are not an accuall day! My one recemendation though, in each resort start off with a little more money and a full hotel full of people. I would totally recemend this game! It is great.

Its an awesome game, at first I didn't think it would be fun but after 5 minutes of playing I really enjoyed it and didn't come off the app for a good 3 hours it's that addictive and have recommended it to my friends and would recommend to anyone else, also if you want to watch a ad to get a reward is optional it does not come up with ads in the middle of playing the game for no reason. great game __

This is a good and addictive game. I enjoy it so much that I purchased the pack to stop the ads. However ive noticed that they need to fix the way the guests interact with the activities. Some services are open for a few hours and even if its the only servive open they dont go to it. The guests walk to all the other services even if closed, by the time they reach the one service open, its closed already. Not generating the money it should.

It's pretty good as far as I've played. Fun. But I would really recommend the correction on the timings of the Front Desk Staff. They're available 6:30am till 12am. The description always says 6:30am till 12pm. 12 pm is noon. Please correct that. Otherwise a really good game, I did watch a couple of ads just to get past a little faster but you could go by without having to watch the advertisements. It's a fairly good game with every small detail pretty good. Time maintenance __

It was a fun game until I got everything in all three hotels to 100% complete and spent all my gold coins. After the third hotel it appears you have to spend real money to buy the items needed to receive the last two stars to open your forth hotel. I don't like games that force me to pay to continue playing when they advertise as a free game.

I love idle games. Right up my street for my busy work days. Suggested improvements, more hotels to upgrade to. Addition of AI competitive hotels that will take customers away if they have a higher star rating. Possible huge reward system for beating AI. Boss hire to manage staff around the hotel with better bosses available by in app purchase. Multi story hotels should be added for a more dynamic challenge on harder hotels. Add events to bring in bonus custoners like hosting a concert ect

Edit: I'm adding a star because you added another hotel. But PLEASE fix the bugs where you enter the game after not playing for a while and not being able to double profits by watching a video. Also when you have to watch a video for investor's money that doesn't work either. Takes too long waiting for another hotel

Honestly I want to give 0 star. The video for 2x profit just keeps on buffering. Once I exit the game n come back its always night time, rooms are empty and cash is either less or same. This is so frustrating. And when I want to contact support team the chat support keeps buffering wherein all other apps on my phone are working fine without any buffering. If the problem persists I have to stop playing the game.

So I would love to give you 5* because I'm playing the game and very addicted to it however I believe there is a key feature that should be added. The services at each hotel have strange hours that not only don't line up with most hotels. But also cannot be adjusted. If you were about to adjust the bar, swimming pool, arcade and so on hours of operation this would make the game much more enjoyable even if so you got X total hours per day and they could be placed wherever the player would like.

**100% Average - Nothing New in Idle Genre** Be prepared to watch a ton of ads to get your first and many other hotels off the ground at the early stages of the game. If you want to get the complete 5 Star rating you will need to spend the ingame currency in order to achieve it. Because there is nothing new being offered to the genre it's very average

Used to love this game, but now they kind of abandoned it and just keep on rolling out this "event hotel" where you can unlock managers but its just a way to force you to spend money so you may have a slight chance of unlocking the rewards. They really should add more content/hotels other than the event ones.

Right now i cant open the app. It's a great game. I love to see the animation and the character in this game. This game is slow game if you not play it long enough and if you want to rapidly upgrade your game you have to watch the ads or pay some money on it. Overall its a nice addicted game but unfortunately i cannot open it right now.

From 4 to 5 to 3 stars. Its a great and addictive game but completed in no time at all and the devs don't seem to making new hotels. The events are the same each week and are only on weekends??? You should mix up the times and the event hotels. If the devs could get a new hotel challenge out every month (surely not that difficult), i will play again and raise to 5.

One thing that bad with this game is the balance for free-non-ads player. This game forcing you to watch ads for extra money or become premium player. There's no way you can keep your finance balance or even make a profit with your own hotel income. It always minus. Other than that, the gameplay for this game is good.

It's definitely one of the better tycoons, but they always seem to miss the difficulty curves on these games. This one each hotel goes like this: First star: challenging for the wrong reasons. You cant afford staff, but you cant make money without staff, so you basically hire them anyway and make income watching ads so you dont go negative. Second and third star: just the right balance between managing staff expenses and profit. Fourth and fifth star: No money management necessary.

I love the game! It's really interesting and unique! However, there's this strange glitch where only two people can sit at the restaurant, no matter how many tables I have. I restarted the game and everything, but nothing seems to be working. And I'm not sure if anyone else has this issue, so I feel bad leaving a 4-star review.

Edit: reduced 2 star to 1 star, as twice now I have lost my vip manager upgrades when I get them to 15% and support have not restored them. Upgrades are VERY EXPENSIVE. Nearly ¡ê26 to remove ads, get an idle increase to 10 hours, and double your profits. It's a shame as it'd definitely be worth 5 stars if they were more affordable.

Please fix the in game glitches like housekeeping not finishing rooms during the hotel events. It is frustrating. Please also fix your in game ads and purchases. Update: I lost everything when i switched phone providers even though my google game services were linked. I had actually made it to the final hotel even spent money on events. To say im not happy is an understatement and I have no desire to play anymore.

This game looks nice... And I thought it was about managing a hotel. But actually I spent more time watching adds than playing because is the best option to earn money. If you just play it's boring and pointless. The decisions you make don't have any difference... You just wait and wait

The game is fun, but really the Dev just wants your money. Money to stop watching vids to get ahead faster. Pay money to stay open more then 2hours. Pay more money to remove ads. Pay money to win at a event cause if you don't good luck just getting the 11mil need to get 1 star out of the 3 to unlock help at the hotel. So if you pay a lot of money around 45CAD to u lock most of the blocks put in place.

Everytime i watch ads,. i lose money even the ads was finish.. getting tired of opening and it crashes over and over again.. i already finish all the hotel and still dont have new.. ____i might going to uninstall this game.. im not getting happy on it now.. ____ Ps: i just upgraded it.. but much worst than yesterday.. ads not giving any bonuses.. ________ Still no changes.. why it becoming like this?? The ads always crashes when its already end.. such a waste of money!!

I really like the game, but the biggest flaw is that you cannot get to 9 stars between your first 2 hotels unless you spend money. I have spent $1 but this didn't help. I like the new update of events but in my event hotel I have one room that never gets cleaned. I have 3 rooms total and 2 housekeeping staff.
