I even got the message to clean all rooms, I claimed that and it still was not clean. It was the room on the left that was already built when I opened the hotel.

Cool to see you need to be careful about your expenses, i just wish there was another way when guests came and there were no rooms available. I mean to stay there the same time it takes for a check in seems unnecessary. Another thing is why can a cook only cook for 2 people? That's a bit of a stretch. Other than that, i enjoy the game and is more interesting than many of this type.

I installed this game, because I thought I will enjoy it. But the apps are keeps glitching and every time I restart the apps, it keeps glitching again. I cannot even watch ad, since whenever I click it there is no response. Please fix it. __

Update: Thanks for the new hotels! Can we work on tournaments not being near impossible to play now? I have really enjoyed this game. I'm on the second to last hotel and I haven't had to spend any real money. The only reason I haven't given it 5 stars is because so far there has been no update to the content. Enjoyable in tandem with other idle games. Does get a bit repetitive. Love the cameos of specific pop characters from Pulp Fiction, Big Bang Theory, etc. It's fun to rack your brain trying to identify them all. Love to see John Wick in my hotels lol Not sure if it's just my experience but the special events seem pretty ridiculously challenging compared to similar events in this developer's other idle games. Not as enjoyable to participate in either since so far each event has been the same.
Great game...... However is there a way to restore the game you were playing. Had to switch phones and went from almost finishing level 4 to level one again..
Glitches. Ads not playing, click them and nothing happens. No bonus money from the investor because ads won't work. Also, once you get to the second last hotel, there are no goals. No fun anymore.

This game is great! I was gonna give 4 stars because I know within time the game will improve like the other games. But for what it currently is the only problem I have is the manager spot. Other than that the game is a complete blast and I cant wait to see what else they have in store for us. Another game to blast hours upon.

Needs some serious bug fixes and optimization. Examples: cleaning staff sitting sideways or upside down; car pathfinding errors, especially on 5th hotel when there is no open space; guests disappearing or hotel being half empty when you return from being afk; hotels being too large for guests to reach a service before it closes; etc. Paid the, what, 12 bucks to remove ads, but i just wish now i could remove the on screen ads asking me to pay more for stuff like vip managers or whatever. Meh 3/5

I am editing my review because they fixed the crashing issue but they still have a bug where you have a full hotel and then when you close the game to earn money while you are not sitting there with it, at least half the guests leave and when you come back you have vacant rooms and aren't earning enough money. So it's improved but not much better, guests leaving while offline needs fixing.
It a great game. There's just too many ads you gotta watch and half the time the ad videos don't work. Other then that it's a pretty fun game. I'm still playing it now didn't uninstall yet.

Its total kool. I like to play it alot. It teaches me patients that a 5 star hotel isnt built in a day. Also money management, how to manage your expenses. Also teaches you what you should invest in to make your business profitable. So in all I love this game. You should try it, who knows one day you may own your own hotel from this game experience.

New Game event system is a pay-to-win. Before you question, note that all VIP purchases for the event only last till the event ends. On next one? Pay again. They are the only ways to reach 2 & 3 stars. Tested by no Ad buyer. Even so it isn't worth bcs the game lack of content, but highly doubt they will introduce insane time gates.

I can't believe it, seriously, what the developers is thinking? The game its self is fine however it is literally unplayable without watching an advert every single minute you play or you play for weeks to complete a level that normally would take a few days So the game literally forces you too watch hundreds of adverts a day in order too make it even remotely worthwhile playing. It's of course a good game. I like simulator games more than RPGs. And the low rating is because the game crashes when we open an Ad. Really very annoying.

Why make more hotels of you can't get 5 stars on the second one? I have upgraded literally everything and it still wont go past 4 stars. This is a very good game. But the only thing that I don't like about it, is that when the V.I.P costumer comes and offers you alot of money, and then when you watch the video it never gives you the money but, other then that, This is a very good game. If you have time please fix. Thank you.

So the problem with this game is the hotel charges you more than the customers pay you (at least 1st 24hours of your gameplay) no matter what do, you get paid a max of $10 & a simple basic upgrade costs you min of $150. Really fun game and incredibly addictive! I just wish they would create more hotels for me to complete that aren't time limited. I'm on my last hotel so I'll delete the game once I have finished. But defo worth the time to play! Thanks for a fun ride!!

I think this game is beautiful, and absolutely amazing. I play it all the time, and really I only wish that there were more hotels and that it wasn't so hard to start off a new hotel to the point it takes days to get it to make real money. But I don't really care, it's still a really fun game that I'd totally recommend.

This game is one of the most realistic games I've ever played. It's much more than just an idle game, because it takes some serious thinking and strategies to play and be successful. I'm also happy with the fact that no ads randomnly pop up, making the game more enjoyable. Good work Codigames, I'm a fan of your other games too!

Much like the rest of Codi games idlers this game doesn't work properly, people get mad and walk out of the kitchen or bars due to high wait times even with full staff and upgrades. When I played the second hotel, the ad king doesn't come anymore, making the progress really hard and I'm losing the money. I really want to buy free ads buff but if the ad king doesn't come, what the purpose of purchasing the buff then?

These people make crappy games that don't work and then walk away from providing ANY support. This one is no different. Devs like this are interested only in greed. Filing complaint with Google.

Bricks ball crusher ad has a glitch, you cant watch ads after it comes up, fix this please. And make it so the guests know when things are closed. You spend all this money upgrading the rooms, but they dont interact with anything because theyre too busy walking to closed pools, restaurants etc. Im in the arabian hotel and the presidential suite is cool, but very expensive and they use absolutely nothing in it but the bed. FIX THIS PLEASE

I have played all the Codigames idle tycoon games and loved them, this one is bulls**t. You never get enough money to buy ANYTHING unless you watch a butt load of ads... But guess what, you STILL don't have any money. Something's screwed with the payouts, spend $300 for a $3 rate increase, that's not $3/hr, that's $3/night, so enjoy waiting 100 f***ing DAYS to see a return on that investment. FIX YOUR GAME

I love this game so much and the game have more hotel but I still level 1 because I just played xd. BTW the game have a little bit lag. Well the game is really fun but the hotel have a sound like __ and shower and coocing and TV but it's ok.
This game is great but my connection is bad and i cant disbale claim rewards and make it another offline version of it so i can play it when lights went out.
This is one of the best idle games I've played so far. Plenty of content to provide a couple of weeks of entertainment and suitable for all ages.

Can't seem to get 5 stars to progress I've maxed out everything hired all staff literally only things that need gems need to be purchased but you can't earn enough gems to buy everything which halts progression at second hotel
4/16/22: 2.0 update, there are periods of time lasting for hours where dancing king won't come and can't watch ads to double income.
Very much to do! Best game ever!

I simultaneously enjoy this game and am frustrated by it. I love the game's art and animation. The characters are cute and their animations are very detailed. The guests could really use some refinement. It seems as though guest movement and timing was created specifically for the first hotel and the next hotels they don't work well for. I bought the no ads add-on because I was enjoying the game but if I hadn't I don't think I would be able to commit to the time to get money to complete.

It's a pretty solid game. Good for taking breaks in between studying. Has a good sense of pace in the first hotel. I didn't breeze through but I didn't feel like I needed to watch for ads to get by. The controls are a little goofy. I feel like when I want to click things I click the wrong room or it takes me somewhere else. Not game breaking by any means, just a little inconvenient.

A simple game with a nice appearance, but nothing truly engaging or worthwhile. I played the game to its current end (complete Arabian) and enjoyed it for three most part. The graphics are simple and cute; and utter feels nice to see everything come together. However it's flooded with ads, once a hotel is complete it serves no purpose, and there's never any challenge or difficult objective. TL:DR, the game is nice for a basic casual gameplay but beyond that isn't worth spending money on.

I enjoy the game, but I feel as though a couple things could be improved upon. First, being able to transfer money between hotels would be nice. I have fully upgraded all I can in the first hotel, but now the profit I earn there is just sitting there unused while I'm struggling to improve the next hotel. Second, while I know app developers could use the money, $10.99 to unlock a special character is a bit too expensive for me. Other than that, I'd say this is a great little game!

Nice graphics, love the upgrade structure. Definitely felt that the ad removal purchase was worth it. Feedback: In blue crystal resort Suite, the Climate Control and Decor overlap each other. You do see bugs sometimes with the guests and surrounding furniture, but this seems like more of an overlooked feature. Suggestion: To be able to provide user feedback through the game.

The game is fun, but I feel like it takes a long time to make money. It's a lot of just... waiting. The other problem is the optional upgrades you pay real money for is REALLY overpriced. Most games just charge a couple dollars to remove ads. This one asks for over $10. Not worth removing ads. But the game itself is fun.

The game is pretty fun, ads aren't intrusive, but they do seem necessary to generate a decent amount of money. At least that is my experience so far. I just started yesterday though. Other than the need to use the ads for income, everything else is pretty fun. Whimsical graphics, reasonable controls, and a decent payoff in the end.

The concept is great but the amount of ads to 2x and accomplish any task with speed is ridiculous. To accumulate cash quick you can watch ads, which is great IF THEY WORK. Oh, logging back in you can 2x your profit...but you have to watch an ad again...AND IT PROBABLY WON'T WORK. Super glitchy. Need to increase what you can do without ads and fix the ads so they play if someone wants to use those bonuses.

I love your guy's tycoon games! Keep making them! My only problem in this game is that its SUPER hard to afford anything without watching a bunch of ads. I leveled to the next hotel and barely get anything from the "ad guy". In the other games you were able to get more money when you leveled up to the next store or whatever. Really fun game though.

Actually a pretty fun game. I'm noticing a lot of people glossing over the fact that this is an IDLE game, where you don't just speed through and you benefit from checking in on the game every few hours rather than playing nonstop. Honestly the game can be played to completion with no ads, however I often watch ads for bonuses because I can choose when to watch these ads. Most games are riddled with ads and paywalls, but this one is pretty great

It was fun at first, I like the controls and it was overall pretty great for a beginner. But then you needed to earn money, and the add would freeze and never play to the end so you couldn't really get ahead at all. Until the ads are fixed I would recommend staying away from this game.

Pretty good game! The dev updated it and added a few new hotels, which are larger and have more things to do. The scheduling is wonky, the people walk too slow (90 minutes to walk from the front desk to your hotel room?) And the events are impossible unless you buy the package, but its still a fun game.

It's a pretty cool game. It's a lot harder to earn money than the other tycoons I've played before though, still not sure if that's good or bad. One thing that need work on is when the guy in the golden guy comes up and dances for, I try to press the watch video button but it exes me out of it like I pressed the no thanks button. And almost every single time the Mades go out to do the cleaning one of them gets stuck in the first master bedroom. To fix it I have to completely ex out of the game.

Best video ad watching app ever! No, seriously. If you hate it when silly games get in the way of watching your favorite ads, then this is the game for you! Update: just played my first event. Probably watched 200 ads to gain as much profit as possible and played virtually non stop other than sleeping and couldn't even get 1 out of 3 stars. Uninstalled.

My second playthrough, but it's just as an awesome experience as it was the first time. There are plenty of ads involved but they're not intrusive at all; they can actually be really helpful. Also you don't have to pay to complete a hotel and also, in my opinion, you don't have to grind endlessly to progress. Sure it may not be the most challenging game, given the fact that there are no grave consequences if you mismanage the hotels, but overall it's really entertaining. Just my opinion.

The ads, for me, have stopped working? The ones that you watch so that you get a x2 on money. It also started to bore me more as it takes a long time to upgrade certain things, unless you pay or watch ads (that don't work for me) Another thing is the daily rewads thing when you log in, it doesn't actually give it to me.

This is, the slowest most boring game I have played, even after spending a good $60 on the thing, it is still slow as, and soooo boring, way too hard to make money and upgrades are expensive, thought once I spent a bit of money on it it would be fun, but alas still boring and slow, it's a shame because the game has A LOT of potential, but as usual, greedy pigs ruin everything.

Fun until hotel three...Like other people mentioned the ads stop working and the investor guy doesn't appear anymore. I really enjoyed it and tried it because I play this company's other games. Apparently, they can't get this one to work, nor do they care if other people have reported the same issue and it hasn't been fixed. I just uninstalled the game, not worth me investing money in I guess if no one wants to keep it up.
Ads won't load. And before you would sometimes get a bug where they don't reward you. I'm due 44k lol.

Been playing for a few days and this been great. I did pay for a few of the upgrades, which I totally find worth it. It keeps me checking and busy over time. Great game so far! Just unlocked my second hotel. The only downside I see so far is that once you fully upgrade a hotel, it still collects money but there isn't anything to do. No extra challenge to make sure the hotel is running properly.

It's a really nice game to past time, I did buy the dog upgrade which I would recommend otherwise you need to watch 100s of ads. But its normally 10 pound but they do discounts alot on events. One thing that bugs me is you cant use your money from previous hotels?? Once a hotel is fully upgraded it earns money for nothing really. So would be helpful to use it in other hotels. Otherwise it does take a long time to get running. Also there needs to be more lighting outside of a night.

Leaving my review again as my last one has deleted for some reason. I've played this game for a really long time. I unlocked the final hotel around a week ago but my balance keeps resetting to zero every time I try to play. I have kept the game open for a long time and clicked on the cash bonuses as they come in order to build the money up as much as i can, but it still resets to zero once I leave. Will change my rating to 5 stars if this is fixed

This game is fantastic absolutly no reason not to play it. Very realistic as what the costumers do not a lot of ads. The only problem I have with this game that I opened the Stanley Resort and took care of both hotels when I went back to the first hotel it restarted it like a rebirth so I bought all the rooms and upgrades and now it's gone. Somebody please explain this.

Love game it's easy still challenging to play ready for more hotels need more hotels should be a way to earn the diamonds better like 5 a day when you play that day when is there going to be new hotel to play with out event time when will there be more hotels

Great game but a few issues. I love this game but I lost a lot of progress tonight. Its a shame that once you finish a hotel you can go back but can't do anything with profits. The amount of energy needed for some things is too high. Also the cost of removing ads is too high. If it was a quarter of the price I would consider it. Overall though it will be great if they can fix these issues.

Loved this game so much I actually made one of the in app purchases that stops you having to watch ads. I played it for weeks on end but after completing the first 'event hotel' with 1 star I actually got kinda bored of it and realised it is quite repetitive. However I completed 4 of the regular hotel and had an attempt at a few event hotels before I got to the boredom point. It's a fun game to play on lunch breaks or if you have 10 minutes here or there to just take you mind off other things.

The game itself is probably worth 4 stars. It's much more involved than most idle games, with a few minor glitches and occasional poor guest path issues. The big flaw to the game is that it's virtually unplayable without spending $15 to remove ads, and then it still tries to gouge you for other purchases. I took two stars off for that... Then added one back because I did pay the $15 and am still playing it lol.

Only had the game a few days and so far i love it, can't get off it. I like the way you can watch ads to build your money up and to double the money when you select the ad for 2 hours. The guests do keep having something above their head which i don't know what it means and it won't let me click on it but so far so good.

I enjoyed the game and would rate the game a 5 star. my reason is due to every now and then my save file would reset itself to default and then I'd lose all what I had gain/ achieved. after reading other reviews it looks like this is a common bug that has developed during early stages of development. keep up the good work I can't wait for the game to get better.

This looked cute and ran well but from the start I couldn't break even. I played for about 10 minutes, then opened it back up in the morning to find all my expenses had gone well beyond my revenue overnight. I followed the tutorial steps but from the get go, I couldn't earn enough money to expand or even keep my 1 chef hired. I'm not interested in a mobile game that's challenging from the very start, it's much better to be eased into it and then slowly increase difficulty

Need to watch loads of ads to progress anywhere. Bundles are expensive, game glitchy. I can have an empty hotel and front desk tell people it is full. Staff quit even though there is enough money to pay them. Would be better if you had a list of objectives for each area, or bar, bedroom etc. Not just 3 at a time. Electricity needs addressing as pretty ,much everything uses it. A telephone using as much as a TV or a Hoover?

I enjoyed this game to begin with but it gets boring very quickly. Once a hotel hits 5 stars, there are no additional challenges or actions so you just move in and do the same thing with another hotel, quite repetitive. The money upgraded hotels make just accumulates and with no option to shift money from one hotel to the next or even spend once it is a 5 star hotel.

Dissappointed. I've had a few of these games now and usually I'd I like them I'll pop a few quid in to them to buy the upgrades. On this occasion I bought the upgrade that let's you keep the hotel open 10 hours. It worked for the first 2 but now I'm on hotel 3 my hotel closes after about 30 minutes. Not had a problem before, so the 2 stars is because the ONE thing you probably shouldn't get wrong is ANYTHING Monetized!

It's not the best game....you dont make money that fast and most of the time you have to watch an ad to make money..its very over priced for keeping the chef's and maids and half of the time I waste my money on keeping them cause they keep leaving due to me not having enough money to pay them! And it takes the maids a while just to go up and clean on the next day...I have a lot more things I dont like but there is a few...3 star..sorry! __

Reward Videos (dancing man, taxi cab, and clean room) videos only work half the time. I watch an ad, with FULL ADVERTISEMENT for Hotel selected, and within the 30 seconds I watch the ad, I go from Full hotel to 18 vacancies! Apparently this is part of the game according to support. When you leave game, even to watch an ad, all your guests leave. When reporting issue, I continue to get a generic response from support with no fix in sight. Dont bother downloading until they fix.

After going through a good chunk, I'd say it's alright. But what hurts it is the single use event buyouts for things like the presidential suites during the weekly events. You have to pay 10$ a week if you want to have a chance at maxing out your earning each week, more or less turning this into a pseudo subscription. It's a shame, I wanted to like this game, but the price gouging killed it for me. If things like the event stuff was a one time purchase, id be more forgiving, but $10 a week?

Love this game! The only reason i gave 3 stars is because the only way to progress is watch ad after ad or pay the $$ (which i did.) Its way to expensive. There's also a problem when you speed up the night time, you dont get all the earnings. I wish (after paying 10.00) that more hotels would come. Its not worth the amounts.

Compared to other idle games I have played, this game is not jam packed with ads nor does it fill the screen with 'watch a video for a bonus' notifications. I find the gameplay easy and rewarding to see a hotel completely filled out and upgraded. I would recommend this game along with other games by this company.

Great game, very addictive. Yes there is a few glitches, people getting stuck, for example. But overall a great game. Can't wait for an update for a new hotel. Maybe having people come in to your hotels to use the facilities would be a good way to increase earnings to build our hotels.

My husband and I both installed this game at the same time! He has no problems at all watching the ads however for some reason my game will not let me watch the ads . Very frustrating. Love the concept of the game and would love to see how far I get but at this point I am getting extremely frustrated! I have emailed support and now waiting for a reply!

Its a good entertaining game, but it does get boring since its so hard to get money after you enter a new hotle such as the events or the crystal resort,(i think thats what its called) the third hotel. Another thing that is REALLY fustrating is when you come back after 2 hours and want to double profits, you watch an ad. For me, it works a bit but then somtimes it will play 2 ads instead and then crash the app, please fix cuz i hate ads.

I love the game and I think watching the ads on exchange for some extra deeds is weighed out nicely. Or the small fee to get that eliminated quickly isn't bad either. I appreciate a good casual idle game with my lifestyle. My only problem is after you fully finish a hotel and start a new one you should at least get some revenue from it while starting another hotel otherwise it's just sitting there unplayed making money. Pls give us some revenue checks

Utter Garbage So the game starts off pretty ok, very very slow but ok. Then comes the ultimate grindfest, spend a ton of cash or watch ads all day! 20 ads to get a two hours income bonus. What the heck! Then it gets even worse. So you can now take part in hotel events to gain special management to help your hotel, however unless you're prepared to sink ¡ê15 into the game don't bother, I tested it without spending, watched ads every two hours invested as much time as possible, not even 1star

I really like this game which is really unusual because I'm not really fond about idle games but I do like this one. If I may I would really like to make a suggestion, the game is really slow on making money and the electric objects in it takes to much power on some of them, so I would just suggest maybe improving it a little bit on those areas.

Great game! Very addicting. There are five basic things that I look for in a game. 1) Fun/Keep my attention. 2) Not PvP. 3) Not Pay to Play or Advance. 4) Game time longer than ad frequency. 5) Can move to SD card. This meets my 5 points. This game has an Fair balance of ads / playtime in my opinion and it's far better watching an ad than having to spend my money to level up. If you dont want ads go out and purchase games! Game devs deserve pay to entertain us and ads do just that.

Really fun game, however the paywall behind 5 starring a location is ridiculous. I'm on the second hotel, and can't progress because I need 5 stars to unlock the next location. However I have purchased literally every available upgrade that doesn't require gems, however I'm still no where near 5 stars. So the only way to progress the game is to buy gems with real money. This is greedy and selfish, and completely killed all love I had for this game. Thanks for the fun 2 weeks, but deleting now__

The game is fun and all but you should be able to carry over your income from hotels you've finished into new hotels. This would be how building a hotel empire would actually be. It's frustrating to see all your money collect and not be able to use it to upgrade future hotels.

One of the most mentally challenging management games you can find. This genre of games are usually just "buy, buy, buy!" orientated but this one is different. The difference isn't too grand and you won't have a stroke figuring out what to do but it's the thought that sets it apart from the rest of the management games. _____ Just like my hotel!

I really enjoyed this game because of the challenges and finding new ways to optimize my build, but for the last 3 challenges, my resort is still built and earning money while away, giving me nothing to do for the challenge except earn money. Now I'm just bored with it.

Can take a while to get to where you need as your progress but it's literally the only game I play so its definitely good lol. I like that you dont have to buy gems you earn them which is so much better. The literal only thing I've paid for is 2x income without adverts for ¡ê4.50 that's all nothing else is required unlike other games. Definitely a winner.

The game is pretty decent. But please make an option to make the time faster like 2x or even 4x. Because it's just too long to wait. And there's too many ways that lead the player to buy the "no ads" and that kind of thing man

Was having fun with it, that being until waking up the next day to find all my progress had been erased, I paid to have the ads removed (the game is unbearable otherwise), and that apparently is the only time the game decided to auto saved. I had fun but wont be picking up again after seeing this, completely took me out of it.

So far, I am loving this game. Unlike most Idle Tycoons I've played, it doesn't generate $1M just overnight thus giving a bit more difficulty. I appreciate the mechanics of the employees and electricity as it adds a bit of management in the gameplay. Ads appear a lot but you can ignore them if u don't mind slow steps, and tho they give boosts they're really not required to progress. I look forward to updates leaning more on the simulation, and happy with the change of pace in this kind of game.

Game is really nice and I was enjoying it but the ads for extra money works only about 5% of the time. Nothing happens when I click watch video. Really wanted to give this 5 stars but had to change it because of that. I have the Google pixel 3xl. Not sure if it has anything to do with the phone

I really like this game, I like to play this when im trying to relax or just when im bored in general. I kinda wish that the gems would come in with the money as well becuase things cost gems and they're pretty expensive. I wish the investors would give a little more money but thats ok. Eveeything else is really good. I just bought my other hotel and it changed the scenery unlike the other Tycoon games that I've played which is really nice! I would recommend this game for 10 plus, or anyone!__!

Stanley Hotel: x2 doesn't work. Gold car does not show up. Maids will not clean rooms. Instant clean just cycles, just like x2. No support. Not everyone does Twitter or Facebook. Nothing works to fix this. Please help. I want to play and purchase but not if this game doesn't work. So sad. It's fun. Please fix bugs.

So far so good. The ads and freedom of gameplay are balanced. This type of game does not have to commit too much. Like can play whenever you have free time. Though could increase the idle time rather than 2 hours only. Thank you

Disappointing game in the end, can only play for 2 hotels then theres nothing you can do to progress too the next hotel.  I also did the event hotel, played from the moment it opened to the day it closed (4 days total) and still didn't reach the 1 star goal mark which was really infuriating.  Your game sucks, you have to be able to progress without micro transactions and even when I spent all my 300 gems in one hotel I still couldn't progress from 4 star to open the 3rd hotel. Too pay to win

Just like many others are saying, the game no longer works. For me however, the game half works. I am currently at 29/35 stars, with the imperator at 4/5 and just recently started the medival hotel. Upon closing the app last night, I worked on the imperator last, and this morning it loaded for me. However, when I went to work on the medival hotel, it was then that the game couldn't load the hotel. It may be that something about everyone's final hotels have stopped working?

Very fun but theres one issue. You should make it so we can take at least a little of the money from previous hotels to get the next one started. Im on the beach hotel and its really hard to advance quickly because you want $55,000 to build one room. I know buying the corgi will make it quicker but i dont have the money for that right now. So either give us more money to start hotels or make the vip prices go up more. Then i will gladly give you 5 stars

I love the game. Developers if you are interested in improving your game, the only thing i wish i could do is use my money as a whole and not seperately for each hotel because right now i just opened my second hotel and i am having a hard time imroving while in my first hotel i have 50,000 cash with nothing to do because i did everything and there is no way to spend that money.

I completed the first level, but now that I am on the second hotel, my double rooms are always empty when I leave the game and come back to it even though they were full when I initially left the game. My single rooms stay full, but my double rooms are always empty. In addition to this, my star bar isn't filling at all even though I have bought enough stuff to make it increase at least a little bit.

Hey, first of all devs please read this. It's very important for you to read this. I don't need to tell how unbalanced and unrealistic this game is because all the other reviews have. Instead, I'm going for some, I mean lots of advices. This game is about managing, but we aren't managing enough. If it's about managing, then let us at least control when the restaurants open or when the maids work. And you're not even letting us interact except upgrading and watching ads. And I'm out of words.

I love the game! It's fun and it's not pay to win,(although the start is pretty much impossible to pass without watching ads to get money it will take to long to pass otherwise) but once you get started it's fun!

It WAS a good game. If i needed money i could watch ads. But now the ad doesn't play and then the screen freezes and i have to reopen the game. But its so addictive and fun I would give 5 stars if there wasn't the ad problem

This game would be rather decent if not for the forced ads. The constant ad pushing every 30 secs or so that gets old, but the back breaker is that the game will knee cap you by locking rooms in your hotel and requiring an ad to unlock the room. Therefore you can expect to watch ads for no benefit, just to keep the idle game running.

Really fun and addictive! This game reminds me of a mix between The Sims and the old classic Sim Tower, both games are beloved by me, so if you like games like those this app will hit the spot for your entertainment. For me this game is worth all their in app purchases, I've spent more on console games that were sub par to this game. Plus I get a kick out of finding all the movie characters staying at my hotel such as John Wick, Beatrice from Kill Bill and others lol . Quite entertaining!!

This game is very fun, ive downloaded all your guy's idle tycoon games. Then i tried downloading another tycoon app that you guys didnt make but immediately deleted it, not as good as your apps. At first its super annoying that it takes forever to get money like the ads you guys display. But then its fun. This also has kind of realistic prices.

I'm uninstalling coz you can't take your earnings from one hotel to the other. So it is like many small games when you've to start from scratch. The ads are also too many coz you can't move forward without the investor who gives you money if you watch the ad. Also it is not connecting to Google Play games

I do enjoy playing the game and would have given it 5 stars, But sadly the game is not working anymore. That little guy that shows up from time to time and if you watch a video then he gives you some money towards your income of the hotel. Well, the videos are not playing so now I'm getting no hotel money from him. Its frustrating.

Been playing it for a few hours and i am really enjoying this game!__ im going to wait for pay day and get the no adds as its a one payment its fun and a bit chalanging...(sorry bad spellings) __ you have to be carfull what you spend the money on and make sure you have enothe tto pay for the staff! I definatly recomend giving it a try!____
The game was good but it was too many ads like I need to watch every ads to earn more money. Sometimes the ads video can't load. And I think it would be more fun if the game was in horizontal mode.

The game would be much better if it could show more details on the customer. Details such as names, age, occupation, relationship, duration and reason of staying could be add to make the player feel more engage. Also when the customer want to checkout, maybe the customer can give a review about his/her staying in the hotel. Like how good/bad is the food, the room, etc. Also how much days or money the customer had spent on his/her stay. Overall, it was a good game.

Updating: since customer support refuses to address the problems of this game, I'm lowering rating to 1 stars Ads in this game dont work which means making money is slow. This is clearly a ploy to get you to spend real money to turn ads off.Numerous messages sent to support. Generic automated responses sent back and nothing ever gets fixed. If you can't fix this why in the world would I spend my real money on your game?!

After reading others, I decided to make a reply as my review is already reflected. THIS IS AN IDLE GAME!! People complaining about making money takes too long, or the opposite, they beat the game too fast.. put your phone down for a few hours every once in a while. That's what the IDLE part means. Agree events are worthless to try for, money should be able to be transferred from finished hotels, and service staff should serve more than 2 at a time. Otherwise absolutely great game. Not a P2W.

Loved it initially, but ads don't load. So I'm missing a ton of extra money. I also haven't had a single ad guest to my second hotel in days. I'm on the verge of deleting the app. Thank god I didn't pay for any of the ad on.

I love this game but i had to give it one star cuz it started cheating me out of money and diamonds. When the guy shows up in the car you push the button to watch a video for more money it won't give it to you. As for task you earn diamonds i've done it says sorry try again later and no diamonds on some tasks. Another its to much money to build room by room and then to top it off fix the rooms up even higher geez. It starts you off with hardly any money. How do you expect to do that w/o $$$

dear Developers, you have done something marvelous. You have taken my favorite game idle market and perfected into this beautiful Masterpiece. Not only that you improve upon your ground, but you didn't fix anything that wasn't broken. You also did something that in the other game bothered me, there was no risk! But now there is! And I'm very happy to see that these developers know what they're doing.

I enjoy this a lot. However, I feel like the money should all go into one account. Cause once I finish 1 hotel, I cant do anything with it anymore. It makes money, but I cant use that money to improve my other hotels. One more thing is that the cleaning service is too slow. I already hired all the possible personnel (that tends to 0 ppl, btw) upgraded all the equipments but rooms still dont get cleaned? And then I have to watch an ad to clean them because dirty rooms cant be rented out

I had fun playing the game. I wish they can update the game and have MORE HOTELS with MORE services. I just opened that last hotel available in the game. About the event, it is impossible to achieve 3 stars without paying for the boost using real money. I just gave it up and didn't bother playing the event since it is pointless. But OVERALL THE GAME IS FUN. I'm giving 3 stars for the lack of LEVELS/HOTELS that can be played and the impossible event.

SUPPORT EMAIL IS INVALID AND NOT FOUND. I FOUND MAJOR PROBLEMS THAT AREN'T ABLE TO BE REPORTED!!! NOW WHAT?! Beat the game in merely 8 days after OVER paying cold hard cash for permanent assistants in-game. Feel ripped off being as the game was beat so quickly, you MUST add more resorts, 4 is too few, but I will not spend another dime on this game or any other this distributor puts out.
super slow game, who in right mind to put golden super car on top of parking spot. no one can click it, and 1 hours gameplay get no progress. ads ads ads.. still with 3 room, super poor gameplay.

It was fun at first. Building my hotel. Bit dissapointed that i cannot use the profit from the first hotel to my next hotel/resort. So whats the point of gain profit from the first hotel?i cannot upgrade to add more rooms,or expands the building or transfer the profit? It getting bored after i finish the second Hotel. BORED.

These guys have made good games but I have a couple of issues, currently when I am in the game it says I am cash positive but yet when I leave and come back, I have lost money, I frankly think that the worker wage thing is stupid. Their older games didn't have it so why now? So onless you are willing to pay money or watch 800,000 ads, which I can't see anyone doing, don't bother with this game.

I was about to fully upgrade the hotel when next day when I opened it it was back to the first level with no stars. I had 5 stars and the other hotel is still fine. Cheating players and making money with ads!??

Game was fun, but little bit dissapoint about the last hotel. I'm just thinking the last hotel more bigger and complex than 3rd hotel. Maybe you can expand the game for more fun. Note : For player who say cant get 5 star without using real money, I can say u are noob. Coz if u spend your gems just for 3x money, thats was your fault. I spend gems bonuses just for 1 special item each service. Max all facilities then 5 stars just appears. Dont blame if you cant manage well.

The first thing that annoy me is the game force you to buy/build something if I have enough money. Even at the start the game you force us to hire a chef and do advertising. After playing awhile I realized I dont need them in early game because they make me loss money. Just do the explanation and let us decide to hire/buy/build them. The other one is there is no faq/help section in the game. I dont even know that one chef only serve two people at first. That make customer angry and leave.

The game itself is a good simulation game. But the glitch and the problem are hilarious, when you reach the 2nd hotel, the game starts to glitch by showing 2 empty rooms, though people were booked them 2 mint ago. It will shown when the all 2/3 double bedrooms are occupied by customers, and you shut the game or visit another hotel, it falls back to 2 empty rooms. It causes lesser profit and also player's unsatisfaction. Dear Codigames,look at this issue, rather your game is good.

The game is good and time killing. Especially in the boring days of lockdown. Its kind of an addictive game. There are certain bugs with the game, hope they will fix. 1. Even if we upgrade the restaurant to 100% and hire maximum chefs, sometimes some customers won't get food and they will be angry. Seen in the codinental. 2. In Stanley resort, upgraded house keeping to 100% and hired maximum staffs. But, they are not cleaning all the rooms. 3. Front desk service should be 24*7.

The game is a slow pace but it's fine, It could be very relaxing making profit in money and understanding who the hiring let go and making the wages and stuff and I enjoy it.there's no glitches yet so it's worth playing. I'm going to see how far I can feel upon my hotel but I would like to see a dance night club in the hotel like a Vegas hotel at some point.

This game is fantastic! Absolutely amazing, The prices and wages are really realistic too! it's slow pasted and you really need to work with the hotel and prices and manage it. For a funny cartoon game this really makes me feel like a hotel owner. great game! (Im definitely Not a bot giving this game a good review because I was paid by the game developers)
Good and entertaining game but too many ads and it needs to be more technical rather than just a game to lure people so that they can show as many ads as possible waste people's time.

It sucks. Do you know how many times I hadn't gotten the money I watched a video for? I mean if you put somone who gives you money for free in a game when you don't get the money it's VERY frustrating. I was playing about three minutes ago and I lost 3000 what ever there curuncy is in the game is for goodness sake. I am beond annoyed by this horrendous game. I hope if you get this game you won't suffer the losses as much as I have.

Game was fun but once you get through with everything there is nothing to do anymore. I got all the way through this game a year ago and nothing new has come up but an event that resets after the event is done and there isn't any difference when it comes back up so it gets boring after a while

Uptate.I have been playing this game for about 5 months now.I bought the 2x money bonus.I used to get 2x the money.I don't anymore.For example,I just turned the game on.My normal build up of money was 1.2 million.I clicked on the 2x bonus.It said 1.2 plus 1.2 I actually only got the 1.2.This just started about a month ago.Seems higher the money,the less likely it will give me the bonus.Thats why I'm dropping to 1 star.Also the help email they have is invalid. No money again.

I like the game. I just dont like that when i exit out of the game and come back i have people missing. Ill have a full hotel and come back and like half my rooms are empty. Its really quite annoying and may keep me from playing if it contiunes.

I dont know if it is a glitch or not, but im still pissed. When your worker leaves, (which can happen even if you gain money, so its just random sometimes) you lose ALL the furniture in that room. I lost a 30 gem TV, even though I gained money. I lost all that work, because of a glitch!

Fun game,but waste your time you watch so many ads just for low amount of money when the guy that comes in the hotel he just give you like $100 or thousand dollars shouldn't be giving you like a hundred thousand or million or something please fix that, I mean I get that it's actually like doing what real-life does where you have to pay your employees but it takes so much of your money, lt takes like two or three thousand away from your account and I always end up with like 10 or $20______fixplz

All fun except the events, they are way too focused on P2W, I'm not paying $10 a week to VIP during the event sorry. And unless you pay you will not achieve even 1 star during the event trust me. You get a permanent 5% bonus for 1 star and a maximum of a 15% bonus per event. They could have made it so much better and encouraging by making it at least POSSIBLE to get 1 star and achievable to get 3 if you play 24/7 during the event.
Too many ads... And the worst part is if you switch between hotels automatically some rooms in the one you switched from get vacant.. even if they had just filled like a few mins ago...
I love the game but I don't get enough money had to watch tons of adds to have enough money, wasted all my data on it, please the money earning easy__ still love the game though, thanks__
The game itsself is neat, I love tycoon type games but i hate that you have to wat h so many ads just to get anywhere and $14.99 to remove ads is WAY too high in my opinion...
Very very poor game You have to watch ad video to grow if you will not watch then your progress will very very slow They only want to make money using ad video _____ ___ _____ ___

People keep saying that it's impossible to pass the first stages of a hotel without ads but that's just not true you can definitely do so you just need to do certain steps I'm not gonna reveAl want the steps are though so you guys can find out yourself.____
This game is really fun you can upgrade and get actual customers within 2 minutes which is really fun the only thing is the ads but I love this game so far
Not able to play any ads after update.... VIP person is not coming. Became an offline game after update, no need of internet at all.
It nice. entertainment's good but whenever I get my money while I'm offline when I collect my money it resets to onlya half of the amount. Plz fix this (btw I'm 9 years old)
Ai on coming in to restaurants and bars or more is not efficient specially when u just starting out a hotel. You loss money instead not good if this keeps up. Fix asap
Please add more hotels! I already maxed the last hotel. There's nothing for me to do in the game anymore. Edit: I've already maxed out the most recent hotel
Please add more map in this game

Interesting game so far. Cost for getting rid of ads and other advancements are a bit too much in my opinion. Some of the ads I try to watch do not play. All in all I like the game. I like trying to figure out ways to make my little hotel profitable. I did lose some staff but there's a learning curve. I am now able to keep my two chefs and 3 cleaning lady's, and my sales desk guy.

Yes, there are alot of ads for those of us who choose not to pay for the privilege of internet games. That being said, and understanding that ads are forever, the game's sequence is true to life, the graphics are excellent. If you think running a hotel is easy (picky, whiney, bitchy guests and all) you might want to try this game first before taking the plunge. I enjoyed every minute and couldn't wait to return to it. It's as close as "close" can be without getting run over. Great game.

Overall, a lot of fun. I'm working on finishing out my last hotel. But I do wish that it was balanced in such a way that you could work on more than one hotel at once. Sure you can go back to them and collect money but that serves no point to furthering your game progress. You have to fully max one to move on to the next and especially at the beginning, the slow grind nearly made me uninstall.

Started as a great game. Good general concept, draws you in, love that you can watch ads to get extra stuff. Uninstalled because, #1, after you finish a hotel, you can't use the money it accrues I'm any way. It just sits there. Money piling up like dust. That was the biggest turnoff. Made me lose interest in even finishing the next one. #2, the glitches are bad. Otherwise, I'd still be playing. Sad.

The game is interesting and kinda fun, but it is marred by how long the intro takes and the complete lack of controll durring that period. I understand it is to help inexperienced people learn how to play, but maybe you can add a "skip tutorial" button for those of us who have pleanty of experience with games like this and would prefer to get straight to the gameplay.

Addicting and Soothing. About 1/2 way through the final hotel and hope that they create more levels. It's an enjoyable game and relaxing. Playing it with my boyfriend and we play against each other by seeing who can complete their hotel first. Theres lots of different strategies to go about doing it. It's free to play and you just log back on every 2 hrs or so to collect and build.

Totally fun, but I wish there were more opportunities for gems so I can freely upgrade all of my hotel rooms. The cost for perks, like no ads, can be a bit too much (I dont want to pay 10 actual dollars for an ad free exp). There are a lot of ads, so be prepared. Other than that, it's fun once you build up your money. :]

I have a lot of fun with this game, but I also have suggestions for improvement: -More variety in the Event hotels. Since there's no option to erase your progress and start over, you could use the existing hotel structures and randomize them for use in Events. -In-game achievements. -The option to erase your progress and start over (for hotels only - cash purchases for ad removal and such should remain). Thank you for the game!

Use the email address provided in the app settings for support. Around January it took a couple wks b4 support answered, but now they're very fast! HET is attractive... Nicely done w/ many interesting features. The events are an outstanding addition. I enjoy discovering upgrades & expansions. Disconnect "Play" in app settings if you want to start over, then clear storage. However, I lost my special managers! Probably will not restart the 5 hotels again. (+1day)Thanks, Support Team, they're back!

Really a great game. My biggest issue is with the ads. You will occasionally get an opportunity to watch an ad to get bonus money, customers, or to skip night time. After a few minutes of playing the ads stop working. Either they will play and you won't get the reward, or they won't play at all. Restarting the game seems to fix it, but it's still an issue that should be fixed.

I really enjoy this game, and can't wait for new updates. But I have encountered a few things that annoy me, first, some of the decorations sit on top of each other(such as a painting and the thermostat in the lvl 3 hotel suites) and the fact that even fully upgraded the restaurant can't serve everyone.

I could have been a 5 star because it was exactly the kind of game I was looking for. The kind I could let run while at work and just check it from time to time. My only problem is that if you buy the upgrade for the manager who collects while you're letting it run in the background you can finish the game too quickly and get maxed out all the hotels and there's nothing left to do. If I were to talk to a new player I would say buy the no add upgrade and don't buy the x2 money.

I've played a few of thier tycoon games before and lost interest pretty fast but this one is more in depth, you can upgrade individual pieces of the rooms and restaurant etc rather than just the rooms as a whole. The "here watch an ad" is annoying sure but they do give the option to permanently get rid of them so that makes it all better.

This is a pretty good game. It is a good time killer, easy to pick up and play, and does not require paying to play. There are options to pay for gold or special abilities, but not necessary. The first couple hotels can be completed fairly quick, but then it takes a while to finish. I just hope they release some more levels. I just completed the last hotel so no reason to play any longer. I'm giving it a 4 star for this reason.

I really enjoy this game. It's fun and rewarding. I wish, however, that you could customize your hotels. I also am not a fan of how the ability to get 10 hours of offline rewards is locked behind a paywall. The monetization is just not the most consumer friendly. I'd rate it higher if either of these things were addressed.

Fun, but felt short. I completed all of the hotels within 1-2 weeks. (But then again, I did pay for the game being ad-free because of the awesome bonus from the "dancing King.") Hopefully there will be future updates and more hotels to complete, progressively getting more expensive, or a "prestige" system.

Love the concept but it's glitchy. If you watch a video for a reward then you'll receive the first one but if you watch a video after that it won't reward you. I tried to find a loop hole around it by closing out the game after every video I watch but if I do that all of my guests in the double bed rooms disappear and don't pay for their rooms. Just a lose lose situation all around.

The base gameplay is fine. All in all, a decent game. But I've had two different games install themselves onto my phone via the advertisements. I dont know if that's a fault of the developer, but it doesn't happen on any other app where I've watch ads. Unfortunate, because I did enjoy this game.

Star rating doesn't make much sense. I would make new resorts need 3 more stars than the previous hotel, otherwise switching to previous resorts and offline income have no purpose. Either let next resorts open in 3-6-9 stars(instead of 5-9-15), or allow funds to be transferred between hotels. Best would be to combine both changes, in my opinion.
They fixed the bugs that made one level have no goals and weird math. Thank you, developers!

This is a cheeky game that is surprisingly well paced and fun to play. Hotel Empire won't rely on overblown numbers or annoying stage resets to keep you playing. In addition, quests are achievable for F2P players. Although, the occasional bug does exist such as when customers refuse to sit in your restaurant's empty chairs or how "couples" rarely choose to eat together - it is clear the developer is making a meaningful effort to reward strategic upgrade choices. I would recommend this game.

Overall a great game, but I'm not writing my review to say how good it is. Its enjoyable, so go ahead an download it. I'm here to ask the developers if they could fix the lag after upgrading stuff. It freezes my game for couple of seconds each time I upgrade something. It seems to get stronger with every new hotel, and it just makes me feel like not even bothering to play anymore. That's it. It's the only thing that I find extremely annoying about this game I wish it could be fixed

I really love this game, especially the strategic management aspect of it. You don't just continuously click to upgrade. However, I would like to point out some issues. For somehow you can't hold the button to upgrade, which is annoying. It gets laggy whenever I press upgrade and upgrading each room is such a pain! They should make a way where you can upgrade multiple things that are the same at once! I literally took me almost and hour to upgrade each room, especially when on higher level hotel

Game has potential but is glitchy af. Ads often don't give rewards, sometimes don't load at all and you have to kill the game and reload again to get it to work. Don't bother leaving the game open in the background for any amount of time, it will not function properly when you return to it later - have to close it and reopen it again. Closing and reopening the game often changes the game state too - usually resets to half rooms rented even if you had no vacancy before closing the game.

The game is a good little game. However once the hotels are done, that's it. They keep earning money, but you dont have anything left to do. Now 4 hotels done and that's the end of the game...... same there isn't more, like upgrading the old hotels, problems to solve... or more complex hotels/resorts.

Absolutely loved this game, unlocked all hotels, all 5 stars. But there is no end game content........ Literally nothing to do once you unlock everything. Can you please make an option to reset BUT you can customize your own hotel, add as many rooms, add as many pools etc. Sandbox mode, no limits!!! Because right now there is nothing to do, and I'm going to delete it soon.

This game is amazing and the graphics are awesome. The only downside is that every time you move to a new hotel, you have no money and have to watch all the videos again. Plus, I was so annoyed with having to watch ads to get money, that in the end I bought no ads but you still get the rewards. I was eventually bored of it though and deleted it but I have downloaded it again. Luckily it saved my progress. I would definitely download this game if you are bored and have nothing else to do.

I've really loved playing this game since getting it _ very satisfying and it doesn't rely on microtransactions. The reason I'm changing from 5* to 3* now is because of a new ad in those you watch for dancing man/instant customers/+10mins to 2¡Á profit _ since it's free to play, I watch the ads without complaint (I'd pay for no ads if it wasn't kinda extortionate), but the new solitaire ad is what, 1 minute+ long each time? Finding it very off-putting. Way too long to watch so many of them.

Great concept, but if you want to progress you'll have to watch circa 20-30 ads an hour minimum or pay ¡ê10+(!) It should be easier to upgrade and not so ad dependant, because if you don't watch ads it would be an extremely slow and boring game. Also, you can't carry money over from hotels!

Playing for about three days, I do enjoy the game but there is definitely a lot of improvement that can follow into this game. Like gems should be able to convert to cash would be a nice feature, achievements added to this game would be nice. I get a small glitch where the front desk is facing away from the guest when checking in and out. Game is based on watching ads if you want to complete the Hotel faster, if you want the ads gone you have to pay a big amount to remove them.

The events are absolute garbage. Can't place without spending money, lowest tier reward if you DO shell out the $11 they want for it. Not actually a terrible game aside from the necessity to watch ads to progress, or else drop $11 to get rewards without having to waste the time on it, but between the garbage events and the garbage ad grabs, they get 1* from me.

if u spent as much time making the game as advertising it would be good. I like these kind of games and thought it would be fun to try this out. Well I download it and let me tell ya its impossible to play with these ads I played it for probably 2 hours with ads before I said f*** it and paid the 11 dollars to play without ads. It also had some other perks to it but not worth 11 dollars but I was like theres four hotels I will get to play awhile. WRONG I got 2 hotels and 8 hours game play.

Game play is good only if when watching an ad for an investor, you actually collect! They are not giving anything although you are watching the ad. 5/7/20 This is a very good and entertaining game, except most of our time is spent watching ads in order to have a great hotel! If we received more by watching an ad it would definitely be a greater incentive!

Fun enough game. However, the $10 charge to remove ads to obtain the games currency , or rather enough of the games currency to make the game fun is problematic. Or you can watch an add every 30 seconds for that same currency. I must say I would pay to remove the ads but after making it to hotel 3 the game would no longer open without an uninstall and reinstall losing all my progress. Already being hesitant with the cost of $10 to remove the ads, I'm unwilling to spend on a game that is unstable

What's the point in he even having a game on your phone if it doesn't even load up past the menu. For all the time I did play it it was amazing it was really fun but after a week or two it's stopped loading up whatsoever if you want to play this game you need to play it fast but I may warn you there's a very high chance of it never loading up again

So i don't usually play any games on mobile apart from cod or pubg (which i also left ) . This game is good for killing time . I would have rated it 5 stars if it was more interactive and less based on ads. I would also like the funds to be transferable to another hotel . For instance if one of my hotel is fully upgraded then i could use those funds to develop other hotels.

So far so good, the tutorial isn't super long and the graphics are cute. The spreadsheets are also quite nifty as well, switching between rooms took a moment to get used to but altogether, everything feels pretty intuitive. Keep it up!

Starting to get annoyed! I get asked to write to them in the game support and I said I can't because the game crashes every time! Never heard back I enjoy these games but seriously this game and the prison one keep crashing every time you get a few minutes if your lucky and I mean 2-3 or less. That's why I won't download anymore codigames or spend money as I have and it was a waste.

You have to watch adds to get anywhere in the game. There are also bugs while upgrading you can get stuck on that screen and have to force the program to close. If you want to switch between hotel expect to loose half your guests or with a hard shutdown of the game due to a bug.

Just paid for the booster pack 3 times because it said failed each time but was charged for each one. Your support email on here doesn't work and if there is a link in the app; it's hard to find. Absolute rip off and seems like you're trying to steal. I have emailed your support email from your website but no response 6 hours later.

I love this game a lot, except there are a few bugs that deter me for a while. The video ads hardly ever work lately. For double profit or for the VIP extra money. It's annoying because making money is a slow process when just beginning without the extras. Please fix for 5 stars!

The reason why I gave this 3 stars is because the game is a good game to pass time but you have to watch a lots of ads to succeed. Every time you unlock new hotel you start of with 50k but that's not enough If I'm on my 4 hotel because upgrades be like 50k. So I prefer if you add more money for start off. Before you go saying oh the ads help no they don't. The ads be like $600 to $1k. Sometimes you watch a ad and don't receive nothing. So respond this.

I like the ability to start and maintain various hotels. At first, you earn money slowly, but as you continue to invest money in upgrades, the income per day (24 minutes) increases. You can get more money faster by getting money from an investor that occasionally walks into the hotel. All you have to do is click the investor (who dances in the lobby) and watch videos. The downside is that the video doesn't always play and you forfeit the money.

Has a lot of potential, but it pushes players to view ads constantly right off the bat. Operating costs are pretty cool for an idle game. Just 5 mins in, I see without viewing ads progress is ridiculously slow. Passive income is a joke because of the gap between playing the game normally and clicking on one of the ads that come up every 10 seconds. Theres no income on nights, so skip with ad. Maids dont actually clean? Clean with an ad. Abysmal passive income? Ad.

Nothing is more annoying than a game pushing adds to get money when they release such a broken game. The people don't stick to routine while you're away. The maids literally lie facedown on the couches. Pay for adds while you're away and the hotel isnt full. The watch an add to double your profits upon returning to the game doesn't work. Gems are expected to transfer to other hotels but funds aren't transferable. There's so much more but this is baseline to work on.

Way too simplistic. There's nothing more to do than to wait for money to tick in so that you can by the next minor upgrade. Also, it seems a lot of effort has been put in to mechanics for ad revenue and monetization which only gets in the way of game play. Promising game, but destroyed by its poor focus.

Don't get this. It's fun for the first 10 minutes, but after that it is pretty much just a game for watching ads. It would take you FOREVER to do anything without watchind ads. Also if you exit and don't play for even a small time the hotel "closes" and you don't earn anything.

I use to love this game, but the issues make it less fun to play. I use to be able to play the events for hours! Now I have to back out and reload the game every so often because the videp rewards stop paying out after a few times. It is very frustrating! If you fix this than I will give a way better rating!

It's a good game, good for when you only need half your attention on it. My only real complaint is that when I click on the Dancing Guy, he doesn't usually give me cash, which really started annoying me after a while. If you could fix this so that I actually get money for watching ads, then that would be great. Thank you!

Love the game! It's very addictive but the income is hard to get. I'm on my third hotel and everything is so expensive to upgrade especially compared to the income you get. You have to watch videos a lot to get more money but that's more than fine with me! It's a free great game and the makers need to get paid too!

Basically this game requires players to spend REAL money. I've experienced lots of bugs and reported to the developer.. to unlock 3rd Hotel Location 9 stars are required.. and you will need to fully upgrade one hotel to 5 stars.. for me I dont have enough diamonds (even after finishing all quests) to upgrade it.. I refuse to spend REAL money.. Totally unbalanced gaming by requiring players to watch ads to progress further faster because this game pace is way too slow..

After the tutorial, I went out to complete quests as suggested. Seem to always lose more than I can make in profit never to make any progress when I get back to the game. No interest in coming back to something that makes me feel like I shouldn't play it in the first place.

This game is so glitchy. I want profits to increase 3 times but it doesn't work. It doesn't even give me the money. Even now I just logged in and I dont even get a thousand. It is a good game to pass the time but my suggestion if you download the game which I highly recommend you do is that always ask the dancing king for money and when logging back in after 2 hours is that never press profits x3 or profits x2 if you want to get the money you collected from that 2hrs. This is what happened to me

I didnt have to spend my lifes savings to play this game and it's really fun! I dont mind the ads I'll watch as many as they put in there so I can keep playing without paying. Yes there are paid options in the game but you can still have fun without them. Perfect for long trips and parties you feel awkward at lol.

This is a very nice game for time killing and specially the concept of the game is superb.! Just a thing to improve is about ads. In between the game it feels like a player is watching only ads. So, there should be equal balance of all these things.. Thanks..!

I'll give it a 4 stars so that you consider making it even better . The game is awesome but maybe there are some stuff you can add for a better experience : - you can add mantainance to the finished hotels , we have a lot of money but we can't use it anywhere and without maintenance the game will come to an end with finishing the last hotel possible - you can add more manager options such as configuring service hours or work hours for the employees The game is awesome keep going __

I tried to email the help center, but I received a response saying it doesn't exist. There's no incentive to return to 5star hotels and there are no rewards for finishing a hotel. Why are there only 16 parking spaces for a bar, spa, ski slopes, and restaurant? People can't park, so they can't visit? Cute graphics! When I finish all hotels, then what? It's over, just delete the game? Why are there no GooglePlay achievements? The game info is misleading and exaggerating.

Fun game so far, and it's and good time killer. Will recommend it if you like to play games that you improve stuff but dont have to watch alot of vids or play a matching game. I did pay for no ads and it is definitely worth it. It made the game so much better. One time charge and I have yet to watch a video or any.

It should have the option of transferring money from one hotel to another. After reaching 5 stars, there's nothing else to upgrade in the hotel. My Resort is in need of more money whereas my hotel has no longer need of money. It would be good if u let us buy the gems with the (in-game) money. Add more not-for-sale-gem items. The serious thing we need is the option to transfer money from hotel to hotel. Everything else is just good.

Gameplay is slow to begin with, it's really hard to build up, only made harder by the fact you need to remain in game to actually keep the hotel open. I like to grind my way through games but this is just abit too extreme. I like that you can pay to double your income permanently, pay to stop ads & pay to have the hotel make money whilst not being in game, but I think ¡ê10+ for this game of game is just too much, the graphics are too low to be charging people that. Enjoy playing tho 3/5.

Don't Bother This was fun until the 3rd hotel. Once there, videos won't load to double money, and when they do, the money doesn't double all the time. In order to progress past this 3rd one, or to even get it running to earn, you have to make purchases. It was fun until this point. Unfortunately, I'm deleting it now.

This games is just designed for you to watch ads or buy their upgrades (which are absurdly expensive), if you decide to block the ads your hotels just won't have as much visitors as a normal ad game would have, every single thing you need in this game force you to watch an ad. It just sucks.

Very slow progression when starting a hotel once you get to 2/3 stars the progress is rapid, to get to a star you do need to watch a lot of adverts that don't always work. It's a slow game so you can leave it for 24 hours quite easily and have enough money to do stuff.

This is the idle game I never knew I wanted to play! It is my absolute favourite right now! It takes a little more thinking than the brain dead idle games, which makes it just enough of a challenge but still relaxing. I just made it to the second hotel!

Good game. After you finish one hotel, you do it all over again in a new hotel. Here's a problem. After I finish the Night Resort, I can't go to the next level to the Palace even though I max out everything in all hotels. So there's a bug in the game. Even though there's a bug, you will spend weeks on this game.

Fun game, was frustrating at first when you keep going into negative and you don't know why but got the hang of it eventually. Now been waiting for new content since last year I think. Keep checking back occasionally as it's a fun little time waster but I'm assuming it's been abandoned

There are some bugs, like when you buy upgrades for the rooms, when you press back it doesn't work. And the yellow starred facility and room means it's the most profitable right? But it says LOSSES! in yellow, which isn't helpful at all.

Progression is extremely slow. Everything cost so much that ads are necessary if you want to buy upgrades or or pay salaries to the staff. Progress from the previous hotel does not affect the new hotel so there's no purpose in moving to the next hotel at all.

Started off promising but soon became pointless. And if you want no ads than expect to drop around 17 Dollarydoos. That's a crazy amount for such a second rate lazy game. Another game I'm playing offered to remove adds for under a couple of dollars and I'm still playing that one. Poor effort from a group of people more interested in making money than creating decent content

One of the better idle games that exist. You can literally hang out in game for hours, without the need to watch adds etc. However, it is worth the $17.99 aud for investor add on, that makes this game far better, more relaxing and more enjoyable. I would recommend whether you make an IN app purchase or not.

It's fun but i had to pay 12$ just to get that no ads privilege, although i don't mind spending 12$ to support the devs it's kinda bad for the fact that players have to watch ads every single minute playing the game, it's not hotel tycoon it's like ad tycoon and for the love of God please fix the AI walking animation and route it's soooo bad. Just don't be the greedy EA of mobile games, literally.

Enjoyable game. More hotels needed. I am having issues with my guests getting annoyed and leaving the hotel when I have the maximum number of staff on each service (I can't see any way of increasing wages so that they work more quickly). Some of them are even getting annoyed because they want to use something past closing time. This is beyond my control, why is it happening?!

This game outshines the others. There is a tad more to do as far as you are able to loose money as well as earn it and it makes it more difficult to make money at first. There is more upgrade options which is neat. I love the direction the developers are going on the game making.

This game unlike some of the similar games has taken the time to offer the user detailed areas to update Achieving the objective is gained through graphic changes that are tied to a chain of budget changes Working towards the objective is similar to filling in an intricate adult coloring book The page starts of as a black and white drawing and ends up however the user dresses it Most of the sound effects and all of the music is nice too
