Please think about taking that ad out or upping the age to appropriately fit your that ad. Thanks

I would give this game more as I really do enjoy it but its so glitch its beginning to make me go off of the game, for example since being in the second hotel I can't seem to watch ads to be able to skip the night or earn double profits and I've noticed when this happens the VIP is non-existent and I no longer get the taxi notification either which just ruins me playing the game

This Manager Event is nice but way too short for the target goals you have set to reach without *having* to buy a pack. Also really annoying that I frequently don't get my reward from the Dancing King after viewing the ads or when logging in to double earnings made while offline. It's discouraging. ______

I really like the game but i'am not a big fan of spending money. Which is why i love that ads can help big time in this game, but after the 2nd hotel i cannot watch ads anymore. I tried clearing the cache but it doesnt work for me. Withoud ads helping us in acquiring money this game is just a slow painful process

Fun game but very annoying when you have to start all over again in the new hotel although loads of effort has been spent in the previous ones. Cannot transfer money between hotels. Millions of dollars in the previous ones, start a new one with ¡ê2000?!

It was a fairly great game but After i opened the second hotel the gane went downhill. It stared refusing to open. I had to force stop and open just to get it to load. When it does load i cant play any videos to get double. The special guest doesnt pop up anymore. Ive been trying to play for 2 days now with no avail.

Hi this is an incredibly funny and cool game.There are two problems I have tho.These both being hacks/glitches discovered by yours truly.Number one is if you close the app and reopen it,if you quickly go to watch ad to get two times money then spam where watch ad would be you get the double money for free no ad.Number two is that if you ask to watch an ad for 2x money and close the ad you still get the bonus.

Loved it til Hotel #3 - the resort. The game seems to be experiencing a glitch in this hotel where money doesn't accrue the same way as before, empty rooms don't register as being available and the booster man doesn't appear half as often as he did in the previous hotels. Instead of the $700 I should be getting for my best room, I seem to only be getting about $50. I've been playing this current hotel for about 4 days but have barely made any progress.

So far, it's a pretty neat game. I like that the 2nd hotel level sounds like it offers even more challenges. The optional__(I appreciate__) coins-for-ad deals are pretty fair, too, and help speed 'the action' along.

Game is good as easy to upgrade and fun but the worst part is all hotels are not interconnected and you can not transfer earned money or profit or resources from established hotel. Once you upgrade hotel, its of no use as it will be making profit but can't use it anywhere else. Game can be made more interesting by making it more real life simulator.

This game is nothing but a grind fest in which grinding only gets longer with each new hotel. And then what? Nothing. It feels very pointless after you begin to realize it halfway through. I'm not going to even bother to complete the last couple of hotels. Uninstalled.

Update #2 April 2022- I re-downloaded the game hoping it was better with the ads no longer glitching and it is! Some ads still glitch and don't give you rewards but it doesn't happen very often anymore. Now if only there were more hotels to do! Finishing the last hotel now. Lol

I really am enjoying this game. But even after the update I am not getting all of my money when I watch ads to double my profits or even just to get more money. sometimes its a good 10, 20000 that I don't recieve. I don't normally make complaints or give reviews. I just would like to keep playing but its aggrevating to not get the money. Sometimes I don't get it at all.

Consider this review for the devs. Loving the game. But... You could make it 100% better with minor effort, star rating should never be 5 for a new hotel. Guest/employee placing and pathing is bad or glitchy. Sometimes watching and ad does not give a reward which is extremely saddening, gems are useless (so you wont sell any) and your other micro transactions are way too expensive to be considered. It also needs some random interactiveness and visuals. And I have so much more to say...

If your looking for a free game that you can complete, this ain't the game. I'm never going to complete this game now *cries*

I am enjoying this game and after the update I got some of my quest rewards but there are still a few unchecked quests. Anyways, can't wait to see what else you have in store!
The game has a great premise but the rewards on rooms etc compared to the price of everything is astonishing. It's very obviously designed to persuade people to purchase more cash.

I just lost almost all of my progress in this game it's making me start over in the first hotel after weeks of playing and I even had some of the luxury items. The second hotel is going backwards like I'm loosing progress in that one too. Very angry!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

It's a very fun game. I'm having issues with the stars I have maxed out everything on 2 hotels and only 4 stars, and 5 star on one.I have been trying hard. I have played this game for a long time. I want to continue playing, but I can't because I can't move on. You really not make it fun for a free player.

Superb fun, love the game. I have a suggestion, please consider allowing guests who are not staying at the hotel to patronage at the restsurants, spa, bars etc just like how we will go to a hotel for buffet etc in real life even though we are not staying there. Keep it up!

Good overall, bit annoying that you can't transfer money being made from one hotel to the other. I currently have about ¡ê200,000 on my first hotel and barely a couple of hundred on the second hotel. I don't mind the ads actually because I see that it helps you to grow your biz. X

Right from the start u already feel like u won't get nowhere without watching ads or buying stuff with real money. Only dumb people want to invest their money right from the start of playing some new games. Use brain pls.

Looks good for like a week but I'd so repetitive it's unreal. No new challenges and the same boring sluggish start to each hotel. There only so many days I can spend watching 5 million ads to get money to actually build up my hotel. Once you live to s new hotel you start from scratch .. no money nothing! Stupid. U should be able to carry over money .. so Ur basically left with a huge hotel that you can't afford to run. Stupid stupid stupid

Everything costs so much money to upgrade and even when you watch ads to give you a cash boost the offers are so low theres no point even watching the ads. Can you please fix this because I really enjoy this game. And also I've got to the 3rd hotel but yet when I come back after 2 hours most of my rooms arent filled please can you fix this.

UPDATE: This is a pretty good game, but major complaint is that the open times for your extras like bars, restaurants, etc. are off and they can go largely unused by your guests. Otherwise it is fun, but there needs to be more. I have played for like a week and a half and I am just about done with all the hotels.

Its a great improvment over other games that were already pretty good idle games. Not only are the different locations different (rather than just adding one room like previous games) but its visually better in terms of the people not being little pegs and actually walk around doing stuff. Id rate it five stars but i miss how in previous games the VIP guy would some time offer the special currency in past games so you wouldnt need to pay for them.

Good play. Honestly this game is for people who will actually put time into a game. Believe me though' its pretty realistic; pays out employees that working the hotel, hire and fire people, add more rooms, decor etc. . Once you remove the ads tbh youare pretty much "game" meaning ready to play proper without frustration but I guess it's like that for every game . We hate ads sometimes nhahaha

Unfortunately, I had to bring my rating to one. Lately, when I open the game and look at my earnings they are great. Here is the kick: When it goes to the hotel after I hit continue, none of those earnings are there. Please fix. I do not see the point in playing otherwise.

Amazing game! I definitely recommend it for people who enjoy idle games. The ads are completely optional, the game is very fun and addictive, and there's so much to unlock. I really don't have anything to complain about.

Good game, but things get harder as I barely get money and the costs are so high, i am ok with it as it is a challenge for me, but the vip customer that comes to my hotel, when i click him, the ad does not load hence i lose their free money, that is the only tension and reason I have! Thank you

Well I was really enjoying this game until I hit a PAY WALL! Only 3rd resort in and I must spend a substantional amount of REAL MONEY or I will never be able to get past the Blue Resort! Really sad as I truly enjoyed this game. Time to uninstall. Developer..YOU DO NOT NEED MY EMAIL ADDRESS as there is NO NEED for additional information! To complete the level you need to purchase ALL premium items for each room and as you MUST BUY the currency with real money; this equates to a pay wall!

unbalanced, hard startup, when you first begin run the hotel, you need enough employee but cant got customer and they dont give you enough money for pay the wages. Dont waste time on this, there are more hotel tycoon better than this over there.

I like the game, but the new temp hotel is pointless to try unless you spent real money. No amount of ad watching will get you the reward. You may also need to open your game all the time as offline money doesn't count.

Yeah the game is very good i think if the things of the game could be 3D type then it would be more better for me more over i would like to look around the city in which my hotel exist like map and there should be a chareacter that denotes me and there should be some free land area from where we can build our hotel with the game money and do all expences what need to make it a hotel like eletrical wiring etc which will be visualise etc so this is only my review thats all thak you.

Great game! Wonderful way to pass 20 minutes at a time. Not a fan of the maddening amount of ads you have to plow through to progress, but that's expected from everyone nowadays.

Originally, I rated this game pretty high but with all the bugs? Not worth it. Game straight up took my 5$ for the event boost 1 pack, froze, and gave me nothing at all. The money was accepted and I was charged, but nada. Not worth the time or money.

Fun but needs work. None of the upgrades work at night. It also makes you watch 30 second videos for "game cash" only for you to never actually get paid the cash. Endless ads for nothing. Concept is great tho.
Too many ads to watch if you want money. Too much to upgrade anything. When I have an hour to save I come back and I'm in the whole. Uninstalling right away waste of my time.

I love this game buy the works have to leave so early they should leave maybe the same time the front desk leave or a hour before. Graphic is nice, i like it But there is a big problem that bothers me Sometimes i dont get double profit after watched ads, if so why i still choose to watch the ad and get nothing? Please fixed it, these problems happened when the amount was big, same with dancing VIP
Cool game to spend time before bed, commuting, in the diner, basically anywhere you can't use your PC. Decent progression and depth, and quality made animations.

I really liked this game its everything tuibg you want for a casual game experience My one problem was the events Im playing the current one as of 9/3/20 and I played almost non stop for liek 3 hours and I've only got about 80,000 which isn't a lot considering you start with 50,000, and one of the rooms is broken where it always looks dirty and needs cleaning but people still use it so that ain't a problem If mabye the next event is a bit easier I will give 5 stars

It's a good game but I have to watch multiple ads just to get money all I'm saying is that we should be able to earn more money than we already have I would give you a 5 but some of the stuff in the game is idk how to explain it but let's just say you only allowed 2 singles bedroom and multiple of double bed rooms but the thing is... well in my opinion I think we should be able to get more single beds they're heaps of people coming in the hotel couples and multiple 1 person

Money hungry developers This game was fun to start with, but after a few days of playing it just becomes the same old. Its hard to progress in the game without actually spending your own money. Ads are constantly in your face.

I love many types of Idle games, yet this one has to be my favorite. I can't keep myself from playing this game. I love how you have to actually hire employees and pay them wages. I also love that you can upgrade the different items in the different rooms into many different varietys.

Yeah no this game is terrible, it will not allow you to double your earnings and if you close the app it won't give you your money while you were away at all and sometimes when the guy comes in to give you money for watching an add, you will watch the ad and not even get the money, save time dont play this

It a great game but you guys should make it a way to move profits to other hotels since you are managing all of them and you decide what to do with your profits. Quite a good time waster! I love the business and finance aspect to the game. The only gripe I have is how hard it is to earn money. For the first few hours playing the game I all but relied on the V.I.P. Otherwise it's a great game with a charming feel!
The game is fun when time needs wasted. Too many ads. You need to mix the ads up and not have the same 2 part ad for 10 days in a row and for every ad you watch.

Every time I go to play a video to get the cash to help get upgrade I watch the video but get no reward for watching it this has happened now three times on this game and I have lost count how many times on idle prisoners

Game is pretty fun and some of the glitches are pretty funny - naked guests washing themselves floating about whilst their shower is on in their room, guests floating around their room while in the toilet animation, guests sitting nowhere near a table whilst eating and sleeping guests planking in the walls. Some cons though - some upgrades are rather expensive and take a long time to get from the beginning and the game only keeps making money for your hotel for two hours after you've left it.

I used to love this game. Tried to play for the 1st time in a while yesterday. In the event when you click money above the desk it isn't added to your score so you basically can't play because you make 0 money.

Yeah, no. Every event, you have the option of spending more than $10 to get the VIP pass and make it so much easier to get 3 stars. Thing is, it's not permanent so the next event, you have to spend more money to get back the VIP pass. Greedy game creators.

Amazing game, fun, very good for people who like to take their time with a game, and honestly a very nice job and I dont think they need to change anything for me at least. I think its a perfect and fun game that I will definitely continue playing!!!

Used to love this game... Seems all Codigames don't get updates often anymore for new levels. Waiting for new levels for a number of there games, this one, police, tv studio etc... Such a shame as I also paid to have no ads in each and finished rather quickly :(

So much cool and fun to play this game. You don't need to decorate the entire room where u gonna put it. The only things that u have to worry about is the expense and the electricity, easy to play with.
It is a good game it is reward but yet at the same time challenging if you make the wrong move which you will make a few at the beginning but the game helps you on the path to a reward game
I'm really starting to not like this game. Everytime there's an event the 2x profit ads don't work.....this is really annoying. You only seem to care about the events now.
Game is good but you need to watch a video for all actions which makes it boring. You need to pay in order to stop videos and advertisements. If you are willing to pay, then you can play this game
Honestly. I love how challenging this game is! It took so long just to get 4 stars. Although once I figured it out, it wasn't all that hard. It's a pretty straightforward game.

Its a very nice and addictive game. Its a great time pass. I would request the creators of this game to add a few more hotels as i hv completed the game and want to play more of it. I would love to play a part-2 of this game. __

Fun game but game needs to raise its profits overall when your running businesses. Maxed out all my rooms with minimal employees and barely made ends meet. Only way to survive or grow is to watch ads or buy your way.
Changed phones and progress hasn't crossed over even though I was logged into Google game app with it, I almost of cash on in app purchases too. Not happy.

This is a food and fun game I do recomend it the only problem is when you get money you do not get a lot so I rate it a 4

I don't really like this game, I tried this game once But I didn't like it, I'm gonna try this game again and I'm pretty sure this game has changed atleast a little Bit, I'm only trying this game again Because most people give this game 3 to 5 stars.

I give 4 stars because this is a good game but there is a issue of ads i can't watch Ads during the game so please fix this issue
Very entertaining. I like you can't just blow through it, and it takes time to build, but not too long .

Brilliant game really enjoying it needs more levels some of my ideas to make game better add children and have family rooms add room service an swimming pool with life guards as staff add more room up grades more rooms many an conference room play airar for kids add an little gift shop the game has lots of potential and I like the way this is going and I know its version 1.0 as I don't expect that much from the first prototype can't wait for updates
Can't play any ads video after the newest update, VIP campaign ads video also can't play. Those VIP with fancy car is not coming.

What are game, it's kind of giving us the power to make our own business decisions and I love it for that, but my concern is, what the use of all the money you're are making from our previous hotels if u can't invest anymore on the hotels. You guys need to do something about it. Why can't I invest the money on the other hotels since it's mine.
Problems fixed! I look forward to more hotels

Addicting but repetitive... I really love this game, but I was super disappointed when I got to the fourth hotel you can unlock. It is exactly the same as the first hotel except that there are suites instead of single rooms and a disco. I would have liked a different lay out, or at very least more than just one different experience. It seemed like they copied and pasted and threw the disco in there to make it seem new.

This game is super addicting. There is really only one problem. Once you get your other hotels maxed out there should be some kind of way to utilize them. Like for instance a trickle of 1 gem or a certain amount of dollars toward the next hotel. Otherwise, this is a great game! Graphics are smooth to look at, I love the animation style. Ill drop that extra star when something gets added to utilize those maxed hotels!

This game is like all the other idle tycoon games where it takes forever to do anything. I'd give it one star BUT there is a specific ad you get a lot that skips through the ad and still gives you the benefit instantly! I love being able to collect rewards without having to suffer through hundreds of ads. I always jack up the double money to two hours and defile the investor each time. Hope they don't figure out which one ! :D <3

Good game, bad upgrades. I enjoyed playing even though it's a very short game. However, the upgrade to skipvideos but still recieve perks wouldnt work when I would sign in and click double profits. I would suggest paying for any add-ons. Don't need to upgrade to play but it takes alot longer with all the ads. Would be cool to have more than 4 levels too.

Game has a ton of potential, its fun to play and thats why I still have it. Why 2 stars?... its one of thooose games. The only way to really play for free, unless you like coming back every 30 minutes to stockpile as much money as possible, is to watch ads. Everything to disable ads is 5 times over priced. I could go and buy 2 full games for a console, for the price of ad relief in this game lol... Be prepared to watch endless ads if you want to enjoy it, amongst the bugs reported by others.

Lots of good things about this game. Played through last hotel. But there's issues: - some ads are malware, they open up websites automatically, can't be exited, and controls to close don't always work - rewards for watching ads (2x profit, taxi, dancing guy) don't always work - hotel has a limit you have to check on it every 2 hours. Ridiculous. Costs money to stay open. - total costs of all upgrades is over $20. It's not a $20 game. - no replay ability, no random events, no different paths.

I like this game, its interesting and fun, you dont run into many ads unless you want the 2x multiplier. I dont like that you have to watch so many ads to get the max 2 hrs (i.e. 1 ad = 10 minutes of 2x multiplier). I've already completed the game and I really wish there was more levels and different customization. Good idea, could be alot better with more goals for gems, and more levels and places. Please update with more levels.

About to uninstall. Played this game for a while now and have made it to the 5th hotel. The glitches have just gotten progressively worse. I either cant watch ads for boosts at all or the ad plays then doesnt give me the boost. Now, unless I specifically close the app when I'm done, time doesn't pass in game. I've lost rl days of income. Fix it. ____

I enjoy these games from Codigames. This one seemed like fun so I gave it a go. Had fun for a couple weeks ranking up hotels but now I'm at the end of the line. There aren't that many hotels to build as of the time of this review. Kinda feel like there could have been more. I get that there are a lot of design pieces involved, since every component of a room or service can be upgraded individually but I was left at the end of this experience wanting more.

I love the game, it's addicting to be honest. lol I was just in the middle of playing it but had to hop off to make a review because this issue has been very annoying to me for a while and it's the reason why I didn't rate it five stars. THE ADS! Not that there's too many of them because I will gladly watch an ad to get the investor money etc. but some of them are glitchy and causes you to miss out on extra funds for the game because it says that you didn't watch the whole ad when you did.

Fun game. Not totally idle - requires a little attention. Can play with or without real money. Plenty of optional ads for boosts. Also, havent crashed at all. A coupoe ads did freeze right before they completed. Minimizing the game and reopening got it unstuck and I still got my boost. Went ahead and paid the 11$ for no ads after a while, totally worth it.

The game looks nice and I like the concept but this has got to be the slowest moving idle game I have ever played. I can't make any progression because you make so little money right from the start and yet everything is expensive. Even watching ads barely gets you anything. Definitely needs lots of improvement.

Don't bother wasting your money for the removal of ads or anything else. There are only five hotels. It sucks because I had purchased the option for the general manager and the no ads only to come to find out there are only five hotels. Overall, the game is fantastic. It's very addictive and a great time killer. I just wish it would have stated that there were a limited amount of levels or hotels to be completed so that way I would not have gotten financially invested into the game.

The game is fun for a small time waster. The price of any of the add ons is just not worth it in my opinion. I was able to complete all 4 hotels to the 5 star in just about 2 weeks or so and I did not spend any money on the game. If there were more hotels this game would be much more fun. Also the game seems to glitch and not all of your ppl stay checked in, even if you are only gone from the game for seconds. The characters and their animations are cute, and well worth expanding the game for.

This is not like any other Codi game I've played. There really is some actual strategy to what you purchase/upgrade. Graphics are simple and cute, which is all you need. Being able to upgrade to a new hotel doesn't mean abandoning your old one, as you have to still take care of the old ones. The only gripe is that the tutorial is a little lackluster. I did not know I had to wait to save enough money to add a new room and make sure you keep enough money to pay your staff!

Good game. Really enjoyable. The only reason I've not given 5* is because when you've fully upgraded your hotel and move onto the next one. You have to start again from scratch. You can't use any money you're making from previous hotels to help. So all the money youre making is just sitting there getting bigger because you can't invest it in the new one. Which is really annoying as I could use that 2,000,000 to improve the hotel I'm currently on instead of it just sitting there doing nothing.

Kinda boring. New hotels are slow to release and not as fun as the early ones. The weekly hotel has been the same sine the start of the weekly hotel challenge so that's boring too. I'd like to keep playing but I need something new.

Various hiccups alobg the way, but I understand this game is work in progress. Love the concept and the graphics. Don't mind the ads to boost things. You don't have to watch ads, the process is just faster. I don't mind that the money isn't transferred over to a new hotel, as it slows the game play down. Waiting for more upgrades and new locations, as now complete. Looking forward to it though.

Really nice game, but sometimes you watch ads to get some coins, but after the ad is finished you didn't get your reward. Sometimes also struggles to start the ad if I want to play it. Just some general bugs like that need to be fixed. Also I feel like you should be able to still do sth with the hotels you achieved 5 stars with. They seem useless to still be there. Also Events seem really unachievable without spending money.

The game is nice and it somehow simulates a real hotel business. But sometimes the upgrade menu stuck (can't close). I suggest to add more characters (people, car, etc.) for immersion. I think it will be better if there is a wide variety of ingame units. Looking for further updates! Good job!

Decent all round if you like these management types of games, the animations are funny, like when the people use the toilet and their face goes red, hours of fun.... One downside is the ads (like any other mobile game now), to progress anywhere in the game at a good rate requires watching a lot of adverts. You can remove the ads by spending a tenner, it's worth it if you plan on playing a lot and the developer is still bringing out new levels so you'll get good mileage from your money.

It's really refreshing to see a game that allows progression without the need to spend money. I did purchase the option to get additional rewards without watching ads, which isn't necessary but made the game more enjoyable. After 2 weeks, I've finished all available hotels and I'm very much looking forward to more additions.

I like the game, bought the ad removal. But the game lacks polish. I've had the maids bug out in rooms and not return to work. I had to quit the game entirely for it to resolve as when I fired all of them she still didn't move on. The dancing guy gives random amounts and it's quite annoying when things can costs Tena of thousands of dollars and he's coming in and only giving a few hundred bucks. There's no working offline mode, double profits on return doesn't work either. Upset I paid..

It is a good game though trust me I'm not saying it's bad but it needs improvement. However, the game encourages ad watching to get money as getting money through playing the game is unbearably slow so they push the motive of watching ads to progress and the upgrades barely help with making more money to progress, other than the watching of Ads to progress, the redundancy of upgrading items to progress, and how slow it is to make money, I still think it's a good game if they fix the problems

The game is great and super fun, However, The restaurant is always going in the negative no matter how much stuff that's being updated in the Kitchen. The only moments its not in the negative its when one is playing live. Also, there is always 2 bedrooms empty whenever going back to the game which is kind of weird and doesn't makes sense since when I leave the games there is a bunch of people come in. Those are my 2 biggest issues/bugs with the game. Otherwise, its a good game.

Really fun game to waste some time. Some improvements needed in the later hotels for holding more guests in the restaurant and other facilities, especially when you're able to build tables and chairs for everyone but the cook staff can only accommodate 10 guests, meaning you're losing lots of people who only wait on the queue for a minuet. Even though there are 20 plus chairs and tables empty. Maybe including actually table staff as well to increase the number of guests.

Please stop the 30 second ads! I fall asleep repeatedly waiting for ads to finish to get my reward and it feels like the majority of game play is ads. The super short ones are perfect. $18 to turn off ads is too expensive for what this whole game is worth! I will give 4 stars when the long ads are far and few between..., unless I lose interest in waiting for ads to end, first.

Overall this game is very good and I prefer it to their other title Gym Tyccon. I would have given it 5 stars but I think charging people ¡ê10 to keep their hotels active for 10 hours when the player is inactive is a little excessive. Edit: after unlocking my second hotel I've discovered that you cannot use the money that you've earned to upgrade the second hotel which I find strange and annoying. Wishing I hadn't spent money on the game now but oh well we live and learn.

Needs at least double the amount of hotels. The weekly event ones are the same .....money grab...... waste of time ....pointless. once you get past the first star it's easy money n just takes a extra 2 days to finish that specific hotel. The dev team for this games needs to add more challenging ones. Not enough listed either. Can finish them all in under 3 weeks.

This game is so addicting! At first it's really hard to earn money, but after you get some good upgrades, it's all good. I love how you can own multiple hotels and stuff. One thing though, Whenever I click on the VIP to watch an ad to get more money, it starts loading the ad, but then the ad stops loading and it goes back to the game without playing the ad. I don't get the money from the VIP and he just walks away. Other than that little bug, it's a very fun game. Please install.

Very slow game unless you want to drop $30, or more, upfront. Premium currency doesnt even let you fast forward time, or give you cash. It only let's you build some extra things in rooms that arent even that big of a bonus to your hotel. If you're a fan of watching ads instead of playing a game, look no further. If you want a game that you can actually play, look elsewhere

This game is just what everyone asked for when searching hotel tycoon or sorts, but there is some problems :v first I really really wish I could play this offline because I have some powercuts and sometimes are busy and would like to play this game offline, of course you can't watch ads or anything but I don't mind.The second problem is after finishing the first or any hotels you don't get to use the money, you restart and I want some solution to that. Anyways best hotel game yet thank you.

It's not very engaging to play. Spend money to upgrade. Exit game for hours. Go back on and upgrade more. Hit yet another wall. Wait hours. Upgrade etc.... ads don't get you very far either. Overall a waste of time.

Needs more levels as in hotels. The restaurants dont seat enough people and the game doesnt record money if the app is left open on the phone so hours could go by and those profits are not recorded. Great game otherwise. It's pretty has a simple user interface which is lovely and the goals to complete are enjoyable. The goals are limited unlike other games

Great game until you complete the second level. No way to progress past the second hotel without a forces in game purchase. I'm not sure I understand this concept with the current in game ads. Having the ability to watch adds for in game currency is a plus, I think this works well. Confused as to why your forced to perform in game purchases when your already provided the option to watch adds. This is obviously profitable for the game creator, why not just continue this concept for progressing?

Ran into 2 issues; if you quit the game, the game removes guests from your hotel, and ad campaigns will never keep your hotel at max occupancy while offline. Tested multiple times, from a full hotel, quitting and immediately logging back in, suddenly 5 rooms were empty, and not even the highest ad campaign kept my hotel full, not even the starter one. Wouldn't had a higher rating otherwise. Also issues with UI bugs and some upgrades not granting additional income.

This game is very fun. You don't have to play the whole time and there are no so many ads. The only thing that bothers me is when I finish one lvl or I get one hotel to 5 stars, when I start another hotel I have no use of the old one. I hope there will be an update which solves this. Again this is no critic it's just my subjective opinion, the game deserves 5 stars.

Love the game! Great to pass the time with, and enjoyable when I reopen and find some extra profit in my bank. I highly recommend paying to do without ads. It's painstaking to watch the ads, just to better advance in each hotel, so I found money well spent doing without them. Wish there was more to do after maxing out a hotel however, than to just watch the bank incease.

Everything's good for me except for two things. First, is It pushes you to do tasks. I'm saving money but it keeps telling me tou buy this and that __. Maybe program it as a suggestion or a reminder but not a mandatory thing. Second, the game can be played offline. I think it is absurd that you need to be online to get the rewards. __

Hey I was enjoying it but when the ADS start freezing on the business guy that gives you chunks of money. That's extremely annoying. I can get past the 30 second ads, but freezing and having to reset the game and losing out on that chunk of money, is a 1 star for me.

First of all I'd like to say this game is pretty enjoyable and not at all time consuming. Its a game you open for a couple of minutes a day just to upgrade. However it's a little bit secretly pushy when it comes to irl purchases, giving you unrealistic event goals to purchase progress and often informing you that you're one click away from 2x ingame currency. Otherwise a good game for when you've got 5-10 minutes to spare

Love this game. Nice and calm. Wish there was an option to prestige previous completed hotels. There's no point in returning to once complete. Great game but once you've completed it, it's pointless. Would love to be able to prestige to get higher returns on the hotels

Quick but fun game... did sink $20 bucks into this game. It was fun but short lived imho. I played this for almost a month before finishing all the levels. Would love to see more levels. Tweaks of the cafe is needed across all levels. It is fun watch all the people move around the hotels. My favorite hotel is the Xmas one.

So I was throughly enjoying the game up to 3rd hotel and then when I clicked to watch an advert for some extra cash after the advert I did not receive my cash. After this happening a further 8 times I uninstalled and re installed. I have no lost my entire progress annoying me even more but the problem with the adverts have still continued. Throughly disappointed as I really wanted to reach the end

Honestly think people are too hard on this game. Its actually really fun and the fun is dependent on not transferring money into other hotels. You have to work from he bottom for each hotels with a little I incentive at first to kick start it. Can earn more money from watching ads and I like this feature because it's completely up to you if you want to view the ads or not. Fun game over all. I've gotten 5 stars in 4 hotels so far.

Fun incremental game. Detailed, smooth gameplay. Ads are used appropriately. 5 stars would be customizable color palates for each room + the ability to make your staff. Very good game overall __ I'm amending this because none of my video rewards are processing. The ads keep freezing and restarting my game which cause me to lose huge profits. Extremely saddenig.

Had to knock it down a star. The ads are no longer working (I've uninstalled/installed) and they are essential to clearing events. The screen just goes gray and you don't get to double your profits while away or in game play or get help from the money man.

This is one of my favorite games ever. I think it is very fairly made tycoon and it is an amazing game. I wish I could give this game five stars but there is however one problem with this game. In the hotel restraunt guests sit down and eat but they only use one or two tables out of the six I have brought and upgraded. I constantly have customers with the angry face and did not have a meal. This is a bug I would like to be fixed. I love this game and hope an update will come soon.

I actually really loved this game. Even spent money on it despite glitches like it offering tokens and not actually giving them. But then my phone died and all the money spent on tokens and all the effort into building 2 hotels was lost. It's making me start over and won't give my old game back even with it linked to my account. Huge frustrations. Please help

I really like the game at this moment, but there are some issues that have been annoying me really much, and the worst one being that when I click the double profit thing after being away from the game it doesn't actually give me the double amount. And it really annoyed me since I paid to not see ads

Hi the reason i gave this 4 stars is because i this game is the one i have been looking for it ticks all the boxes with the reallity aspevt however there are a few things that i feel could enhance this game even more and the first one being that the hotel should be that when the hotel is full then the reception should be closed. The second thing is that there should be more things that can be upgradeable in the hotels and also another great feature could be adding in more rooms.

Good game but then got glitchy, would give it 4 or 5 stars if the ads didn't constantly glitch out and not provide what you need to advance. I don't know if paying for ad free would solve it but I'm not going to gamble to find out. I wouldn't recommend unless they get the bugs worked out.

Hi, I really like this game alot and it's fun but what I don't like it is you need to play online and not offline. An other thing also there's a glitch that if I want the man money thing that if you watch an ad it makes money but I try want to click it, it all goes away. But that's all but without that glitch I would give 5 stars. Thank you -Annie

Highly recommend for tycoon gamers! Amazing fun! I love the user interface here __ easy to understand, cute symbols and I love the fact that the game didn't intentionally force player to watch commercials like other games. You can play in free mode but still nothing bother. It's smooth and player friendly and I spend more time playing! Actually all entire weekend lol. BTW I did purchase non-ads and it worth every penny.

I've completed the game in less than 1 month. A lot of things are in typo,such as wages for the staffs. in the third hotel you can have max 44 guests but max 6 guests in the queue for the restaurant it's ridiculous. Also the last hotel is a dissapointment. Nothing new, just a disco but the furnitures are all recycle from the previous hotels. The layout of the hotel is also boring, similar to the first hotel.

This game is fun. I like it very much but there are some issues that are making me not happy. Sometimes I watched the ads but I don't receive profit x2, money from investor or customer. Sometimes I can't even watch the ads. I just started a new hotel and really need profit x2 but didn't get it__

Well this game was fun until I opened another hotel and kept losing game money because it kept resetting it but keeping everything I upgraded. I would lose the patrons in my expensive rooms, lose the money and incur losses because I used the money I thought I earned to upgrade before it reset on me. Half the time the videos didn't even work.

Very good. Very few unavoidable ads. I'd suggest that staff training should be a thing; Cleaners should have better route finding with training; chefs should have higher customer capacity with training (so the seats can be filled). Add a waiters upgrade to reduce the eating time slightly. These can all be offset by profit margins. At the moment, the restaurants can be fully upgraded without nearly reaching either seating or customer capacity.

It's a good game, not a pay to win, you do have to grind though. I think they should add a prestige system when you finish a hotel though. Like after you get so much money at a fully upgrade hotel you get another floor. Great game though!

The game is a scam you can play the game up to hotel two then you can't buy anymore because you need 9 gold stars. So you can get 4 gold stars on each hotel but you need 9 to unlock the next hotel you can't complete any more tasks to get more gems so the only option you have is to buy gems to unlock next hotel. Also all this game is made for is to make money everything an ad or pay to not have ads or pay to have your hotel stay open. Very disappointed would have been a good game .

I actually really like the game, however I started noticing around hotel #3 that it didnt take in more than a certain amount of clients even if you had a lot of rooms available. Additionally the last hotel was a disappointment. They mixed designs from the beach hotel and the first one, I just felt like it was thrown together last minute.

Its fun, engaging, and informative. It gives a more accurate experience in running, managing, and financing your hotels and stall. With informative statistics, wages, and bills to be conducted and ran like a boss should. I really love it! ____

It's not a bad game just relies too much on the ads to upgrade and for only making money for each in game hour instead of paying for the room itself you waste money on the staff pay compared to the rooms itself. Besides being very slow to start and the power consumption being too out of proportion, it's not too bad of a game.

Can't stop playing it. You will love it. Go in upgrade get out. Makes you want to complete each hotel. You start out with a raggedy hotel. Then as you go each hotel has more amenities. Spas, pools, restaurant, bars and more. Great game.

Let me preface with the game itself is straight forward and could do a good job as a sporatic distraction However this game has flaws You only get 2 hours backlogged unless you pay ingame to expand it to 10 hours This game does have some annoying and frequent bugs: Ads will go black screen and force app restart People getting stuck in place when going to a closed services & requires restart Crashing during ads Pathing is unoptimized and in need of overhaul If you restart, you lose guests

The game is ok, but not sure if there's any point going back to a hotel after building all non premium items and completing all goals. Also can't forgive the lazy programming, sprites clip through each other and cars (my chefs are "run over" on arrival and everyone walls through parked cars).

Was fun to play from time to time. Now it keeps glitching. Watch the ads for double money bonus then it vanishes and the same with the amount of money. Now it's saying it can't connect to the internet when using regular data or wifi.

Game is fun but weekly event goals unachievable. Only way I see to achieve the top goals is to pay to win! I have maxed out all the hotels and have absolutely nothing to do with the game Dropping to 2 stars as they need to add more hotels or make the weekly challenge not the same thing every week

Cannot receive investment funds. The videos dont play out and you dont get the money. It annoying because it a really good game. But you cant upgrade fast unless you just dont play and go back to see how much you made to upgrade.__

If it was possible to leave a zero star rating I would. Since its updated the game stops providing ads after 2/3 hours leaving you to either uninstall and reinstall the game or watch a loading screen for hours. When you finally do reinstall it erases all of your progress over the last 2 hours. #Pissed

I simply love it!!!! It is not just like any tyccon it adds things that other games usually don't like having to pay wages and having to upgrade the rooms and services to make more money. It requires your attention every once in a while and i love that. 10/10

I love this game, I really do. The only issue I have is the ads almost never work and it becomes beyond frustrating because it's extremely difficult to progress without them especially on the events. Please do something to fix this.

Seems like it could be fun, but there is just too much asking for real money on every little thing. If you bought everything it would cost more than a playstation game and even then you'd still need to watch ads to progress. Just too greedy in my opinion.

Boring game, i usually like 80% of the idle games i play but this one is just entirely too grindy. Also, i dont know if im just missing something or the games messed up. I upgrade a sink in a room for it to earn $6 instead of the $3 i am currently earning. Then o go to the big stats where it shows all the income, and it only shows im earning $2.76 from that sink that should be earning $6.

I like the game,only problem is money from my other hotels should be able to be used on all the hotels.all my upgrades are maxed out on 1 hotel I should be able to carry the revenue to another.So I have a lot of money I can't use.I've spent real cash on this game but 10.99 for manager,10.99 for the dog and 4.99 are too much. Too high the game is NOT worth 26.00 I cant move to the third hotel because I can no longer get stars.I need 2 more. All tasks have been completed, I guess I'm uninstalling

Great game, love playing it and keeping up the only issue I would have which isn't a problem it's just how long it takes to get the business up and going the income isnt the best to start with butim sure it will get better as you go. But all over an awesome game definitely recommend

Urgh what is this??? You cant have a progress unless you watch ads and still some ads dont work. Also, everything is too expensive. Yeah the grafics, details, gameplay are realy good but it is impossible to play unless you pay a lot or watch ads in every a few min

decent until you get to the second last hotel where it pretty much becomes impossible to advance any further without saving ridiculous amounts of money. you upgrade things in the rooms and expect to get more money next time you go on the game but never do? probably going to uninstall as i'm just not progressing anymore

Impossible to play. Constantly at 0 money. Losing faster than can be earned. This is by default! No extra expenses other than ones game starts with. First housekeeper and receptionist should have no upkeep. It feels rigged to get you to pay for normal gameplay.

Was loving the game until I got to my 3rd hotel..game started glitching really bad, videos will not load, when you get out and go back later over half the rooms that were full are empty and the video for double profits does not give you what is promised. What is the purpose of being able to visit finished hotels when all you can do is collect money? You cant even take a portion of it to help with the others and all upgrades are done..getting boring and frustrating

Great game just a few hiccups. Like how it takes to long for the people to walk places so things close before they get there. Also I can have no vacancies, log out of the game and right back in within seconds and have 6 vacancies. Also it would be nice in the bigger hotels if the chefs could feed eveyone, right now its only like half before they either close or the guest deside it is too long to wait. Im full upgraded too. I love the extra cash you get for watching ads, and the double cash.

Way too many Ads..Also, I make so much money on my first hotel and even the prices of items at the second one are doubled, I can't use my profits and have to watch another ton of Ads to reach any goal, which still won't let me have 5 stars. Uninstalling.

It's a great game, but I would love to see some sort of money transfer between hotels. Like when you finish the first hotel it would be nice to transfer money from that one to any other of your hotels so you have the option of not being broke in the game the whole time. ^^

Last night the game was working fine, this morning it won't load. Loading bar goes full with the scrolling advice but it never enters the game. I've uninstalled and reinstalled and still the same. My Internet is fine but can't get in the game. I was really enjoying this game up until this point

Issue is when i play ads sometimes it triggers the ad to play and sometimes it is about to trigger the ad before it stop it from fully activating. So ill click for the ad to trigger to get money from the rich guy and sometimes the ad play sometimes it doesnt so I'm missing out on money that I should get for trying to play the ad. When I close the game and restart it fixes the problem. Then it starts u again randomly not playing ads.

I love the game however during my second event, the one with Boney Mars, I bought all upgrades and even spent the ¡ê10 on the presidential suites with roughly 3 days left to go. After 2 days i had collected around ¡ê160m. I left the game to gather money knowing I could double it when I returned. I returned to the game and my money hadn't gone up and I had only collected around ¡ê16k so I couldn't get the 3 stars for the event. Please fix or reimburse me. Will give 5 stars after it's fixed. Thanks

It's an alright game.very challenging but I love it. It would be cool if we could upgrade or add stuff to the completed hotel instead of earning lots of money and not being able to use it in the new hotels

This game is really fun and I Really enjoy playing it. I like that there are no pop-ups. The one thing that I find is annoying is that you have to add additional batteries for the power your hotel uses. Another thing is that you can't add more than two small rooms. Overall this game is super fun and intertaining. I would suggest it to anyone who is bored and needs something to do.

I love this Game! But... The problem is I have finished my first hotel, now what am I meant to do!? I have started on the second Hotel and it is slow going , everything is more expensive to upgrade ,so have to wait a few days to purchase items, whilst my first Hotel is still making Money and I can not purchase anything in the first Hotel anymore! So it would be nice if it was made possible so people that play this game could move their Hotel Money Over to their other Hotels Thank you

A super entertaining game.When I'm bored I can just get my tablet out and play it. The dancing king makes it much more easier to earn more money - CHECK IT OUT!!!! And the diamond items are really nice.I've tried out almost all these sort of games but this one is the best.You should definitely try it and it's super fun!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Codigames have done it again! I absolutely love all their games and this one is just as good if not better. I miss the prestige mechanic but there are multiple hotels to build. I'm still on the first one but can't wait for the alpine lodge. Great game, addicting, and can't wait for more updates.

userName: Bryce Gerard J. De Tomas (Random Person)
content: It's a fun game but when you unlock the Stanley Resort it becomes boring. I mean, after you finish the Codihotel, what will you do with the money? You won't be able to spend that money on other hotels, you can't transfer money between the hotels you own. If there's an update where you can now transfer money, I'll turn this review into a 5-star review.

It is better than others because it is a little harder but not to hard that you quit. And all the little things you can do in the rooms to upgrade is good for when you are bored. It's like a mind game like for if you want to save and by something that gives you big profit or to by something now for I very little profit. And the power generator is a good touch.

Can't get past the load screen after several attempts of downloading and reinstalling. Will just display the hints at the bottom of the screen. Let load for several minutes with nothing. Using a galaxy 10 with current update as of last week.

I just started playing 1 day ago and so far, I am enjoying it. The graphics are okay, the gameplay is fun and I like how you can earn money even when you aren't playing. The down side of this is it is for a limited time and then the hotel closes until you play again. Overall though I am happy with it and hope there is much more to be unlocked as I play more.

It's a simple game that lacks depth. You have no control over the layout of rooms and simply upgrade different aspects of rooms with no choice or variety between furniture. Your employees just walk out the second you have no money to pay them. It would be nice if we could get a loan or something and go into debt, similar to real life. I noticed a maid in the bathroom at the same time as a guest was using the shower which shows that the AI is pretty basic as well.

Literaly the best game i've ever played 1 year ago... but my phone broke and I lost all my progress... then, whe I got a new one, I couldn't find this amazing game so I was back then sad. So I got a new phone and I find it finally! And yeah I changed phones two times in a row just to get this game. I really recommend it! Keep going developers =)

Good game. A little too many ads, but its fine. My main problem is with the restaurant room. There will be several tables open, but the guests will for some reason wait until other guests finish the table they're at, and get mad and leave. Causing you too lose money. If you could fix this, that'd be great.
Won't let me watch ads. The button to watch the ad turns into a swirling circle and then the dancing man won't show up anymore. I tried to close the app and reopen it and it still doesn't work.

I've been playing this game for 2 days now and so far so good. I've already completed the first hotel and playing on the 2nd one now. But I don't understand why the money I accumulated on the 1st hotel could not be carried over to my 2nd hotel, it's my money. That I earned from my first hotel so technically it should be mine, right? And supposed to be my capital money for the 2nd hotel and the next ones. Please if you wish to update, this feature. The game is nice, just this feature is off :(

Better than the other Codigames I've played. This one has just that much more intricacy and character. I like that you don't wipe out your earlier hotels and get to keep working on them as you progress at other locations. Makes it feel realer. My biggest complaint is that the 2x multiplier only gets you a 10 minute boost at a time. I watch enough ads with the VIP guy and the instant sunrise; can't you give me an hour or so for the multiplier?

Played 5h, fun, cute polished game, but. You are not really managing a hotel just building it. The only thing you can do in the game is built rooms, a restaurant and a bar from a list. Nothing else, you don't manage anything apart from watching commercials. And boy i haven't watched so many videos in my life. It's like one video every 3 minutes. There is also something wrong with the the star system: built all rooms a full upg bar and a full upg restaurant, bam 2 stars

I really like the game! The ads, though many, aren't that bad. I am wondering what I do after I move onto the next hotel. My first keeps making all this cash that I would think my 2nd hotel could have access to, but instead it kind of sits and grows. I've maxed out all the upgrades too. Can I use that money somehow?

Good game. 'The crystal resort' kitchen needs to serve 30 people, or to the maximum number of tables available, too many times I watch A.I. go for breakfast only for 6 or more to turn away unable to get in, please do a new update to increase all kitchen serving limits in all hotels to fix this issue, thank you

Why can't I transfer the amount I made with the first hotel into the rest? With the new hotel the costs are super high for everything. Basically the developers want you to pay to make enough money to be able to continue playing the game. Sorry but though the start was good. After the first hotel you just simply cannot continue playing.

So far I am absolutely loving this game!!! I love that items change and look better as you upgrade them! So I have finished my 1st hotel, I like that you can go back to visit it, I just wish there were more options after you have finished it, to do more stuff to it!

This is one of the best idle games I've played so far. You don't need to spend real money to actually feel like you're progressing in the game and it doesn't take forever either. If you don't mind watching a few ads to get some more in-game currency, you can progress quite quickly without opening up your wallet. I like this game!

The game is quite good, typical Codigames idle game, the format works. My frustration is with the events. Every event my cleaners don't work properly and get stuck in the rooms, meaning I need to watch ads to clean my rooms as they are just stood there. Forever. I have contacted support several times, but no fix as yet.

Overwhelming ads ruin what could be a fun game. There are also irritating bugs and design issues. The housekeeping staff gets stuck. The double-money ads when you resume don't actually double your money. The events are impossible.

I love this game, I spend hours playing it and it's super relaxing but the thing is that I can't use the money I make in each station (hotels). It would be awesome if you guys could connect the money earned in each one of the hotels :) Thanks in advance!

I tried to email the issues that I found at the email address that was enlisted and it doesn't work.... It is a disappointing matter as I spend money on something that is not working properly. The issue is that there should be a way to manage the wages of the employees and is Not, and I got out of the game and when entered again the first hotel that I finished everything on it spending diamonds as well and had 5* gone back to the beginning with no star. Please fix or refund all money spend on it

Worked well in the first hotel but since I got to the resort hotel there are so many glitches. 2 rooms are always available, ads dont work, It is a struggle to get money to progess and why when I've completed the first hotel can i not transfer any money? Seems like such a pointless thing because I cant do anything with it. Please look into this!!

Love having a game where you can upgrade! It is awesome!!! My only complaint is that I wish you could cancel when the boss wants you to purchase the bar or a new room because I might 6001 dollars and it will call for 6000 and then I am left with a 1 which leaves me bankrupt.

I enjoyed playing this game a lot. I was a little disappointed when I received my final 5th star. I was at least expecting a "Congratulations, you've gotten 5 stars on all hotel's." But, sadly it did not. Game got way more fun after I purchased the Valentines day offer for $10. Now I'm looking forward to an update so I can build another hotel.

Great gameplay overall and, but when you get to 50 power, your forced to build a bar and also there are some who take pride in figuring out the game their way instead of the tutorial. This is my feedback.

Great little game. But, the fact that there isn't a few hotels available for when you finish the 2 that are already there means I've now basically finished it. Would also be good that if the income coming into the other hotel can be used as one account rather than oer hotel so if something needs built in another hotel the funds are available rather than waiting for ages.
Really fun. A bit more challenging than their previous idle games, but still easy enough to progress easily and without the need to purchase anything. I love it.

This is a very fun and addicting game. It's pretty easy to learn, and once you get the hang of everything, there is tons to do. The only thing I wish you could do is transfer money from one hotel to another. After I made it to the second hotel, the first one had been maxed out, so I didn't have anything to do with the money it was accumulating. It would be great to be able to use that money in the other hotels too. Also, I love the Dancing King even if I don't accept his services often, lol.

Fun game, but recently encountered a glitch - any time I exit the game and come back, it drops my guests from the current number to 16, and makes them all come out of their rooms to go to the restaurant even if it's 1 am and the restaurant isn't open... The ads are also no longer loading.

The game is definitely enjoyable, as I work in hotels. I'm more than a little disappointed with hotel guest AI, as the guests ALWAYS do the same thing everyday; wake up, go to restaurant, go to bar, go to other random outlets until they've visited them all, then check out. This would be more acceptable if the hours of operation of f&b and other outlets could be managed. Often guests try to walk in to closed outlets. And also they game's major check-in time is before guests check out.

Game is enjoyable for me mostly. An amazing amount of detail goes into the improvements for your hotels. Ads are almost required to get anywhere though in the game as earning money in a new hotel is extremely slow and I had difficulty breaking even on profits AND upgrading the hotel without watching many ads. Once you get enough for another hotel, there's really no reason to go back to the previous hotel as no earnings are transferred between them. Not a lot of replayability in that sense.

Another awesome game by these guys. Still there is one thing I hate and it's the UI. There are so many buttons that clog up the screen. Like there being 4 buttons for pay to win stuff. A calm little quasi-sim game with decent graphics and low-stress gameplay. I did buy the no-ads upgrade, though, which is kind of essential. Otherwise you're bombarded with opportunities to watch ads and the game's a chore to play. Think of it as a demo and once you "buy" the game it gets way more enjoyable.

It's addicting!! I like it but wish I could do more than 2 levels without having to pay real money to advance. I really enjoy newrly all of the idles they offer. Love how my hotels upgrade in looks with each of my upgrades. It really keeps me coming back to play this and their others. The gameplay is nothing gr8. In order to progress they have 15-30 sec ads you can watch to gain $ faster. The trouble is most of the time you wont get the promised $ after the ad. I just purchased the bar and have enjoyed the game so far. There is a nice balance of idle and online management. You can open the game and do a few upgrades, start different advertising and get some offline bonuses in the span of 5 to 10 minutes. If you've got more time, you can play the game for upwards of an hour and still have things to do and tasks to complete.

Hotel Empire Tycoon is one of the best idle games I've played since it's just so satisfying to manage your staff and grow your hotels. But the ads aren't something to ignore, since calling the ad boosters appealing would be an understatement. The game has an amazing base but it's bogged down by a cripplingly slow progression, especially at the start, like most idle games nowadays.

The game is good, but i dislike how when a hotel is 5 stars there is nothing left to do with it. Otherwise, the game is pretty good. Upgrading everything is pretty fun, you have to invest money pretty wisely and you also dont have to watch ads often.
