I've really enjoyed this game. However I give it 4 stars as 1) I have completed it and there is literally nothing left for me to do on it and 2) it would be great if you could actually choose the decoration? Like the room colours etc as the final product of the rooms look messy and nothing matches and it would just add another string to this bow.

Its a fun game and a good time waster, I don't even mind the adds all that much, but there needs to be a fix in the AI at some point that either lets the guests tell what time it is or the limitations on number of guests using the facilities needs to change to reflect open seating. Guest pathfinding breaks down in higher levels and half of them never end up using the attractions so even though all of them are required they're not actually worth it to include :/

Like the game a lot, but umm... Where is the rest?! Finished the four hotels in well under a month... paid for the two ¡ê10 upgrades - no ads (every 10-15 seconds was driving me insane!) and hotel open of ten hours idle - and frankly feeling somewhat cheated! In terms of gameplay, pretty good graphics and good range of rooms to build. Needs to have interaction between hotels, as once at 5* never need to visit again.

Its a fun game. But i've been stuck on the newest hotel and havent really played in a while as clicking one upgrade freeze the game for several seconds, and if you tap it go up multiple levels, it freezes and sometimes your taps dont register. Would be great if the lag or freezing could be patched in the next update, maybe then i'll be playing it again, especially since i've paid real money on this

Not a bad game but prices to upgrade or build something are quite high, you have to collect enough money, if not your staff quit and so on. And sometimes the ads freeze or don't play at all, you lose the chance of collecting money from them. Fix this please!! Also i wish the money from other hotels could be used in the one i'm expanding.

Really fun, needs more content. Finished the game, no more hotels to upgrade. Fun to do the event time to time, but kind of pointless to get the rewards since i have no hotels to upgrade. Event hotel is always the same Lots of repeat furniture throughout the games hotels. Overall gameplay was fun, i love the art syle and i had a lot of fun completing, it just needs more content.

I enjoyed the game. I disliked the third resort (due to placements, spacing and general price for stuff...). Currently finishing the fourth/last hotel, which sucks since I enjoy the final hotel. If you don't have the x2 purchase, i feel this game would be way to much work to keep up. I had all 3 purchasables, and enjoyed the expenses addition (played many idle games similar, but this was a first for expenses). Overall, I had fun and hope they'll be future hotels added.

Very fun management game. There's just a little bit of exploration on the add feature, you have to watch way to many adds to have normal progress. It would be also nice if the game had Google play achievements, but that's just a personal preference of mine.

Seems like a pretty easy, great game. However, when I leave the game for a bit, then go back onto it. And the option where you click on profit x2, well I click on that, watch the add, it shows my profit has been doubled. But doesn't actually put it into my hotel game balance.
great graphics, love strategy component, enjoyable gameplay, highly recommend

I like the game, but it has quite a few a issues. Great example is that if you accidentally close or get a call ever for a second while you are launching a game you will lose your rewards collected while you were away. Also if you close (not even fully) the app your guests will change (often the most profitable room will suddenly become empty) and your daily earnings will drop. Some guests get stuck in your hotel for several days or new cannot come in even when there are empty rooms.

Great game, got hooked quickly! Only issues are there are literally only 4 hotels (have been waiting a while for more...), one of which is essentially a duplicate of the trainee hotel you have first and that you don't gain even a percentage of the profits from the previous hotels which in a hotel empire would really happen. Fix these two and so long as there are plenty of hotels I'll continue playing __
So far so good, very cute graphics and the ads are voluntary ( when I need extra cash)...that's hard to find..thank you.

Unfortunately the videos to obtain coins or new cust do not work anymore. You can use them once or twice and the you have to reboot the game..again and again. The event hotel is always the same so after doing it once there is no point in trying again. Unless the videos probs are not sorted I'll delete this game. Tried to send email but did not work. Bit poor and as it is today no worth the trouble to download.

Absolutely ridiculous event open for only 8 hours that is literally impossible to get rewards with unless you pay to have unlimited access to the event. Instead of wasting my time by pretending that you can finish the event without pay, advertise it as a paid for level. Already paid for other things, not being conned into paying for that. Just closed the app as a room was bugged and lost several thousand worth of progress. Going to try and refund.

Good game but I don't mind watching ads but there is far too many but now the game won't play any ads, they load up but then I can not select 'watch now's on the advert to watch it just throws me out to the game screen. Should definitely be able to use money made on older hotels across new ones! Just a few tweaks can make this game brilliant!

Really enjoying this. There's no pressure to spend real money. Progress is realistic yet a bit of a challenge to make it fun. Videos/ads are an option to increase progress but not a constant pop up type, which is great. Don't change any of these factors :)

Want to give a five star but 2 things bother me a lot. First is the bug where if i switch my hotel to the first one or just quit the game and reopen then the double bed rooms go empty even if there were people a sec ago before i switched. so that makes me go for loss for no reason. And second one is that after we upgrade a hotel to 5 star rating then there is nothing else to do. The money keeps piling up and that's it. We should be able to transfer funds to our newer hotel or give more upgrades.

Reall good game, exciting and challenging because you literally have to balance the expenses and more. It just got a little disappointing when I moved on to the 2nd hotel and can't use any of the money I earned from the 1st hotel lol, I don't get that. My first hotel has 5 stars already and there's nothing else I can upgrade __ while the other hotel of mine is running out of funds ______

The game, whilst enjoyable, has a considerable bug. When changing hotels or exiting the game to "idle" the hotel seems to lose a number of guests. This is rather frustrating if you think you've left in a good state to not. Also ¡ê10 for removal of adds is extortion- had it been ¡ê4.99 i might have considered it.

I think there could be a little more to the game. It just doesn't offer much to really distinct itself from other games like it as much as it could. The game has gotten a better I like the addition of new hotels. However it would be cool for the old hotels to be of some use or you could do something cool with them. once you upgrade everything there is no real reason to go back to older hotels even though it is an option.

The game is good, it proves a bit of a challenge in the beginning. However every time i click on the double my coins when i get back on, it never does. Also the x2 that you watch videos for doesnt actually give u souble the money either. The game is good but fix those issues then it could be better

Fun game at the beginning, be aware that you will end up play for 1 minute for then watching a 30 seconds ad... constantly. Once I finished the first hotel, I found repetitive to start building another one, and I wish I could use the money from the previous one. Anyway, good game made unplayable by too many ads.

Always dreamed of running a hotel, this makes it fun and easy. Great for setting up and letting it run, and for budget management skills. Having to create your own electricity doesn't make sense and is expensive and delays progress, otherwise would have 5 stars.

Love it , please add a upgrade shortcut button. Towards the end of upgrading it so frustrating going in upgrading everything one tap at a time and then rinse and repeat. It would be alot better if their was a upgrade all shortcut tab or something. Other than that very great game , good job!!!!!

Of all the tycoon in codigames, this one by far is the most challenging and i like it for that. This game is a little specific when it comes to upgrading something in the game, you eve need to uprade even items like tv, the bed etc., Instead of just uprading rooms. The downside is, when youre hooked with it and youve made it far already, ads arent enough, you need to start paying real money just to get ahead. Its dissapointing.

The game is honestly pretty good and addictive. The problem is the constant crashes from the ads - it's quite maddening, actually! Please fix this because I want to keep playing without losing my sanity from having to reload the game all the time. Thanks!

I was on my third hotel, had loads of cash etc. Then my game started crashing on startup. I uninstalled/reinstalled and it took me back to the tutorial. I have my progress saved to the google account :( rip me Also it's incredibly slow to make money, you have no choice but to watch all the ads. Frustrating!

So far it's pretty nice but still a little confusing on how to get some of the challenges done. Such as the wordings used to describe things in the game to be upgraded confused me. Either I'm hella uncultured or the names just don't feel right to call it that. Either way really nice game and people should give it a go and see how far they get.

The finance expert rarely works; It will not let me watch an ad to earn extra money, it automatically closes it and he walks off. It takes forever to accumulate money & upgrade. You have to watch an ad, but it only gives you 2x profit for only 10 minutes.

Very long winded, after completing one level you have to start all over again, you cannot create an empire, only way to get anywhere is to watch lots and lots and lots and lots of adverts or spend lots of hard earned cash, especially on the events which is even worse,

Well Im addicted! First off there are so many ads but absolutely worth the payout. Graphics are good too! Down fall is I didnt want to open a sevond hotel begore I had the first one completely furbished with all checks. If that makes sense. Other than that I really do love this game!

I loved it but it was slow. I had to purchase the ad Remover in order to progress better. I finished the entire thing today so I definitely wish there were more hotel that didn't use the same design from the previous ones. Liked seeing more unique amenities.

I enjoyed it. The main thing is how sllooowwwww it is to earn money! I would have to always click on the dancing guy to get enough money to upgrade. Earning diamonds is hard. I feel like this game was me watching ads most of the time! It's a pointless tycoon games. I'm going to uninstall for sure.

Quite slow in the beginning to collect money. You need to persevere by watching ads. Things will pick up after you have build enough facilities for guests, just need to take it slow and easy. Games like this are not for thrills and excitement, like most building games.

I look forward to any new hotels they add. It's a game that takes patience to earn enough money. It's not a pay to win game but paying the once to permanently remove ads is worth it, just don't uninstall the game. Cons are that you can't use money earned at previous hotel at new one & there aren't enough tasks that reward enough gems to get the all the special items. Special Events are impossible to do unless you pay sadly

Awesome game, few issues though. Yes, there has to be some sort of dynamic whereby you have less than 100% occupancy. However, this is impossible given the amount of visitors, and if you watch the hotel you always get 100% occupancy, but if you close the app then come back, it's 2am and 3 rooms are magically unoccupied. Also, some of the ads don't pay just through a glitch, the Seven Seas ad never pays, and most ads are for apps like Mistplay. Check their reviews on TrustPilot.

Yes this game is great but Why I rated it 3 stars? Because It took couple of minutes for me to be in the game Itself. I was still in the entry which is the one that just shows "hotel empire tycoon" and has some tips at the bottom. It was challenging my patient but I got irritated because it happens most of the time. Idk if my phone was the problem or the game itself.

This game is a fun idle game. There are some ads, but you dont have to watch a whole lot. I do because there are ones that give you cash bonuses so you can progress faster. You have to be smart about your investments because you can end up losing money if you dont make smart decisions. Fun game would reccomend.

The game is super fun and addicting I just really wish there was a way to not have to watch a thousand ads without spending $10 on the ad free version. That price should be much cheaper because no video game is worth $10. Many app creators make amazing games but ruin them by loading them up with ads.

I've been playing this for a few days and so far I think everything is on a good pace! Not too hard to level up, it takes some time but wasnt to that point that made me want to give up. Graphic is cute, music is fun, difficulty level is well planned. Really enjoying the game!!

Well this is a game here gentlemen. Great graphics. I love the way the environment get changed by the upgrades. I think it can't get better. I just unlocked the second hotel btw. Excellent work. 5 stars from me. Hope you make more games like this peace of art!

Giving this game 3 stars might be a little harsh. It's a good time killer and the concept is fairly simple. However, it seems to take forever to grind money to make your hotels better and then all of a sudden you have more money than you need for it. What's the point in previous hotels continuing to make money you can't use? Great concept. Should be a great game but it's just not there yet.

It's a fun game. I experienced no technical difficulties. I purchased no ads. Since I finished it, I wish there were more hotels, or a way to restart the game (I can't currently do so and keep my no ads purchase).

Middle of the road idle game. Graphics are nice and smooth. Growth is challenging in the beginning. Ad incentives are very weak compared to other games. Additional money, double revenue, and more customers rarely if ever impact your gaming experience and are removed when you close the game.

I really like it. But srsly the chopping sound is so annoying. Like, one star less cause of how annoying that ONE sound is. I okay my game muted now. Otherwise it's lots of fun, I don't mind watching the ads when it's presented like this and I can play free. Charming mechanics and graphics. Except for that annoying chopping sound. Ffs.

I really enjoy idle games, but they usually don't hold my attention. That is not the case with Hotel Empire Tycoon. Granted, I paid to have the ads removed, but I have spent hours on this game and the ads were optional boosts before I purchased, so I didn't feel any pressure TO buy. I have maxed my hotels and got enough bonuses to get neat little editions in each hotel by meeting my goals. Didn't spend a dime on those. I am looking forward to their next update.

Decent game. 3 stars because they want you to spend real money to hire a manager. Would be better if could use the money u makenin the game to do so like in other idle games. And u have to watch an ad for absolutely everything. Yes ads keep it free but shouldn't be for everything that will give u extra money. Which u need Alot of to upgrade things or ad rooms... But over all it's ok.

ADD MORE LEVEL PLS.... it's very addictive, I'll just be playing for hours but the only problem that I have is that there aren't enough levels. There should be more rooms and there should be a hotel where it has all the rooms( single, double, suite) and a bit more of attractions. Merci __

Took the paid upgrade version and as a hotelier can totally relate to the game. Really well made. One suggestion is to give an option to speed up the game with a fast forward button like Rollercoaster tycoon. Otherwise, I'm definitely enjoying.

Pretty good but it has a few bugs. Such as whenever you sign the deal with the travel agency it has you watch two adds not just one but other than that it is ok. Additionally do the event hotels get easier as a free to play later or ar the event hotels sumthing you have to buy to do well in I am asking because I completed less than 1 percent of the first star.

This is my first (and probably only time) giving an idle game a 5 star review. The game is challenging yet completeable. Also the key asset of not ads makes the game enjoyable but not dull and boring. The upgrades actually detail what they do as well as really giving you an understanding of how important they are. 10/10 awaiting the next couple of hotels to be created.

I would give more stars but there is a severe Limited playability. Even though they have a continual weekly hotel to play, it is not only the same hotel over and over, but they lock the ability to build any of the Presidential Suites. Paying for them completes them instantly but takes away the fun in building. Since this is a building game, the option for building them with the in game cash should STILL be an option and NOT ONLY for pay-to-play! Also they need to randomize the weekly design too

I remember playing before but it seems my old gameplay didnt get saved but that doesnt bother me. What bothers me is how cluttered the screen is. Please move "event available" "shop" and "VIP" off the screen. Maybe move it into a menus option along with settings and google play

I've only started playing but I'm really enjoying it. It's not easy money making. But a great challenge. The offer of free cash after watching videos is fantastic. Graphics are cute. I love that updating items makes them look different.

Can be fun at times, has a slow startup. A few critiques: guests should leave the hotel at times, perhaps a visible mall or store. When starting up, they stay in their room or walk around to closed places. 2nd, chefs should accomodate 4 customers otherwise, lazy chefs and a lot of empty tables, plus split guests eat with random guests. 3rd if you close your phone with a level running it stops collecting money on that level till you turn the phone back on, this has happened several times.

The game is good! Though I paid for no ads. My only issue is that the booster pack only lasts for ONE event and won't carry over to the next. I don't want to have to just repetitively buy the booster pack. I just don't have the money to be forced to do that just so I can get even a STAR for the new manager.

It was a fun game until the most recent upgrade, now there seems to be a lot of bugs and it takes forever to make money because 95% of the times the videos for double income doesn't work. I bet the advertisers wouldn't appreciate that people arent viewing their advertisements because of bugs in this game.

Fun game that has been eating a lot of my time up. Ample opportunities to progress by watching short videos instead of paying money which is fair and unobtrusive. The hotels are neat, art and style is cool, and it's relaxing with a little bit of challenge to make your hotel profitable by balancing upgrades, staff wages, etc.

I really like the game, but I have one complaint, even though it is an Event Hotel if I pay $10.99, I should be able to keep it on my phone and see my profit and travel to and from that hotel. Once I realized I can no longer see the hotel I stopped paying my money for them, the Special Managers are not much of an incentive in my opinion.

Always loved codigames's games. But this one seems to be the slowest to progress. But i love the idea that you get to upgrade small details and parts of the hotel, which is very entertaining to see what will change, hope they speed the pace it a little bit more.

A lot of fun! Though it would be nice to have a confirmation button when purchasing items for gold. Imagine being able to move items around and selecting from a variety of 1st grade to top tier items! Little suggestions for future updates maybe? :) Loving the game so far!

Thought the game would be fun, boy as I wrong! Wouldn't let me watch one video, for xtra cash. Takes away from the fun and makes it very hard for your cash to add up and to be able to upgrade anything what a big disappointment... I'd give less than a one if I could. Don't waste your time with this game..

Its too early in the game to really see if simething goes wrong. I've only been playing for 2 days so far and the game is fun. The only thing I thought is a little off is when I played last night and got up in the morning my game was still on night time mode __. Had to watch a video to make it morning, lets see how lkng morning will stay.

Maxed out upgrades and still haven't met star requirements, seeming free play may be impossible. I don't understand why prices for everything in event hotels is more expensive. The event goal is impossible to reach on free play, so don't bother trying. Also, what is the point in continuing to collect profits at old hotels once upgrades are maxed out as finances aren't shared to new hotels. It would be great for free play if funds were shared given the point of the game.

Awesome game! Super addictive and you can progress at a good place without having to spend real money. No pop-up ads, you choose whether you want to watch for a reward. If you do choose to watch, the game rewards you quite nicely and helps speed up progress.

This game is pretty fun and I don't really mind the ads. They get you free money to expand your hotel. The only bummer I've run into is you can't transfer money from one hotel to another. Once you've completed one hotel, it keeps making you money that you can no longer use. There's nothing left to spend it on in that location. It would be pretty neat if that money could be put towards expanding the new hotels so it's not totally useless. Other than that though, the game is pretty enjoyable.

We aren't allowed to use the cash earned from first hotel. You always need to start from the bottom starting a new hotel! Is that what actually happens in real life? Seriously disappointed. If they'd fix this, then this game can beat every other tycoon game here! Yes it's damn good but this little feature seems to be an annoying thing, it's more like they want us to watch ads every time you open a new hotel.

Love the game its amazing a little slow paced at times but it keeps you coming back. A few suggestions, a space themed hotel and a rebirth type thing or an option to reset your level so you can start at the beginning if you chose. I love all codigames they are well made and fun to play thankyou for making them

It's very interesting, at times it can be a little bit overwhelming how slow it is to get cash especially when you have to keep it high enough to pay off all the workers and stuff. Overall very realistic and smooth though if you know how to use the bonuses with the ads.

Review edited. I've completed all 5 hotels only to have the app updated and find another hotel that's on an event, and they only gave you 48 hours to build up a minimum of $10,000,000 to get 1 star __ And per usual they charge extortionate amount of ¡ê10.49 to help you achieve what's required.. now I don't mind paying real money but only if the prices was half the amount they ask for like ¡ê5. Further more they don't give enough money to start off with and the game is very slow and very tedious

Its a little slow loading the firdt time but everything else is great! Lots to do. You dont get money fadt but steady like a real hotel. You must be smart on uogrades to make a profit. I wish there were other ways to make extra money besides ads but I understand tjis is the developers only source of income.

A fantastic game to pass the time! I love it. I absolutely love it. My only issue is the Event Hotel: It claims you can "win" managers, but I can't seem to win them no matter what. The only way I can see you "winning" them is if you pay for the boost pack. So that's a scam. But I still love the game. __

mm...half finished game..the guests are like zombies, eat at the same time and do things at the same time. was expecting something like the crazy hosptial but instead, just upgrade and upgrading the same rooms...there are tables all over the restaurant and bar but people just line up...also one guy can only serve two people thats just strange..very poor setting. again half done and all advs

An easy game to do whilst needing a distraction. You don't need to purchase to play either which I love! The purchases are bonuses and may help but you can keep playing without. Most games aren't like that. I really appreciate this.

HORRIBLE - more like AD EMPIRE - can't even play bc it freezes on a grey screen.. how is the prison one so much better in setup and quality when this has the same creator yet (imo) a better concept ?? Kept pressing back from the grey screen bc there was no other option and nothing happens, why do I have to restart the whole app every time I play??? Also I click the ads to double the amount earned and it doesn't ever work.... #fraudulent

Love the game! However, after the 4th hotel. nothing :( I was bummed out that there wasn't more content. The last hotel seemed to me, rushed a bit. The furniture didn't match well when in final upgrade.. Just looked thrown together compared to the 2nd & 3rd hotel! Otherwise, Was fun to play while it lasted! Definitely needs more content and good content, not lazy content! - J_PIT_R

It is a very good time killer. I love how the game takes into account almost everything a real hotel must have. Adverts are not particularly annoying because they don't just pop up and only appear it you choose to watch it. It is ok to watch a few videos ina day to earn profits and stuff. Also a few rooms that were occupied whenip I left the game were sitting free when I can back, so pls fix this. Other than that it is very good game. Pls developers add some 3d camera for cool pov's pleaseeeeee

The app needs you to look at adds to have a stable hotel at the beginning but it's so addictive and chill to have in your hand as you watch youtube/slow movies. Would love if getting a new hotel would benefit from the ones before. Now at the last hotels it's like looking at the same gameplay but slower progress speed. Love the design, details and overall feel. Some changes would make this my favourite app

A very good game, but the offline time is very small. It will be great if i could have the 10 hours upgrade free please. I play all your games since few years and i liked all of them. I think this one is the best one, but like all your games the offline is too short and we need to watch a lot of ads to earn some money, and I think I gave already watched enough ads. Please let me have Lord Wilton upgrade for free to improve my game experience. ____

It's a time killer game, but unfortunately I can't give this game more than 3 stars because I did not gain any money even I already watched some videos. Please fix this, because playing videos also takes time and data. Also, I just wondering if we can transfer some money to the other hotel's account. It'll be great.

Love the game iv been playing it for 2 weeks and just finished santas shelter! Really really hope theres more levels in the near future!!!!!!. Yes lots of adverts but they do help but can be slighly annoying. I have only spent ¡ê10 in the game to get the offline manager which really does help with iver x2 or 30 gems for x3....

Really fun game so far. Sometimes the actions of the maids glitches out. Main thing that I think ruins this for me is that you cant use money from old fully developed hotels toward new hotels. Maybe just allow a certain amount to be used or have to spend coins to use the money depending on the amount. Will change rating if fixed.

I think I have played all of the Codi games and others like it but this is more than an idle game. You do not just gain money, you have to hire staff and pay their wages otherwise they will leave. You also cannot just upgrade at your leisure as you also need to build generators for electrical power to run the upgrades. I payed money to remove ads for rewards so I get instant rewards which is more value for money than some modern AAA games. They also keep producing content. I recomend it.

Are they making another level after little Camelot? A new level hasn't been added I'm quite some time. I love it. I've neary finished the last level __. Also when upgrading a room or entertainment area, the option to upgrade all thing by 1 level at once would be useful as suggested by another player in the comments
A very good game. A little heavy on the ads side, but at least watching ads in this game helps you and you are not forced to. The one downside would be the very expensive costs of permanent upgrades.

So disappointed with this game if you want to progress past the second hotel you have to spend real money could have been a fun time filler as it is it's a demo with 2 levels and even if you bother to spend money to unlock the rest it's only 4 levels altogether I have completed the first 2 hotels and will now uninstall because the game won't let you progress past this point I was enjoying the game until I realised this real shame

Much better than other trash management games like Civ, Sim City, and basically anything by Kairosoft. All of which are too hard, and boring af. In fact unlike that trash it's actually good. One of two good management games. (The other being Recettear for PC). Original review: Too hard... Seriously can people PLEASE stop making business or city management games. They are all boring, and too hard. Heck this, Civ, Sim City, and basically anything by Kairosoft are all trash games that are boring.

Really enjoyable game however there are a couple of things that could be improved. (1) To be able to get to 5 stars on a hotel so you can move to the 3rd one. I've been playing for ages now & only managed to make 4 stars on 2 hotels, (2) Be able to use the money you make from one hotel on another as you can the gems.

The game is good but they're some things to be considered: special services (marketing, no ads, general manager) are so expensive. Always limited power. High expensive on chef and bartender. Sometimes the housekeeping are jot doing their job, expecially on instant night. Low tips. Game is not giving me the stars for a new hotel.

Love this game and all your others, payed money I like it so much,, just wondering if you guys could make a better viewing system,, sort of like a birds eye view? It's hard to see where I need to progress, or maybe a highlighted function.. just an idea is all.. anyway you makers are great!

Great gameplay! I really enjoy having to choose what I can and can't afford to increase my revenue. I purchased the dog for no more ads, which is great and well worth the $10. My only problem is there aren't enough hotels. I've maxed out all my hotels and there are no more to build and maintain.

I love the idle games by codigames until recently. 90% of the time I click on anything to watch ads and get more money or coins the video doesn't load and goes away and I don't get any reward. It's very frustrating when I'm willing to watch ads but don't get anything for them.

Best idle game from this developer of their idle series (hotel, gym, etc). I was actually able to "beat" this one too! Other games in the idel series from codi grew monotonous and felt like they just dragged on. Hope they will release more levels and also fix, what I feel, are a few bugs. Couple of the higher hotels not everyone can eat due to the line as well as an entire service is wasted because people are checking in and out. All and all great game!

This game is one of the best if you've been looking to itch the scratch of needing a managerial game, like I did! It's fun and simple, all the steps are explained and the levels are challenging but not game quittingly so. Definitely recommend!

Extremely fun, but it's kind of hard to gain money... but I like that the VIP customer gives a lot of money. It's a nice touch. Though, continuing, you have to wait at least a minute before you get money. Therefore it's hard to get stars to get a new hotel, but the game itself makes up for it. Fun game :D

You should make it to where we have a choice to choose whether or not we want a bar or a double room..ect.. and I think we need to update the decor also with choices.. but all in all its a good concept.. take this game and just make it better with choices better styles thank you and now ! I can't get the money to work for me !! And I will Not spend money to play!!so off to another game!!

This game is a lot of fun. I like how you can watch ads to get bonuses that in other games you'd likely have to pay money for. It's not play to win, which is awesome, and the game is simple. You've got a goal to build towards, which I love, and I think the artistic style of the game is fun and cute.

Other idle games by codigames such as the university one (that is the best) and the law firm one are much better than this game, solely for the fact that this game makes us watch too many ads. The money making process is too slow. So we do not have an option except to watch ads every 20 seconds. Highly annoying.

This is the kind of idle game I can really get behind, each upgrade actually feels like an upgrade because something other than a number changes. It's really good and satisfying to see the hotel change as you continually upgrade your rooms and services.

I really enjoy the game, i feel more into it than other idle games. Its nice and slow so you're not practically completing that game in three days. Only down fall is the Real money prices for perks (gain bonuses and skip all ads, active after you close the app, and 2x cash in.) But is what is.

Kinda fun, you pretty much just want to play to see all of the variances. The BIGGEST issue is that you have to literally click 90+ times to get a room to level to 100. Needs an options for x1, x5 purchase, x10 purchase, Max purchase.

This game is fun but has some issues. One main issue is when I switch to another app, turn off my phone,switch to another hotel, or exit the game I immediately lose half my customer. For example in the second hotel I have all the rooms but if I switch to the first hotel then go back to the second I have 7 rooms empty but when I left I had all the rooms filled. Some might say they leave well yes they do except sometimes it's like 2am when I leave and 4 am when I come back, same day.

it's a really good idle game that's not unrealistically easy because you have to deal with expenses and not making a loss etc... my only issue is that there are only two hotels and I've fished them now. also there are no missions for the second hotel which meant I couldn't get gems.

Normally I would give it 5 stars but the ads you watch to get more money or skip to day aren't working properly. When I try to press the button to watch the ad it keeps acting like I never pressed it at all hut if I press the no thanks button it works perfectly fine. What kind of bs is that?? Please fix

Starts out slow and there's nothing to do with money after you've 5 _ a Hotel. Maybe add a currency exchange system that let's you trade money for gems, or buy permanent boosters, or a prestige system. If not, it's useless to revisit old hotels. All of their games seem to do the bare minimum despite all the potential.

I was enjoying this game up to the third hotel but then it gets absolutely annoying. The hotels are supposed to close down after 2 hours of inactivity except for the hotel you are in. But from third hotel it closes down all of them and when I open the game back it takes me to the first hotel and I have to travel to the third one EVERY MORNING and EVERY EVENING when I play the game the most.

Fun so far, I played a few games on my phone, fallout, castle clash, boom beach, paradise island. This is wonderful so far, however I have bought the add skip and the night manager. Not so much p2w but the micro transactions are amazing so up to you as a consumer. __ For scale.

Game stops after 6 hotels. Why? Seriously... Edit November 2020. They added another level. Now The Game Stops after 7 levels and it's been this way for quite a few months. I just don't get it, it's a wonderful game. Why do you encourage people to stop after finishing Seven Levels.

I've really enjoyed this game, even the ads to double money earned, extra money aren't annoying, you have the option to not use them but 30 seconds isn't too long to wait for the reward. I have however completed all the hotels available so I'm hoping more will come soon __

Awesome game in the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that occasionally when you hit to get an ad to say double the amount of money that you get from something it'll freeze and then restart the app and you'll have to do it all over again but other than that occasional glitch it's great so recommending it

Great interactive gameplay. Nice graphics and storyline. Not much on earning moneys. But still good cause you need to spend time in playing. Ads is also good since it helps in the collections of money. Hope their will be a control in the speed of the game time. So far the game is good and fun to play.keep up the good work.

Very buggy game play. I constantly have to force stop the game in order to play the ads. That eventually stopped working. It's too bad, but I enjoyed this game until the problems started. I will be uninstalling.

This is a fun game to kill time unfortunately there is only a max of 5 hotels and onces you have gotten 5 stars on them all there is nothing left to do. Spent the 20 dollars to remove ads and get all the upgrades for free tho. Would love to see more hotels come into play.

It's a really fun game but all of the sudden no ads will load and you can't get extras then sometimes when adds do finally load you watch and still don't get the bonus. I have updated the app multiple times and still have the same problem.

Edit: not gonna lie even there are some bugs, I still decided to finish the game. Great idle game, but there is so annoying "establish connection" bug which make u cannot claim a quest and have to restart the game. (In my case I cant pick x3 income with gem) and the hotel is not updated yet so u dont have a reason to play this game anymore after u finish the last hotel.

I like this game so far, it's pretty addicting. I like that I can leave and it's still making money for me while I go about my everyday life. I also like the fact that it's very in depth about how things actually work in a hotel, I just wish that you had some kind of minigame to help earn more money or possibly a way to exchange points earned for in game cash which would also help alleviate wait time and give the player something more to do besides just watch.

Your game is very adcentric and often ads are not available. The game would benefit greatly from a short term no ad purchase option like no ads for a week for a dollar. It is impossible to get any prize from an event without the ads but they have been unavailable for the last several hours

It's a great game certain things are too expensive especially when you are spending diamonds. Fix that being that it's the first hotel have the prices reasonable so we can upgrade quicker. Overall I love it. Btw let the investor bring in diamonds too not just cash.

LOVE..LOVE the game.. very enjoyable. Also very smart about the ads.Making it the players decision if you want to watch an ad or not and making it profitable for the player to watch an add..I think because of that I have watched more ads and don't mind because it furthers the game..Well done..keep it up

Once done with the first hotel it's rather pointless to keep earning money and have nothing to spend it on. Half the time I click on the dancing guy to get extra money and there's no ad, or money. And if I leave the game for a short time and come back I notice with both hotels that just my single rooms are full and none of my double rooms are. They're clean and it's already night so I lose more than half my profits. But while watching the game all rooms are filled. Really enjoy add more hotels

One of my favorite games, After resetting my phone I've installed it again and all of my progress got erased including my purchases, I approached them and they gave me everything I've purchased back!!! Great customer support!! It really shows that they care about the players. Waiting for new updates and more levels!!

I find it so hard to progress through this game, everything is so expensive! Why do you need batteries that cost so much?? I cannot add anything else until I've upgraded the power, it makes no sense! Another room is now 16,000! A bar is 8000! The income per guest is around 200, minus what the staff takes and you get painfully slow game play. Please adjust all the values!!

It was really fun strategizing and running 1st hotel. The second hotel is hard but you can grow it. It is challenging and fun. You don't have to play boring match 3 games. It truly is a strategy game!!

I love this game but as of the last few days it is no longer allowing me to purchase more cash using my gems. Half the time when I go to purchase cash it is in a foreign language, sometimes it won't let me scroll once I'm there, and sometimes when it does finally look normal I click to purchase and it does nothing. It also won't allow me to buy more gems. The app and. Y phone are fully updated.

Ads, game freeze, more ads, bonus mission that's impossible to finish even the first goal. Graphic issue with the cleaners. WHAT CLEANERS ENTERS A ROOM WHILE THE CUSTOMER US TAKING A DUMP. This game has a lot of fixing up to do.

First are the "pros." The game art is beautiful, unique and fits well with this developers theme. The play style is also geared to be more challenging, you aren't their to just make money. Implementation of expenses and employee wages adds realism and depth into management of the gameplay. Then their are the "cons." I often find some of the AI tracking is flawed. Customers will just stand in the lobby as if they were in line for food or another service. The app will not close automatically.

This game is awesome man. I just love the balance sheet and everything. I had to fire a couple of people in order to keep it up and and running which was funny__. But now you guys should make it to where people can get robbed and we can hire police staff I mean I absolutely love this game im on the Stanley property now. Its really cool. I appreciate the amount of detail you guys put into this game. I seriously hope you guys make it to where you can do police reports and all.

Yup, this game has a really nice sountrack, good voicelines, and good animations for me to enjoy. My experience in this game is really exellent; the ads doesn't annoy me at all so I'll rate it 5-stars. Maybe one day, this game will be popular for Tycoon lovers. I've been waiting for this game for a long time and little by little, I got quite addicted playing this game, so I'll share this with my friends and family. Thanks.
It's really fun to play although when I try to watch ads for money or 2x income, the ads won't load and then the game freezes. It's so frustrating! Please fix it!

This game could be really fun but the amount of adds you need to watch to get money is kind of ridiculous. The worst part is you have to continuously play the game or pay $10.99 real cash to make money at the hotel while not playing the game. It's like they are trying to force you to want to spend money on the game but the reality is the game is not fun enough to even consider spending any money.

I completed the 2 Hotels that you have to do but there are only 2. There weren't anymore hotels for me to complete so I removed the game. The game is difficult but fun to play. Good game just add more hotels and as another review suggested combine the money from both hotels into one account.

Its great but, it can be difficult and it takes time. The only problem I have is when I play for too long I try to like get time 2x profits by watching videos but it brings me back to the game with nothing but other than that no problem here!

Ran out of hotels. All hotels are. Completed. I was playing it on the weekends after completing all the hotels but then I got bored. Housekeeping takes too long. Visitors arrive late and no where to get food. Perhaps players should adjust timing for food, bar. Etc. Maybe make the hotels where you can select colors of walls and floors? Possibly be able to remodel hotel or rooms once completed? Maybe developers can minimize game download by game retrieving part of the program online?

So I love these types of games but honestly THE ADS! It's like you could dish out $10-25$ to avoid them and get perks but then the game would run its self for the most part. You would be it in 2-5 days if you pay. And if you dont pay then more then 50% of the time your running ads just to be able to interact with the game. Great concept but as always just a imbalanced game with money grubbing developers.

Its a really great game and a fantastic way to kill time, I just wish the progression was abit faster, I seem to need to stop playing for a few hours just to earn enough money to continue the game, I get that its idle but yknow Id like to spend a little more time actually playing it haha
Fun and relaxing hotel management Sim. Great graphics as well as an easy to use UI. The game doesn't overload you with ads, and the rewards from them and challenges are worth doing.

i have been playing this game for a week now. and it does not dissapoint it is a wonderfull game and i just cannot leave it!. it is not hard it is very satisfying and i think anyone could try it. it never forces you to whatch adds you can choose to for currency. i would not change anything if i could.

Was pretty great to play while I did. Engaging and fun..wish the money could be used across all hotels kinda pointless to have hotels earning tons of money and nothing to use the money on at them then it just builds up. Eventually got the the point of tired with the game but was great until then.

I love the game but I despise how I literally spend 90 percent of my time watching ads and 5 percent of the time waiting on it to load. Which leaves me with a sad 5 percentage of ACTUALLY playing. The concept is awesome!!! I adore all Idle games. Just cut out the ads a little.

The game is a lot of fun, but there are a lot of ads if you dont want to spend money for the manager. You also finish all the available hotels before you even get the chance at all of the VIP managers. Need more hotels and more options to earn gems. I dont feel like playing it now that there isnt anything left to accomplish.

I was enjoying it until I found something rather stupid and game breaking, apparently when I was waiting for the game to give me another chair that costed diamonds, I closed the game and went back into the game only to find not only that I didn't get the chair but also that it consumed the diamonds as well so unless you fix that issue, I may consider changing my rating to either a 4 or 5 depending on how the game is.

Please add more hotels. I already achieved 5 stars for all hotels. It will be great if we can keep upgrading things at each hotel. This is as the hotel where I have reached 5 stars, the money keeps on coming in, but I have no way of spending them. Love the game though.

I like this game. But the fact that its so hard to progress to the next hotel is unfortunate. PLUS, if you buy the presidential suites, they arent still purchased when the new event hotel becomes available. So you basically just have to fork out money every time theres the event hotel for the same thing.

Starting off with 4 stars because the devs are clearly very responsive/actually trying to make a good game. I'll update it as I play. Update: this game is great, I'm having a ton of fun to it. Ads also give genuinely helpful benefits, which is nice. Updated to 5 stars.

Do not spend money! It's been well over a year with no updates or new hotels. When I spoke with customer service, they said their timeline was to produce a new hotel every couple months. I wasted a bunch of money on a game with very few levels and zero updates. It's fun, but you'll complete everything within a few days. Since the developers aren't paying attention to their product, it's not worth your time or money.

This game is so awesome that I have completed it. I am waiting for more hotels to be added. I keep checking backing to see if they add more permanent hotels but they haven't. With all the idle games out there this one is my favorite. They just need to keep adding hotels. Other games have hundreds of levels. Why can't this one?

Great overall free to played game. There are a few bugs with the investor and I had an issue with some of the cleaning staff staying in a room that bugged me but I just reloaded the game and it went back to normal.

It's such a wonderful game emulator for business. This game treat my management skill though it just a game. Perfectly, when it able to travel in another hotel with a different services, money from investor, and free gem from the task! Trully reccomended try this game..

This is one of the best idle-type games I've ever played. The ad-based bonuses are non-essential, but definitely helpful. There's not this overbearing pressure to buy like I've experienced with other games. Great job on this one, guys
So far it is a decent game to pass the time. You can watch videos to do certain quests and there isn't a bunch of annoying ads every time you do a task. Thank you devs!

Progress is very slow, ads that are needed if you want to get anywhere dont work and removing them costs $18. Also after closing the app and coming back later all progress was lost. Hours of very slow work all gone.

I loved it until I finished the last level. I did it in 2 days. I put money in the game also and there are no more missions. Its disappointing. I would have gave 5 stars if there was more hotel. But I loved the game while it lasted. I'm completed now. So add more hotels and my rating will go up.

First fix your buggy game then ask for that whopping large amount of money for in game purchases..u expect me to pay _940 just to double my profits which has no use.. that's the reason mobile games are bs..do some thinking and use regional pricing..and as for the bugs, fix the house service stuck in room, room dirty even after cleaning, parking bug (even though i have space for parking, the car does not park) and lots more which i don't care as i uninstalled this game.. Pathetic game..

Game is fun/addictive. But my problem was with the events. I started an event and have been playing it constantly since it started, and they're is no way to get maxed out on it without paying for double profits for an additional like 15$.

Really slow grind and only speeds up when you're pretty much done with the hotel. Also there's something buggy going on with hiring, even if I only have one person hired for the job I'm paying for three? Okay idle game but honestly really boring after a minute, there's nothing to do to improve idling except idle overnight and upgrade like one thing.

Nothing but problems since the update. Had been really enjoying the game till that point but it is impossible to complete the Codi Resort challenges without the ads which now simply won't load. If not fixed in the next few days I will be uninstalling.

The game is good. All is balanced, just a little bug with the wagers of the bartenders. It said their wagers are 100 but when I hire its goes to 200 just like the chefs. Great little game that you can fill up some spare time in and come back to as and when but don't need to keep being told when the hotel closes. Event hotel is impossible to get far in so never going to gain a manager.... ridiculous idea only for those with nothing to do all day so I stick to own hotel. Also rooms should not vacate just because you went to visit another hotel... full when left, mostly empty when return a minute or two later.... not fair play.

I love this game man. Codi, I been with yall since the jump and haven't regretted my gaming experience. Only reason I put 4/5 stars and not a 5-Star, my game has completely stopped opening. It's really fantastic game.... I like it so much because there is so much activities that we have to do with the game players.... Great game it's really nice once your hotel comes together and you see people coming in and the hotel really comes alive. Eventually I would like to see more hotels with different designs. 4 stars because I have a lot of money from my other hotels that I can't even use towards my newer hotel.

Don't earn enough money period. It is a REALLY slow game even watching ads for money boosts. You legit have be outside the game in order to get a decent chunk of money! I understand added that up would be a lot more but from a game perspective, it's just not enough.

I like the game but when you open a new hotel it's the hardest because income is low and it takes forever to get a good amount of income. I think being allowed to transfer VC from other hotels to new ones should be a thing. You would have more users download the app and play more hours

Good idle game, but lately every time I go into the game 3 rooms are empty, I've even waited for them to fill, exited and then log right back in and they are empty again, housekeeping is fully built and staffed so it's not that, others have experienced the same, fix this bug please

Great game, unfortunately far too many ads to enjoy it! Uninstalled as a result. Would help if you could transfer money between hotels but get the feeling the creators made it that way because that would stop you needing to watch so many ads!

A bit slow if you dont watch adds but the only one that is useful to watch a ad for is the investors which is just to gain money to speed things alone. I enjoy just sitting down and playing it when I'm just relaxing.

It was doing fine until this update. Now, it opens up to a hotel I haven't played since I finished it when I was working on the event. It has done that after the event but NOT DURING! Unfortunately I will be Uninstalling.

Edit: I find "Dmitri the Russian" offensive for my country and culture. Reduced opinion even more. Balance seems poor. Same things become progressively more expensive when you move to new hotel. A good game but all the developers games I have played have a continuous error connecting to the server problem (even when I have no connection issues) and this affects game play. It's annoying as I have spent money on the game

Never ever written revies before but this game was so fun to play. It's easy to finish but still challenging enough to be fun! totally reccomend this for those who want something to fill their free time.

Love the game, the there is huge performance issue on puchasing upgrades, especially in the last few maps. Every actions takes 1 second to process. It also drains my battery quickly (using galaxy note 9)

Cool game, but the ads give you needed rewards and they won't load after a while, and I have to uninstall and reinstall.... until they stop working and I do it again...... getting tired of that, but I do enjoy the game.

I love this game, it's the most captivating tycoon I've ever played, thank you for this game. I would like very much if I could use money from my other hotel to invest in the new one cause if you do anything for one hotel(100%) it's pretty much useless afterwards. Thank you again !

I did give this game a 4 star before but after putting money into this game there is a glitch where the hotel takes almost all the profits and you can barely upgrade anything. If it's not fixed soon I'm going to uninstall the game and you won't get anymore money.

The game keeps closing after I try to get money after I watch the ads it needs to be fixed or I will have no choice but to uninstall it because all the frustration that I don't need can you fix it I'm so frustrated with this game, I spent my money on this game I deleted this game and I'm telling everyone who is thinking about installing the game not to unless you like throwing your money away if I could give this game a lower rating I would give it less than zero DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY

The game is addictive and nice, to some point. Lately, however, when you hire cleaning staff. There's a room that's not being cleaned and it annoying because nothing is cleaning it...and money keeps on disappearing

Very entertaining casual game. Graphics are cute and small details add to the fun. It was worth it for me to purchase the 'manager' that allows you to get the boosters without watching advertisements.

Great tycoon game, i love it and there's plenty more ideas that can happen like a space hotel, wild west hotel, Japanese hotel, futuristic hotel, so many possibilities Codigames can create also perfect balance in earnings if you bought all charcter except the newest 2, but 10hours offline and just 2x income is perfect, cause other games are to fast completed if you pay for them but this game you need a lot of money and you don't get enough to play it out to fast so this game is enjoyable.

I liked this game and paid money into it until this past event (7/24/20). I paid for the VIP package and never got it. The money came off my card though. I wont be playing anymore games by this developer due to the this. Just wanted to make others aware...dont spend money with them! 8/5/20 Still nothing but a generic email answer.SMH!
The game is alot of fun but definitely wish there were more levels. Also the events are made to only be obtainable if you spend actual money, that needs to change.

I've played this game non-stop for a couple days. I'm loving it so far...only issue I have is that the price of the payable perks is a bit high...like for the managers and stuff..but I can make due without them. Loving the game

I don't know why the rating for this game is 3.7*... Its brilliant... I've completed it. Got all rooms, staff and items. I cant wait for more levels, as I was a little shocked and dissapointed that there was only one hotel. Its such a nice, calm, relaxing stratagy game. More please!

Update: Raised my rating, as the updates have made challenges enjoyable. New hotels have also been added. __ ......................................... Loved this game. Too bad the update sucks. The event hotel is a total rip off. The new hotel is rigged so that you can't advance. Disappointed.

I like the game, only problem: the timing for a lot of things is way out, I've got patrons turning up and the first thing they want to do is get food, but that's the exact time when the chef's go on break so I lose money for that, or my patrons then head down for tea, and the place isn't open yet and then they just go back to their rooms, there should be an option where I can decide when its open or closed because these things are ether highest earners atm and I'm not making any money.

Excellent game so far, only issue is i have upgraded everything i can so far at the beginning hotel and my quests wont update with the progress i have made so i cant actually do anything now other than watch the hotel, no option to do anything so after a few hours of playing im now stuck and still waiting for a reply from the support team

Edit: Just finished leveling up every hotel. 25 stars. Waiting for more to continue. Great time killer. The only thing is, I wish you didnt have to start all the way over with like no money at each new hotel.. these are all my businesses right? This is ridiculous. I opened the app and let it load for at least 15 minutes. But it never loaded. Restarted my phone and uninstalled the app, but I reopened it and yet, nothing. I am typically a patient person, but this game made them run way to this.

Its fun but but if you dont upgrade things I the right order it can really impede your progress. I did not know there was a battery I needed to upgrade . . . Maybe I missed the msg but it stopped my progress for 2 days as I waited for enough money to upgrade it as I had no energy for a geny.

I think this game is amazing! One thing to make it better would be able to transfer money from different hotel. That way we could upgrade low stared hotel, but other than that I love this game and I recommend everyone to try it.
Fun and addictive! It's been awhile since I've found a good tycoon builder type game. There are a lot of ads but the 10.99 upgrade to remove the ads is 100% worth it.

The time you are in the game you are spending 50% of the time playing and 50% watching adverts. It's an interesting game but how all mobile apps are designed its just a terrible experience. You loose interest in a game even if the game os good

Loving the game at the moment but I've got three of the same quest but I dont know what it is as it shows up in a different language not English like everything else in the game. It's a fun game but unfortunately I can't opt out of the download for the upgraded version of the game and have no storage on my phone to download it. I have only had the game for a couple of days (it was great the way it was) and it's already wanting me to upgrade so I'm assuming there will be many more throughout time so it's not even worth trying to make room for it in my storage. I will be deleting this game.

It would be 4 to 5 stars. Game kept freezing especially during events. Contacted support and they just said they would try to duplicate and didn't do anything for my lost time.

I think the money earned from all hotels should be added together, or can at least be changed into gems. It's pretty useless when the hotel's already fully furnished/no items left to buy with the money collected, but your other hotels need more.
I get ads only once and there are no more ads that are there. It has happened this way for the past two weeks. Fix it fast otherwise I will be uninstalling the game for good.

Very addictive in a good way :) However some things could do with improving: 1) Service room capacity - It makes literally no sense that things like restaurant, bar, cafe and other rooms with seating stand half empty whilst people queue and are sent away. Half my hotel going at 7 am to a club that opens at 7 pm?

It is such a neat game. It's easy to upgrade and expand your hotel so far. Quite fun to past the time with. Maybe another way to earn gems? Like spend your hotel earnings to buy gems, like other games do. Like $500 would get you 5 gems something like that anyways. Also you should add achievements.

I really like this game, but a bug that removes all my guests at the ski resort every time i close the app is really frustrating and hampering my progress. Please resolve this issue and this would be a 5 star review

Super expensive upgrades compared to the hotel's earning. E.g: battery upgrade needs $16000, while you only get $25 per night. LMAO. The ads is buggy, no reward after watching videos. uninstall soon probably.

I finished weeks ago and nothing new except a ridiculous 2 day challe.ge that was a impossible to even come close to winning unless you spend money . Good game very fun, waiting for more hotel expansions. The " challenge hotels" don't really appeal much to me. Perhaps there could be a reward system for the challenges?
