This game is really good. I enjoy upgrading things individually.
Great time killer, very engaging and addictive game.
Great graphics, no bugs, great game in general
I really enjoy this game!!!! It is challenging and keep me on my toes! Lol Not bad __
It's hard to earn money unless you watch a ton of ads.
This such a bad game I allways get low amount of money like when I get of and don't get on intell the next day I gives me only 100$
Pretty fun watching the guests go about the hotel. Not sure what they are eating but the potty face makes me laugh.
Challenging Good progress. Need more ui. But ideal
Don't listen to the people who say you have to watch ads to progress it's just that you have to spend your starting Money on the rooms.
After the hotel is finished after a 5 star rating, there is nothing to do in that. Would be better to have a feature to transfer money to another hotel, where we struggle to make rooms.
Great a lot more challenging than other tycoon games
It is not working again there is a bug on the Stanley resort Hotel again
Alot better since the adverts issue sorted
U love this game i really recommend it and if your bored it's really fun to play!!! ____
I got stuck at Santa's Resort now neither I m able to proceed from 4 star to 5 star nor I m able to start this from beginning.
Ads + ad about getting money , not true , game sucks
It's fun to play, cute but, it's a bit boring
Add stopped After Plying few days Fix this Problem As soon as possible
It's OK... But it s hard to get a lot of money and ye..
This game still keeps crashing! Are you listening to me?
Anyone else having issues with the game starting

Good game. Been playing for over 2 months and in my 5th hotel. To get bonuses you watch ads. This was ok, but lately has been freezing and not letting you play ads. Also, game has been freezing when trying to double profit ads on boot up. It has not let me start the game for 10 hours. Some ads are 10 seconds and some are 45 seconds for the same bonus. Overall fun and addictive games but the freezing is having me get ready to uninstall. This review was originally a 4 Star.

Way too addictive! Had to delete! Would have been better if you could transfer some money from already completed hotels to newly started hotels - like others have mentioned, there is nothing to do with hotels you've maxed out and the profits they earn. Also, a couple of times the videos haven't given the profits advertised, but that's not a big deal. Great game all considered!

Love it, one of my favorite idle games of all time- only complaints are how required the ads are to progress. Without watching ads on a regular basis the progress is almost nothing and it would be a far less enjoyable game, taking months to complete levels and achievements instead of days. I also want more hotel levels, but that's just because I beat the game! Overall super fun and satisfying.

Fun game and quite enjoyable at first. But the amount of money it takes to upgrade rooms and services start to seem disproportionate to how much increase in profits made. Also, the game has some glitches. Sometimes the video ads don't play properly making you miss opportunities for a cash increase. I've also been finding myself stuck in a room upgrade screen, or a pay for ad free screen, and unable to get out, making me restart the game. I finally got frustrated enough to stop playing.

This game is simple, easy to play and doesn't require hafvesting coins. It's a cute game that is good for passing time and has a fun cartoony artwork. However it doesn't require any thought or planning, simply dump all your money into upgrades and you win,and there is no freedom to choose where things go or what is offered at you hotel. Over all it is a good pleasing game to distract you but could be so much better.

Pretty fun overall! I like the cute simple design style and after the tutorial gameplay is pretty intuitive. My main complaints are all in glitches. Often my game just freezes on the loading screen and I have to close out the app entirely to restart it. The game seems to want to make me watch ads very often, yet 3/4 times the 'ad' is just a black screen with no reward. The double money function after being away from the game still gives the original amount, not doubled. Etc.

Pretty good game and quite addicting. I think it could benefit from more diverse upgrade options, though. Also, maybe some semblance of intelligent movement in visitors and employees. It's frustrating to see visitors travel from one closed service to the next, or to see housekeeping take ridiculously inefficient routes to clean rooms.

Was a challenging and fun game. Watching ads was an easy choice to get the additional bonus cash needed to advance. Then bonus ads slowly stopped working... click the link and it sends you back to the page with nothing. This makes it very frustrating. I enjoyed it until this started happening... now it's time to uninstall this game.

You definitely have to watch ads to make some game progress in the beginning or it'll be a slow slow progress for upgrades. Sometimes after watching the videos for money r X 2 money I don't get the reward. I have contacted them about this bug as of now 3 stars. And definitely need to fix hotel going from full to half full when u close out of app makes progressing even worst. Game has potential but drives u to watch ads.

Normally I don't mind ads in games, but you rely on viewing ads to gain money, boosts, more customers, etc so often that half of your time is spent watching them and not actually playing the game. It's almost the ads are a game mechanic. The game itself just isn't fun enough to make that worth it, mostly consisting of upgrade, wait for more money, upgrade, rinse and repeat.

Fun and addictive game! But it glitches all the time. If you upgrade things it might not save, if you have a full hotel and exit out of the app for just one second you'll have 3 guests that have check out. If the VIP guest comes and you click on him to watch a video to get more coins it'll glitch and you won't get the coins. Its frustrating and you can invest time into this game and have nothing saved.

This is an addictive idle game but it's loaded with problems. You have to watch way too many ads which won't even load half the time. You can miss big bonuses for this reason. It actually has a challenge aspect to it which I appreciated. Manage your money! My biggest issue is the inability to get my 9th star for the 3rd hotel. I've upgraded everything possible and spent all my gems on upgrades but still no 9th star...

The setup and controls are great. The opening tutorial isnt to invasive and get you going pretty quick giving you exactly what you need to know. I'm having a blast playing. My only complaint is the cost of the unlocks. $10+ to go add free is ridiculous. I usually pay for add free on games I like, but I'm not paying that.

The game has started working since the last time I tried to play it. It is a really different look on idle games because you have to manage your money because of the expenses. I did have to watch a few ads to keep up the balance, but now I can keep it up without the ads. It's a worthy experience if your looking for a time killer.

Great game. Ads are never needed to progress, there are many hotels and many items to unlock. However, the Blue Crystal resort does not capitalize the r in resort like the other hotels and there is no period at the end of the description. It is just a simple annoyance, but makes the grammar inconsistent.

Have to admit, I'm pretty impressed. Most tycoons it's like, blah blah blah, watch ad watch ad, somehow earn Nonillions of dollars by just owning a business for a few days. This is at least a little bit different. You dont only make profit, and you have to pay your workers. It still gives me some trash tycoon vibes, with a bunch of "optional but takes 1000x slower to get the money if you dont do it" ads. It is still a great game though, and I recommend it.

I personally loved this game. It doesn't require a lot of time invested at one time, so I can just check back in with the game 2 or 3 times a day and get upgrades. My biggest complaint is that I finished all the hotels and have nothing else to build. But overall, one of the best tycoon games I've played. Fun, simple, and takes a little strategy instead of mindless clicks.

Fun with a few drawbacks. This game is super cute. Once you get over the first hump in the game it picks up. Took forever to earn enough money to upgrade stuff but once you do it gets faster. Lots of optional ads to earn more money, which I don't mind. Wish there was an option to fast forward but otherwise a fun game.

Half the time after watching an add for money the dancing man man that gives it to you will still be there dancing and you do not receive the money and cannot watch another add to receive further bonuses, same with the 2x, and taxi bonus. The only way to fix this is to close the app and reopen it, but when you do this you always loose customers. I will have all rooms booked come right back in and have 3 vacant rooms. These glitches make it hard and annoying to progress in the game.

Great, fun, addicting game. You get caught up in trying to build your hotel that you forget what time of day it is. The only draw back or complaint I have is that sometimes I do not get my rewards. The video will play for a short second and then go back to the game without giving me my reward. I would give this game a 5 star rating if this issue or bug is fixed!

Great idle game. I enjoy playing it for probably a lot longer at a time than I should. Ads work and reward you correctly unlike some other games I play. The only issue I have is occasionally (rarely) the game seems to freeze up but its nothing a quick reset doesn't fix. Highly recommend if you enjoy idle and management games.

I can tell there was a lot of work put into the game. It shows! The game is addicting, but Holy Advertisements, Batman! I understand, though. They do offer the no advertisement benefit, but for a pretty steep price. However, there are very little, to no bugs and it I really do have fun playing the game. Great Job to everyone who was part of making this game!

This game is awesome and I was having a lot of fun playing it. Unfortunately after a day of playing it started occasionally freezing, forcing me to restart my phone. By the second day it froze seconds into the game and became completely unplayable. I tried restarting my phone, clearing the cache and the data, nothing helped.

I like the game, and when I got to the Stanley Resort it was super fun because of all the new things, and then when I got to The Blue Crystal Resort I became addicted because it was incredibly fun, but then I got to Santa's Shelter and was so disappointed. But I think they should make a new hotel that is like Great Wolf Lodge, or Kalahari where you can upgrade the hotel and you can upgrade the waterpark. That would be amazing.

I love the game! A few suggestions though... Add an option to buy as many possible upgrades in a selected room/service. Maybe even, if you have enough coins a button to fully upgrade the room? After getting far enough my phone lags from everything going on and trying to upgrade constantly. The premium features should also be a bit cheaper. :)

The graphics are cute, and the potential is there. But unfortunately any fun is ruined by the scummy free to play model and it's clear this is just another cash grab. If you play free progress is slow and locked behind watching a ton of ads constantly. If you pay to remove the ads the game becomes boring, as half the features becomes useless and the game throws cash at you constantly. Playing free becomes a huge grind and if you pay the content evaporates quickly.

Excellent game, no bugs or crashes at all. The graphics are clear and the little details for each room are fun! I love how the creators put in little touches such as one of the guests looks just like Heisenburg from "Breaking Bad" and two other guests I swear are from "Pulp Fiction"!!! Definitely an A-1 game!

I really like all the different ways to upgrade the hotel and how it effects everything. There's just too many ads. Watching one ad only gives you 10 min double income. You basically have to watch ads to progress. I don't mind watching ads but I watch more ads than actual gameplay.

I really like this game. The only issue I have is, when I watch an add video for coins occassionally it won't give me the coins and goes all weird and won't let me watch ads on the game at all until I restart it and then when I restart some of my people left so I am making less profits and never got the coins for the ad I watched when it stopped working. Other then that I enjoy the game play.

Super annoying that you can only have so many chefs, or bartenders or whatever it be, working. because once the hotel is leveled up there's way too many people and the restaurant will stay open for hours making no money, because they've walked away. Also can't really get started at all without watching ads but that's whatever. Better than most Tycoon games still.

Controls pretty straight forward. Graphics are good for an idle game. My only issue is not being able to take money from previous maxed out hotels and use them on newer/bigger hotels. Makes the game really slow. It would be nice to use all the other hotels income to improve the newer unlocked ones. Fix that and this game is all 5 stars.

It's a good idle game but some of the upgrades don't add up. For example, according to the description the fully upgraded double bed should be worth 165 dollars by itself. Yet my room only makes 54.21 an hour. I have a fully upgraded deluxe room in the event happening now that should be making 1081 based on the descriptions but it's only making 54.21. That makes no sense. The activity rooms reflect the actual description cost, like the restaurant. It's just really annoying.
Ive had this for a couple weeks now and all of a sudden it has started to crash on me and close out on its own. When i watch adds for the investor, it doesnt give me the money.

Well I started playing this game more and more now. Its actually really enjoyable!! And I got to the second hotel and im now unable to double my profits now when the ad guy pops up... it's just a constant load screen and never loads. I read another review just like this. Hopefully this can be fixed soon.

A good game for keeping ur mind fresh n free n it doesn't even costs you money for buying things if ur are patient n calm u can earn money by just watching videos, and as the level increases the amount of money also increases by watching the the videos n that's a great point of this game by videos earn more n more money to run ur hotel n to make upgrades go for it....
I love this game I used to play it all the time on ym old phone and it got crashed I just got reminded of it and now I am back. No changes and no adverts randomly.

I completed this game. It was good but the ADs showed up that needs to click next 4 times. So when thst sort of AD came up. I stop playing game. Other than that. It's been great. I just hate article AD so much.

Sometimes the ads freeze and don't have a way for you to close out of them and also sometimes while you're in the rooms or in the menus you can't get out of them and you have to reload the game until that's fixed for stars and yes the ads are heavy but that's what you have to do when you're a free player

I liked the game, good animation and good idea. But I want to say that I would like it more if there were issues with the guests, for bad service or any problem in their rooms. Maybe a little bit more complex. It would be also better if you can decide the style, colors, etc of the hotel, and it was a bit annoying when I change the hotel, the gains of the last hotel were lost. Maybe I earned a lot in the first hotel, but the second one will be more expensive.

I like this new approach, feels much more in depth. However it feels far more advert heavy than previous games. Like it really pushes them on you in order to progress because the start of the game is soooooo slow to start up. Not to mention that in game purchases seem to more expensive, each upgrade is over ¡ê10. Not a chance in my book, way too expensive.

Everythings nice, the progression, the amount of things to explore and unlock and the fact that ads are optional which I love. But the few things that I don't like about this game is 1: the fact that hotels are basically nothing after it hits 5 star. 2: the event hotels are a joke, it's practically impossible to hit 1 star without ads or spending money which takes away from the awesome perk of having optional ads.

It's a great game don't get me wrong, but what I hate is that when I watch the add from the VIP guy with a boost on I never actually get money despite watching the ad. He promised 290k and 580k but when I watched the ad I got nothing. Is this a glitch? ( I had a 5 times boost on )
My kids love this game so I decided to try it. I LOVE IT!!! My only issue is all the ads but it's okay.

It's quite a good little idle game, there's plenty to do when it comes to up keep and upgrades, plus with the various stages it's enough to keep you interested. My only issue would be for the premium upgrades could use less stars but I guess that's where the pay to play comes in, it doesn't impact the game you can still upgrade all rooms to 100% without them, that's why it still gets a 5 star otherwise I would have only have it a 4.

Good game but to progress you really need to be on the game all the time. As if you leave the game without the In game purchase. It stops collecting revinue and time only 2 hours after closing. Which is only a bad thing when you are trying to save up for the more expecive items and everything else has been done. I reccomed this to those with time to waste and a long battery life.

I almost always on every game I play turn the audio off so I can listen to music or a podcast or something, so obviously did the same here. Watched an ad to get some money and when I got back the audio had come back despite setting still showing them off. Turned them on then off again. Watched another ad to get more money and when I came back the audio was back with the settings still off.

It takes super long to upgrade stuf so it would be nice to add a button that says upgrade all or something like that because you can have 5m and Only spend 100k because you get bord from just clicking please add that-great game thanks,roblox candle

Great gameplay. I used to play other games from this company too. Loved them. But this one is a little bit disappointing for me because it's almost impossible to move forward in the game because it's too slow unless you watch a lot of ads or pay actual money for their upgrades. Puts me off the game and prevents me from actually purchasing the upgrades

The game looks interesting enough. However, I find that there are way too many videos and each video is at least half minute. You can pay $15 to get rid of the videos though. Think there are other in-app charges too which makes it too expensive for my preference. I would rather decide if I want to pay a reasonable price for a game after a free trial, and not have to deal with so many repetitive videos.

Cool game. I liked it there's no sudden pop up ads although you have to watch ads to get money for stupidly expensive upgrades. 2 stars because once you finish updating a hotel to the max it's starts making unusable profits it's such a waste considering following hotel are even more expensive. There's also an annoying thing, if you move between hotels most of your customers would disappear and you wont profit of the sudden unused rooms. Please fix this the game is one if the few idle fun games.

I love this game there is so much to do and when you play this you never get bored I spend about 3-5 hours on this game! Also one thing I wish you could transfer money to your other hotels that would be awesome
I've waited long enough. I'll edit my review and change to 5 stars if you release new hotel by End of February. If not, im deleting app. It's been almost a year without new hotel added.

Super addictive, really great fun and great for killing some time, there are adds yes but these are optional if you want the extra cash to spend in the hotel. The graphics are fun and the missions not out of reach, it can take a while to save up but thats part and parcel. All in all a really great time killer.

It's extremely slow to get started, building up money is very hard without watching ads. Still a good game despite that, however. As you progress in each location you'll hit a point where the profits start to come in quicker and the game becomes more fun from there.
After recent update, app crashes after about 5 minutes. Happens sooner if you're interacting with it lots

Uninstalled. The game was ok to play, Just like all the other tycoon/management games. However after watching an ad of my own choice, I came back to the main screen which said your hotel has been running for a few hours now. If you hire a general manager you can keep it running for another 10 hours. No indication that it was real money. Until I selected buy and lucky I don't have one tap to buy set anyhow, as I realised it was actually $17.00 about to be deducted. Very sneaky Not happy!

One of my favorite codigames, but I wish the game progress didn't get reset all the time. I even pay to play, yet I am expected to remember where I was at for the support team to get my progress back. At least kudos for actually having a responding support team. Also, I wish there was more updates. The weekend events could also have at least have a few rotating hotels, as it gets boring really quick with the same one over and over. Either way, with the ads paid to be removed, it is a great game.

It's a pretty decent game, I wish growth wasn't so dependent on watching ads. I've also had a glitch a few times where I'd watch an ad all the way through and still not the my money. Once it happened three times in a row and I had to restart the game to get it working again, which is pretty annoying.

the game itself was good but for me, once I got to the second hotel it started getting annoying because the math for my profits was off. At one point it started charging alot more for the daily wage then it shouldhave because i only had 3 staff and when i counted that was the it didn't work. It started doing the same for profits. I dont know if that's a one off bug or something else but it wasn't working right.

Very fun!! however, I've completed all the hotels and now I wish there were more... Also, for the event hotels, the achievements are really hard to achieve unless you pay or you constantly watch ads to double your profits. And theyre so boring because its the same hotel every time. its so dreary building up the same hotel again and again.

Basicly you have to watch the ads to make the game progresses. The bar and restaurant didn't make any sense since it can serve only 2 customers per chef/bartender. Also, their wage is 200 each and the revenue from restaurant and bar are way too small when compared to the cost. Only give 2 stars because of the graphics.

Love it so far! A more in depth tutorial would be nice. My housekeeping is always at a loss. Not sure why. Also you have to watch ads for currency. Everything is ad based it's ridiculous. And the ads lie about.how much they give you. Only worth playing if you don't mind watching a 30-45 second ad every 3 minutes

1. I love the graphis - they are so cute. But they need more degree of freedom in their movement. I like watching them but they all behave the same way. And the path is too long. It might be better to grow up speed a little bit or shorten the path btw utilities. 2. It's way too slow. Even though I paid top money for this, it' too slow to earn money. 3. Graphic is good but ppl like more details to it. There are too many blank spaces btw stuffs(chairs, tables, spa...). I enjoyed it a lot
You need to make more hotels so the game continues might want to think about designing games with alot more levels in the future before you release them to be played

I like it but it has sooo many glitches. When i try to watch an ad to do somthing it either takes forever to load the option button to watch add or it want even play it at all and if it does i dont end up with my bonuses ie 2¡Ámoney or the VIP man. It also lags and take ages to swap between the hotel or upgrading thing. I know its not my internet as i have the theme park game too and it does not do it on there. PLEASE FIX as it is a good game i really wont to keep playing.

I would've love the game. It's fun and it makes you think of budget and finance thingy. One thing is that the time's too fast but the customers/clients are too slow to walk. Sometimes they can't reach the destination open because it's already close. Can't imagine them walking for almost 2 hours to reach a close destination.

I love this game. Its challenging but weirdly calming thanks to the in game music. One downside is I just cant seem to get the game to start, its been stuck at the front loading page for more 5 minutes. Tried closing the app and restarting my phone. Still nothing. Didn't wanna uninstall coz I'm afraid of losing my progress.

It's a great concept game, however it takes way to long to save money being restricted to three rooms. You can't get enough customers in and out of the rooms to make a profit. Only way you can really get some money to do something is to watch the adds. Fun game, will give 5 stars when these problems are fixed

Good concept, slow progression. Takes forever to make a significant amount of money. The ad rewards aren't very impactful, and the real-money things are waaaaay overpriced. After a few days of playing & not making real progress, it got kinda old to go back & have to watch 4 videos to get something done.

Reasonable game but unfortunately falls in with the pay to win mechanics of it's ilk. 2 of the 3 purchases in the game are over ¡ê10. A lot of devs nowadays seem to be following this trend too. I can't help but feel that a lower price of ¡ê3-4 would entice far more people to spend a bit of money but overpriced greediness seems to be the norm nowadays. A good game to play as a timewaster but expect to pay significant amounts or watch an endless torrent of ads to make any real progress. A shame.

Good game but still bugs. This isn't really a real Idle game. It only keeps your hotel open for 2 hours. I'm on the second hotel and every time I leave and come back 3 rooms are empty. The ad videos to get bonus money works sometimes. But not all the time. So its taking longer for me to make money to upgrade my hotel.

Okay, the whole game is like make money and upgrade your hotel until you get a 5 star.... Nothing so creative about it. You need to click moindlessly to upgrade your hotel to get more money. No possiblity to customize or creat your own hotel.. The fun part about Tycoon games is that you get to create your own but this game clearly lacks in it.. I don't recommend this game.

I LOVE this game! its so addicting but I just want MORE. Theres a lot to do and it kept me busy for quite a while but I'm nearing the end and it's kind of upsetting. Id love more content whether it be a way to restart with better profits, expanding current hotels, or adding new ones. It really is a great and fun game.

I want to enjoy the game, but it feels like I watch ads more often than playing the game. So far my main place of revenue in game is through watching the 'VIP' ads which most of the time don't even load and give rewards. Everything else provides so little revenue it takes so long to save up for upgrades.

It relies too much on ads that it frequently disrupts gameplay. I agree with the other comments that the profit from previous hotels should be brought to the succeeding ones, atleast half. It's fun at first but it just gets tiring from relying on ads just to get money. Without ads, gameplay progresses unbelievably slow.

Great game love playing it. Just needs one extra option, rather than upgrading the individual items in the rooms, it needs an upgrade whole room button either one level whole room or full upgrade whole room or both options if possible. Its just so time consuming upgrading everything individually. Please add into the game

Update: Contact received from the developers who could t reinstate my game progress but offered some gems and other rewards. Still had to redo both levels completely though so it was still frustrating. I do like the game idea though and await further levels. Still a glitch as missions I've completed are showing as incomplete. Work in progress

Fun for what it is: a casual, chill, idle game that you can play while doing other activities (tv, podcasts, chores, etc. Not much in the way of strategy or complexity but that's not why we play these types of games. I also wish there was a way to increase the speed of time passing within the game.

Pretty fun and addicting game. Sadly the "events" are pretty much pay to play. There's no way of getting the manager reward without spending $10 for the 2 day event boost. Completed 2 of the 5 hotels so far, game play seems to have slowed down quite a bit also.

Good overall concept, however the challenges/missions stop very early and there are only two hotels - in which the second hotel doesn't allow you to have enough power to supply all the facilities such as the ski resort...just hope there will be an update soon fixing all of this! Need more car park space, upgrades for staff and services!!

It's a great game that teaches you management, budgeting, costs, time, and patience. My only problem is the money earning rate. It is very slow, not the usual tycoon speed you'd find in Miner's Tycoon, and have to wait for some days to get 10,000 cash. Overall it's a great game.

It's awesome. I like how it kills time when I need it to lol. Also, it's just super fun and I think it teaches you a lot. I just hate the housekeeper glitch. One to two of them will get stuck in a room just standing still while the others finish and leave. I have to completely restart the app for them to go back to normal. Keeps happening though.

Decent game over all. But a couple things I have are the event hotel should either have a pool or casino added to give people more to do to make profits. The profits are really slow once you max everything out making getting 3 stars pretty difficult. Also need to add more regular hotels. I'm almost done with the Camelot hotel and after that might just have to get rid of the game since there won't be anything but events to do which would be pointless.

A fun experience and not too grindy which is a positive, however the quests/goals stopped working, not a big problem though, the game needs content, maxed out my hotel. The whole strategy with wages and decision making on when to upgrade and having enough money in the kitty is a welcome change. I would recommend.

I've been playing now for a couple hours - yes it's addicting. A couple things noted: There's a lot of ads but most of them are short (15 seconds or less). The income multiplyer is only a max of 2 hours and you have to watch a lot of ads to fill it. I should be working but I can't put this game down!
Great game. Its very addictive but i gat a bug where it wont let me open the game anymore. Please fix this

A great game and thoroughly enjoyable. It would be great to manage staff better e.g. promote to more senior positions so they can complete tasks quicker or serve quicker, have the option to fire lazy workers and have the animation of them taking longer than others like laying on the bed, standing around watching tv. Think this would be quite funny to see. Having the chef's clean some days before their shift would be a nice little touch also.

Update: As an absolute fan, I have completed all 6 hotels, missing playing it. Please put more hotels to do. Thank you __ Love this game, so addictive. Good graphics, love the different hotels and the different locations. The dancing king makes me laugh as he looks different in each hotel, I think that was very clever idea. I am now on the last hotel and hope there is a new upgrade before I complete it. Thank you for a brilliant game __

Pretty awesome game. It us pretty hard to earn an amount that you can continuously spend and use to upgrade without watching the ads offered by special patrons. Hard to get going, but once you get up there, it really is a great game!

The game is pretty straight forward you earn money and move forward to build bigger hotels etc. Postives about the game - simple game instruction - objectives easy to understand and obtain Negatives about the game - Money that is earn from one hotel/resort you can't transfer to other resorts when opening it. So you start off with little to no money again. Which isn't realistic if you have one hotel making 50 k or something - Ads too many ads, and to get rid of the ads it's like 15 dollars.

Fun idle game. A little more strategic than the norm. My only gripe is I don't get the cash boost sometimes cause the ad doesn't really play. It's just a pop up for a few seconds and nothing happens. When I close out of it the guy walks away and I never get my reward.

Why is it so slow! __ I played different models from this developer, some were so much better than this. Well the cooldowns of everythings are slow, way too slow to get improvement. Advertisements are everywhere and they are the majority things that speed up actions and times. Why? 20-50 seconds of Ads are time consuming, pretty much the same ads everytimes. ______

Soo I love the game. Very addictive. Paying for no ads is a bit expensive imo. It looks great and I love the little details like Kill Bill and John Wick as guests. Still..it needs an upgrade to max for the rooms button. It takes waaaaaay to long at some point to upgrade like 50 rooms. PLEASE IMPLEMENT!

Played for a month , game is interesting and we do complete levels but after a month game seems monotonous. Please could you bring new types of challenges in this games with difficulty level. Eg. Now lets for a resort we give player option to cook variety of food and earn money. Little depper level of cooking complexity and so on for room decoration and employ timing changes. This will be something different from regular resort/hotel running which will keep us entertaining. Overall awesum game.

Its a really fun game but some times you find yourself a bit board. Its really hard to get the second hotal. If you do get this game my edvice is to save up all your money because youll look back and think i wish i saved my money. I love the game its easy to get money and items when there not on high levals. Get the ar erley and rooms later. Enjoy playing remeber look on the bright side and dont get courght up with drama.

I like the game. But it is getting pretty annoying watching ads that dont work. Like the screen goes black then resumes game with no money like promised for watching. Also if I exit the app while the hotel has full occupancy, I'll reload the app immediately to find only two single bed rooms have people. Please fix.

Sometimes gives ads sometimes doesnt game progresses very slow after first hotel i would buy the instant ad thing but $11 is way to much $2 would be reasonable unless it transfers between every game you make but i dont know and dont feel like finding out overall decent game but in app purchases overpriced like every other game and it relies on ads to progress at decent rate like every other game. I wouldnt recommend this game to anyone unless you like ads

Simple game with incredible graphics. Great fun and its challenging, unlike other idle games. No forced ads, you choose. Downside is sometimes you have to watch ads to get anywhere. And it also glitches if the ad is dodgy. When it kicks you out it only has half the rooms occupied.

I've played many of the other Idle Tycoon games and this one seems to be most in-depth, while still allowing for the game to operate in the background and stay under the Idle umbrella. Costs $10 get rid of all ads and unlock all, otherwise ad-blocked, bonuses. .. considering it.

It is a fun game but I feel you have to watch a ton of ads to get anywhere. Increasing the profit booster to 20mins per vid rather than 10 would be more understandable. Also it is a shame the money on hotels you have finished can't be tied over to other hotels. You could make the other hotels more expensive cost wise to counter it.

Kinda fun and addictive game.. but its annoying.. if you leave one hotel with full occupancy for few seconds to go to another hotel, then come back.. that hotel will now have 2 or 3 rooms free.. although a few seconds ago it was full. Its frustrating because it slows your progress down unless you have the game open 24/7

Fun, addicting game. I enjoy how it's easy to make progress while still being challenging enough to take some time to complete the game. Customer service is impeccable and reponded extremely quickly! I've played multiple games Codigames and they're all great.

I really enjoy this game and it's fun to see the different upgrades and hotels. However, my other 5 star hotels are now making copious amounts of money and i have nothing to buy with it! Would be nice if I could transfer limited amounts of money per day or something to my other up and coming hotels.

I used to like playing this game but now when I set my ad option to social network ads, I've noticed when I play the game later that it resets it back to newspaper advertising. So I don't get as many customers as I could, therefore taking much longer to level up. So I am going to uninstall this game.

Its a nice fun game, just everything is way to damn expensive and you dont earn any money it seems like. After awhile it becomes impossible to keep upgrading. I been playing for a couple weeks and only have 4 rooms the bar and restaurant. Constantly dont have power and have way to many customers and not enough rooms due to lack of money

A unique take on idle business games that goes well beyond the other ones. I'm glad I gave it a try. The only issue is the permanent buffs are way to expensive for each one. Nock the price down to a third and I'd consider sending the money your way.

Uninstalled. 30% play time and 70% advertisement watching. Your profit only rises if you opted to watch their ads. Hotel will not earn money while offline and customers only pay small amounts. Plus, upgrades are expensive. It is hard to keep the money up. It also consumes too much data.

It is a fun game to play, but once you open and complete all the hotels there is pretty much no point playing. Would love it if it had the opportunity to reset the hotels but keep the people earned from the resort events. (P.S resort events would be nice if there was more to build eg, pools etc)

Enjoy playing this game a lot. I never had trouble with it up until I unlocked the Blue Crystal Resort. Every single time I log into the game, only 2 out of the 4 bedrooms are booked out amd that means that my expenses are high and I only recieve minimum profit. I hired two chefs in order to serve 4 people and the rest of the 4 waits to be order without any problem, but now it's only a waste of money since there are only 4 guests whem I'm offline.... PLEASE FIX THAT

Hard from the start and never gets easier. Wish they gave power ups away after failing so many times instead of the option to purchase only.. its not fun to log in 3 times a day just fail over and over. Im about to Uninstall it -.- too bad. It was fun..

Game is fun, but once you 5star a hotel, the money doesn't transfer to another hotel, so you're just racking up cash that you can't do anything with, but you have to 5star the hotel to open a new one anyway. Just seems kinda redundant. There should be a way to transfer funds or something. Gems, however, are used for all hotels, so those run our very quickly. Gets rather frustrating.

Very fun time-passing game. The graphics are quirky and fun while also being easy on the eyes. Would definitely recommend to anyone who enjoys any tycoon-based games. While you don't have the freedom to build everything custom what you do have is still fun.

a really good game, great challenges, however money dwindles fast and is hard to build up quickly. it adds to the challenge but can be a bit frustrating sometimes, all round a great time passer you'll find yourself investing in!

Good game. Enjoyable. Wish you could do more than 1 at a time though as it get a boring in the higher levels trying to earn money and not having anything to do. If I could work on more than one the rating would be a 4. 5 stars would be if we could pick colours etc and make it more customizable

I love this game. Yes you have to pay or watch an ad to get the better benefits but the makers of the game need to make money somehow. I think the player interface works great and the upgrade system is nice too. I only wish there were more hotels to play.

Spelling mistakes all over, and unless you pay, or watch loads of ads, it is really slow to progress. Review update. 5 stars on first hotel, and only 4 on second and third. Need 15 to progress, but I've bought everything and can't work out how to improve further

Easy controls. And rather addictive. However Is there a way to spend the money from one hotel to another? Just seems kind of pointless to continue collecting a ton of money from my first hotel if everything is upgraded and i cant spend it on anything else. Edit: i already have my first 3 hotels maxed on everything. Is there going to be more hotels added. Other than the issue with the money just piling it is a very fun game.

Excellent game, very addictive, but probably the first game ever where I recommend NOT to pay to get rid of the adverts/double pay/hotel management while youre not playing. If you do, you finish the game far too quickly. Took me a week and now theres nothing left to do.

Really fun game. Love that you don't need to do in in-app purchases to complete the game. But there's a bug at the third hotel. Every time I exit the game, even though I have a full occupancy, minutes after, I open the game and they will be gone and reduced to only 2. Please fix this.

Love the game, love the graphics, love putting time in for it. I didn't rate five for the fact I feel so pressured to purchase in-game microtransactions in order to achieve upgrades I should be able to buy with in-game currency. Other than that, great game!

Absolutely love the game except as of today, the advertisements are too large for the screen and all I can do is close out of the game. Tried emailing the company to explain the problem and received an email saying it was an incorrect address. Very disappointed in this!

I'm actually enjoying this game. The ads can be a little much at times, but you need to make funds somehow. Please add more hotels!!! Just a few suggestions for improved game play: * can the guests wake up at different times * can there be a cafe option open when the restaurant is not * room service, where a guest pays more to eat on the balcony * more hotels * be able to adjust service times - a bar closing at 7pm is crazy

This was a 5 star game to me I couldn't fault it however since the latest update it is loading the very first hotel & I have to Keep selecting the one I'm actually playing which is the last one, I'm trying to take my time with it but I'm getting incredibly frustrated with being redirected to the first hotel all the time, like if I watch a video for money sometimes when I come out of the video I'm suddenly in hotel one again, I can't continue to play it like this, please fix this issue.

Great game at first, very addictive, but once you run out of energy, thats it, you dont earn enough money from the rooms to be able to buy more so you are constantly watching ads which are still not enough and you have to watch several. I spent more than half the time watching ads instead of playing the actual game.

I fell in love with this game! I have to give it 3 stars because it KEEPS STOPPING. It just freezes before watching a video when investors come in and I have to exit and restart the app. Please fix it if you can. Awesome game! UPDATE: Hasn't happened since.

Can be a great game but the mixture of 30 second that play back to back to back is very annoying. If you finish a hotel you can't take the profits over to the next.. And it can be addictive.. But if you want to watch Rage ads And Grasshopper ads over and over to improve your hotel by all means play this.. Lmao

Love the concept of the game and the detail is great however there are many glitches. - Half the time the ad's for the investor won't play and you have to shut the whole app down which looses some of your progress. - if you aren't active on the game and click back on half of your rooms are empty yet when you are active they all get filled and are turning potential customers away. This is with everything maxed out ... - when you double income from whilst not playing any other disappears.

Pretty fun. It's different in how you have to continue to pay the workers unlike in other games from the developer and you do have to balance income from expenses but it doesn't take away from the game at all. There are some small bugs here and there but nothing game breaking. I also like how when you're ready to move to the next stage, you keep managing the previous hotels.

Well love the game but atm you can only watch 1 ad at a time without closing game and reopening so this is ruining the game for me as I won't be able to complete the event without them. I have uninstalled the game b4 to fix but if I do that now I'll lose my event progress. So please fix the ads!!!!!!

Pretty enjoyable love the concept. Just want to add an idea, if you could, some how incorporate the transfer of money between hotels maybe a premium add on/update then I feel there would be better use for the idle money that is sitting around. I cannot upgrade or anything with the first hotel so money is just sitting. Or another idea would be an expansion with the first hotel to luxury, for a better replay value when traveling between hotels. Please continue the update!

Good game, but, I'm the King of the Swinger's, a jungle VIP, I've reached the top, and had to stop, and that's what's bothering me... Done 4 hotels, will there be more? If not then I'll need to uninstall the game, as it's boring without further progress. You'll get 5 stars if there's more to play for.

Things to buy with real money are pretty expensive, and there are a lot of ad benefits, which seem to be the only way to grow other than being idle. However, the game looks nice, and would be 5 stars if it's annoying problems were fixed.

This game was ok until it started glitching. One of my stars never came even though I completed the missions. I messaged support 3 times for 3 days and they haven't responded to me at ALL. I'm glad I withheld myself from spending money on it until I played a little longer or I would have lost my money on the game too. You don't even get your rewards all the time for watching the stupid videos. Not worth the download when they clearly don't offer support.

The game was fun to begin with and requires very little actual play time. Perfect for an idle game. But now... I've maxed out the first hotel, and I know you just move on to the next one but what are we supposed to do with the old hotel? It just collects money we cant use anywhere else... No point in even keeping it.

fun game but it would be a lot better if the dancing yellow customer offered more money. its very hard to make money and progress in the game. everything is so expensive, workers keep leaving and im not making enough to keep up. please offer a way to earn cash outside of the hotel because the income isnt much at all

Great Game, really enjoyed playing and using different strategies to complete each hotel. Now finished the game and nothing to do. Hope more content will be released for the game. Would also be cool if a hard mode could be added so you could play the earlier hotels but make it harder to get customers and make money

Tycoon meets idle done right. The most complex idle game of this developer. The prices of premium stuff is laughably high, but I do not use any and it plays just fine. Update: okay all the different themes and visual models if you updrage anything is just to cool. To support the devs I bought something. Looking forward to a new hotel theme :) keep up the good work guys

This is an exciting App ..oh yeah I enjoyed it.. It's kinda fun and surprising like you're buying some decor things that's surely awesome and gives a surprising look to the hotel. so yes lemme come to point which i found a problem .. if we are going to the next place you have to start with the very first means you don't have much money to buy something ...Is this possible like we would be having our some money from the previous hotel. ? Inform please If yes then please change ASAP.... THANKS_

Great game! Just....It is too difficult to start! Especially if you don't pay attention to the game before the guide is finished! So i was lost and ready to give up! I am glad i hung in there though! Throws you into the deep end, because there are too many variables! But! Ya learn if you stick with it!

Amazing game!... However, it would be great if your money was transferable between hotels. I will edit and change to 5 star if you guys correct this simple mistake and add a 5th hotel. It's been too long since its been updated and had hotels added. Thanks!

First two hotels were fine. But as I progress, it gets harder because the ads cannot load properly, considering there's no problem in our internet connection. Please do fix this because I am enjoying the game. I will only reinstall the app if this bug will be fixed immediately.

Must have must get game very enjoyable l I ts of different things to do needs a online mode though so you can play with friends and family to compete against then and the money you should make it easier to get to start of with as its easier as you progress when it should be easier at the start and harder as you go on recommend get this game passes time overall a very good game needs a few things sorted other than that it all good

It was interesting to play addictive a little but a little problem is that I have a glitch. I've maxed out my second Hotel and I still only have 4 stars and there's no way I can make any more stops right at the point where I could become 4 stars so if there's a way to fix that I would love to hear about

Really enjoy the game - love the cute characters... please could you do a "mass/ whole room upgrade" option, especially for the higher levels? I spent ages clicking over and over again to get bedrooms to 100% completion, despite having all the money I needed to upgrade them - a bit tedious! But still love the game.

Its not really idle unless you pay. Great game but no offline reward unless you pay to hire a manager, which makes me quit after 5 mins. The game itself is great but the cost for offline manager is kinda ridiculous. I dont mind paying a lil but everything just cost so high, when theres a lot others idle management game available, just doesnt seem reasonable.

A great ad free experience! There are optional upgrades that can be brought but the game allows you to play through it with no limitations for free. its fun and exciting to progress yours hotels and actually watch them grow. My favourite Phone game to date!

It is so awful. I was enjoying my 100th forced ad and then you interrupt me to play a hotel game? Thank God it just took 3 seconds and I was back ENJOYING YOUR ADS. Do you want to progress? Ads. Do you want 100 money? Ads. Do you want x2 money? ADS, ADS AND MORE ADS. An ad gives only 10min boost in the x2 boost so do the math how many ads you have to watch to reach the 2h. The game progress really slow enforcing you to only watch ads. Except if you want to pay the absurd amount of money it asks.

-1 : only 4 maps. Youll undestand once you check week after week and still 4 maps (read: there is nothing to do).... -1 : i get it, vendor needs money, so cough up $10 else watch constants ads. But $10 for 4 maps??? I caved in and dropped the cash on map2 and can only imagine the hours of ad watching to complete the game.

This game is a really fun and addicting game that only has 1 issue that i can see right now. This game revolves around watching ads(not an issue for me) to speed up gameplay or you buy managers for real money to avoid ads but keep same rewards. The issue is THAT THE ADS DO NOT GIVE YOU REWARDS OR PLAY MEANING THEY FORFIET THE REWARDS, SO THAT YOU HAVE TO BUY THE MANAGERS.

I've paid for the premium to not have any ads and the game keeps glitching. If I leave a hotel then visitors disappear, meal times are skipped or money isn't being brought in when it should. Other than that the game is fun and addictive. Kind of want my money back though...

Great game, I love it. Simple intuitive. And I don't mind watching the ads if it means to support the company. This isn't a watch to win or pay to play. You can still play without the ads. I have only started. But I'll edit this review if it's not as good as I praise.

To be fair it is good, but at the start you won't get to somewhere unless you depend on the ads. But I think it's fine since they don't offer much in-app purchase. Eventually you'll earn after you've establish some property in-game. But the double event cash ad is different from the other games.

Not too bad just needs far more levels. Completed within 2 week. When are we getting more levels. This is a good game, but lacking quantity of levels. Reduced from 2 to 1 stars. From editing previous review.

It's fun i like it and I enjoyed it but the only problem I have with it it's difficult to figure out plus too many ads to watch to get free cash and not enough cash to pay for everything in the hotel it takes a long time to upgrade everything in the hotel to get 1 star even 2 to 3 stars I hope that the game gets much simple and not too difficult and more free cash to upgrade everything in the hotel please make some changes to the game make it more fun and simple to figure out and less ads______

It's a great game to be honest. I gave it 5 stars before but now I give it 4 stars. At first it was great then I saw the prices but I was making money fast so it was no problem but when I got my second hotel the prices to me where ridiculous and it's not like u can use the profit from one hotel in another hotel

Edit on the first day!! I have all of the housekeepers and they just stop working and stand in a room or go to their lounge and sit. This is frustrating. Just started the game and it seems fun. I like having the option to pay once to remove ads but still get the benefits

I really enjoy the game, I play all of the other ones, so was really excited for the hotel one. However, even thought I've done the quests, it wont give me the prizes for it, I've done the 3 that are on the current list but still nothing. I cant see that anyone else has had the issue? Is there a way around this?

Great until the Christmas/Santa hotel. I downloaded this game in February and it's not only out of season, but the design of the hotel just feels like a mishmash of the ones you've already done. Like the beds are from the beach resort which doesn't fit with the Christmas chair and the layout is basically the same as the first hotel.

The gameplay is "watch an ad then click." Everything is behind a paywall. The only free thing to do is to watch. My favorite ad is the Experian ad, cause it's only 12 seconds, and has a big exit button :)

I've been playing TV empire tycoon and it runs well. This game is almost impossible to play and a lot of the time the ads don't even load to watch. The game says I'm making daily profits but when I reopen the game I've lost hundreds.

My ads wont load. Only once each time I log in. I try to go out and go back in, but it still isnt working correctly. Other than this issue I really like the game. Will give it 5 stars when the issue is fixed.

Really fun and engaging game! The perks you get from watching ads are totally worth it. I like that i do not have to stick around 24/7 and can get back to it when i have time and my hotel is still surviving.

Although there are very many advertisements. You do get the option to pay to get rid of them. Overall very well made game and very fun. Definitely thinking about investing in micro- transaction to support the dev. Good job! Definitely would recommend for casual mobile gamers.

The game is okay for now! Usually when a VIP comes to the hotel, Ads don't play for us to get the money. Then the VIP campaign? You have to watch MANY videos, just to get 2 hours worth. But it's challenging and time-consuming. Haven't had any technical issues.

I played 10 Days and game graphics are great and concept is amazing. However im unstalling the game due to : :Nothing can be done about the money if u complete the hotel. :Almost watched 100+ adds in just 10 days whic im pissed of the most. So i dont want to move with 3rd hotel. The Developer is just earning by adds.. So i guess u dont need us.

It's a really good game and gave been addicted to it but let down by the fact that when you finish with one hotel you gain money from it that you can't use toward your next , so can have millions building up but can't do anything with it. They could atleast let you withdraw a percentage each day. Fix this !!

Its a ok game but really slow moving and gets boring fast. And so slow at making money. To buy upgrades with real money is quite high for what lil u get from them. And ad boost 90% of the time not even worth it. To watch ads for idel boost is only 10 mins im not about to watch 1200 ads before i go to work so the game dont time out.

I've really enjoyed this game but I got very close to finishing the final hotel little Camelot and it crashed and took me right back to the beginning of the hotel after spending weeks upgrading it. Please can you sort this issue out. Thanks

I recommend giving this idlw one a try because unlike most idle games this one is actually f2p friendly and you don't need to even spam ads to get huge profits, it's satisfying to hear the music nad see the customers using services in your hotel. If you still are hesitant this game is updated a lot. The first time I played there were like only 4 hotels but now there is almost double that amount and they also add events everytime one is finished. Give it a chance at least try it.

Ive had this version for a long time now. I should have dropped a review way back when i started playing it Ive had it for years on my phone and multiple phones lemme say..as this is such a stress buster and has super funny graphics and attention to detail should not go unappreciated. So Kudos to the team.GOOD JOB on the game. Ive played almost all of your developed games and byfar this is my fav.

Enjoyable and challenging game. But once you have finished all the hotels you can't reset them w/out new acc . It's worth paying extra to have ads removed and night time to finish quicker. Makes the game more enjoyable. I am sorry to say (might be in the minority) I prefer the competitions as they were before, dancing king was giving away only one $100,000's. Where is the strategy, challenge and persistence to reach just the $15,000,000 mark to earn 5%. When is competition for last 3 managers?

It's fun at first, but they need to add the ability to purchase other amneties in the hotels that have already been completed. It's a waste of time otherwise, they gain all this money and you can't do anything with it. It becomes monotenous and stops being enjoyable unfortunately

Pacing is too slow. The money gained is so low that it forces you to watch many ads to gain money to use to have any kind of fun in the game. It got to the point that I was watching ads longer than playing the game. No thanks. Didn't encounter any bugs. Game works great.

At first this game was fun to play but if u reach 5__ in a hotel u can't upgrade it anymore also u can't use the money from 5__ hotel to ur second hotels. So no use for making a hotel 5__ also it's very hard to make a hotel 5__ cause at first ur income will be in negative and u have to watch ads to earn more money. It's a little bit boring also kills lots of time. It will be fun to play if I could use money from one hotel to another

Starting each hotel is unfair because you generally don't make a profit. Some hotels like the events are designed so your cleaning crew takes paths so long they can't clean in time. Worst of all, watching ads for money fails sometimes and I don't recieve the money I should. Another game designed to sap players of their real money.

Very hard to get started, without the momey boosts from watching ads BUT you don't actually get the rewards from watching ads cause the game automatically redirects you to the play store and has to reload, when you switch back to it! So infuriating!

It takes ages to be able to buy something. Everything is so expensive. It took me quite a few weeks to even get a double room. And there is loads of things to track like electricity. Would put 0 stars if I could. __ Wish I could enjoy it

This game is good but the tech support is not good at solving the problem.. i did many time give them a feedback but NO RESPOND AT ALL. I encounter alot of not responding and error. And sometime the game kick out it self. I am very disappointed to the tech support.

Good game, but I think we should be able to keep the money from other fully upgraded hotels to use on one that hasn't been fully upgraded. Instead of leaving the money earned in each individual hotel. Maybe also add achievements to earn gems.

Honestly could have been fun, but the some of the ads force you out of the app and into the app store to download whatever ad you were just watching. It got very annoying because it was pretty much every other ad.

There's a bug now I've noticed after the event hotel disappeared/finished where when I open the app again (after closing the process), it doesn't bring me back to the last hotel I was working on and always brings me to the first hotel in the list. It's very annoying

Love the game but i have ran out of things to do, i have all the upgrades, could be a good idea if there were different floors with more rooms and different types of entertainment like arcades etc. Also more levels would be good too

This idle game to me covered all aspects and has been my favorite. Along with all the funny things to watch theirs plenty to do and enough upgrades in this one.and plenty ways to build up your money.. Even though their is in game purchases this game gives you plenty of opportunity's to make cash! I never felt the need to have to buy anything. Good job! I'm looking for more games from them and hope they stay away from pay to play games.These are the games that we should support though if able.

I like the game but it's not perfect. Despite using all my gems for upgrades and using cash to pay for the needed hotel upgrades there seems to be no way for me to get even one 5 star hotel to move to the next level. I don't mind all the ads and I'm not sure why we can use money saved in n another hotel.

I do like playing this game but keeps showing that there is not enough energy to build a certain part, even when I've just opened the game and not upgraded or built anything. Very frustrating, going nowhere fast with this game, thinking about u installing it actually __

This is a fun game where you can save money and be forced to build a bar before you can reach your money goal!!! I like the game, don't get me wrong. But I hate the way it forces you to bye stuff when you were planning on saving up to bye everything at once! Why did you make this feature and why do you want to force people to bye stuff when they've only got so much money.

Just started and unlocked the bar area but it's nice and relaxing and i can play it at work. And if not i can close it and reopen it later and make double the money watching an ad real quick. It's great.

Game is superb.. but without ad watching you can't upgrade the things in your room. Because each upgrade cost is high. Earning is very low. Without watching upgrading the things will take 1 year to complete the 1st hotel challenge. I'm uninstalling

Ths game is awesome.... But if we can upgrade multiple items in a room at single click it will be way better.... Also if we have enough we must beable to buy a fully furnished room for somelower cost... Some more amenities like kids activities etc canbe added which will make the game more fun

Even if it's fun but I found 2 annoying bug of this game. Firstly, I often waste time watching ads in order to receiving some money in game. Secondly, I sometimes stuck during playing and I couldn't even move anything.

Great game, a few glitches with bonus cash and the extra customers game keeps getting stuck with them on. Have to restart the game each time also the game looses customer on me. I have a full hotel and then restart the game due to above glitches and then I have only half the customers.

Fun game but it is obvious this is just a money maker. I have maxed out the first two resorts but need 9 stars to get to the next, of course. Sorry, but I am not spending any money on this and from reading other comments it is probably just as well. Obviously I still would not be able to get to the last resort anyway. Too many ads as well. Deleting now!

Abit slow to start with but not a bad game to kill some time on. Its ashame that when your not playing you make upto 2hours of profit anything after that you get nothing. I suppose it's a way to make you keep coming back. You have to depend on adverts to watch to get some decent start up money from investors. Apart from these afew things for only playing a day. I cant a better review would need at least a week for better feedback

So i have been playing for 2 weeks now and i have moved on to the "stanley resort". The advertisements honestly helped progress. i wish i could do more with the first hotel that i already made into a 5 STAR hotel just so i have a reason to switch from one to another. Its collecting money but i cant do anything else with the money. If i complete the whole game i am out of it and wont further support it if the road ends. Thank you
Ok so looks like some effort into fixing the game to stop it crashing all the time, BUT , it still crashes!!! When trying to watch an ad it crashes, Not quite as much, it sucks cos its a decent game.

This game is good, I really like it...but the issue is that the playable ads ruin the ablility to view other ads in order to do business with the gold dude. Can you please do something about that, because it's ruining the experience.
This is a fun game and the upgrades you get for the hotel help a lot. The thing that doesn't help a lot is all of the crashes and when I watch a video it also crashes.
Overall an entertaining game. One thing I would change would be the ad to skip the night. I'm happy to let an ad run to get coins, but the ad to get past a hotel of people sleeping is annoying.
The lower hotels become pointless as you move up. It'd be great if they could integrate them as you move up. Also, sometimes the ads are LONG and then you get left without the reward you waited for.

Both my hotels should be 5 stars. That's NOT the case. So they give an update only that opened up 2 new hotels, one in which is a holiday christmas theme. Well see here's the thing you cannot open the 3rd hotel because it REQUIRES 9 stars. Well how the hell is that possible when I only have 4 stars a piece for hotel 1 and 2. Get it together DEVS. Automatic DELETE. what a waste of the time and days I've spent on this useless game. Had promise and even got the bonus UPGRADES, still Nothing. TRASH

I love to play this game to pass time. I bought the ad dog a d personally it was worth it cause the game goes by a lot faster. But you can play perfectly fine without it. You only get ads when you are doing something to earn money or what not. :D I do recommend this game.

I have read all the negative comments and issues some ppl have, I downloaded this game and I can't put it down, I look forward to coming home just to play it. Sometimes you have to spend a little money to have a enjoyable game, I spent the money to get rid of the ads. I find it easy to make money to improve your hotel. So what if the guests wonder around aimlessly, you still make money. Great game that provides hours of entertainment

I love the game and there was literally one thing that I disliked! It was the amount of money that you had to pay for certain items such as the bar (6000). Well done for everything else though as it is a great game and clearly had a lot of work put into it. The idea was absolutely fantastic and you ver much pulled it off! I love it!

Very good game about managing your money, but it sucks when you watch an ad to get money when you really need it and the screen just goes black and you don't get anything -_-. Overall, a very good game __

My personal experience was not great it's really slow and I bought everything and was still boring it's NOT FUN you just stress out cuz is not an ability game it's really good looking game and funny to see the people with different costumes but not worth it but I can see some people liking it just not me or any young person my age my friends tried it out and they'd pass so that's that

Boring. I've done the 4 hotels. Maxed out the stars on them. Now nothing else to do. Give us more hotels to build. Also it's impossible to properly finish it all without paying for gems. Ive tried to contact the developers but the email address isn't active.

Upgrading hotel only possible through watching ads. On 2nd hotel, the operational cost is way too high compared to the income, and the money from other hotels are not transferable. It doesn't make sense at all

I love this game! The graphics and gameplay is nice and easy. There are other hotels u can manage and u get money off them too. I wish theres an option where you yourself can choose which room the guests go.

Unlike other Codigames apps, this one game is way too slow. The rewards from the ads are very little, so it's frustrating. I know it's idle app but making money shouldn't way too slow. At least offer good rewards with ads.
Fun little game to pass time. Ads to achieve goals faster gets quite repetitive but certainly help. It's easy enough, gradually gets more challenging and free to play. Overall pretty good.

The game is pretty fun and if you pay the little bit of money to double your profits and turn off advertisements it makes it even more fun great Pastime fun to watch the little characters run around I'd say it'll be better when they add more stuff but right now it's fantastic

Reply to Codigames: Yes the money from the ads are great however my issue with the game is that there is no way to see why the characters are upset so, I am just watching ads in order to make money that should not be necessary. This is an ad generated game. There is no real way to advance without watching ads for additional money. The guests are upset and leave, but you don't know why, so that it can be fixed. So you have to watch ANOTHER ad to quickly get more guests. Lame!

The game is great but I think I've uninstalled and reinstalled the game in 3 days like 30 times because ads stop appearing due to some kind of bug. At this point I find it funny that they suggest the No Ad purchase.

good game, i enjoy those type of games. Tho only 4 stars because the game has often lag spikes making characters glitch. It also could use more randomness for when people go in and get out of the hotel. Would make it more interesting.

So much fun! Very addictive. I wish there was a help icon. I have a few questions. *Edit* I'm going to go from 5 stars down to 4. On your next update please add a "max upgrade" button. It's very annoying to have to push the upgrade button dozens of times to upgrade every item in a room individually. It would be great if, for example, you had "Sofa Upgrade $1,200" or "Sofa Max Upgrade $15,000" as well as "Room Max Upgrade 525,000" or whatever the prices may be.

Would be better if I could get the videos for extra cash to play. About 80% of the time I hit Play Video and it just goes back to the hotel with no extra cash! Fix the problem and I'll rate you higher. And yes, I did send an email to support.....but no reply yet. Still no reply. Uninstalling. Looks like I'm not the only one having this issue - with no reply or comments from the developers. SAD!!!

Have played the game on and off for sometime now, starting to see issues with collecting large amounts of money past the 1m mark. It prompts to say when you have been offline that you have earned X amount but it doesn't go in to the usable funds pot. Needs fixing

When I first downloaded this game I had no idea what it would be like but after 3 days or so I had already had mostly everything upgraded. I have 6 single rooms and 3 double rooms everytime I leave the app the people in the double rooms at the time glitch out so I'm losing that extra money. They should let us use all the money we earn accessible for all hotels because my first hotel has $200,000+

"Hello, I knew this moment was coming!! So today I finally made it to the last hotel which I had been hyped for because the crystal paradise resort was challenging and beautiful. But now that I get to Santa's shelter its supposed to be the next level up. But I feel like I've gone down to the standards of my very first hotel. Also I hate that money doesn't transfer over from previous hotels, I mean theres not really a reason to keep the money there if you can't buy anything else.

Id rate it 5 stars but I honestly can't. I paid for upgrades in the game long ago when it was being updated but thes no longer any updates, all there is, is events. Why do I need to skip ads if it's only going to further me in events that can't even further me in the normal game? Not worth putting any money into unless there's an actual good update

Fun idle game, it isn't too difficult to progress. The grind is there but ads can also provide some quick cash, and you can keep progressing and upgrade with different hotels. Very good game, very good experience

The game is okay overall. It's almost impossible to get the amount of money you need to build things without the watching ads. Don't waste your time watching the adds thinking you'll get double your earnings, because you won't.

What hotel have you stayed at in 2019-2020 is 12 for a room. I enjoyed this game 4 starts due to it's easy when you get the hang of the game before I bought the "no ads" they can be annoying but there was no massive pop up but they wasn't long ads and they wouldn't crash my phone so that was a plus,

I'm going to play the game because it's fun. But y'all are a bunch of money grubbing hacks. Pathetic

It is a very fun game with lots of things to do. I think it deserves 4 stars because it has everything to be a good game but there is something missing. I think the need to add a daily rewards (money) so then it is easier for beginners to upgrade things.

I want to like this game. seems fun and extensive. However, the ROI on ad watching mixed with a fair bit of reliance is almost unbearable. 45 seconds for 200 cash? I can barely upgrade anything worthwhile for that. And the important person comes all the time. Even instant sunrise takes 40 seconds. And no, $11 for ad removal is not soemthing I am gonna do. You gain hourly but you have to pay daily wages and when game closed your residents don't dont move, like to get food, which gets most cash
The game was (is) enjoyable but there were a lot of bonuses behind ads and they got annoying pretty quickly. I thought it was worth it to pay to have the ads removed and it really is.

Really enjoying the game. Only downside is you need to earn cash from completing tasks and not diamond as takes too long building up. EDITED - was interesting for about 2 days. Fun - but so many ads and they don't always work. It's super annoying to rely on ads to progress, particularly when most of the time they won't load so your bonus is aborted.

It was a little difficult to start, becuase it wast like other idle games, but soon it became a fun experience. I was suprised when my chefs walked out, but it added a layer of realism that I really liked.

New to the game and I have been enjoying it. I love this game and all it's features. I can't find any reason why I'd wanna uninstall or restart except for I want there to be more hotels. Like idea you can have a tech area. And it can be located off the coast. Im almost done and I don't want to wait for more hotels on this game

I enjoy the hotel n it's challenges to a point. Evertime there's a even it's impossible to achieve a star, n the ads always seem to freeze r stop when your trying to meet important milestones. To many glitches men.

Kind of addictive. I like this a lot more than the other idle games as it is more complex. It's a little more constructive so it doesn't get boring within a week. All the other idle games I played are pretty much the same games, just a different theme. I like this one though.

I have enjoyed this game for years...first on my iPad and now on my phone..I've recently deleted this game from my iPad because the only thing to play is the codi hotel which is repetitive and boring I really wish the game makers would do a major update of all existing hotels as in adding more rooms venues etc to make the game challenging again ...I'm almost done with the hotels on my phone and if there's no new major updates or hotels I will be deleting it also..make this game awesome again!!!!

my opinion is you guys have to make that the hotel will run even if we quit the game. this is because not everyone have their leasure time to play this game and some of the people need to quit this game for sleep or working or studying. this simple feature alone can attract many people to play this great game in the future. keep it up the good work!
