Came back to re-install due to cleaning-up my device, so far, the game itself is NOT that P2W, just watching ads and let the cash flows while waiting for the loot to come-by so I can upgrade better stuff. Thanks for the game and I'll recommend my IRL friends to try it out. :)

I dont like how you have to continually have to watch ads to get enough money to even but 1 thing but its optional you don't make a lot of progress if you dont but the reason why I rated it for 5 was because it's such a good game it also teaches you how to save your money when you grow up and work in a hotel if you end up working in 1 but overall it's such a good game and I think you should download it

It was the best game I've ever played in 7 years the Tycoon idle games are really fun to play but this one is a game-changer because it is a hotel styled game with many hotels and different layouts of the map I hope you enjoy the game as much as I enjoyed the game.

To be honest.. I really liked this game! But there's some things to be improved.. I would love to see it more realistic, like who stand infront of the t.v like 30-40 cm away, and also who cleans the bathroom while they are using it? I will change my ratings after these things are updated...
Fun, easy but progress is often a little slow. Simple design but still aesthetically pleasing. I enjoy playing it from time to time and I'd recommend it.

Nice change of pace! Instead of always having to buy the newest upgrades available, you have to manage your team beforehand to make sure they dont quit on you so you can make the most profit. Waiting takes awhile though but at least the videos are optional!

Really like it, it's more of a challenge than other tap games. It takes more strategy with your upgrades to run the hotel. Great way to pass the time.

Change my four star to a five star! I love this game alot. Its great that I dont have to sale one property to open another. I have the freedom to visit the hotels I have open. It's easy to upgrade. It takes time but other that I like it.
the only way to profit is through in app purchases or ads that offer small amounts of money. sometimes there's a good amount but it goes so quickly with all the expenses.

Really fun game once you have played for a while. Lets you have a good idea of how business works. It's a challenging game that takes a lot of time though but it isn't just a really easy idle game that you'll play once

I really like this game - I think it's actually quite incredible! Great fun being able to upgrade and watch your hotel grow because it makes you feel accomplishment of the hotel. Love the animation, everything. Really good!

Fun game with plenty of freebies to keep you entertained plus premium purchases if you choose. Nice and interactive with the ability for offline production. Recommended to me by a friend so I would recommend as well if your into sim type games.

Love the game but has frequent issues connecting so I can watch ads for double rewards and it glitches away my 2hrs of double rewards when I go out of the game and back in. Very frustrating. If it doesn't resolve I will probably delete

4/11/20 updating my review. The new special event feels hardcore micro transaction. Once you get 1 star it slows down dramatically making it seem you need to buy the bonuses. That greatly effects how I feel about this game since codigames has done great in the past. OR add more stuff to do in the weekly special event. I've emailed them this request, they do answer emails. More people need to request this. Special event could be much better.

I thought this was such a good game until i realized you have to "buy" gems to get the special things for your rooms or whatever and u cant use ur game money for gems which is ridiculous. You can't possibly get 5 stars on on the third hotel i have almost upgraded everything in the game and still only 4 stars.... looks like i paid $17.99 for no ads for nothingggg because now i cant even finish my last hotel. Not very impressed, especially because it cost me soooo much.

BE PREPARED TO WATCH MORE ADS THAN YOUVE EVER HAD TO IN YOUR LIFE... and theyre not short either. 30-50secs long on average. Ads for extra cash, ads for extra guests, ads for double profit (10mins each, max 2hr = 12 ads), ads to skip night time, ads to double earnings on your return. ADS ADS ADS. For an "idle style" game its a bit naff that youre only allowed to idle for 2 hours. Not surprising though... so they can force you to watch all the ads to catch up. Still got bugs. Support no help!

A bit slow in pace but satisfying. A true game that doesn't require money to advance but it is available for those who are willing to pay! Good sense in Minor details which show us how much effort you have put in creating this fun and addictive game. Good job!

Love the game, but there is a bug that that annoys me a lot. I am on the second hotel, when I exit out of the game and re-enter all of the guests in the double rooms disappear and I get no profits from them.
$14.99 for one upgrade! That is insane. Right from the beginning, the game is very slow unless you watch tons of ads or pay. No thanks, uninstalled.

It was fun but you will be stuck on the second hotel unless ypu pay actual money. So i have upgraded EVERYTHING in my first 2 hotels and i still cant get all 5 stars. I woukd have to purchase gems to be able to move on. So i wouldnt reccomend this game. Its very sad that thats how you have to move on.

My parents both run hotels (GM and Regional Manager respectively, for different companies) and this, while dumbed down to make it an enjoyable game, is surprisingly realistic. While I'll never go into the hotel business, I like this game a lot! Good job guys.
It takes too much money to upgrade while the in-game money takes too long to get. This games is actually forcing you to watch ads to get the in-game money to upgrade anything. Don't bother to play

This game is really fun it's a time killer. It gives me a challenge that no game gives me. I would recommend this game to other people. I wish I could go on first person and walk around the hotel that would be really cool. This game can teach you patience because the money on this game adds up slowly and that's fine with me.

In general a pretty fun game. Would like for more hotels though since Ive cleared them all. Having some of your money from previous hotels transfer over to the new ones would be very helpful. Especially for the bigger hotels.

Started out as a great game...but i'm on the 2nd hotel now and if i travel to the 1st hotel and come back all the people staying in the double rooms disappear and all my profits become losses and it happens even when i leave the game and come back.. it's so frustrating...fix this please....

*Update* I really enjoyed this game however I'm sad now because I've completed all the hotels and there's nothing else to do but play events which get pretty old since they all seem to be the exact same hotel and you can only get stars if you purchase the VIP pack which is only good the 4 or 5 days the event lasts, but that's still pointless anyways since there's nothing to do after you complete all the hotels except collect money you can't spend ___¡â_ nice temporary game I guess.

Really addicting, I may or may not have gotten 5 stars on EVERY hotel in the game... so far. This game is different from other tycoon games, the biggest difference I love is that you need to have extra money to pay your employees. If you spend all of your money on a hotel room and don't have any money to pay your employees they will leave.

Obviously love their attention to details and level of thought. Not simply about making money with simple upgrades involves some level of planning with have funds to pay staff, electricity to power the hotel, and parking on top of the hotel side aspect. Really flew through first 3 hotels but game gets a bit more challenging as you acquire hotels. Watch the patrons of the hotel and the various special managers etc. Like a subtle pop culture "where's waldo"
WAY too many ads. Process of making money, WAY too slow. You have to start over when you reach a certain level, and lose ALL progress. It's fun, but VERY painful.

Great game, not like most games. You actually have to think and plan where to spend the money. Even though its only In early stages, it does seem promising. Having already completed everything there is already I look forward to receiving further updates for the game
Very addictive! I love the art style! No bugs to be found. And best of all, every single ad is consented and not unwanted. Thanks for such an amazing game!

One of the best games I've played. The graphics are amazing, the controls are easy best of all It's a game that takes some work. It's not a game where you can finish it in one day. The thing that needs improvement is it would be amazing if you could transfer money from other hotels and vice versa other than that I would definitely recommed this game.

Nice time waiters. Edited: had to drop two stars. The Christmas lvl increses the price of all upgrades and lowers the return on all of the investments. It took weeks to finish that level without spending any actual money. Then the Arabian hotel increases/decreases everything even further. Sadly it stopped being fun. Plus their is no incentive to keep hotels open after you have purchased all of the upgrades.

Its a really good game and addictive, I even paid to remove ads. I was wondering if you guys could hear a suggestion I have about it though. I was wondering if it would be ok for us to use the money we make from one hotel for the other, or like to make some sort of "money transfer" to make it seem more realistic. Its fund and all starting from new but I feel like it would make the game more interesting instead of having to forget about one hotel while working on the other besides that great app.

Rather tedious experience. You can play the game normally, but the exponential growth in profits on your hotels doesn't happen until the levels are almost already max upgraded, which is...just bad design, IMO. The point of a Tycoon game is to be able to continue building up your empire or business, not reach a halt at the end of it. Ads are plagued across this game, as well as micros that are intentionally trying to make you spend too much money on things that don't feel fairly priced.

This is the best Idle Tycoon game out there. You actually get to buy things to make your hotels nicer and more amenities which adds a really interactive element. Most games you don't get to customize whatever the Tycoon is like a hotel, restaurant or airport. You just save enough money for the next level to get unlocked then you wait for the money to unlock another level. They get boring fast but this game keeps your interest as you save up to buy pools, better beds, more staff, etc. 5 stars!

There's some basic balance issues in the game right now with early income to upgrade costs. Also upon unlocking a new location, the game implies all your money is shared as a cumulative total across all locations. That's not the case however, so upon completely upgrading one hotel, all the income from that's becomes useless because it just accrues on that map and isn't able to be spent elsewhere.

Pretty fun so far. Still on my first hotel and the dancing man doesn't work all the time. He'll definitely go away when I send him out, but the videos only play sometimes. I also tried skipping night and that didn't work either. However as others have said, I'm glad I'm not pressured to spend money to level up and the graphics are nice on the eyes

There is a very tiny problem but still kinda annoying,when I get off the game for say like an hour and I come back the cheffs are already coming into the restaurant when it's been open for some time then before they even hit the table to get cooking the restaurant closes and all those people are asked out furthermore there is an issue with the rewards after an add... I don't know if it's just the wifi but the video will load every once in a great while but other times I've watched a black bufer

Could have been fun but it just became stressful because the balance between how much you earn and how much you pay for upgrades was off by a lot, and the ads didn't help at all either because the reward it gives is so little and the amount you pay for upgrades is much higher. To do almost anything you have yo pay 10 dollars. And. It's not a single purchase, there at least like 3. And then there are the gems, another moneygrab. This is a fun game, I don't even hate the ads. Other than that, its fun.

Definitely addicting! This game is a total time waster, yet challenging. You do not have to pay a dime to be successful, ads are the key and opening up every 2 hours or so to reap the rewards. Definitely want more hotels, more guests in the restaurant and casino. Currently have 5 managers. Ready to ball out!!

Fun while it lasted. So, it's just the 5 hotels? I was enjoying it, even spent $11, then the game just ended, can't even replay. No new challenges. That's disappointing __. Ok, so these events are even worse. Just 4 days and you literally have to spend money if you want to be at all competitive. It's just a cash grab now. Come out with real, new content and I will play again and even spend money here and there. Reduced from 3star to a 2 star because if the new event structure

It's too slow to accumulate money to do anything. I waste $3,000 on a double room and the profit per hour is less than $4? The payment for watching an advertisement is less than $1,000? I'll lose interest in this game, mainly because the only thing I can do is watch advertisements. It's not fun. I would not recommend this game.

You can get x2 money without watching the ads! After you have already entered the app once and received your money from being offline (you must watch the video here ot get the 2x profits) you must close out of the app. Then go back into the app. Once you've gotten in, select where you'd go to watch the videos for 2x profits as fast as you can and spam the button until the bar is full. You can only do this after already having opened the app a first time and closing the app out.

amazing and fun game. i hand many props to the developers for making the game independent from in app purchases; meaning you dont need to buy anything to progress in the game. even if you did, the prices are fair! i love this game and its super satisfying to keep customers happy and use money wisely. the graphics are great and is a super cute style. my only concern is the lazy duplication of rooms when doing the other side of the hotel and people walking through walls and furniture.

Excellent game, gives the user the opportunity to practice some abilities while playing and having fun. I wouldn't modify anything about the game since it needs the adds to have earnings. Which is better than blocking the services until we pay to have all the experiences of the game. A great deal.

As soon I join the game it takes long and longer for me to play game it just shows me the theme of y'all hotel game

This is a good game. It does have a lot of adds whenever you want to do something. A lot of things are money and I don't like that. Other then that it's a nice game.

It's half and half. It's a nice idea and game, but has some issues; the services offered (i.e., restaurants, bars, etc.,) don't allow you to actually serve ALL your customers. The parking lots also don't offer max capacity, and while you advertise it only works while you're in the app (if you have more beds than parking spaces.)

This was a very good game at first but as you progresses to other hotels, it gets so very expensive that I can do nothing. I have no choice but to keep watching ads. And it has bugs too but it isn't that troubling, if you aren't annoyed at the receptionist looking the other way. Good but it gets boring later.

Fun game , but I want a way to improve my gameplay if I play for a long time. I.e., a research that can improve hotel open time or eating time reduced. I also notice the amount of ads are just never ending, if it can drop by a little bit, the game won't be as demanding in using ads to progress.

I couldn't get very far before I got annoyed. The game feels way too reliant on watching ads to speed up the progress. And I understand that it is an idle game, but the amount of time I needed just to get a new room without ads was just too much for me. If you had $10.99 to spend on getting rid of them, you would have a much more approachable experience.

This game is interesting, it helps you sort of keep track of money. I wish there was more freedom, as in I wish you had more of a choice on how to decorate rooms while also getting to play the game how it is. I also wish you weren't forced to buy certain things, for example the bar costs 6,000 and when I eventually made 6,135 I was forced to buy the bar! But all in all a decent game.

It's a slow game to pass the time, and its really more ad watching simulator to do anything. The reward doesn't even show up most times. The way everything's set up is a bit confusing and the pop ups go by to fast to read. The art is cute though
Game is good but way too many ads

Great game but it is virtually impossible to make any real progress without watching reward-after-viewing ads. Or you can buy the ad remover but I believe it was either $5 or $10 for that feature. Great concept but the need for ads is too great. Perks only last a few seconds after viewing.

The game itself is alright. It takes a while to progress but without spending money or watching ads it's almost impossible to progress. I refuse to spend money to advance so I've been watching ads right up until yesterday when the only ad I get is a black screen you cant back out of without closing the game. FIX THIS BEFORE I DELETE THIS GAME PERMANENTLY. I shouldnt have to beg to watch your advertisements.

I would rate this game 3 to 4 stars if it weren't for the block that keeps you from advancing past the second hotel without in-app purchases, rendering any functionality obsolete once you reach the limit of what you can do without spending money. Then there isn't even a point to opening the app.

4 instead of 5 is because the restaurant part is awful. In the first hotel, it isn't so bad. In hotel #2, you can serve 10 people at a time, but can have 22 guests in the hotel. Please update to give the ability to serve half the guests at once

Its ok, but get rid of things the game doesnt need. I watch adds but dont always get the reward. I need LESS power ti build and now i can't buy anything. Overall a amazing experience and I enjoy playing this game a lot but with one issue is that I can restart my data on the game. Very fun and time killing I love hosting my own hotel it's fun and I love tycoon games wish it was easier to make money though.

Revenue is wasted. Once you finish the first hotel, you end up making a ton of money. It says you can use your revenue to improve your empire, but there is no way to spend the collected money. It is not shared among the hotels so it feels like such a waste, especially since you can switch between hotels. Ads are prevalent, which can be annoying but they are optional. The only way to have no ads is to purchase the dog. That may not work for some, but not a problem with me.
It's a great game, kills time easily.
I just started, and already I'm obsessed. It's amazing in many ways: The style, the idea, everything. I really enjoy it!

I found this game to be unsatisfying in that all you are required to do is buy upgrades for the various parts of the hotel. The only challenge is learning to manage your cash so that you cover wages and expenses. You are locked into what upgrades you can purchase and where you can purchase them, so there is little skill required to play.
I would give a 5 star except i dont know what im doing so im learning the best i can!

Very bad app no matter how much guests I have the earnings remains fixed .also the add man suddenly stops coming in the gameplay pls fix else I would uninstall it

Lovig the game so far. Poorly paced. Codigames has a couple good idle games with great pacing. But then it releases stinkers like these. Upgrades cost several hundred in-game dollars yet you earn only a couple dollars every few minutes. Even the ad money boosts aren't enough to upgrade anything. There's an issue if you hit a progress plateau at the end of the tutorial.

I kind of like this game, but after playing two days it really is nothing but an ad watching campaign to get anything done. Can you do it without watching ads, probably, but then you would have to wait so long to get money to upgrade. Thankfully I didn't spend any real money. I like simulation games such as this one where you build instead of destroy. So if you have a lot of time to waste this game may be for you.

I think this game is really good!! And quite realistic in the aspects of It taking a while to get it going, a lot of criticism from the customers and having barely any income. It hard going in the beginning but once you get on your feet it's a really entertaining game.

So far, it starts off really slowly. It did have a great tutorial though, and it is starting to get a tiny bit fun.the only problem with us far as that the beginning is so slow you're constantly watching ads. The permanent upgrades are pretty expensive for a mobile game.

Blah-blah! Was fun the first 2 and 1/2 stages. You build a hotel save money & upgrade. However you cannot transfer money from one hotel to a next which doesn't make sense! If I own the hotels then I should be able to move revenue from hotel to hotel, This is not the case. The maxed out/ completed hotal continue to make money (billions) but with no way to spend it__. Developer should rethink upgrading. Especially because your rooms are limited to six rooms per hotel not very smart.

I've finished the game. Took quite some time, long journey, super slow but can be faster paced. Enjoyed seeing everything improve and it's finally time to put the game out to pasture. Would never play again but I don't regret one moment of it. Have not found any game similar in style to come anywhere close to this one. Y'all done good

It's a fun game to play and I would rate it higher however on multiple occasions I have purchased coins and never received them (the money did get taken from my bank account as well), and is a hassle to try and get the purchases restored. Also unlike their other game Theme Park, the boost only has a max of 2 hours where as the other game is 12 hours. The double bonus isn't long enough and there is never enough videos.

As the only hotel game I could find, it's actually pretty great. Fun, interactive gameplay, with not too many ads and not too much waiting- you should try it. Ads are hit or miss, sometimes they'll work, sometimes they won't. Can't wait to see more updates!

Well the game was good overall, but something keep picking me. Its a good quick few minute time passer. Your not gonna play for long periods of time. It takes time to build up money in the game. The faster you upgrade the faster you build. Its pretty cool looking after all the ins and outs of your hotel. It has a cutesy art style which makes it eye pleasing. I like how the tutorial isnt super pushy. It shows you the very basics and thats it. It only force buys like 3 things because they are essential to the game.

A good game to play. I really like earning money and spending it on my hotels even when it takes a really long time.

cool game, i love how it change the design eveyrtime you level it up. but there's a huge problem here. there's a bug where i doesn't give the prize after you watching the ads. I hope you can fix it as soon as possible because i really enjoy playing this.

It's ok enough..good game to distract you from the banality of day to day but had to delete it after one week. The Game functionality is awesome but since the recent update the game has started to lag a lot. Whenever I try clicking on the Dancing King the ad doesn't load. It pauses so please if you could fix it ASAP. Apart from that a perfect gameplay experience.
amazing, fun, and addicting little game

The game itself was fun to play, there's a few practical efficiency issues stunting growth in the later hotels. It was great to pay for features that worked. It was a good game at first, but when you go to the next stage you start from zero again does, not allow you to carry over absolutely any money, and the cost to upgrade is twice as high and much more difficult to upgrade. Would be better if you could at least carry over some money

It was okay until the app just suddenly started freezing and making me miss opportunities to get more cash for my hotel by watching ads and then it wouldn't let me click anything or kept messing up then it wouldn't open at all and I had barely had the app for a day. Rly fun no ads it is so much fun unlinke others

Game hang the my device plz fix this bug.

If you want to have progress in the game, you have to watch ads constantly to get the extra boost. Even sometimes after you watch certain ads, you won't get that extra cash. It's a fun game though, but what a shame if you have to keep watching ads to lvl up your hotel.

It was a nice idea and it looked good but it was incredibly boring. Everything was priced too high so I was forced to watch the ads in order to do basically anything. It kind of sucks sitting there watching my front desk turn people away because there aren't enough rooms while knowing that I can't buy any more rooms for another couple hours of play time. I rarely make reviews when I'm unhappy with a game but this one was throughly disappointing.

I paid for the premium version of the game and absolutely loved it. Although at Santa's Resort and Arabian Nights Resort whenever I logged into the game there was no money made. I had to switch hotels when logging out to make money at those 2 resorts. And when you do consecutive upgrades in a row at all resorts the game freezes. Really good otherwise and just waiting for more hotels now:)

I really enjoyed playing this game, and I made a lot of progress in collecting different managers. However, I've finished all the hotels. A very fun game if it wasn't for the extremely slow progression. True idle games let you progress quickly through the game but you have to watch copious amounts of adverts to progress; they are optional but if you wany any real chance of getting to a double room you need those ads. it is quite fun as a casual once in a while game but to get more money, you need to watch ads however that is still better than pop up ads because you choose to watch the ads. Very nice game, though at the beginning you get a lot of your income by watching ads. This affects a lot your income especially at the second hotel where everything becomes serious.

The game is really very nice. I used to play the University tycoon game and it was also very good. The only issue is the ads. The amount shown to be given after watching the ad and the amount given after the ad are always different. Please resolve this issue and this game might get a lot better.

Please developers make this game has better development curves. There's no way i can upgrade things normally without clicking on ads. Its literally forcing me to watch ads so that i can progress. This is one of those games with ad economy like crazy but 80-90% of the time the ads don't even work

Love the game. Very addictive and fun. Had to rely on ads to make enough income to upgrade and maintain a steady rate. Overall it's fun, buy once you finish both hotels. There's nothing left for you to so but watch a simulation.

I really enjoy the game, but was wondering if there will be more hotels to work with besides the weekend event ones, as I've gotten through all the existing hotels thus far. Very good game the only problem that I have is when the bonus characters appear the hotel doesn't change. I wish you guys gave different stuff as well. It gets repetitive and boring. I'm on level 3 and I don't want to play it anymore. Everything else is well done.

It's a good game, I'm swear. But, when it came to play the ads, especially the 'Klondike Adventure' ads, it became crash, and cannot play any ads in the next/future. So, I must log out and log in again. Please fix it. Thank you.

It's an okay game. Too many ads for my liking and it needs to have more to it. Maybe like different colors or furniture or other things to add into the hotel. It's a virtual game so you can put anything you want into it if its given to you.

Just started playing and not too bad. There are adds to watch stuff but they are given as a choice and so don't really cause any problems. Game is pretty straight forward, offers simple fun. Graphics are decent, concept is ok. It becomes a grind, no choices to make just plow forward until everything is upgraded. Its a fun game but ads stop paying out once you hit second hotel. Have to restart game almost every time dude walks in. If Im watching ads for bonus dollars I want the dollars. Otherwise... fun so far. Also money should be transferrable if you cant continue to level up hotels. Would eliminate the necessity for bonus ad dude.

I build the 3rd hotel to its fullest and then when I changed my device and I tried to get the progress back using Google games Id I can't get it. Now I have to build all the hotel again from scrap. This is so irritating. Just add a button from which we can easily get our progress back which we have worked for so many hours on the game.

Kind of annoying watching the ads for the influencer and then not getting the reward. Also sometimes you loose your last 3 guests from their rooms after you close and the re open the game. Noticing it's happening more and more Please fix. Other than that, fun game
Game feels pretty fresh. Nice game to pass the time.

Simply perfect. I played the game all the way through, enjoyed it's amazing scaling system through new hotels to build! I only wish there were more but is certainly kept me happy and on my phone for a long time! In game commercials were also perfectly placed as well!

Great game. The only issue is that the "without ads" option costs a fortune. If it had a more reasonable price tag (e.g.: half price off, or more), I would definately buy that one too. Untill then, IT is Just to click on the ads, but not really watching them...

Hi,I love playing this game But i noticed recently that there is some issue I'm on level 3 (blue lagoon crystal resort) and i have upgraded each and every item of the hotel and still I'm not able to collect the last star and move on to another hotel level....can you guys just check and tell whats the issue? It would be really helpful

The game basically gives you money as you play. Yes, you have to watch ads or pay for things, but if you have even a child's level of patience you can watch 30 second ads for free money and gems. It's a fun idle game that slowly gets easier and self sustaining the longer you play.

Sort of fun, but ... To get cash for the upgrades you'll need to spend more time watching commercials than actually playing the game. You're not forced to watch the commercials bit not doing so will mean you have to wait longer periods of time for those upgrades you need that of course cost more and more.

I love it. I love that per hotels everything is different the guests etc. But having to click multiple objects per room to upgrade it and having 60 rooms is terrible. It took time and lagged a lot! Only reason I stopped playing is that. I reached the last hotel and knew it would lag endlessly

Really a great game it's fun to play. I just wish instead of so many ads that maybe there was a puzzle to do or matching game sometimes in order to finance or what have you. Watching an ad every minute is a little much.

It's not a bad game. I actually really good for passing the time. However, upgrading and making money fast is really really hard . So if you make 8,000 sometimes 7000 is deducted . It's not a huge deal it's just very slow and makes me lose interest.

A decent idle game but the weekly events are poorly balanced. It is impossible to complete one in the short time provided. Also the costs of the permernant upgrades are overpriced for a mobile game. Other than the flaws, the game is just idle fun.

It's a lot of fun but not entirely idle unless you play every two hours or spend real money. Still love it though! Graphics are cute and it's easy to make extra cash with the short ads. You advance quickly but not so quick that you get bored. Try it out!

A more in depth idle game that requires more management, and results in greater feelings of accomplishments. Ive not felt pushed to purchase anything, though it does advertise its options. It also gives you ad benefits aplenty, which aren't so bothersome if youre playing this while mutitasking, and gives good bonuses.

i really do love the game, is super entertaining and has a cute aesthetic, but this last update didnt worked out as i expected. the game keeps crashing when im watching ads!! so ill give it 5 stars when the issue is fixed. edit: they solved it!

An idle game that's fun and easy to pick up during idle moments throughout the day. I'm about to finish the last hotel and with only 4 hotels it's a short game. I did purchase the no ads which helped pace the game. Hopefully the dev team adds more hotels in the near future.

Your game is ok. Whenever I click on a video to ferry a reward or something, sometimes the video closes straight away and doesn't give me the reward, then the video button decides not to work anymore. I have to reload the game. Over and over.

Hi I liked the game very much but I experienced an issue. Im currently playing the Ski Hotel on then lost my progress on the Codinental Hotel like lost everything and started from the beginning. I don't really know what happened hope you can fix this. Good game overall. Thanks.

Really enjoying the game, lovely graphics and game play. Currently on the 2nd hotel of 5. Would love to see some options of swapping some money earnt for jewels - though only once a hotel is finished to get the jewel upgrades for that hotel. Also a way to link to facebook so i can link the game to the one on my phone (android) to my ipad as there is currently no way to do this. Looking forward to seeing the next hotels and more content being added.

In love with this game! Wondering if you have any other games like it? The few others I've downloaded dont have the 'sim' environment I enjoy with Hotel Empiren rather its Idle and that's not quite as exciting. I like the challenge with the balancing act of expenses to profits. Please message back!

Good game, but needs work. Almost Everytime I go to watch ads, it won't give me my reward or I have to watch them twice. On top of it when I close the game then come back, it removes all my x2 profits. It tells my I have unlimited profits then takes it away.

So far so great! 4 hours in I havent stopped. Amazing thing is adds give you a good amount of money. Everything else that brings income is slow but doesnt matter. Great game to keep playing instead of having to come back every 2 hours. If anything changes I will update !

Most of the time I do not mind ads if I can get something, but when I have three rooms and three Maids, all the rooms should be clean and yet one of them stays dirty. I have to watch a stupid ad every time to clean the room. After a while it gets very annoying! I was quite addicted to it until this started showing up.

Who ever made this app is a low key genius, I never really stick to games, I get half way then get bored but this game has kept me interested. The little sim people have funny and cool features. It's a witty and fun app. No money needed which is an amazing bonus as you can just watch the ads for currency which helps you level up a bit more quicker. Best idle game I've tried out so far. Kudos to the creators.

It's a fun game but the ads glitch constantly. The farther in the game I get the more often they seem to glitch and always when more money is on the line. It's frustrating and makes me not want to keep playing because I am not going to spend money on a game and it makes it hard to play without paying.

I left a review and it was removed. I'll just keep posting about this, if it keeps happening, with a tally number and I'll drop the rating. It's a fun game and passes the time, but it's not an "empire" if I can't use the money from other hotels to upgrade the next. Completed hotels uselessly accrue profits.

Great way to pass some time! A great idle type game. I've played many idle games and this is definitely on the top 7. And no.. you don't really need to spend real money. And if you do decide to watch ads, which isn't neccessary, they reward you!

Don't have to spend ¡ê_$ to complete! I like the fact you don't have to purchase the golden upgrades to complete a level and move on, that is rare in a game nowadays. Lovely little game that is easy to play but not too quick to end.

I've played many idle tycoon games and this was my favorite! It was very easy to keep progressing..I made it through all the hotels. I only put 5$ on it, but you don't even have to do that. Watching ads takes care of it all. Great game!! I'll definitely reinstall when more hotels are created.

Could be more. I just finished all the hotels and there's nothing else to do, no more hotels to build, nothing else to upgrade, etc. this makes playing the game after completion, very boring. I love the game, I just feel like there could be more to implement to make the game better.

Highly recommend. This game is super cute idle tap game. Make money building your hotel and see the improvements in your buildings. I really enjoy it. Watch extra ads to earn extra game money for improvements which isn't so bad. But very few pop ups and a pay to remove ads option. Easy game play and cute graphics.

Love the game. Wish I could restart it from the beginning of the first level, after I finished it. The 2 last levels are ridiculously long and therefore boring. EDIT: I followed the instructions in this reponse and my game did not reset. Still can't play.

It's a fun casual game in itself, but it's very finite. It didn't take me all that long to max out the last hotel and once you've upgraded everything there's nothing else to do, so it's now become completely obsolete. It would be really good to see content that keeps you playing for longer.

The game is fine, however, it often doesn't save the idle progress. So you log back in three hours later, thinking that you got a lot of money before you leave. It just put you right back to where you left off. For a normal game, I'll be fine, but for a idle game, the purpose is to be functioning while the user is gone. It's a failed game unless you want to stay in the game for the whole time, which what I did first then got bored pretty quick.

I do love the game.. it's more realistic, plenty of options, quite generous ad rewards. One thing I hope is that in the future pleass add more features.. since if one has already finished a hotel the money just sum up without anywhere else to spend, I'd love to have options whether the money could be use for helping other hotel (not all the money), or give to charity for certain rewards, also the money can be use to upgrade something more.. I leave this to your dev..

Great little game however could be a 5 star game if the developers changed a few things though - takes guests too long to walk from one place to another, either slow down clock or speed people up. The fixed opening times are a bit off and would be so much better if you could alter these.

Actually its a pay to win game. But if you dont wanna play an ad to get some benefits like get some money or skip the midnigth, get some costumers, you can use my trick. The trick is you have to upgrade the service first, then you have to buy many parking lots, the last is upgrade the room. I have play this until the 4th hotel, and I already know how to beat the game without playing an ad or buy for something

Something is wrong with the computation of profits for 2x. I got 40k while I was gone and clicked the ad for x2. The total of my profit was originally 660k, but only got 709,000 when I'm supposed to get more than since I should have received 80k. Also, it's really funny that you have many seats for the restaurant and have many clients but not all the seats get occupied so only a few get to eat and some don't. I don't know if that's a strategy of your but it's too stupid.

Like the concept very much but I believe the money flow is a little low plus watching videos for the VIP should offer more money also. I'll be willing to give 5 __ if you can really consider offering that. Also can we get more offline time because I play supermarket and get more offline time. And if you can fix the thing of letting cash go from one hotel to the next because the concept is to build an empire not be broke from one to the other.

Sadly, the reviews are right : without spamming ads, this game is unbearably slow and tedious. It's kinda cute (which explains the 2 stars), but it's impossible to have any sense of progression without viewing every possible ads presented to you. Overall very disappointing and unsatisfactory.

I really enjoy playing this game, the only reason it is 4 stars and not 5 is that I don't like that I am forced to focus only on 1 hotel at a time. I think the star requirements should be a bit lower so that I can hop between hotels and actually feel like that accomplishes something. As it is right now it might as well be set up so that you don't even have the option to do so. By the time you unlock the next hotel there is no reason to ever go back to the older ones.

Fun Game. I want to get to the ski resort level. I feel like the tutorial didn't set me up great and I ran out of resources quickly. I would've restarted but there wasn't an option. I just left it for a day and had the in game money to progress.

Overall addicting but needs a few fixes. You have to watch ads in order to receive "boosts" but currently having trouble either clicking to watch an add because it gets stuck trying to load one or it completely glitches and doesnt show me the ad; thus missed boosts.
The game is stuck on the loading page.

It's cute, and fun for sure but so are most games like this. What sets this game apart is that you can succeed without paying any money. Yea they have options that require money.. buying more diamonds and buying better advertising but you dont need them in order to play well. I like jt and I hope you do too!

This is definitely a good game , it has ads but only when you want to do something like skip a night or clean a room. The layout for the game is amazing , but I would appreciate the ability to do 360¡ã so I can see my whole hotel. Overall great game.

Amazing game. First game ever that i have purchased micro transactions. Downloaded on Christmas break and kept me entertained for a month and a half. Now im just waiting for more hotels to go 5 stars in. Maybe put a endless hotel in that way you can always have something to work towards? After 5 stars there is no point in revisiting old hotels. Food for thought.

There is potential here, that's for sure. But boy you make money so hard... I have to abuse the ad system otherwise you can't do it. I have only 2 stars because if you don't use the ads you can't play it... It takes too long and you might go bankrupt

I'm a hotel manager and I enjoy the game a lot. I appreciate how in depth it is and love the challenge. The only issue I've seen so far is that sometimes the video you can watch for cash, sometimes doesn't give you cash. I'm only on the 2nd hotel but is becoming a major issue in advancing the game.

I really like this game, but I don't like how long it takes for the customers to get from one side of the hotel in Arabian Nights Resort. By the time they make it to anything its closed. Also when the guest are checking out they walk past the front desk then turn around to checkout delaying the new customers. Once you've finished a hotel there's nothing to do. Wish you could add more tasks. What's the point making all that money if you can't do anything with it. Love to have those fixed.

I love playing this game, but the glitches suck. I don't want to play it until the bugs have been fixed. When you watch an add to get more coins it almost never gives you the coins after the add or it just doesn't load an add. It's extremely annoying.

The first time I played this game, I'll be honest, once I went into debt I deleted it. But after playing another one of codigames I redownloaded it, and with a bit of time it's became my favorite. In short, I never spend money on games, but the valentines day special was too good to let slip by!

Love this game. You dont HAVE to pay anything to be able to advance. And if you choose to the prices are reasonable. During holidays they do deals on the prices of the few things they offer to pay for. I play it during my breaks and my free time at home. Completely addicted and love it.

Pretty Good but expensive. Unlock to get game credit w/out ads - $11. Unlock constant 2x bonus $5. Unlock other bonus - $10 -$12. All these are separate costs. Would be nice to ask for a game price of $9.99 or so and just have a nice money making progression versus this nickel & diming

Yet another CodiGames self clone. Tried it and it has more layers than usual. Unfortunately, I had to close the game due to life and when I opened it next I found that the tutorial staff cost far exceeded the income and I was broke. Earning back what I had was so painfully slow (again still right at the beginning) I could either uninstall or restart. The irony of a game about getting customers losing this customer is kinda golden, though.

Very fun tycoon game, just wish there were more hotels. Finished all of them in just a few weeks. We need more locations! There are a lot of upgrades and some cool animations. Ads are not working properly but that is not the developers fault. Download this you wont regret it!

Ads ads ads... This game had so much potential but its absolutely littered with ads, it's basically an afk game. If you want to play it actively, be prepared to wait long periods of time and be bombarded with ads. Shame, graphically and gameplay wise, it seems like it could be great.

One of the ads isn't working and it won't allow me to watch any at all to earn extra money and it happens on other games made by the company. It's only one ad that seems to mess it up. Klondike is the ad that is messing up. Otherwise this game is fantastic and deserves 5 stars

It's a pretty good game. There are some bad things like random crashes or that I watch an ad for a reward and not actualy getting the reward. The concept is pretty cool, that's the type of games I like. Everything else is ok

So if the app is still open on my device, in the background, even if your device is turned off, it actually stops being an idle game and you won't collect any money once you open it back up several hours later. This is not how idle games are supposed to work.

Very nice little game, I haven't bought the double money or anything else only watched the ads for the bonuses, by doing that the gameplay was longer but more enjoyable. So far since i started playing there's been regular updates, there isn't ads randomly in the game which makes a welcome change to most games nowadays.

This game is really fun and addicting. The number of ads is annoying but not a deal-breaker. Each hotel isn't too hard to complete, and you're able to do it with cash you earn in-game. Gems are used for extra decoration that doesn't seem to do anything. My issue is that there are only 4 levels. I completed the game in about a week, and now there's nothing left to do. There's no incentive to keep playing on previously completed levels. I'm disappointed and now looking for a new game...

The events are incredibly hard to keep up with. 15mil and you only have 3 days to do this? Really? I do agree with people, some aspects of this game almost blatantly say "you need to pay real money to get any progress" like the event. I dont see the point in keeping a hotel open that you completely maxed out and finished. Unless I can transfer money from one hotel to another why do I have to "reopen" the hotel every 2 hours. It's fun and I havent spent money yet.

When I exit the game in the second hotel my guests in double bedrooms disappear. No guests = no revenue. Watching ads don't always give extra money. Money from ads in second hotel should scale better. There's not much I can do with $1000 when most of the upgrades cost around $1000. Developers please fix.

The first two hotels were fun, if a little quick to get through. The third though... My housekeeper passes out face down in the lounge, the cooks don't get to the restaurant until it's about time to close, it takes my guests over an hour to get to their rooms, and the additional rooms are too expensive to get in a timely manner. It ruins the game when you can't do anything, and it gets boring when you can no longer add on to your hotel.

Fairly easy game to get used to, it can be a little slow to start in building up cash but soon enough getting the higher upgrades is a breeze. However I think the cost no ad's and the like is far too expensive.

It is a really fun game thats easy to manage once you get a hang of it. I love that there is many variety to not just the kind of hotel but the upgrades! I just wished there was more options for the actual design.

I don't mind that there are ads. I know that's how the devs make money. And I'm glad they have a "pay to opt out of ads" option. I would score this much higher, but some of the ads are deceptive and some won't even let me back out of them. I have to close the whole game and come back in again. There's no x to close the ad and the back button does nothing.

Crashed losing everything. It wouldn't load and the top recommendation was uninstall then reinstall. So I do did and I finally loaded but lost months of progress and all the purchases made. SCAM STAY AWAY

Its a very fun game. Giving 2 stars because they purposely make it so you can not advance to the 3rd hotel without spending money. You have to collect 9 stars to get the 3rd hotel and the only way possible is to buy more gems. I was really enjoying the game and even the ads aren't to bad. But the 50k ads I watched to get both hotels maxed out without buying gems should be enough to get me the 3rd hotel.

It's a fun game but the ads are killing it. It's almost like you can't progress without taking the investment options. I am not going to complain about a free game I'm sure there was a lot of effort put in and it may need ads to survive but they do disrupt gameplay frequently.

Words can't describe the disappointment. It takes an exorbitant amount of time to make any money to upgrade anything. And when you can't upgrade, the amount of money coming in isnt enough to upgrade. So when you can't upgrade, the hurry up and wait grindfest starts. Then you're forced to watch ads to pass time in the game. This game could have great potential but not with the way it is now.

Trash game absolutely! Was really excited about feeling the need to upgrade and manage a hotel until I unlocked the next hotel. I understand the ads and I watched them to get extra cash but the fact you can't transfer money from your other hotel kills it for me! I mean come on your a OWNER of multiple hotels you should be able to choose how the money is split.

I have maxed 3 hotels so far to 5 stars. But honestly its getting very frustrating the fact guests only stay one night, but the time they have arrived it's 5 or 11 afternoon and night respect fully which is a massive downside . Can't you make an update for some guests that choice to stay more than one night .. Or if we could choose what times the services could be open, I have guests wondering around with nothing to do as soon as they arrive... Great

Liked the game, although in order to achieve the 5 stars advance to next game you had to purchese the gold to buy extra items (that should've been considered perks) for the room. After Santa's hotel I thought game was done went to uninstall game and seen an update for next hotel. There I ordered extra gold thinking it would be cheeper for next hotel. To find out that's it. No more hotels and now i have extra gold and nowhere to spend it. __ I expected more.

I'm really enjoying this game but an event in the game has blocked everything for me. I've tried three times to unlock the booster pack for the event, and payment has been taken 3 times but the app isn't making the connection to unlock the boosters. It's a shame as I'll need to stop for 4 days until the event finishes

**edit** new level added. I love this game. I just finish the levels faster than new ones are added.** Love this game! Even paid for no ads! I spent $10 only to make it to hotel 4 and find out that's it!!! 4 levels is not worth $10! So mad!!!

Decent game. It lacks content and replayability as you can quickly unlock everything in all hotels. Upgrades are cool as you can really see the improvement visually but that's about it. Not very fun to watch the bots go about your hotel as money comes in extremely slowly when online.

I have always loved designing & visualizing growth in the way that this game provides. It's been fun!! I would like it if the game offered a 2nd optional savings account to keep some of ur money separated in case u accidentally over spend & still need to pay ur employees. Overall it's fun & entertaining. I love that it's not a punishment to watch videos. You CHOOSE to watch them in order to progress! Thank u!! But like others have said...sometimes the videos won't play & u basically lose money.

You earn in two digits(tens) and have to invest in thousands and so the only way to earn money is from the dancing man for it requires to watch advertisements all the time. So i will say it is a strategically planned game. There's an option to remove 'ads' but not everyone wills to pay 'real' money. Except this, its a good game.

Its ok, it is slow and monotonous watching the same ad after ad to gain more money things in the game cost a little too much for the gameplay. The graphics are very reminiscent of Gameboy wouldn't mind being able to move faster through the gameplay. Maybe make rooms suites.

Micro transactions are crazy expensive. I love the game and dont mind giving a few bucks but $11 is insane! Especially when you have to shell out that much cash to when a single event and itncant be transferred over to others.
Really enjoy, very good. But there is some bugs when we upgrade bed.

Absolutely love this game. Super fun and goes at a good pace. Plus you actually see you're hotel grow and change. Only negative is when I do the 2x multiplier to double my profits when I've been away for a while. I watch the ad but don't get the multiplier Others a great game

Really fun game! Slow to start, lots of ads (but only if you choose to watch). Definitely worth buying to get rid of the ads, but only 4 stars because $14.99 for no ads (and other perks) is a little high.

Game is pretty fun for an idle game, but I'm almost out of content to play. Hopefully new content drops soon or some kind of prestige class unlocks letting you restart the hotel chain from the top with maybe a boon for completed hotels? Maybe even just a statue at the hotel that improves itself with everytime you prestige

I don't mind paying to support devs, but prices are outrageous in this game. It takes a very long time to get started unless you constantly watch ads, and $11 for a manager to increase offline profits??? I would only pay $3, maybe $5 if the purchase included other extras.

I love that the upgrades you have to pay cash for are permeant and you don't have to keep purchasing to have your hotel opened longer when your offline. I also like the little dancing man that comes in and gives you extra money and all you have to do is watch an ad. Only issues I do have is I've had some issues with the game. I sent messages to support and have yet to even get a response. My other issue is that money doesn't from hotel to hotel.

I really do enjoy the game. Been playing non-stop since I downloaded it, but it won't give me the reward for finishing my quest. Example: upgrade 2 single beds to level 5. I did that and nothing happened. Still not completed. Hope it gets fixed :)

Love the game. I just finished it all and ready for more. Lots of stuff. Why not try doing hotels from other countries. Maybe ables to somehow take the funds from the hotels income from other hotels and remodel a hotel/casino. Play in the casino with the money you earn with a bank interest. Just an idea. Love the game. Thank you

There are a few bugs with it, but force stopping the game and then going back in seems to solve most of them. Fun, and I like the option to watch videos for in game rewards, but the upgrade options are WAY above standard pricing.

Way to ad heavy. You have to watch an ad just to get 10 minutes if double profit. Got to the last hotel and hot bored as it took way too long and way too many ads to do anything. I understand that games need to make money through ads but this is far too much for what is a basic and pretty boring game.

I give it 5 stars. I wish i could give it like 4.9 stars because of the 10 minute for the x2 money, and slight bugs like customers, maids/workers glitching out and standing in place, the desk people dont go home at midnight they are just stuck in place unless you close the app and reopen. Other than that i love the game its perfect. Its realistic (as it gets) and its fun but if the bugs were fixed i would rate it 10 stars if i could. Keep up the amazing games codigames!!_____________

The whole game it self are great. But, i recommend less Ads. For every couple of minutes special if your just started the game just to earn more money, its very annoying spending more time on Ads. Rather in the games, for me this is a great game.

Update, rubbish, keeps sending buyback to the first hotel, everytime the game is started again. It's so annoying and having the countdown to the new extra bit is so big it takes up alot of the screen. Dont like it, I've emailed and heard nothing. Please dont ruin this game.

I looooove the game! But in the future could you add more hotel locations? And also you might wanna fix the audio because its kinda broken but it's okay only a small scratch and overall I think it's the perfect app! Also fix the bug that the housekeepers get stuck in the rooms

Not a bad game, highly dependent on watching optional ads to progress faster. Playing without the ads makes game progress painfully slow. I play about 2 minutes a day, and that's all I can do while waiting for more coins.

The game is fun. I wish you could pick the times that the stores are open. The restaurants close too early and yet the game still has people walk over there knowing it's closed! Upgrades need to be cheaper. If those two items could be fixed I would give the game 5 stars.

this game is quite fun, but everytime i move to other hotel half of the visitors disappeared. while im focusing on second hotel but still visiting the first one, all the progress in hotel one gone. back to zero, and thats just disappointing. ive watched A LOT of ads just to make the hotel 5 stars and now the progress is all gone. and theres a lot of bugs too. fix this or this game wont survive for sure.

Nice game, different hotels. Have been playing for a long time. Gets a bit on your nerves cause at the beginning of a hotel is a bit slow but I have enjoyed it so much. The only thing is you still have all the money and 5 star hotel and can't spend them, maybe trade it for something? It's an idea. Apart from that been playing for long time and it's been really nice __

This is an amazing game, for an idle game it actually requires some forethought and strategy into what and how you are going to buy and build your hotel. Sure you can just max out a room right away or buy all the services but you will lose profits fast. First idle game I have ever played that I actually had to think about the path I was going to take before I just went crazy with the in game cash, and the gems are very generously gifted through the missions so you can max out your profits too.

I really enjoy this game. Have one huge problem though. There needs to be some type of warning for free players that ads wont give you money/advantages after a certain amount. It is entirely annoying to watch an advertisement just to have nothing happen.

I am really enjoying this game! But I have to agree with most of the other reviews that having all the money in one account would be great, or better yet, the option to transfer funds from one hotel to the other so as not to leave one hotel completely dried of funds. If not that there really needs to be something to spend the money on once you've completed all the upgrades

Laggy at times when you get up there in upgrades, but overall great game. It's not worth buying the gold to upgrade the rooms because you'll be switching hotels and you'll not benefit from those upgrades bought in the next hotel, just a tip and heads up.

From the 2nd hotel onwards, the number of guests within the hotel are never consistent with how one has left from the game. This just doesn't seem fair to players since the game simply assumes you have pretty low income, and causing negative wages even if you had planned well to mitigate the costs. That and ridiculous amount of ad watching just to even progress. While I love the graphics, music and gameplay, it just isn't enough to convince me to play on.

Addictive, but....... I have a lot of patience, but the adds sometimes freeze and this game often makes the only part of my screen that reacts to touch is the back button and the exit button, both at the bottom of my screen, so I can't close the adds when they're over...

Good tycoon game that keeps you playing The problem is too many advertisements to unlock upgrades all the time and get money. They make the game annoying, you should be able to get 3x from viewing an adv. Other that that it's a good game.

Very time consuming but very interesting Best-One these makers have made the rest of the tycoon's look and feel kind of basic. When you do finish this game and complete all the rooms nothinghappens you just keep accumulating money. There's no good job you won the game or any other that you beat the game. Kinda a downer

We should be able to transfer money from one hotel to another. What's the point of collecting money in a fully upgraded hotel.  Also while traveling between hotels the current hotel shouldn't close. We lose all guests which is incredibly stupid. It makes sense if we exit the game but while in the game occupancy shouldn't half irrespective of which property we're in.

This game is fun, But the only suggestion I would make is that when completing the hotels we should be able to have the money transfer to the next hotel also because once you complete the entire hotel the money just builds up but you can't spend it. It should be able to be used to help build the next hotel i hope they do this in the near future. Then i can give 5 stars

I like the game, and want to keep playing but it keeps glitching. I'll watch an ad to get my profit x2 and then when the ad is over I don't get the money. Happens A LOT! I'm owed probably 500,000 in all the money that hasn't been given even tho I watched the ads!

It's a fun game in that it's challenges you to be smart with your money. It feels like such an accomplishment each time you pass a hotel. However don't bother with the "doubling your profits" when you return to the game by watching it an ad, it doesn't work.

I payed to get all the rewards from ads without ads, and that's it... and the flow is nice, I finished the original maps instantly... which came in handy when I lost all my data when I got my new phone, unfortunate that I couldn't figure out how to transfer data, but glad I got the restart.

1 star because a pixar trailer ad repeatedly shown but it never works (cash bonus, customer taxi). Waste of time Fun games, especially because I played hotel giant before. However, sometimes I didn't get the rewards from watching the ads. Will improve the rating if this has been addressed.

Game is good and realistic but only if we could use the money toh all hotels. Its frustrating to earn a huge amount of money again. It's like you went bankrupt and starting again. I mean if it my money I can use it anywhere. Wish you could change that.

It's fun and lovely game. But I just got the same problem with the other players, the ad button was broken. It's no longer shown and the ad man didn't show too. If it will decrease the price for disable ad like 10 $ I think I will purchase it for sure __

Super cute and fun especially if you just need to pass by time. Rewarding and challenging but not stressful. This aided my boredom during my mandated medical bed rest and finished the game in less than 3months. There were funny animations that i took photos of and showed to my friends. _____

An addictive click game the only downside is the constant stream of ads (that can be removed for 10.99). The price to get rid of ads is too much (personally) ; then they charge for other stuff as well (6.99+).

The game was fun until I wanted to watch offered videos. They took forever to load and didn't play eventually. It's not normal that I had to wait for more than 2 minutes and no ads played. In general, this game gives me a solution to earn more money but their method doesn't work. Hope you can fix it.

Fun game easy to play. My only issue I've had is when you watch ads if you dont close the ad soon enough after the ad ends you dont get the bonus. So it ends up being a waste. Other than that,____thumbs up

WAAAY to many ads!!!!!!!!! The idea of the game is good however the novelty of having to watch a 30second ad every 60seconds wears off very quickly, you need to spend real money to remove the ads which the game isn't upto a high enough standard to warrant doing.. big thumbs down __

I like the game. I paid to not have ads. My problem is that the profits make no sense... I purchased a spa in my most recent hotel and that act alone CUT my profits almost in half. In the hotel prior to this one it took forever to build the daily profits at all. It really doesn't make any sense and that's frustrating.

It is a decent game, but you literally can't progress after 2 hotels unless you get in app purchases which are way too expensive. It costs over ¡ê10 to just turn ads off, but you need to spend a lot more to actually play the game.

The game is fun but when you get to the third hotel the people have to walk so far and the clock moves so fast that less than half my people get to eat even 1 meal a day. Over half dont eat at the restaurant for dinner. None make it for lunch. By the time the people who were in the restaurant for dinner finish only some can get drinks. Either the people need to walk faster or time needs to slow down. I prefer if the people walked faster.

Calm management game. Buggy. Regularly stacks enough processes to crash the app. Does not always provide promised benefits for watching ads. Update on 12.19.19 broke the app such that it is stuck on the loading screen announcing a new version. No updates available on Google Play store, and uninstall/reinstall does not fix the problem. Email to given developer's address bounces.

Good. The ads help you complete your goals. There are options that you can pay with real money but the game is not forcing you. HOWEVER, after I unlocked the 2nd hotel, Im trying to earn more money via ads but its not letting me.

Fun game, has a lot of potential but relies too heavily on adverts. It offers a way to remove adverts but it costs ¡ê10! Way too much in my opinion. I'd have happily paid 2.99 or similar but certainly not a tenner!

It is a fun game. There is a little bit of a grind to it. But the accomplishments of managing and upgrading the hotel are fun to do in a great time waster. Unfortunately it takes less than a week to finish and needs other things to do. I hope that they expand upon the game in the future.

I give it a 3 because the first hotel is easy but I never got close to finish the second one and I wish you could transfer money becaus3 on my first one I had 100k and on the second one I had 5k and everything got so expensive like the ski hill was 240k and I never had that much money so I deleted the game because of those reasons so yeah. Also if you want to get money you gotta watch a lot of ads.____

Absolutely brilliant game. I have played most of Codigames idle games however this is by far my favourite. The graphics are very aesthetically pleasing, the music is relaxing, the gameplay is very enjoyable. Overall a simple, yet very therapeutic game. I was devastated to discover that there are currently only two levels and I cannot wait to see more hotels added to game. Well done to the devs for this little gem.

Overall nice game. Lots of ads for little things like in game cash or to speed things up. Nice there is a purchase option to remove ads and still get the perks. Would be nice to keep adding features and to speed the game up a bit

Hi, I think there is a bug with the game. Every time I exit the game/visit another hotel (example, I left Codihotel with all rooms occupied and travelled to Stanley Resort) and immediately return to the previous hotel (in this case, Codihotel), the number of customers is always halved, i.e. there are empty rooms when it should be occupied. It happens to all of my hotels and hence I experience loss instead of profit. Help will be greatly appreciated.

Nice game but...I have more and more problems with the advertising for the coins of my investors. The advertising just doesn't come up. It buffers for a minute or so and then it goes back to the hotel. If you can change that, then I give you 5 stars.

Its been a ton of fun. I am looking forward to 5 staring all my hotels. This game is a great time filler and has a very fullfilling set of objectives. The controls can freeze up every once in a while but other then it runs great.

Fun game! You can watch ads to get awards and stuff. There is 5 hoteles as I am on the 5th one, although I am not sure if there is more or not. Overall, 5 start the gameplay of fun, I would recomend unless you don't like to idle for a while, or be away forma the game.

I really like it because you could create your own hotel upgraded if you finish with one hotel you want another one it keeps going it's really fun. But one thing I kind of hate if you want money you have to watch an ad it's kind of annoying!

I like this game. A little slow starting unless you check in everyday. I do like how you can upgrade every aspect of the rooms, even though you can't choose how it looks. Maybe a little bit more income in the beginning would be cool.

Really God BUT few issues on Android. I can't play the game unless on wifi it just keeps coming up error code 4 I have 60Gb on my phone network&everything else&all other games R fine but this just won't work & it's not a setting issue on my side ALSO dose not work properly when u download the game on your tablet as well I lost loads of work id put in I'd done on my phone (on a mates wifi on my phone) then lost it all when I re launched game on my tablet so I have had to delete of my tablet :)

It's easy to play. I wish you could adjust times bar, restaurant, etc are open. Anyway, you gotta watch ads to make extra money. Or pay 11$ to hire someone to watch ads for you. If you're not playing your hotels close because you're not collecting profit. Or pay 5$ for someone to collect it for you.

The game is buggy. Cant even start the game with wifi connection, always said error code: 4. And when it does open, it always took me more than a minute. Sometimes, the ads just doesnt show up or the ads shows up but we dont get the said gifts and prize afterwards.

Perfectly playable without paying cash or watching ads, and still paying cash or watching an ad doesn't feel like cheating. Gameplay is about what I was after, and the visuals make things satisfying. Even the music ain't half bad!

Good game, not enough levels. A steep price to pay for oy 5 levels. My advice is play for free and put up with the ads. If I had known the game was limited then I wouldn't have paid the fee to remove the ads. It's a shame as I was enjoying the game.

Very fun game not the normal tap game but it is way better, u actually have to work for each dollar. Developers you did really good making this game you hit the nail on the head here. Its the new age of tap games. Also you don't have to purchase anything if you don't want to and you watch adds when you want not when they want.

I enjoy this game alot but it doesn't close all the way sometimes and it just freezes the progress. When I close it so I can wait for a bit to build up money it doesn't close and just sits here on the same spot so when I come back No time has passed in the game.

this is an ad-game you will need to watch ads always, if you want to play it. i like the idea of it - the upgrades, hiring/firing employees, the things needed to build the hotel. But that's it, you have to watch ads, like a lot, a ton of ads, for you to be able to do things. you will spend your time on ads than actually playing the game.

Great game. Suggestion... Make the opening and closing times of services manageable. In on the third hotel and guests keep missing out on things because they have to walk so far. This feature would be awesome.

This game is not uploading the videos to receive coins properly. And when it does, most times I do not receive the coins but the investor is still jumping around. I have to restart over and over. Please fix this glitch and my rating will increase to 5 stars.

Beautiful game with beautiful animation. The best management game ever played so far. Only one thing I don't like which is choping sound that coming from kitchen its way too loud & makes uncomfortable to hear after certain times. If developer see this please remove & add some other kitchen sound instead of choping. Thanks

This app drains my battery very quickly and my phone gets warm to the touch. None of my other games do this. Watching an ad only gives you 10 mins of double revenue. There are several other idle games that are better gameplay and don't drain your battery like this one does...

I saved up $6k for a much needed double room, but the game forced me to build a bar instead. Now Ive lost staff because I couldnt bring in the income I was counting on from that double. Show me the basics, and leave me the heck alone, to play as I please!! I cant stand games that dont just let you play.

This game was amazing and very fun! Though it really tested my patience and since I'm not a very patient person,I bought some features for the game __ After the 5 hotels, I wonder if there would be new hotels since it would be a waste of money if ever if it would've stopped after the 5th hotel.

Quite a poor game. Theres so much you need to do and you dont have enough money to do so unless you keep watching ads. Great concept and I would keep playing if it wasnt so difficult to get money and advance in anyway. I suggest fixing this if you want more people to play.

Good at the start. The games gets better and better with more and more items and things to upgrade as you through hotel 1-3. However you then get to 4 and it is just a re-skin of 1 with more rooms. Was really hoping for more. They should add a 5th+ hotel

Great and entertaining game but too short. I really enjoyed playing but beat it within a month. They need to create better pathing for guests on later levels. Food Halls are too small so you lose on a lot of profit until you get past the bar and food activities.

It's a slow start, but not terribly so. I haven't reached my first star level as of yet, but I've only played for a total of three hours at this point. Essentially it's pay to win or settle for ads-to-progress gameplay, which is so far worth it.

Stop requiring upgrades on building parts of the hotel. I love having a bunch of coins I wanted to use on different upgrades but instead there is an arrow forcing me to upgrade the hotel before I can continue. The helper is annoying and not necessary.

Much better than most idle games, this one takes time instead of beating the game too quickly. Very addicting!! However I would like more achievements in the game before moving to the next hotel! And more hotels!! I'm on the last one I dont know what I'm going to do when I beat the last one! Lol

I'm enjoying the game but on the third hotel it seems like every time I log in 2 rooms are empty and its closing the hotel a lot faster. I refuse to spend ¡ê10 to keep the hotel open while I'm gone if the 2 empty rooms are still going to be a problem. Fix the glitch and I'll rate 5 stars

Just blah and expensive. $20 to get rid of ads is just not worth it given its just repetitive work. I've played a fair chunk, but mostly coz its there and brainless. Once you complete a hotel, its pointless. So there's no real goal.

It's a great game, but I cant get the third hotel open. I've upgraded all my staff and everything and still no 5 stars for the first two. Someone told me to do a restore purchases because it would tell me what I'm missing, but the restore purchases option isn't even there now for so,e reason. Some please help!

It was a fun game but when I tried to log back into my account in my new phone my progress wasn't saved after I saved it on my old phone. It's a cool game if you play with it for a while. just don't try to save your progress because it won't save and all the hard work you put into it will just be lost

Find game but too many videos to advance! Just to advance at a decent pace you have to watch countless videos. It takes away from the fun of the game. Real bummer. Oh and to pay to get perks well they are pretty expensive compared to other games.

It takes a long time to get things going. Once u have enough money to upgrade something u have to wait like 5mins for the invester to come back and give u money. And a lot of times the ads dont play and u dont get the money. Also u have to watch like 20 ads to get 2hrs of doubled income. Some good additions to the game would be more pop ups on the side to get more money so u dont have to wait 5min for the invester, lowering cost for upgrades and to fix the bug so the ads play to get ur money.

it is a great game, a boredom killer but my progress aren't saving. i was playing the game then exit for a while, when i go back all my upgrades are gone and even my balance is negative. i have my google play attached to it, i tried to disconnect then reconnect it again but nothing happens, all my upgrades and the my hotel balance stays negative. so i uninstalled.

I like the game. I wish there were maintenance options so it gives me reason to revisit my past hotels, rather than just to keep them open. If there were maintenance options i can hire handyman or plumbers or something like that. I would be more engaged with my previous hotels.
