The app is superb and it keeps us much intersted towards the game more..but the only one problem that i felt is that after we have fully developed a hotel to its full, the difficulty in developing the next hotel is much more challenging..otherwise the game is so interesting and keeps us play the game more

The game is fun and really has enough reasons to keep you playing the game but when I reached the 2nd hotel, everytime I quit then enter the game, all the customers renting the rooms with double bed are gone even in the middle of the night. Hope this could be fixed.

Add heavy. Game was designed to be poor in performance to justify the ads. Everything have an ad. Need to pay around 10 dollars to remove ads. Not gonna pay for something not so good. I have even bought the permanent 2x profit but the game is still meehh.

Really enjoying the game, but the main bug I've noticed is ive completed the goals, but they aren't coming up as complete. I've been playing it everyday since downloading, i just hope the bugs get fixed in later updates!

I don't like constantly looking at a bald black guy so I uninstalled. Also after 2 minutes the gameplay was too slow. I don't like forced tutorials. Give a way to skip and figure it out, that's part of the fun.

Used to Love this game, I have completed all hotels up to date... but recently when i went to play the weekend challenge the ads with the dancing king kept crashing and the circle just rotates- it did this with last weekends challenge also... nearing ready to give in! Please fix.

It's good, but could be a lot better Is it just me ??? When your starting of on the 2nd hotel, is there a quick way to earn fast money, without constantly watching ads? I love the idea of the game, but I dont want to keep watching adverts , for a game, that constantly requires a lot of in game money to play... Dont get it ???

Good game but I wouldnt worry about spending any money on it. I completed the whole thing already (all hotels) and ive only had the game a week. Not very challenging. The ads glitch and and you dont always get your rewards for watching them. Shame there isnt more hotels though.

Decent game, lots of options to watch videos for good rewards so far. Very very expensive in app purchases though. $10.99 for a general manager to keep the hotel open for 10 hours while im inactive is outrageous to the point of hilarity.

Its ok, the earnings are a very slow, and the pricing for upgrading generator/batteries is high...might just me wanting to progress a lot quicker than able, as most money has to come from ad watching, which gets very tedious. Will most likely end up deleting due t this

I love this game. It takes a long time and effort to build a hotel to finally make it profitable (which I like) and then you start from scratch with the next hotel. All efforts gone to waste I feel. I don't like to start from zero after I've put so much time on one hotel. So, 3 stars from me

Good game, entertaining. But can only get a decent amount in 2 go if you watch the ads, which unfortunately dont work. So any x2 multipliers are lost and any bonuses throughout the game cant be used. Please fix the issue

This game has the potential to be fun. However, watching ads to get bonuses doesn't work after a minute of playing the game. It seems it's to force the player to pay for the "permanent" bonuses. Bad move on the developer's part. Not worth keeping.

Good game, love playing it. But whenever I come back to it after a certain amount of time, the hotel has made money but when I watch a video to double my profit I never get the money. And the entire game keeps crashing.

I mean its a great game. Worth the whole 10 dollars in game i paid for no ads and can just claim double on anything. It just gets boring after a while i got to the third hotel and just got bored waiting.somw of the upgrade prices are just not realistic to me.

It was alright. It was fun at first but restarting at every hotel was really annoying. I get it but it is frustrating to raise the prices for everything at every new hotel but not give a good income raise. Takes forever to get to the last hotel and then I just quit.

I really liked this game. The game play was fun and easy. What made me delete the app is that it was impossible to get five stars for either of the two hotels I had. I had everything levelled up to the max and I still only had four stars on both hotels. Eventually I got frustrated and got rid of the app.

not the game like in the ads. You can't rearrange furnitures in a room. The interface are a little confusing. The moneys are slow paced. It has a nice concept and all, I'm just not satisfied with how slow the game is. BUT THE CONCEPT ARE GOOD! Please keep it

I paid to not have to keep watching ads when I wanted to collect from the investor and claim all the other benefits like double profit etc. However this game has not been allowing me to claim my double profit. It will just reward me with the original profit made. If you don't close the game out completely it pauses the double profit clock but the time the hotel is open still continues so you don't get the profits from that either. Events aren't fair, you have to pay to make it to 3 stars!

This is a fun game, but I'm stuck now on the second hotel, I've upgraded the electricity as much as I can and can't fully upgrade the final suite or buy the ski resort, so I can't even make it to 4 stars, let alone 5!! Let me upgrade the power some more please, or I'll never get further. __

Fun game. I've been playing for about 3 weeks now. One complaint is since the new update I can't watch the video to get the VIP bonus money. It pulls up and crashes. I haven't been able to watch any ads but some how my 2¡Á profits will fill

Only had the game for day and so far I really like it. It is a little slow pace though and sometimes when trying to get out of the room update screen I have to push the back arrow a few times before it works.

Fun game, I bought all the upgrades and finished the entire game in about 2 weeks. Once finished, no point in playing or purchasing items. Too bad, I like the concept and would have continued playing.

They can't add content update to this game fast enough for me! I've had no problems whatsoever, the graphics are adorable, cheeky and fun. Personally I don't mind watching ads, so no need to purchase anything; this is a fun, casual game. I enjoy many others from this developer __

Really nice game!! I like how the animations are done and the ideas of the hotels. I would really like it that there can be several buildings in one place if u can do that. Overall its a really great and fun game!

The game takes too long without ads, but ads no longer give rewards when the investor pops up. I believe they broke it on purpose to get users to buy the game. But $10 for game with very few levels seems a bit of a stretch.

Good game overall keeps you interested. Needs to be expanded to more hotels for lasting stability. Overall I believe the ads are a little much but you can get by. Reducing the no ads price would be nice.

It gets repetitive after the second hotel, and it's mostly updating the items and watching ads because you never have enough coins to upgrade... So basically it's mostly watching ads. It's interesting at first but then gets too repetitive.

One of the worst part of the game is that the way you accumulate money is incredibly low even there's no use of ads coz it will not earn you any money, most of the time the ads only conver the wages of the employees. This game has so much potential but if you are not ready to spend hundreds then it's not worth it. It took me 2 days with countless hours and ads to complete the one hotel and things become even more difficult when I'm in next level. I'll pass this one there are far better games.

I enjoyed the game especially the first hotel. I just wish that your money could transfer and that it was easier to upgrade the other hotels. I'm on the second one and there's so much to do but we get like no money. Was wondering if something could change :)

Game is fun, for some parts. It lags and freezes when I click on ads for cash, have to exit out and back in, loading takes so long, can't keep up with paying staff because you don't make enough money to stay afloat.

On my second hotel and every time I log off then get back on my 3 double rooms are always vacant when they were full before I got off....and I watch the ads but half the time don't get my reward....I can't get profits if the rooms are vacant when I make sure they are occupied....I really enjoy this game but it's getting frustrating!!

Very Addicting game! Only gripe is once you max a hotel out and move to the next the old one becomes useless. Wish you could either carry over earnings from old hotel to help with the new one or sell the old one for profit. Once its maxed out it really makes money for no reason.

I had no option but to uninstall the game because the game keeps on crashing it's not even loading it's not even opening. I even try to mail the developer for problems but it said that the mail was invalid. I love playing this game and had been playing it for a week and it is really really addictive but all of a sudden the game stop loading and not working at all. I uninstall the game of thousand times reinstalled it, erased my progress nothing happened.
A fun way to watch ads. I love the concept and itnis fun to watch guests move around the hotel but most time is spent watching ads. They are optional, but the perks they offer are often needed.

I would provide five stars but there are two reasons preventing me from doing so. The first issue is that lifetime earnings from one event to another are not rolling over. I lost most of my progress. The second issue is that when i contacted support there was no reply. Fix these issues and i will change my rating.

Since the new hotel the ads for extra money from the special guy doesn't work so you can't get the money for it and end up having no staff because you're stuck at like 50 bucks for the hotel.. it would be better if the funds from one hotel could transfer because otherwise the hotels keep making money no reason. Like the first one has a million earned but the new one has 50 earned. In order to keep your game going it seems like you HAVE to pay money for the add-ons with the new level

Cute enough. No real incentive to sit in the game. But no forced ads either. Events, as far as I can tell, are impossible to win unless you pay real money. *Maybe* if you sat in the app 24/7 watching ads and collecting tips, you *might* win. But totally not worth the time.

Like the game. But you can't stop it from running in the background. I have a steam phone which is made for family. And this app eats my battery. To make sure before uninstalling. I changed my phone fully. Closed everything but the game. It ate 30% of my battery in 15 minutes. Uninstalled.

I really enjoy the game, I just hate the fact that they're always offering x2 profits in exchange for watching an ad, yet they won't let you do it. I've had the app a few days, fun yeah, but everytime I try to watch a video, it never works. I've been on numerous wifi's and even used my data, nothing. _____¡â_________
Its a really good game. Only wish you vould use the money from the other resorts. Once you level them up you can do much. If it had like a leaderboard to compete with others it would be perfect.

Glitchy, even with x2 profits enabled profits received are glitchy and it's a guess what you are going to receive. Secondly more hotels are needed as the game has a very short story on each hotel and once completed is pretty much a worthless game, especially if you have paid for anything.

Not fun, sounds are... disturbing to say the least, grafics are fine, too many plugs for advertisements, but at least they are optional. If you are looking for a great game, however, install Board Kings today! Fun, optimised, and more!
I really enjoyed this game! I like that I had the option to watch ads to make 2x the profit. But I built all the hotels and have been waiting for some new levels. I like the hotel events also.

I like the game very addicting. But need fix to the second hotel as the profit while i'm away is still small. It says there i earned 40 thousand then i watched the ads to double the profit. But when i continue my money is still low. I think this should be fix.

I love this game! Quick to learn everything and upgrade as you please. You choose if you want to watch a 30 second add for more money or not. But sometimes the video doesn't load and I don't get the money, that is why I am rating 4 stars instead of 5. Please fix that issue, will be greatly appreciated __

Love this game!!! But am sad now... just completed the last hotel!!!! We need more!!! Any plans to add more levels or create a new similar game? I love the fact that you CANNOT buy the money to get through the upgrades, you have to work the levels!! It's great!! Need more games like this!!! __

Am actually really enjoying it. I think the profit vs loss system and how many things there are to do is what's keeping me in the game. That and how advertising is controlled. Very nice. I hope I don't end up getting tired of the game like many other idle games.

I really enjoyed the game. The ads were a bit tedious and I completed before my desire to play ended. It was a bit frustrating that you only get 4 hotels and it doesn't celebrate when you reach 20/20 stars. When you add more hotels I will reinstall.
So far it's great. No real issues to speak of; except some minor lag. Controls are responsive, and menus are easy to navigate. And a major plus gems aren't terribly expensive.

Love the game but at The Blue Crystal Resort location, the restaurant is too under staff, the maximum is 12, it's just not enough. Please upgrade so we can add more staff to it. Also the Bar closes too early, it needs to close at least 2:00 a.m. Thank you

One issue that I have discovered while playing is that the ads are not working anymore. So I can get the double profit or the money from the game. So I cant play for a long period of time. The issue needs to be fix becuase it's a really fun game to play.

It's very addictive. Hope I didn't have to watch so many ads at the beginning to get money. Most ads are short so it's fine though. After you get a stable income you don't need them anymore. Also as you progress the ads give you more money so they are really helpful.

The game is not an "idle game" there is nothing earned when offline. Other hotels stop collecting money at 3k unless you go to visit them and just sit there while it operates. Was fun at first but once you get higher levels you basically have to keep the game running constantly to progress at all.

It's a little annoying to start out, but it gets really fun as you go along. I have a suggestion- could you make a bundle with all the upgrades so they can be bought at the same time? (Maybe it could even be discounted when you buy them together or during certain events?)

Generally a great time sink. All the ads are optional, you don't have to spend the almost $40 for the extra stuff to enjoy the game(not counting gems), but if you want to support the devs the option is there.

It is a nice game but after we have maxed out a hotel we should be allowed to use that money on our other hotels because starting from a peny Everytime is frustrating. And plus we have to watch too many ads to grow easily. Otherwise it's a good game.

Pretty slow in the beginning but gets addicting once you start making money. A suggestion for the game is to have a better upgrade menu or screen when updating. Updating and having to exit out to update the next room is very redundant.

Not a bad game. Just had a few glitchs where i lost out on money, the video wouldn't play and had to tap no thanks and lost out. I just wish you could pull money from the other hotels to help with the more expensive ones.

The game is interesting with micromanaging stuffs to keep you entertained enuff, and also it can run in background if you kinda busy. The animation top notch and i really like the differences that are shown each upgrade you make to the hotel.

Without the ads reward, it is very hard to survive the other day. This game really simulate the real life business, staff will leave if couldn't pay them, upgrade/expansion on the hotel require certain supports from investor, no marketing no customer, and most importantly the chart showing which department is loosing and earning. I'm simply amazed by all this, it is exactly like real life. Bravo.

Great game, although only at beginning of the game and have watched so far 100 ads all just to recieve money to buy things for the hotel. There must be another way of doing that without having to watch ads. Which is sole destroying.

Just another money hungry, ad pushing game. This games mechanics are designed to make progress impossible/extremely long without viewing a ton of ads or paying money. Or both. I'd rather just pay $10 one time and have an ad and microtransaction free game.

Cute game im enjoying it. I dropped it to 3 stars cuz ive noticed that when i let the hotels accumulate alot of money, i try to do an upgrade more tgan once on one object... And it acts like it needs to catch up. Other games similar to this, u hit upgrade and its immediate.

This game was pretty alright. Too short though, there's only four hotels and I got through without making any major transactions on this app. Ads are a little annoying but not unbearable, uninstalled after completing to save phone space.

Overall an ok game, I've just got my 2nd star on the 2nd hotel after a ton of ads from the investor and about 2 months of playing the game. The last few times I've opened the game, I haven't been able to play as no loading bar appeared which takes my rating down

Very pleased with the game! Simple and cute graphics, but so much to do! It's by far the best idle game I've played so far! I am especially amazed at the little details put into this game, and it fascinates me to watch the little guests do things!

Would love to interact with objects within the game other than upgrading a room or parking lot. It would be cool to click on the refrigerator in a room and the door opened or tap the sink and the water comes on. Maybe even being able to interact with some of the hotels guest. Other than that I love this game __.

I think the app has great value in it being an idle game. However when I do pick it up to play I wish there was more to interact with or perhaps ways for me to speed things up by maybe cleaning the room myself or serving a customer food.

This app is a pretty good game to waste time on. However, the double profits (the one where we're given chances to, well, double hotel profits for 2 hours) do not reflect on the balance whenever we open the game. Hope you can fix this.

Overall the game is really fun but just one advice for the developers. We should be able to transfer our profits from one hotel to another one. There's no point in maxing out a hotel if we can't use the profit generated from it to use it for another one.

Latest update is frustrating, the profit x2 button when you come back isn't working, the ads to increase your profits for 10 minutes aren't loading forcing you to close and restart the app multiple times. Really enjoy this game until I updated the app. PLEASE FIX!
Great game so far. Highly addicting, lots of options to watch adds which is a nice option to have. There is also an option to pay to get the perks of watching the adds without actually watching them.

This game is very good and addicting but, why do I need to use internet to play the game? I know you want to make me watch ads to get rewards but, apperently there are some things that doesn't require internet like making the hotel profitable and other things and can you make the missions not require wifi because, a lot games missions don't require wifi.maybe, add some achievements like getting 1000 dollers in 1 minuite. I hope this comment makes the game better,Thank you.
Great game concept and execution. Enjoying it so much. Advertisement is an option to look at as they do not implement direct auto-ad but rewards the player when he choose to do so. Win-win.

It freezes alot. And its now not paying out after watching the invester video. And it only pays out in the lobby about every 3rd time. And I hate that. Its hard to get enought money to do all the upgr.. Or to build because of it. I like the game in it self. Just not the stupidity of the pay outs not working right.

Very enjoyable game! Cute graphics and game play is fun. It was worth it to me to pay for the "ad eating dog" so I could just get money etc without watching ads. Four stars because the ads were annoying but it was optional to watch them so not bad.

I cant give you 5stars because the progress is so slow, if you didnt watch ads, you only earn small amount of money. So you MUST relly on the ads for fast progress. And the ads is just give you random amount of money and not much. And after 2days I play this, I found that ads is also have a limit. After reaching limit, your progress is slow again. I stop playing this...

Game is wonderful, however I've had a problem. When I am in the application playing the game, it's alright and all the residents are doing their activities. Then, when I close the application, I see that only 2 residents have gotten up after sleep, and start doing their activities, tho I had much more residents in my hotel before. That just ruines the game, as the progress just reloades. But except that, this game has a great potential.

In just two days i have unlocked four double bedrooms built a bar upgraded to almost max and built the batteries upgraded the generater to level 2 upgraded the front desk hire all the staff upraded the interior of the rooms just an simple upgrading and i am addicted to this game if you go on building you can see for amazing furniture and the dinning area is the best. When you're bored you can just play it and when i searched tycoon this was in the top second and saw the reveiws it were awesome.

The game is fun but.... you can only win or even enjoy this game if you watch the ads. Otherwise it's slow and you lose money and everything takes forever. You CANNOT make money and get forward in the came without the ads. I dislike this...that's not how you should make a game.

This is an amazing game! It's everything it claims to be in the adds. It's really fun and addictive! It's also not to hard which makes it alot more fun! It's really cool and I love it!!! However once you're at your third hotel, it starts to be almost impossible to get money.

The Klondike playable game ad breaks all ads when it shows up. It doesn't work, and then any clicks to watch ads for bonuses don't work until a game restart. Tried emailing devs and it bounced back. Please fix. Or remove this faulty ad.

It's awesome! The only thing, is that I had to watch ads to keep myself interested at the start. I still havnt reached the point where I can make enough profit to be happy without ads, but the ads give enough money that I can still play the game.

Normally i would do 5 stars but i have been waiting for a new hotel for a while and there hasn't been one. I hit the last one and i know i can do the events but they don't last long enough to be satisfying to even do. I really hope more hotels come out since i envested some actual physical money into it for no ads and a few other things.

Probably the best idle game from Codigames! I love the 'expense' aspect which become a consideration while upgrade things, unlike their other idle games which dont have 'expense'. Graphic and animation is really cool! Hope it will get updated regularly by adding more hotel.

This is a cute game. A bit repetitive and once you have a hotel maxed out it is basically left to make a pit of money that isn't usable anywhere else. Love everything else about this game, right down the different little dancing investors!
Gameplay is easily addicting, fun, and easy to grasp. Upgrading different aspects of each room is a very nice aspect of the game, seeing every upgrade take shape makes the game much more realistic!

This game is awesome, i could play it for hours! Sure, at the start the cash flow is a bit slow, but after like a day its great. They dont force you to watch ads, its only if u want rewards. But i just overall love this game, definately recomend getting it

This game is painfully slow and ridiculous expensive to make it even a little faster. It's kinda pathetic. $10.99 for no adds? $10.99 for a manager to make an "idle" game be able to make money for longer.. having a cap on away time earnings isn't even a true idle game. $5.49 for double earnings. Absolutely ridiculous. I could see paying maybe $10 for everything but not almost $30

There was an event game i played recently and won the permanent manager but did see it anywhere. Not even activated in managers list. Is this kind of bug or what because i'm really annoyed bu the fact of watching too much adds putting alot of time into it n gets nothing.

Fun game but very disappointed there are only a 6 or so maps to play. I bought a few of the paid features and now it's not even usable anymore since I completed the levels they have. Any plans to release new level maps for this game? If more levels - rating would had been a 5.

It's impossible to do anything in this game without watching a large number of ads. The "idle" part of the game only goes for a few hours without real money upgrades and it tops out very quickly. Would not recommend to download.

It takes a while to get into the game but besides that I love it. At the Blue Crystal Resort the showers are facing the wrong way, it's a minor problem and doesn't change how the game is played I just would like to see shower changes in rooms 107-114. I would highly recommend.

Probably one of the greatest Tycoons in a while! Graphics are good and the amount of ads are a good amount. It never gets boring and my hotel is thriving I love the amount of things you can do and there is no issues! Thank you

Made it to the second hotel, but even with every possible thing upgraded, and even spending gems on premium stuff for most if not all the rooms, they still didn't give me enough points to actually move on to the third effectively ending any possible way to play further. kinda lame.

I enjoy the game. It's basically watching ads to get money to upgrade your hotels. The only issue is the ads don't always give you the money after watching them. That almost makes it pointless to play.

The game is good but I've been having issues where the ads glitch out and its stuck on the video and I have to exit the app to do anything and the game goes back to a past save and it messes up my progress which is really frustrating.

I have completed this again and now have 25 stars and no more hotels to move onto. I have upgraded all and every hotel and can do no more... please ADD more hotels. Great fun game, especially when I have time to waste. I loved the last update with the ,Arabian resort. Was great to see new presidential suites very cool and lots more ! Took longer than the others but I was more determined. The game did glitch a little with soo many rooms and people they never slept lol kept walking round till morn

I personally like playing the game just to have a distraction in the day and it's a lot of fun. I only wish there were more hotels to purchase and upgrade as I've hit all 35 stars and now have nothing more to really do. Sure there's the events but they're just not as fun to me.

Uninstalled. Content is limited. Their last new content took 2 weeks to finish and then nothing new for a year. They have a weekly 4-day event that is the same everytime. They have abandoned updating this game. UPDATE: It looks like they sold out. Idle restaurant tycoon is the same style game as this, almost identical in play. I'd imagine they will no longer support this game anymore. It's a shame.

The game is great. The graphics could be alot better. You could make it where all the money you earnd can be used at all hotels. An plz if your gonna have a game like this. Plz make sure you make more than 3 hotels. Its really a waist of pplz money. N the only reasone i gave 2 stars. I cant watch an ads from the money man to get extra money. An i have had to uninstall the game twice

I feel that this game is really good! And very entertaining but there is just one problem. In the restaurant part of the hotel only two people can eat at once even though there are four other tables other guests can sit at. The guests get angry and I dont know what to do! This problem might be with only me but I don't know.

I love this game until three days ago when the videos and money man stopped working. I can use them once and then not again. Makes it hard to do the events when you can't use the x2 and money man. Wish they would fix it!

If you like watching ads in order to make progress in a game, this game is for you! Without watching ads, no progress is made...but wait 2 minutes and you can watch an ad and actually make money. 5 stars for an ad watching simulator, 1 star for an actual fun game to play.

I'm loving the game so far but I've noticed a small bug with the restaurant. There could be 2 tables completely un used and there would be 1 person waiting for a table but they would get frustrated and leave rather than sitting at 1 of the empty tables.

Great game! Plenty of ads to help progress without having to spend actual real life money. I just wish there was more levels, and more/new challenges and additions for past hotels as well as new levels!

It's fun but the finances guy, the video button always buffers and doesn't work. A lot of the times, the videos dont load for the investor guy, cab or automatic cleanup. Its really annoying. Please fix it!!

Good game but the last hotel was completely an afterthought and almost a replica of the first hotel it was dissapointing to level up to the last hotel only for it to be an extreme downgrade to the one before it. Also its extremely cluttered and looked like a mess when upgraded

It is an ok game. Limited in what you can do. Repetitive in each hotel. Fixed development structure. But reasonably fun at time. Plenty of waiting for money to roll in. Like many phone games there isn't any way to fail.

I like it but there needs to be a lot more added to it. The dude that comes zooming in, in his gold car to give you cash if you watch an ad, needs to offer more money. Or at least more money the longer and more you spend. And options to earn more free gems.
Great game. Addictive. Goals are achievable and it doesn't bombard you with ads. I happily watch the ads to get some extra cash and benefits that make the game progress at an enjoyable speed.
Very relaxing and fun! Don't have to spend either! Only for extra luxuries that you already can access through watching quick ads. This is nice as well to not be bombarded with ads either. Love it!

Good game fun and simple to play. Only one problem. I've had a few instances where I've purchased furnishings with crystals and it's been placeed in game but when reopen the a later its not longer there.

I have finished the last hotel in this, took me a few weeks and I played it during my lunch breaks and the odd bits when waiting or bored. Really enjoyed it. I would love there to be more hotels, so if you do make more, I'll reinstall it. Great game, very pleasing on the eyes and a great time killer.

Pretty slow starting but it's one of codigames most interesting idle tycoon games. The ad bonus tend to not work after one or two uses. I don't mind an occasional ad for a boost and probably wouldn't spend money on the +$10 bonus so that's unfortunate.

I really do enjoy the concept of this game but it's glitchy. Sometimes the ads don't work so I usually restart the app, which will bring them back, but then I have another problem. I will have all rooms booked when I close the app but open it right away and some of my rooms are empty. What's going on?

I have just found this game.two hours ago and I have not stopped playing since to get it started and set up. Yes it is annoying that at the beginning you need to keep watching an add to gain more money quicker but that is optional. So far I am enjoying the start.

Decent game design but you cant do anything without constant ad viewing. This whole game is basically more ads than actual game. not to mention some ads bug out, freezing the app, forcing you to reload the game.

It's an okay game, if you don't mind the glitches. Almost all the time, the game's power-ups won't work if you don't have AD free because if won't show the "watch AD" button. If you leave the game on a certain hotel, you won't earn any money.
Pretty good game! So far so good, it's not highly demanding with the ads and there are still other things I can do without the ads. Although, the money does accumulate kind of slow.

Pretty much impossible to get money early on without watching ads and money doesnt carry over between hotels so when you max one out it essentially becomes useless. Everything in the second hotel is significantly more expensive but the base rate of money earned is the same meaning you have to watch even more ads to get anywhere
Was going great until this upgrade. The hotel closes soon after logging out. The cumulative time of 2 hours of play doesn't work. Also, once out, the hotel runs only half full... Please fix this.

Having a lot of problems with the adds, they either don't play or they don't give rewards a lot of times and constantly seeing the yahoo add that has 5 adds in one gets old because half the time it glitches and I'm kicked out of the game without the reward.
Lots of ads. All optional but in order to get anywhere fast you have to watch ads. Very slow moving. Also they want $10 to get rid of ads. If 99¡é I would pay. But not for that price.

Edit: New hotel added. Am happy to be playing again. I've had to amend my rating from 5 starts to 3. Was really enjoying the game. Had absolutely no issues. Even paid for no ads and to keep hotels open as I was enjoying it so much. Then I find there's only 4 hotels and no further progression. Lots of similar reviews saying the same thing with no developer response. Hugely disappointed.

They really need to fix their ad system for tablets because it only now occasionally works and make events unplayable and I experienced a bug where a ad glitched out and I lost an hours worth of 2x money boost, but it was one of the few games that was an actual good time waster game.
Good enough. But slow progress, need to watch a lot of add of ads to save up some money __ Can't fast forward the night time because it's for sale. Only earn coins when upgrades cost thousands.

It is indeed a tycoon game. You are building your hotel empire. The game can't get any better. It has so many options to choose to offer for your clients. Keeps you engaging and interested. Good work by the team for putting this game together.
Took a bit longer to warm up to it... But now I love it! Give it a longer chance than you think. Lots of ads, but all purposeful, and the opt-out costs are reasonable if you want to spend real money.

I love this game, I agree with people saying the money for each hotel should be combined, but it would make starting a new hotel very easy. I can't wait for more hotels to be added! It's a slow game for sure but if you watch the ads, they're well worth it.
I love the idle games _ when I found out that there was a hotel edition I had to get it. The graphics are cute & fun. I highly recommend this game especially for beginners of the idle range of games.

Fun game up to I reached the 3rd hotel The rooms, the check in & dining are all different areas not contacted to each other except by the outside The worst part of this game is you can't carry over funds from one hotel to another. The ads after you fishing watching & click the x to close the ad & to get your reward instead of closing it will send you to the play store Then when you click back to the game and to get the bonus You don't receive it because the game has restarted

Would be better if the ads worked. I might be able to watch a couple before they stop working. Only thing that'll work is the instant sunrise. Also need more hotel choices. I'm at the Christmas one and don't see any more
Addictive, a balance of fun and challenge! Downloaded it only 2 days ago, but can't help checking it throughout the day. It's fun, while providing a bit of a challenge.

Fun so far, just started to play a few hours ago. I like that it's not a time management game. You can play for a few minutes then put it away. Plenty of opportunities to make cash by watching a video. If I'm successful and have a lot of money, the ads might get annoying. But for now, they're great.

I previously gave this game three stars because although I love it it had been stuck on the loading screen for a couple of days. they fixed the issue pretty quick and I was able to start playing again last night so all is well.

First of all i had to install it 3 times for it to be on my phone, second the tutorial was WAY too long and lastly when I'd tap the character that would give me money in the game it would load for a few seconds and then it would give me nothing and walk away. If I'd be able to give this a 0 star, I would. I am very unhappy about this game. Don't waste your time on installing this game. ______

I am very frustrated. I watch videos to get extra money for my hotel, and I only get the reward 1/4 of the time. I've lost out on about 50,000 gold in this game. I have sent 3 messages now with no response. PLEASE FIX THIS!!!!!

This game would have been great if it had allowed players to upgrade quickly at the lower levels. I have to wait and play fo a long time to vomplete a certain task. That just too boring if younhave to w as it for a long time

It was fun for a while but you cant get past the third hotel unless you spend money for more gems which is no fun after you put in all this time and watch all of those ads and they have A LOT OF ADS just to upgrade everything to not even get past the third hotel and I upgrade everything I possibly can without spending money

Great! It's smooth it's fun and it doesn't take long to get upgrades like other games I just wish there were more way to get gems because so far that I saw there's only tasks but you could have added a feature to watch ads for gems or something but I'm not that far and I haven't saw everything.
It's a really fun and addicting game. Only problem I have is IT WON'T LET ME WATCH ADS! That gets really annoying and I wish there were like minigames or something. Anyways 9/10 would recommend.

Would have given 5star but the buy-in features are tooo expensive. Was Will to buy if everything comes under current price. Edit: bought ad skip pack for $18 Found a major bug, on hotel 3, if you get room capacity above 30 then the guest routine messes up and they start to have dinner at 2am __ and at that time the restaurant is closed. Developer need to fix this ASAP

The only way to upgrade your stuff and build ur Hotel is watching ads all the time. The ads dont pop up that's good but Click on a character in the game to watch ads to get your self money. It's hard to upgrade without watching ads.

There are only 6 main hotels. When you get to the last one there is a glitch with Suite 202. The safe can only be leveled up to 3. The other suites the safe goes to level 4. You cannot achieve the 5th star because of this.

I'm not into idle games, yet this game keeps me entertained a lot. For some reason the graphics are so bland, that it makes it funner. I love watching the little people walk about the hotel. And its balanced in expenses and profits.

This game is amazing, but theres just one thing missing which is being able to transfer money from one hotel to another. Its pretty dumb to have a different bank for each hotel so id really appreciate if you would add that feature in the next update

Pretty good, but game is a little aggressive about spending money. Not as bad as say Candy Crush, but it's there. Do appreciate the no-ads option though. I understand games cost money to make, so I usually buy that to chip in for the developers.

How to mute all the sounds from each ads? I have been trying to listen to music from other apps but everytime i play this game and everytime an advertisement comes up, the song i have been listening to automatically stops. On the next update please do have an option for muting all the ads.

Wish I could zoom in more on the graphics, was hoping the to selections to have more furnitures at least to increase the exciting part. Overall it is fun to play side the graphics where you can't see their expression.

I work in hotel. This game is really following the proper time per employee to serve a guest, a room, etc The gameplay is very easy with a short but right enough tutorial. The ads can sure be annoying but if u did as me by removing them (the dog is cute no?) you can really fully enjoyed the game without waiting.

I thoroughly enjoy this game the aspect of having to account for expenses makes it more realistic. However I think it would be better if the night skip option was available when reception closed and if the bar was open until 2 am

Pretty fun game to keep occupied for a couple of hours. I just wish you could take the profits from one hotel and move it to another. I completed all the upgrades for one and now just have money growing with nothing to spend it on.

Mildly Fun so far. I dont think I'll be paying for anything but if I did it would be to get rid of ads. $10.99 though? Come on guys... Still playing off and on, at the Arabian nights hotel. Not much to it just collect money and do the same upgrades.

I used to really like this game but it's now pissing me off. 2 nights ago I was trying to purchase the VIP pass for this week's event hotel. It didn't work and I still don't have the pass. Whatever, so long as it didn't charge my card. It did though. Twice. So now I've paid about $20 for an item I never got. The refund process seems impossible. I never got a Google receipt and yet, I need it in order to get a refund. I don't want the item at this point I just want my money back.

absolutely trash, it's a pay to win game played it for 20 mins and can't believe such money hungry scummy developers exist. Honestly , every 20 seconds it wants me to click on an add , when I click on it, my screen completely blanks out. Progress is very very slow without playing money please don't waste your time on this__

Fun to play. Could use a few fixes like chefs and bartenders should be able to serve 4 instead of 2 and people should move maybe double speed. Finding in higher level hotels the staff cant keep up with guests or housecleaning even at full staff

The game is really good and teaches a good aspect of management... But you could add a few details such as making a indoor pond or making a small artificial river... And some other extra features like that.

Enjoted playing for a day. Once you are in the second level and wgile playing event there seems to be problem with the ad. Sometimes not able to play the ad and most of the times rewards not credited.

Had a slight issue at first, but I was unaware the game was still in testing phase, so it's completely understandable. Issue has been fixed. The game is excellent and still growing, looking forward to more updates and game play!

Its a really solid mobile game underneath several layers of microtransactions. It looks really nice and plays pretty well with only minor lag. Theres so many ads everywhere though, and constant reminders on ways you can spend your money.
An awesome game! I just love it! I think there should be more options for expansion within the hotel itself - I.e. you decide the theme, and layout. Otherwise this game is perfect!
It's a cool game, but its unfortunately very advertisement heavy. I like the concept and it's a good way to pass the time, but I think I spend more time watching ads than I do playing it :/

Great app, it gives you many choices to earn money. The only thing I would change is that they should lower the prices of add stoppers, it is a bit high. I would buy it if it wasn't so expensive. Otherwise I love this app, it helps time pass by.

Overall pretty good. I sometimes have trouble with the advertisement rewards but usually closing and opening it will work. Though sometimes customers will disappear when I do that. So a few bugs but overall enjoyable

I like playing this game. But so many things to complain about it. Once a hotel is upgraded completely then why do we need to back there when there is nothing to do. And why can't we transfer money to new hotel. This is really disgusting. You people should understand this. Once hotel is completed what we're gonna do with that money. You should give option to transfer that to new hotel at least after that hotel is compltd with 5 star. Please do something about this. This change is highly rcmnded.

It's fun I like it. Now when I watch videos to double the money I earned, when you first open the app, half the time I can't watch the video or I do t get my money. I've watched the videos with the little guy and I don't always get the money. Other than that 5*. I'll change it when the bugs are fixed

I got the 1st and 3rd hotels to 5 stars but the 2nd one "the stanley resort" will not go to 5 stars with EVERYTHING fully upgraded. I can not progress due to this. This game would get a 5 star rating if not for this. Edit- I had to scroll to see the restaurant decor was at 0. I am changing this to 5 star. It is very easy to miss something.

Really good... only suggestion i can think of would be maybe random videos for time rewards, such as faster service for a minute or two or faster customer walking for a minute or two or something along those lines. Otherwise no complaints.

Enjoying the game! It is a great way to pass the time, and honestly, I enjoy the game. However, I have been noticing a severe math error in the game. I always watch the video for DOUBLE profits when I start up the game. However, the total for what should be DOUBLE profits and what I have saved up is always coming up super short. Basically, I am not getting the DOUBLE profit. If I watch a video for DOUBLE on 32,000 profit then that should be 64,000 profit not just 32,000.

Tbh the game is really good! I just have one suggestion and it is that, once you're completely maxed out on one hotel... It's pointless to keep its money there so there should be a system to transfer your money to the bank account of other hotels you own. Thank you!

I liked the game but everything cost so much money! And not the money in the game but the money in real life. It was a great game overall but id prefer it to to less be based around having to spend money for perks. Like i get it but why not money in the GAME and not irl(in real life). Like to run it for 10 hours you have to give tgem like 10,000 dolkars and pay them 909 dollars every day. Just saying. The real world is all about money these days.

The game is good and it's concept is also good but, the 2X investment part is really annoying. No Ads, No Money, everytime I click nothing happens even No attachment and saved progress in Google Play Store itself! What the Ultimate Rules? Here the game itself loose balance. Please Fix it for future Ratings.

This game is good but we don't have much money and we have to upgrade all room which take much time there are many rooms to upgrade and money is less and we have to tap one by one to upgrade any item if we tap more than two times it hangs and takes time so please fix this bug so if we will tap twice it should quickly get upgraded

Gameplay wise, it plays smoothly. But after finishing the tutorial, I left the game as is and did not buy or hire anything or anyone (except the chef from the tutorial). I came back and I had a negative daily balance, and the chef resigned. What the hell is wrong with this game? I already created a new account to start a new game, but I got hit with this BS. Now I can't even buy anything or progress because of losing money from the employees wages.

Great game.... Cool graphics and also a great experience while playing, that golden king helped me a lot while developing the hotels....for the third hotel it kinda gets boring coz the prices to buy the rooms and other things are high and income gets low due to timings of the facilities...in and all i really liked the game till the third hotel.

Great game, good time consumer. Love getting all the little add ons for my hotels and seeing them grow and develop. Bit disappointed that the money you earn isn't transferable between hotels, which means once you've reached 5 stars for that hotel, there's zero point in visiting it and the later hotels take forever to build up - only managing to upgrade a single item/ room at a time. Please rethink this part and give us opportunity to use the money our hotels make us in other hotels. __

Decent time killer. The fifth star is held up as I have never had more trouble watching ads. Every so often the ads become disabled requiring me to uninstall and reinstall to re-allow ads. Silly problem as that's how they make their money.

Need more hotels. This having 2 new hotels in a year and thats it is a little ridiculous. You can literally only play for so long. Once the hotel is done you have to wait years before they add another, yes there are bonus things but those are very short.

I started the game yesterday and accidentally swiped my phone, leading to the game choosing to proceed with me getting 3x profit, spending 30 gems... I really didn't want this since my hotel hadn't earned that much... So, I would like to suggest that you guys add a warning before this option becomes valid: "Are you sure that you want to spend 30 gems to recieved 3x profit?" All in all, this game is a great piece of work! Have a great new year! Regards

Its a good game... But the bigger the place, the longer the customer will take to get to their destination, the gap between the rooms to the restaurant takes about 2-3 hours (in-game time), by the time they get to the restaurant the chef will leave the restaurant, making the customer cannot eat, the chef and bartender will take longer to get their work, even checking out the hotel takes a long time, ended up in the afternoon and nearly night time of getting new customers... Its wasting money...

the events are worthless...not enough time or startup money to even bother. and it would be better if you could take a percentage of competed hotels to the new ones(like you would in real life) to help get started besides that tiny 50k and the measly $300 for watching adds. I wouldn't mi d the adds so much if they were worth it. are there going to be more hotels besides this handful? I'm on the last one. other than that, I find this a nice little time killing game.

I played for 24 hours. I really thought it was going to be a good game. I could watch ads to speed up some things and get some cash. But then the ad stopped coming and I couldn't make any more money. Try clearing my phone and it didn't work. Really like the game up until this point. Uninstalling now though....
Great game to play, however completed all hotels and there hasn't been any new levels in 18 months

Don't waste your time. The first two hotels are great. You watch videos to get money and a man comes where you watch a video and he gives you sums of money, but as you move onto other hotels the costs of rooms, facilities, etc are absolutely stupid. You are looking at 14,000,000 the cost of a room in hotel number 5 and you only start off with one room as an oppose to the others with 5. It's impossible to make money. It clearly wants you to buy money as time goes on and I'm not prepared to.

It is a good game I have been trying to beat the game I'm almost done and it was fun to play the game and it's a cool game 5stars and it's upgrades make the game better so thanks for the games codigames

Really good timewaister, but it has the probably all tycoons have, not being able to do much while waiting for the money to roll in. It gets boring to just sit there and wait, so I go out the game. But if you wait long enough the game will start to cut your earnings! Not like a week or a month, anything more than 2 days! It's absolutely baffling! So I deleted it.

I would recommend having that in the game so other people can have a good time with the money and not just waste it in the other hotel. But , overall it was a pretty good experience.

it's pretty fun, it's not like other games wher it's so easily to level stuff up. And you have to manage your budget which makes you more interested. The game isn't that hard to play aswell.

Waiting for new hotels __ I absolutely love this game. Love the planning of expansions, the graphics and appreciate the expertise of the developers. Really surprised about the negative comments. I enjoyed it so much that I paid to get rid of the ads and then the game was perfect. Thank you so much. Can't wait for more.

Great game. Guests are charged by the hour, so it's super convenient that it takes them an hour to even walk up stairs to their room to put away luggage! Sweet! Not to mention another hour to get to the restaurant! The room service does a wonderful job by ONLY cleaning the bathrooms WHILE the guests are showering! realistic! And it's comforting knowing the profits from the finished hotel cannot be transfered over, only kept safely in the accounts of the Trump's or Hilton's. Great concept. Thx!

I used to like it but now I reinstalled it to play again after not playing it for months and I can't watch any videos hardly for the 2 hr. Increase, and the dude that comes in with videos for money I'm having the same problem. Sucks!!!!

Really annoying, I had to wipe my phone. Would think signing in with Google would save progress and be able restore. But I've got to final level twice now and had to start from the beginning.

Very fun ____ idle game I enjoy it and I honk everybody else will too I rate it 5 stars because it has no problems and has very good graphics for a idle and good controls that are simple and easy as well as the gameplay it enjoyable and you can make money pretty quick I'm unlock new hotels overall it a good game!!

This was so fun. I wish there were more hotels to upgrade and idle through. The cute little animations of all the npcs are amazing and the graphics are nice. Its fun to just stare at for a few moments.

It's a good challenge due to wages but it's loads of fun and it passes the time really well . The game only has ads when you want them it's really smooth and not laggy I fully recommend it to people who like a little challenge

Pretty fun. If your okay watching ads all day in order to get money quicker. Wish they can do more when the game from hotels and resorts. And transfer the money you made from the other hotels. Overall it's great

It's a pretty good game not bad at all really. Very low on the pay to advance area most of it's just extra fluff so you can kind of play it take a break come back and still enjoy the same experience.

This is a really fun game, but it takes a long time to earn money. It can almost the game by itself. The ads are not bad, the only time an ad pops up is if you watch an ad to earn something. Overall this is a good game and I would give four stars if it were easier to earn money

It is very fun to do. It is very realistic like a real hotel will like paying staff and more. It may be glittery, it depends but it is my fav. I love the man who gives me free money if I watch ads. Thank to the creators for this game.

Fun to play, don't have to buy anything to get stuff done and if you want to buy things it's reasonably priced. That said, there's only two hotels and I completed them both in a day. Add more hotels or more upgrades pls.

Ad-Watching (plus gameplay). Optimal free play: Every two hours, log in; watch an ad to double profits from the last two hours. Watch 12 ads to double profits for the next two hours. Watch 3-4 more ads. Maybe if I hadn't slept I could've won the lowest level of the event for a small permanent boost. You could buy full games on Steam or Big Fish Games for the cost of one or two amenities here. Can a free player even reach third hotel? You can't get five stars w/o paying cash, and it wants nine.

The game is good, but I often don't get the money even after watching the ads. Please fix this issue and I will give the game a five star rating. Otherwise the game is really very good and the game locations and features are also amazing

I use to love this game. I have spent a lot of money on this game and others from this developer and quite frankly if I could... I'd ask for a refund. These events in all their games is a money ploy. Spend 30 to get rewards. That you can't use anyways because they never roll out new hotels, or location as to their other games. It's the same.. I've been waiting over 6 months for a new hotel. Waste of money! Do not spend it here!

Not a bad game. It requires a bit of strategy to be able to stay out of the negatives, but pretty easy to pick up and play. My only complaint is that the prices for things like VIP and Ad-Free are, in my opinion, too high.

content: Play inside the huge museum and visit the various exhibitions The fun never ends at the My Town : Museum! Take the taxi and stop by the front desk to pick up your tickets so you can visit our 5 themed exhibits. The museum is huge! You can awaken the ancient mummies in our Egyptian exhibit, dig for dinosaur fossils in Prehistoric Times, go on a spaceship ride to outer space or even ride a horse and compete in a jousting tournament! The My Town : Museum combines fun and education. In each exhibi
